name: Cozy & Colorful by Nature (Private Room)
description:
Up in the hill of Montjuïc (a mountain overlooking the city where Jewish people were forced to retire when they were thrown out of town), only 10 minutes by bus from Girona's beautiful Old Town.

Private oom with private bathroom and garden just for you! You also have a wood house in the garden where to store your bike and other sports equipment.

The space
YOU'LL HAVE ONE PRIVATE ROOM WITH A PRIVATE BATHROOM AND GARDEN JUST FOR YOUR USE - IT'S A SHARED APARTMENT, MEANING YOU'RE NOT RENTING THE FULL PROPERTY. WE LIVE HERE, TOO ;)

Cozy, Sunny & colorful apartment with a refreshing garden facing east where to chill out in the hot summer nights.

You will have a private room with a direct and exclusive access to the garden. It has a new very comfy bed (135cm) and you will have your own bathroom.

There is a closet in the room.

The apartment is in a lovely suburb area 2' walk to the entrance of a Natural Park with g
neighborhood_overview: Montjuïc is most likely the best neighborhood in Girona. We are up in a hill, only 15-20 minutes to the center of the city, and surrounded by Nature. it is very safe and quiet.
host_about:
It's hard to define oneself in such a narrow space. I think we people are really complex material. But since I guess it's good I say a bit, I would define myself as someone fascinated about living and getting to know both this planet and its inhabitants. I'm interested in serving people, especially, but not exclusively, my friends. I enjoy good food and if possible better company. My interests are broad and go from traveling, literature, creative writing, philosophy and body "care" to Buddhism.  I'm pushful, curious, a bit narcissist maybe, hahaha, and I guess I tend to dream pies in the sky far too often.

I am original Catalan, from lovely Girona - Costa Brava but I've lived abroad for many long periods: Miami, Dubai, Bali and Melbourne (Australia). My live partner is a lovely aussie-greek Personal Trainer named Stelios and, together we travel the world, when not working.

I like outdoors sports and I am addicted to mountain biking. I also like snowboarding, climbing, hiking, swimming ...; I also do some mat work like yoga and Pilates (of which I am a certified Instructor). 

I read a lot, books facinate me!!

I like to go out eating with my friends from time to time, although I am most of a day-creature and at night I like my sleep. I practice ioga and meditation and have a second level on Reiki. I'm a flexitarian (meaning I eat fish but not meat) by moral reasons and I enjoy a lot good food, if possible made with organic products. Music, all kind of music - depending on the moment - is very important to me; couldn't live without it. But my main and huge passion is travelling and meeting new people, travellers like me, or locals, and learn about them and their experiences in life. 

After many yearts working for others, I am now running my my own company. It's a fresh project dedicated to giving marketing and creativity services & solutions to other companies. I am also a teacher at the University of Girona, where I teach at the Faculties of Tourism and Economics and I run an international women's project named "Grace of No Age", devoted to mature women.

I am pretty busy however I don't complain, as I do what I like.

name: Beachfront Tamariua (Costa Brava)
description:
A little paradise by the sea. Apartment 2/4 adults charming, bright and magnificent views of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus. Comfortable and tasteful. Splendid views. Located in the charming village of El Port de la Selva. Very near the beach.
HUTG 003688

The space
TAMARIUA a small paradise from the sea. Ideal couples. Apartment for 2 / 4 adults with plenty of charm, bright and with magnificent views of the Parc Natural Cap de Creus.
Apartment is located outside the village on a small hill in the middle of nature and the sea, 250 meters from central PORT DE LA SELVA, a small authentic village of fishermen, 20kms from France and 30km from Figueres.
Quiet and sunny with magnificent panoramic views over the sea and Pyrenees mountains. Just 3 minutes walk from the sandy beach of Cala Tamariua naturist, on the road to Cap de Creus. Good weather from April to October.

Comfortable and tasteful. It consists of a living room / dining room wi
neighborhood_overview: Apartment located outside the town on a small hill in the middle of nature and next to the sea, 250m from the center of the PORT DE LA SELVA, a small authentic fishing village. Quiet and sunny with magnificent panoramic views over the sea and the Pyrenees. Only 3 minutes walk from the Cala Tamariua sand naturist beach, on the road to Cap de Creus, and 50m from a small cove suitable for bathing and diving. Very close to the Nautical Port and the School. Shops, supermarkets, restaurants at 200 m.

name: CAN FELIP - Ático loft del s.XVIII
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d
host_about:
Como representantes de una pequeña empresa familiar que se dedica a la restauración de Casas y Apartamentos nos complace mucho integrarnos en la comunidad Airbnb para poderos ofrecer nuestras viviendas, que esperamos sean el futuro de magníficas experiencias para nuestros invitados...

------------------

As partners of a small family business dedicated to the restoration of properties, we are delighted to become Airbnb members to offer our Houses and Apartments, which we hope will be the future of great experiences for our guests...

The house has a modern decor. The interior is bright and has an authentic feel. You will find the pool in front of the house. At your disposal a stone barbecue.
This home is the perfect place to enjoy the sun and stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Costa Brava.

It also has magnificent views of the castle at one end and the other the monument to "La Dona Marinera" which represents the suffering of women waiting for the return of their fishermen husbands.

name: 18th C Stone House near Costa Brava
description:
Casa Fluvia is a charming stone village house in a Catalan village on the Costa Brava just 5 km from the sea. A perfect base close to the beach to enjoy culture, cuisine, history, nature, and sports . Spacious house suitable for up to 8 people.

If your stay is less than 1 week, please request a price. It is difficult to cover all eventualities and lengths of stay with the automatic system. In July and August bookings run from Saturday to Saturday-

Tourist Registration Ref: HUTG 000207

The space
CASA FLUVIÀ IS A 18TH CENTURY STONE VILLAGE HOUSE WITH 3 DOUBLE BEDROOMS AND 1 TWIN BEDROOM.

- rooftop terrace and solarium
- first floor living area 30s Catalan style
- ground floor living area typical of 18th century stone farmhouse

The house is within 5 km of some of the best Costa Brava beaches, set in a quiet Mediterranean village in the Empordà with views of the Pyrenees, surrounding fields and neighbours wor
neighborhood_overview:
Torroella de Fluviá is a small peaceful rural village located a short drive from the beach (about 4 km). The immensely long beach of Sant Pere is famous for its beauty and (in designated areas) as a wind surfing, surfing, and kite surfing venue.

Sant Marti de Empuries offers a series of more protected coves adjacent to the Roman ruins of Empuries and the picturesque hamlet of Sant Marti.

Our house is a minute's walk from a great local shop. Fresh bread and newspapers in the morning, good local produce (including organic products) and most essential items. A village bar/restaurant in the town square offers great lunch options and small plates at all times. Or you can sit in the sun while the kids play safely.

The neighbouring village of Sant Pere Pescador offers a good range of shops including a largish supermarket. There are also restaurants for every pocket and taste in Sant Pere. See our guide book for some favourites.

Roads through the f
host_about: We have both been living in Barcelona for over 30 years and we met here in our adopted home. Girona and the Empordà are part of the attraction for us and we were very happy to be able to buy our beautiful village house in 2003. We are keen cyclists and get in some Touring every year in Ireland, France, and Spain. Our other passions are wine and food and having a place near the French border has allowed us to get to know the wonders of the wines of the south of France (Languedoc Rousillon). We like to travel simply so Airbnb is a perfect solution and we have been hosting on Airbnb and elsewhere for over 10 years with great results, meeting interesting people for all over the world.

description:
ALMADRAVASOL·COM
Outstanding sea view terraced house with air conditionning and wifi

The space
ALMADRAVASOL·COM
- First floor: Living room, kitchen, 5m2 rear garden, lavatory with shower (access from rear garden), and 15m2 front terrace with a marvelous views to a sandy beach.
- Second floor: 1 bedroom with a bunch bed + sofa bed & 5m2 sea view terrace, 1 room with one big bed & 4m2 terrace looking to the rear garden, 1 complete bathroom.
- Air conditioning in all rooms
- Free wifi

Other things to note
SURROUNDINGS:
Roses town (5km from the house):
- Animated touristic town with a attractive pedestrian center
- plenty of restaurants and small fancy shops.
- Touristic boat trips and renting.
- Nautic Sports, specially for windsurfing and sailing.

Cadaques (20 km from the house):
- Famous picturesque fishing village.
- Painter Dali's hometown (Portlligat)
- Cultura
neighborhood_overview:
RESIDENTIAL AREA:
- The house is located in a select residential area around a sandy beach
- 5 km away from the town of Roses
- South-east orientation: sunny terrace during all the day!
- Located at the border of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus.
- There is no car road in front of this beach, so it is specially quiet. The beach parking lot is 100m from the shore. You can also reach the beach by walking from the house (10 min. going down, and 20 min. when returning back).
- Safe area and quiet roads where children can play safely.
- Charming neighbors, most of them coming from France.

name: Begur, house w/garden & pool, view to sea & castle
description:
200sqm house with garage, private garden and shared pool.
5 mn walking from Begur centre and some 3 kms from the various beaches and calas. Gorgeous views to the Medes islands and Castle from everywhere in the house. At the entrance level, a very nice suite with its private bathroom, and 2 large doublerooms with 2nd bathroom with same views. At the garden level, large livingroom with bar and its 28sqm porch. Opened kitchen with cellar. Guests toilets.

The space
Our house is perfect for relaxing and enjoying Begur Cape, its landscapes and varied activities (beaches, walks, cultural patrimony, nautic sports, golf...). Views over the sea, the Medes islands, as well as over the Begur village and its Castle are beautiful , and invite to relaxation while keeping you connected to these exceptionnal surroundings.

Guest access
We rent the entire house, except a closed zone at the ground floor not included in the above description.
The swi
neighborhood_overview:
Close to Begur you'll be free to choose between the long Pals sand beach and the many beaches and calas of the Begur Cape (Sa Riera, SaTuna, Fornells, Aiguablava, ...) which are amongst the most beautiful of the Costa Brava. We recommend as well to explore the pathways that link them.
Diving (various marine reserves), nautic sports, tennis and various golf courses (one PGA) are available close by.
Gastronomy quality of the area is well known, and you'll find a large variety of restaurants in Begur and its surroundings.

name: Luxurious Villa in La Costa Brava
description:
The space
Located in the heart of S'Agaró and annexed to one of the most exclusive area in La Costa Brava: La Gavina. It combines the tranquility of a residential area with the proximity to a very fashionable center of leisure in the Coast of Gerona (Playa de Aro).

With spacious rooms and a warm inviting decor, the Mas Sais Villa stands out for its 3 Suites with individual bathroom totally new for the best comfort of its guests. It has a large kitchen fully equipped Mediterranean style that binds to a nice, bright dining room and meeting place to share. It also has a spacious lounge with two areas and a large fireplace ready to use.

The private garden consists of a beautiful travertine pool with night lighting where you could cool off. Also a hammock hanging between two trees shade on a blanket of lawn for romantics. Certainly its unique marble porch with comfortable wicker sofas will make guests enjoy the wonders of the Costa Brava.

description:
Nice apartment with saltwater community swimming pool, terrace, very well equipped and very comfortable.
Perfectly located, just 1 minute away from the beach, supermarkets, restaurants and more. Privileged for being in a quiet street where nightlife noises won’t be a problem.

The space
Apartment with 1 bedroom, bathroom with shower, washing machine, kitchen, living room with a little terrace equipped to enjoy meals outdoors.
Very comfortable bed in the master bedroom with fan.
In the livingroom there is AC, with thanks to its orientation, helps keep a perfect temperature in the hole apartment.
Smart TV (curved screen) and safe.
It has a private parking lot, 5 minutes walking from the apartment.
There is room for 4 people, with the following distribution:

Common area with swimming pool on the rooftop. Exclusive use for the peo
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a centric area but at the same time, quiet and nearby everything.
The beach is just a minute away, just like supermarkets and restaurants.
Walking 3 minutes you will find the commercial street with a big supermarket, great shops where you can find fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and more.
Just 5 minutes away, it’s the old part of town, the walled city of “Vila Vella”. A realy beautiful place.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the ru
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Ecofriendly getaways in Costa Brava
description:
LA CASETA is an ideal combination for an enjoyable holiday, especially for those who love nature, organic food and bio-architecture.

The space
"LA CASETA ECOLÓGICA" has one bedroom with double bed, kitchen/living/dining room, bathroom with shower and a sofa-bed (2+1 people).
La Caseta is located along la CASA DE FANG which means the house of clay in Catalan. Clay is one of the basic materials we used to construct the walls, in the traditional "tapial" style used by the ancient iberians of this area. I live here together with Lluís Auquer who is an architect, specialized in the construction and restoration of old houses. Our house is a haven for lovers of "bio-architecture and is not for everyone.

We are located in Rupià, a quaint medieval town, 12km away from the coast and the hustle and bustle. Our house is located within 7000m2 of land, consisting of the local cork tree. We grow our own fruits and vegetables in our organic garden. From the house
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hola! Soy Mercè, profesora de danza creativa para niños y barcelonesa de nacimiento, aunque llevo ya treinta años viviendo en el campo, a 12 km de la Costa Brava.
Me hará mucha ilusión ofrecerte mi maravillosa eco-casa en la que podrás disfrutar de unos días de absoluta sensualidad: espacio, luz y agua. Percibirás la naturaleza y el paisaje al tiempo que cocinas, comes o descansas. Me gustará ayudarte a conocer la zona del Baix Empordà, sembrada de pequeños pueblos medievales, y a escoger las mejores playas y calas de la Costa Brava.

Hi! My name is Mercè, I'm a teacher of creative dance for kids, born in Barcelona although I've been living in the countryside for the last thirty years, near the "Costa Brava". I'm very happy to offer my wonderful eco-house where you will be able to enjoy some days of absolute sensuality: space, light and water. You'll perceive nature and landscape while you cook, eat or just take rest. I'll be pleased to show you the surrounding area (Baix Empordà) which is spotted with small middle-age towns, and to recommend the best beaches and small bays of the "Costa Brava".

host_about:
Me gusta viajar y esta es una muy buena opción de compartir experiencias a un precio mas asequible que ir de hotel y mucho mas interesante.
Deseo dar el trato que a mi me gustaria recibir si fuera a la inversa y fuese yo la que ocupara vuestro hogar ,así como deseo que cuiden de mi hogar y  sus cosas como les gustaria que lo hicieran en el suyo propio. Es como la película de Cameron Díaz " The Holiday " ! 
Tiene su magia ir a otro país u comunidad autónoma y vivir por unos días en un lugar diferente como si fuera tu propia casa ;.)
Así que mi madre y yo hemos decidido alquilar nuestra segunda residencia ! 
Os esperamos ! 

I like to travel and this is a very good option to share experiences at a more affordable hotel to go and much more interesting.
I would like the deal that I would like to receive if they were reversed and I was the one to occupy your home as well as desire to take care of my home and things like they would like to do so on his own. It's like Cameron Diaz movie "The Holiday"!
Does your magic go to another country or autonomous community and live for a few days in a different place like your own house.)

name: La torre del Capricorno: 150m2, Sea-& Mountainview
description:
Auf der Spitze des Berges in Massos de Pals lädt "La torre del Capricorno" mit einem (fast) rundum Blick von den Pyreneen über das Tal bis hin zum Meer schlichtweg zum Träumen und entspannen ein. Die einzigartige Lage wird Autoren inspirieren, Paaren Zweisamkeit bieten und Familien entspannen.

License number
HUTG-025420
neighborhood_overview: Mit dem Auto gelangt man innerhalb von 5 Minuten zum Supermarkt Jodofi (mit separater Frischfisch Theke) und in 10 Minuten zum Playa de Pals. Die Altstadt Pals bietet als einer der ältesten mitteralterlichen Orte eine Vielzahl von Boutiquen und Restaurants an. Den wohl besten Cortado und die besten Crépes gibt es im "Dino" gleich gegenüber vom Rathaus im Altstadtkern.
host_about:
Seit mehr als zwei Jahrzehnten bin ich schon als Kind in Pals und der Costa Brava unterwegs gewesen. Nun haben wir als Familie dort unser Domizil und freuen uns über jeden Gast, der diesen zauberhaften Ort mit seinen wudnerbaren Menschen genau so ins Herz schliesst wie wir das bereits getan haben.

Wir sind im schönen Seligenstadt (Hessen) ansässig und vermieten auch dort ein Ferienhaus, direkt gegenüber der Basilika.

description:
Hiking, biking or enjoy culture on the Costa Brava with host family.
Everything you need for an unforgettable holiday: varied walks or bike rides, detailed city walks, with or without guidance.

The space
My wife and I regularly go to our apartment in Ampuriabrava, known as the Venice of Spain on the Costa Brava. As avid hiking, cycling and culture lovers we have collected an enormous amount of information on the Costa Brava: detailed town walks, informative guides about museums and especially some 130 walks and a number of cycling trips. We have discovered over the years that the Costa Brava has much more to offer than beach and sun. That's why we started the formula host family to explore this unprecedented Spain at an affordable price.

Guest access
Common areas are the bathroom with toilet and living room.
In the bedroom are washing facilities (a sink) present.

Other things to note

host_about:
TULUM, MEXICO: PEARL WHITE BEACHES, CENOTES AND MAYA RUINS 

After my experiences with the rental of holiday homes in Bali, we have now started a new rental project in beautiful Tulum. My family is living in Cancun and obviously we know the region very well. Together we will do everything to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

If you are looking for a destination with pearly white beaches, azure blue sea, incredibly beautiful nature and culture and lots of fun? Tulum has it all. This ancient Maya city is just a bit further south than the famous Playa del Carmen in the province of Quitana Roo (next to Yucatan) in Mexico. 
A destination that you absolutely should not miss when you are traveling in the Riviera Maya

Tulum's most well-known attractions are its ruins, cenotes & water sports, (Snorkelling and Diving). We warmly welcome you to enjoy and discover this beautiful region and immerse yourself in the relaxed atmosphere of Tulum ....

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 1
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

description:
La CASA ANNA is an ideal combination for an enjoyable holiday, especially for those who love nature, organic food and bio-architecture.

The space
CASA ANNA is an apartament as fully immersed in the sun light as airy and fresh. Organised under two "catalan vaults" the space is divided in two areas. The first one has a big bedroom and fully equiped bathroom. The second one has a small kitchen and living room with a sofa bed. Free internet connection. The apartment has private entrance from a fresh patio with plants and lemon trees and access at a second garden with plants and small pond where to have breakfast and others meals. On request, it is possible to rent a second double bedroom attached to the apartment. It has its own bathroom and an exterior chill out area to relax.

host_about:
Hola! Soy Mercè, profesora de danza creativa para niños y barcelonesa de nacimiento, aunque llevo ya treinta años viviendo en el campo, a 12 km de la Costa Brava.
Me hará mucha ilusión ofrecerte mi maravillosa eco-casa en la que podrás disfrutar de unos días de absoluta sensualidad: espacio, luz y agua. Percibirás la naturaleza y el paisaje al tiempo que cocinas, comes o descansas. Me gustará ayudarte a conocer la zona del Baix Empordà, sembrada de pequeños pueblos medievales, y a escoger las mejores playas y calas de la Costa Brava.

Hi! My name is Mercè, I'm a teacher of creative dance for kids, born in Barcelona although I've been living in the countryside for the last thirty years, near the "Costa Brava". I'm very happy to offer my wonderful eco-house where you will be able to enjoy some days of absolute sensuality: space, light and water. You'll perceive nature and landscape while you cook, eat or just take rest. I'll be pleased to show you the surrounding area (Baix Empordà) which is spotted with small middle-age towns, and to recommend the best beaches and small bays of the "Costa Brava".

name: Modern design house close to Girona
description:
The space
Modern, cozy and design three-storey house in a typical Catalan town, perfect for families or for a group of friends. The house is about 200 square metres. It is situated in a green and very calm street at a 3min walk from the center of town. You can drive to Girona in a 15min, to the best beaches of Costa Brava in 25min, to France and the Pyrenées in 45min. Ryan Air's Girona airport is only at a 10min drive.

The house has a big garage and parking space, a front garden, a back garden where you can eat and have barbecues. On the ground floor you also find one of the bedrooms, the huge open-space living room (with plasma TV) and dining room, the design fully-equipped kitchen, a bathroom, and a fantastic veranda. On the first floor: two bedrooms, one bathroom, plus 100 sq meters terrace. Top floor: large open space with pull-out sofa.

Markets and grocery stores are only at a 3min walk to the center of the town. Plenty of hiking and bike riding

name: Medieval castle S.X - the tower apartment
description:
In the center of the Ripollès between rivers, valleys and mountains stands magnificently ancient castle Llaés (sX). A unique place of exceptional beauty, where there is absolute tranquility amidst lush nature.
The apartment is distributed from a distributor hall with an old well, which gives way to the whole, with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, dining room, living room and a kitchen equipped with a terrace with wonderful views of the immensity of nature.

The space
With over 1000 years of history, Llaés castle has been renovated to enjoy the accommodations in family and / or friends.
We do not offer anything extraordinary, since everything here is quite natural, we will invite you to the castle and its history, to know the corners of the surroundings, waterfalls, ancient house in caves, the uniqueness of the "Bufadors" forest...

Welcome!

Guest access
In ancient Tower of Homage we have enabled an apartment for 10 people, with 4
neighborhood_overview: In the town of Llaés we are 12 inhabitants, and what we like the most about our neighborhood, the tranquility and harmony that is breathed, the green of the mountains with the contrast of the electric blue of the sky. We love quiet afternoons where just looking up you see eagles, owls at dusk, butterflies, hares, moles, foxes, and countless more neighbors running around the neighborhood!
host_about:
Hello!
 We love the rural environment and the variety of activities offered: hiking, mountain biking, climbing, and a lot more.
We are fortunate to be able to receive people from all over the world in this small and incredible X century castle.
Always there, 24 hours 7 days a week, we ensure that our guests feel like royalty!
 We hope you have the best experience during your stay :) Marc & Ginny

Hola!
  Somos una pareja joven, amamos el entorno rural y la variedad de actividades que ofrece: senderismo, ciclismo de montaña, escalada y mucho más.
  ¡Somos afortunados de poder recibir personas de todo el mundo en este pequeño e increíble castillo del siglo X!
  Siempre allí, las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana, nos aseguramos de que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como la realeza.
  ¡Esperamos que tengas la mejor experiencia durante tu estancia! :) Marc y Ginny

description:
Country House in Rocabruna, Camprodon, Catalan Pyrenees. Quiet and lots of light. Incredible views of the Alta Garrotxa. Nature, landscapes and fresh air. Country house with absolute quietness, outdoor spaces, ideal for different types of activities: resting, sun, games, barbecues... And much more! We offer many indoor spaces. Our purpose is to look for comfort and quality respecting the environment and the characteristics of the old "Masia Catalana"

The space
The house has for your exclusive use, a living-dining room with fireplace, a kitchen and a toilet with shower on the ground floor. The kitchen is totally equipped (Cooking and eating utensils.
Appliances: Fridge-freezer, oven, microwave, toaster, blender, juicer, Italian coffee maker,washing machine). These spaces are complemented by 3 bedrooms (one room with a double bed, another with three single beds and a third with two single beds and a double sofa bed) and a bathroom on the ground floor.
W
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. The village of Rocabruna has two high quality restaurants, the Romanesque church of Sant Feliu de Rocabruna from the 12TH century and the ruins of Rocabruna Castle. It is also an ideal place for mountain routes, horseback riding, BTT, 4x4, trekking, trail-running or enjoy pleasant rural views and fantastic nature.
host_about: Soc l'espòs de la Concepció, propietaria dels allotjaments. description:
NUESTRA ACOGEDORA CASA ESTA DENTRO DEL PARQUE NATURAL DE LA ZONA VOLCANICA DE LA GARROTXA Y A CINCO MINUTOS DE OLOT. TIENE TRES HABITACIONES CON BAÑO EN SU INTERIOR, COCINA, UN AMPLIO SALON CON CHIMENEA Y BARBACOA EN EL JARDIN

The space
Caserío del siglo XIV reformado y totalmente equipado, situado en pleno Parque Natural de la zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa. Es uno de los lugares más bonitos del Parque, combina bosques, pastos y algunos caseríos aislados con chozas y muros de piedra seca de roca volcánica. En este paraje de múltiples leyendas es donde se originaron los primeros volcanes, ahora solo testimoniados por diferentes coladas de lava, ya enfriadas y superpuestas una encima de la otra, que configuran un relieve suave.
A cinco minutos del famoso Hayedo d’en Jordà, Volcán Santa Margarita, Volcán Croscat y la Ciudad de Olot.

name: Can Portell by 123ole: the Pink Box 2 pers
description:
The space
Bed & Breakfast 123ole, Can Portell” has both the sea and mountains on its doorstep, is not far from the vibrant town of Girona, and only half an hour’s drive from the airport. Not only is it easy to get to, but Can Portell caters to everyone’s needs.
The house is an old masia farm and dates from 1690. The main building is surrounded by a beautiful plot of land with a swimming pool, stables, trees that provide shade and an original, abandoned corral where we now keep our horses. The house comes complete with a truly unique décor, intriguing corridors, steps, rooms aplenty and a charming veranda – the perfect spot for a morning coffee, for reading the papers and for surveying the garden. This is where you will be served breakfast, and the occasional dinner if you so desire. The shady area underneath the veranda, furnished with loungers, offers cool relaxation.
Each season here has its own charm and beauty, so our doors are open to guests all year round.

groet Debbie

name: Quiet times by the riverside
description:
Stay in a historical building! Right in the Old Town, you will have shops, restaurants and walks literally round the corner. Very quiet, with wide views on the river. Parking is about 5 minutes walk. Long stays welcome. No late arrival fees.

The space
Days for a great break in the historical centre of a small pretty city!
The apartment is in the heart of the old town, on a privileged location: right in front of the riverside. So you'll see the birds fishing in the morning, and the sun sets will just be yours, on a huge 4 meters wide window on the river.
In addition to the views, the silence is one of the pros of the apartment; the river is very quiet, and as I live on the apartment below your you won't have parties every night (or you'll be one in it! :) )
The place has one big room; on one side the bed, very comfortable and wide, and on the other the sofa-bed and the computer. It doesn't feel small as the ceiling is very high, and a nice (sort of
neighborhood_overview: I believe we live in one of the best places in the world. It has the advantages of a city, but actually is is still a town- in the good way! Iis a lively area with many places to visit, shops, or simply walk around. I specially love the gardens around the city wall, 10 minutes from here. I deeply appreciate that cars are restricted in the area.
host_about:
I am someone who likes very different things, you will see. Let's start: I was born in a small town in l'Empordà, called Torroella de Montgrí. Those were also a mixture of happy and wild times, a bit like Amarcord from Fellini (watch it if you haven't).
Then I studied computer science in Barcelona, and a PhD with a part of it in London, about medical imaging.
In between something entered my life, for good: yoga: I started practicing and soon I was so pationated then when I finished my PhD it was obvious that becoming a teaching would be the best choice of my life.
So I practice yoga every day, and also: I love music, and I play myself the accordeon and the clarinet. Just as an amateur, but the pleasure of making music is amazing. I also like dancing, folk music and lately also Lindy Hop (Girona has a few places to dance if you are into it).
I like eating well and healthy. Not to much meat (I am sorry for those creatures we kill but sometimes it comes and I eat).
I like travelling, in all wild ways, but I am not a traveller that can tell thousands things! I participate as well in the couchsurfing project, from time to time- and when there isn't already someone at my place, a friend or a friend of a friend.
The apartment I rent, Girona Riverside, was planned to be for me as another floor was ment to be the yoga studio. However now I have another, bigger, place for yoga and I rent it. I hope you like it!
As a buddhist (if I can call myself that which I don't know) my motto would be to understand the sources of suffering, and enjoy immediate happyness.
Hola!Soy David!Soy profesor de yoga y os invito a una estancia estupenda en el centro de Girona en un apartamento con unas increibles vistas al rio!Naturaleza y silencio para tu felicidad!

description:
The space
Cet appartement très lumineux, à seulement 2 minutes à pied de la plage, des cafés et des restaurants riverains, est idéalement situé dans un espace vert entre pins et chênes.

L'appartement dispose de deux chambres, d'une cuisine entièrement équipée et d'une salle de bains. Il accueille confortablement un couple ou une famille de quatre personnes.

Il a récemment été rénové, de la cuisine aux planchers, ce qui donne à l'appartement une atmosphère acceuillante et gaie. Il dispose également d'un aménagement élégant, la salle de séjour s'ouvre sur une terrasse, parfaite pour la détente ou le divertissement. Et Si cela ne suffit pas, il y a aussi une deuxième terrasse, avec une vue partielle sur l'océan pour se détendre avec un livre ou un verre de vin et aussi bien préparé pour un dîner sous le clair de lune.

L'appartement est adapté pour les changements saisonniers de toute l'année. La ventilation naturelle vous rafraichit au cour

name: Spectacular house at Costa Brava
description:
The space
Mas Alegot is originally a barn built in 1903, which was converted with modern architectural criteria into a residential home, respecting the historical context of the original carácter of construction. The interior spaces are characterized by contemporary comfort, tranquility and spaciousness, they are decorated very tasteful and carefully.
The house has a beautiful view to its sprawling garden and the landscape behind: the maize, rice and sunflower fields, the poplar forests and the mountains of Montgri with its imposing castle. The 1000 m2 large garden offers enough space for relaxing moments with a nice swimming pool, 2 leaves covered patios, barbecue, further lawn, a small organic garden, herbs and trees.
Alegot Mas is located at the end of a very small picturesque and quiet village, Fontclara, in the heart of the Empordà, famous for its medieval stone villages like Peratallada, Pals, Palau Sator or Ullastret.

This two bedroom apartment has been tastefully furnished & is the perfect base for discovering the beautiful & ancient city of Girona. Fully registered with the Catalan Tourist Board as a holiday apartment.

The space

A large lounge and living room with balcony give lots of room to relax, whilst the kitchen and bathroom are attractive & brand new in 2019. Free, fast wifi is available for your entertainment devices.
Sunny yet cool in summer, whilst warm and cosy in winter, there are fans only, as with tree shade and good ventilation, air conditioning is not nee

The block is home to Catalans, not a holiday complex, so relatively peaceful for a city centre location.
host_about: My family and I moved to Catalonia from the UK 20 years ago, finding Can Torras two years later. Since then it has been a labour of love to renovate two apartments and my old farmhouse. I knew from the start this was where I wanted to live - the food, the scenery, the wonderful weather. Now I'm pleased to share the farmhouse, my garden and its magnificent views with visitors and offer my apartments in Girona for self catering stays. I am happy to share my experiences so that visitors enjoy the best that Catalonia has to offer.

It is a 120 square meters house all in one level surrounded with a garden, on a plot of 430 square meters.
It accommodates up to 8 people. A double bedroom, a twin bedroom (with an optional third pull-out bed) and a triple bedroom with three single beds. The house is renovated and furnished. There is heating and is fully equipped with modern utensils such as dishwasher,

name: CAMA EN UNA CASA DE LA COSTA BRAVA
description:
The space
If you want the Costa Brava, we offer two rooms in our house.
We are in a village in the middle of costa.En one of the most beautiful Catalan coast, with a privileged environment for mountain bike excursions, trekking, kayaking, diving, etc. ..
Two cozy private bedrooms in our house.
The rooms are equipped with heating and fans.
The bed linen is provided and towels.
The bathroom is for guests, with two services and a shower.
The price is 50 € for each room, depending on the season.
Breakfast is optional 10 € per room.
The house is in the center of town one of the most picturesque of Catalonia (Begur).
The house is in the oldest part of town but also in a quiet area just 50 meters from the square and the entertainment area as well as the bus stop that takes you to the best beaches of the Costa Brava.
And with direct bus to the city of Barcelona, Girona and the city railway station.

The space
This marine-themed apartment is located in Calella de Palafrugell, a fishing village on the Costa Brava dotted with small coves and beautiful walks.

name: Cap Bonifaci Vela, CanyellesPetites
description:
The space
Apartment 20 meters from the beach with a superb view.
You just go downstairs to get to the beach, not crowded even in high season.
There are 2 other beaches nearby, at a 5 and 10 minutes walk along the coastal path.
Supermarkets, bars and restaurants are a 5 minute walk.
In Rosas, a 10 minute drive by car, there are all kinds of shops, restaurants and other entertainment.

The coastal path underneath the house allows for hiking, for experts to Cadaqués through the nature reserve of Cap Creus, or to L'Escala.

Other suggestions for excursions are Figueres with the Dali museum, the ruins of Empuries, the Aiguamolls parc.

Other possibly activities include snorkeling, diving, tennis (in L'Almadrava Park Hotel), pitch & putt and golf.

The best part, of course, is to come back to the appartment and enjoy the terrace with the best view in town!

Casa típica de Cadaqués céntrica situada a 100 metros de la playa “Es Poal” que se compone de seis apartamentos. La casa se compone en tres plantas y hay dos apartamentos en cada planta de diferente distribución. Se encuentra en una calle tranquila donde delante hay unas cuantas galerías de Arte.

Living room and lounge.
A large terrace with a small garden is the preferred place to enjoy great moments of rest, for lunch and dinner on the outside, to be with family or friends and to 'waste time' watching the comings and goings of the boats and of bathers.

The house is located in the bay of Sa Tuna, facing the sea. Going down the stairs, in 2 minutes you will reach the beach.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the center of the town, with all services nearby.
Distance from the beach is just 2 minutes walk.
Less than a minute away you will find the commercial street, with a big supermarket, excellent shops fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and more.
Just 4 minutes away you will reach the old part of town, the walled city of Vila Vella. A really beautiful place.


Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: f21.DUPLEX I - Old Town of Girona
description:
We offer you a very special place, were you will find interesting works of arquitecture and interiorism, vintage and design furniture, originals and classic re-editions, and diferent kinds of art works and objects that we have selected for their historic or artistic value. The building is located in Força street, in the middle of the old jewish quarter of Girona and it was totally renewed in 2006. An eclectic mix that you will enjoy during your stay.

The space
The Força street is the most special street of Girona’s old quarter. It was the neuralgic center of the old Jewish Quarter and during the Roman period this street was part of the Via Augusta. Nowadays it is a beautiful pedestrian street located and it connects the Cathedral square with the center of the city. From this street we can visit the monumental Girona, the most important museums, eat in the best restaurants and have a drink while we enjoy a live jazz concert.

name: Apartment 4 pax, 150 m from Sea
description:
The space
Lovely 2 bedroom apartment with openkitchen and living room, 1 bedroom with double bed and 1 bedroom with bunkbed, 1 bathroom with shower
Parking and outdoor garden with seating space
Nicely located, 100 meters from the sea, 700 meters from riells beach and 550 meters from another 2 small beaches in L'Escala old town.
The appartment is located between l'Escala old town and Riells. In l' Escala old town there is two small beaches one sandy and one with pebbles.
Riells beach is shallow, you can enter the water 50 meters and still does not cover you. When there is wind in Riells you can also you can hire a small sailing boat, and you can hire speedboats and sailing boats in the port.
Diving is also available from different clubs, my preferred one is Grassi sub because it is a smaller diving center but there is also good ones like Dive Paradis, Diving club l'Escala and Orca Diving.

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 3
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is located in the city Sant Feliu de Guixols, a few minutes’ walk to the center city, shops, restaurants and beach.

Just in five minutes by walk of the apartment you'll find a supermarket open till 9 30 pm (closed on sunday), good fish and meat shop, fast food restaurant.

The area is safe and lovely. You'll be close to the wonderful modern building "La Constanse” and beautiful seafront “Passeig de Mar”.
host_about:
Hola, hola!

I am Gary. 
I like Spain and it's culture with interesting traditions. 
My favorite region here is Costa Brava with small nice city Sant Feliu de Guixols.

I extremely lucky to explore everything that this city has to offer; the thriving foodie scene, nice beaches, the amazing coffee & craft beer, and above all have developed some great friendships along the way.

I love introducing people to this amazing city. And whenever i have the opportunity i love discovering new places and great people.

You should stay in Sant Feliu de Guixols because: 
-I would love to meet you! 
-I will give you the best advise on the essential Sant Feliu 
-I will make sure you fall in love with this city!

And many, many, many other reasons!

name: APARTMENT BEACH PALAMOS COSTA BRAVA
description:
Comfortable and quiet, very central to the town, where there are numerous restaurants, shops, supermarkets. The beach is located 200 meters from the apartment. The building have a private parking space included. SARFA bus station 300 meters.

The space
Apartment about 40 m2. Ideal for couples or families with children. It includes parking in the same building. 1 dining-kitchen room with couch, 1 Bathroom with shower, 1 large bedroom with double bed and two single beds for children. The apartment is centrally located, hasn't got balcony , 200 meters from the beach. It is a quiet area with playground and shops of all kinds and weekly market. There are all kinds of restaurants and bars just a few minutes away from the apartment. You can walk everywhere. SARFA bus station is about 300 mt. Palamos is a fishing village on the Costa Brava and it's ideal for the summer to enjoy the beach and tourism. Palamos is 50 km away from Girona and 100 km from Barcelona and France.
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet at 200 meters from the beach, 100 mts supermarket, weekly market every Friday 8h 14h at 100 mts. Town center at 300 mts where you have all kinds of restaurants and places for drinks and Tapas.

name: Charming house by the sea Cadaqués
description:
The space
The house is ideal for both summer and winter. It's new, charming, sunny, cheerful, comfortable, very spacious and it has a nice garden with native plants.

On-going fully equipped house distributed as follows:

- Ground floor: large living room with a very big fireplace and direct access to private garden, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and laundry.

- Second floor: three bedrooms (one suite) and two bathrooms.

Sheets and towels available for guests.

Possibility of having a housekeeper or babysitter in case you are interested.

The house is ideal for families with children. It is only 1 minute walk from the Ros beach, one of the most beautiful beaches of Cadaques, a 10 minute walk from the town center and a 20 minute walk from the house-museum of Dali in Port Lligat. The area is excellent, nice and quiet.

We will leave an instruction guide and advice house tours, restaurant

Nos gusta la vida tranquila, disfrutar al máximo del tiempo libre y compartirlo con familia y amigos, el deporte, la naturaleza, leer, cocinar, viajar y conocer gente nueva y otras culturas. En nuestros viajes intentamos alojarnos siempre en casas de gente del lugar que, como nosotros, han decidido abrirlas a viajeros con ganas de conocer lo más auténtico de cada sitio.

name: Together w family·friends in cozy apartment-lofts!
description:
Organize a holiday reunion together with family members or friends. We have 3 apartments for an independent stay use with central-heating for 3 fam. or 13 'pers. You can apart hire an extra separate large room having a wood stove celebrating a party.

The space
Can Banal is a former Catalan farmhouse called "masía" from the XVI century. Since 1987 it has been our home and camping business. Since 2012 we have been able to open up 3 holiday apartments on the upper floor that can be rented all 3 together for a group, specially 3 or 4 families "together but not mixed". The apartments can accommodate 3 '- 5' - 6 '= 14 persons in total. Besides there is a large room, beware rather rustic style, for a party event. We rent it out apart including a simple kitchen, wood stove with firewood and music-equipment. Consult us the price.

The apartments are independent multi space rooms containing bedroom, kitchen with dining area and bathroom. All have central heating
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orchids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' walk
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

Catalan Touristic Home HUTG-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT OUR VILLAGE : LLAMPAIES

The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands.

The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about: Haber realizado mi sueño de hace más de 20 años me hace muy feliz. Desde Mayo del 2013 vivimos mi marido y mis dos hijos Roger y Oriol en una masía rural Can Gat Vell, en un núcleo de 100 habitantes y a 2 km de Camallera. Me encanta estar en contacto con las personas, ayudarles en lo máximo que pueda y prestarles todos los servicios para que estén satisfechos. Después de 23 años de vivir en la ciudad de Barcelona, vivir aquí en una casa rodeada de casas medievales y campos es un cambio radical necesario para volver a disfrutar de la vida y la verdad muy bonito.
neighbourhood: Saus, Camallera i Llampaies, Catalonia, Spain

description:
Nice, open and very bright apartment with terrace, from where you will enjoy incredible views of the bay and beautiful sunrises.
Located in a privileged zone for being quiet but at the same time with everything nearby

The space
The apartment has wifi included in the price. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, open kitchen fully equipped with dishwasher and washing machine and private access to the terrace. The big terrace has furniture so you can enjoy meals outdoors.
AC in the living room.
It has a private parking lot in the same building.
There is room for 6 people, with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with 2 single beds
-Bedroom with 2 single beds
-Bedroom with 2 single beds
If needed, single beds can be put together to make double beds.

Other things to note
HUTG-011070
We are a couple, we do the management of our properties for more than 20 years ago in Barcelona, Costa Brava, Co
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a residential zone, privileged for being quiet, its incredible views but at the same time near everything.
Distance from the beach is just 8 minutes walking. Restaurants are 4 minutes walking, there is a little supermarket 6 minutes away and a big one, 10 minutes away.
Just 8 minutes away, you can find the old walled city “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.
The sensation of being apart from the noises and living that peace in plain summer, listen to the birds sing, and decide when to leave this peace and go to the center, without car, its one of the best qualities of this zone.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do.
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Biorural apartment together forest, with biopool
description:
Can Pol is a corner of peace before the forest, with biopool, inside the Costa Brava, 1 km from the town. It is a single apartment, ideal for couples to enjoy relaxing in harmony with nature, Mediterranean forest, the tranquility of rural tourism

The space
“Can Pol de les Bòries” is an apartment in an isolated bio-constructed family house (1997), and biopool (2020).
It is located a 1 km of Vidreres, farmer in the neighborhood of les Bòries, through fields and woods. The area is exceptional close to Costa Brava and cities like Girona, Barcelona, and Figueres, or the Pyrenees's mountains. We suggest you lots of activities to make the most of your stay: to visit Girona's cathedral and Dali's Museum, to go horse riding, mountain biking, trekking, parachuting, hot air ballooning, to play golf, to enjoy food and wine tourism, and much more.
The Location is a 5 km from Sils's railway station, 17 km from Lloret de Mar, and 20 km from Girona-Costa Brava's Airpor

Hola,
Som una parella de jubilats. Fa 25 anys vam fer-nos una casa familiar aïllada a pagès, en una pineda, amb criteris bioconstructius: can Pol de les Bòries, a 1 km de Vidreres. 
Ens agrada viure al camp, en contacte amb el bosc, amb respecte i cura de l'entorn.  La casa té un petit  apartament autònom, obert a la natura. 
Tenim un gat; acceptem altres mascotes però també han de dormir fora l'habitacle. 
Ens adaptem en el que podem a les necessitats dels hostes. Ens agrada compartir.
Benvinguts!

name: Nice apartment 50m close to the sea
description:
The space
The apartment is located in the urbanization of San Carlos, 50 meters in front of the sea and 10 min walking to the beach of Llança`s harbour. Situated in a very calmed zone, offers at the same time all possibilities of beach and shopping without the necessity of using the car. Close to the apartment are rocks that offers the opportunity of take a quick dip into the sea. At a short distance you find a natural swimming pool formed by the rocks of the sea, perfect for afternoon bath.
In the same street, kids can play on the street and on a small play ground for children with swings and a slide. In the streets finishes in a view point to the habour of Llança where you can also start the “Ronda-track” Llança – Colera close to the sea.

The apartment has capacity for 6 people with 3 bedrooms.

name: Torre Can Ripoll
description:
Torre en Sant Hilari Sacalm, rodeada de un magnífico jardín y piscina privada. La vivienda consta de 350 mts construidos. Incluye garaje y está completamente amueblada y equipada para ofrecerle una estancia inolvidable en medio de la naturaleza.

The space
Sant Hilari Sacalm es un pueblo de media montaña reconocido por sus aguas medicinales, y su tranquilidad. Rodeado de montañas y bosques nos ofrece gran cantidad de excursiones para los amantes de la naturaleza. La casa está construida en la cima de una colina, y tiene todo el pueblo a sus pies, siendo un verdadero paseo llegar al centro. Una vivienda cómoda y confortable que cuenta con unas estancias muy espaciosas ideal para encuentros familiares o salidas con el grupo de amigos en busca de intimidad. El jardín que rodea la casa garantiza esta intimidad, al mismo tiempo que les acerca al pueblo.
La piscina privada les garantiza la diversión sobretodo para los más pequeños. Debido a la climatología de la z
neighborhood_overview: El barrio donde se encuentra la casa es una urbanización privada, de carácter familiar, donde residen cuatro famílias más, agradables, dicretas y que aceptan plenamente recibir huéspedes en la propiedad.
host_about: Sóc de Sant Hilari, de les de tota la vida, i  sempre, (vaig néixer el 1968), he viscut allà mateix. Ja fa deu anys que vaig perdre els pares i vaig heretar la casa que llogo. El meu objectiu és que les persones que venen a casa s'hi trobin com a casa seva i puguin passar uns dies innoblidables de descans en família i amics.

name: Casa Rural La Casanova de Beuda
description:
La casa se alquila entera, mínimo dos noches 430 Eu. independientemente del numero de personas. Situada en el Pre-Pirineo. Girona
Dispone de 2 h. matrimonio, 1 doble y 1 triple, 2 baños 1 aseo. Salón comedor gran cocina con chimenea, calefacción. Jardines que se funden en el campo.

The space
La Casanova fue construida a principios del siglo XX, en el año 1921. Recientemente, ha sido restaurada en piedra y madera, siguiendo el modelo original y la tradición arquitectónica local; y respetando así mismo, los colores preexistentes a su restauración.

La casa, el jardín respiran un clima de sosiego y tranquilidad; siendo –con la armonía de sus espacios interiores y exteriores- un lugar ideal para la calma y el descanso.

Guest access
Todos los habituales de una casa rural

The space
Location
A few kilometers south from the catalonian border with France in the Alt Empordà region, in the medieval village of Capmany, on a 15 hectares plot of land are the vineyards, cellar and houses of Oliver Conti.

Description
Two beautiful Mediterranean style houses built in 1996, with a big porch oriented to the south, sitting on top of a small hill overlooking the Empordà region and the Pyrenees, and surrounded by vineyards and silence. At the front of the houses we find the 10x5 swimming pool amidst vegetation and with a sun deck with sunbeds to enjoy the wonderful climate and the relaxing ambiance.
Built in 1996, the two houses are separated by a hedge providing total privacy.

The space

We are Pilar and her son, Arnau. Pilar lives in the apartment and Arnau is currently based in Barcelona. Due to Pilar's difficulties with English, Arnau is helping out with all the reservations, but you might meet him as well, specially on weekends.

We are happy to offer the possibility of hosting you in our beautiful apartment in the centre of Girona, only five minutes far from the train/bus station (that connects you with Barcelona, Madrid and Figueres among other; and where you can catch a bus to Girona airport).
At the same time, you can reach the old city and the well-known ancient Jewish quarter within 10 minutes walking. Do not miss it's charming and enigmatic atmosphere!

description:
The space
If you want to know the Costa Brava, we offer two rooms in our house.
We are a people of average costa.En one of the most beautiful areas of Catalan coast, with a privileged environment for mountain bike trips, hiking, kayaking, snorkeling, etc. ..
A cozy private bedroom in our house.
The rooms are equipped with heating and fans.
The bed linens are provided as well as towels.
The bathroom is for guests, has two services and a shower.
The price is 30 € for each room.
Breakfast is optional € 10 per room.
The house is in the center of town one of the most picturesque of Catalonia (Begur).
The house is in the oldest part of town but in a quiet area and just 50 meters from the square and the entertainment area as well as the bus stop to take you to the best beaches of the Costa Brava.
And with direct bus to the city of Barcelona, Girona and the city railway station,(AVE).

Som el Carles (42) i l'Eva (45), som germans, vivim a Barcelona però tenim la família a Llançà, on passem molts caps de setmana i les vacances d'estiu i festes amb les nostres famílies. name: El Badiu d'Alemanys 5
description:
Exclusive rental property in the historical core of Girona

The space
Located in the heart of Girona's medieval quarter, inside the original city walls and overlooking Sant Domènec square, is the property Alemanys 5, whose original building dates from the sixteenth century.

Its recent restoration integrates old and new, with sober, clean lines that celebrate essential elements such as space, sunlight, shade, fire, stone, nature, water and silence.

The house is available to be rented as a whole unit, but it also can be divided into two independent apartments: "El Badiu" and "El Jardi".

"El Badiu" (The Veranda) is a 180 m2 duplex apartment equipped with a master suite and two junior suites, a fully equipped gourmet kitchen-dining space, spacious living room with fireplace and a spectacular sunny veranda terrace facing south, with exclusive views over the old quarter of Girona. Its capacity is up to 6 people.

Facilities inc

name: Can Roure, la Fageda d'en Jordà
description:
Can Roure es una masia construida en el s.XVIII, situada en un valle soleado dentro de la Fageda d'en Jordà.
El apartamento está en la planta baja de la casa, tiene entrada independiente, ideal para cuatro personas con un sofá cama doble adicional que permite hasta 6 personas.
Está pensado para disfrutar de la vida al aire libre, en plena naturaleza, sin carreteras ni coches cerca, dispone de piscina i barbacoa.
Incluye ropa de cama, toallas y lavadora y secadora para largas estancias.

The space

neighborhood_overview: La Fageda d'en Jordà es un bosque de hayas que se extiende sobre una colada del volcan Croscat, dentro del Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa.

name: Front Row View of Roses Bay
description:
Located in a small family residence, with only a small sent between the residence and the sea, the apartment with 2 bedrooms can pleasantly host a family of 4.

View from terrace is spectacular, since there is no obstacle between the apartment and sea. From the terrace , Medes Islands as well as all of the Roses bay are visible.

To go and swim, one only needs to get down into the small cove in front of the apartment.

7' away walking, there is a supermarket and a restaurant.

The space
The residence is made of 2 small buildings plus the residence keeper place, 3 parking areas, a 2-part swimming pool for residence members only, a garden and a direct access to sea .

Located on the top right end corner of the second building, the apartment has 2 bedrooms, and is fully equipped.

One well located parking space comes with the apartment.

The apartment has a front row view of the Roses Bay.

The
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a family residence made of 2 small buildings.

The view from the terrace is exceptional because there is only a coastal trail between the apartment residence and the sea.

The apartment is on the fourth and last floor on the corner of the second building.

From the terrace, one can see all of Roses Bay (220 square km), and the Medes Islands located 21 km away, on the other side of the Bay.

And to go swimming, all you need to do is to walk down into the cove located in front of the residence.
host_about:
French and Canadian, married to a Spanish Catalan, with 3 daughters, including 1 American, I like to travel and meet people from all countries and different walks of life.

As a host, I am flexible and understanding as long as the guest respects my property and her/his engagements.

As a guest, I appreciate a caring host and I respect her/his property and leave up to my terms of the deal.

If any life motto, mine is: "keep on growing, with an open heart".

I do quite a lot of horse back riding, skiing and scuba diving.
I have a motor bike that I ride almost daily.

On the leisure side, I like to read in English, Spanish and French. 

I have eclectic tastes in music, movie and art, ranging from Mozart to Adele, Ingmar Bergman to Steven Soderberg, Michelangelo to Bastia.

I believe it is never too late to start new things in life and I am very close to my wife and family.

name: Old house in the heart of Cadaques
description:
The space
This house is located in the heart of Cadaques, just a few steps from the church and walking distance to the beach, supermarkets, bars, shops and entertainments. You have everything you need around the corner, where the atmosphere is alive, authentic and full of local colour.

The entrance of the house opens to a dinning room that adjoins to a kitchen fully equipped with everything you need for cooking. Then a staircase connects you to the first floor with 2 different bedrooms and a bathroom. They both have windows, one facing the old village, the other one facing the sea. On the second floor there’s a big living room with a fireplace and a wonderful view to the sea. Going up the staircase, you’ll get to the last floor with the main bedroom and its private bathroom and a terrace overlooking the old village and the sea.

The house has washing machine, dishwasher, freezer and everything you need to enjoy your holidays. It also has a fireplac
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hola, Soy Victoria (y familia) y acogemos a huéspedes desde 2010 aqui en Cadaques. Vivimos aquí todo el año y conocemos casi todos los secretos de este pequeño rincón del mundo, los cuales compartimos con todos nuestros huéspedes, haciendo de su estancia en nuestras casas algo más que una simple estancia, en la que incluimos recomendaciones de restaurantes, rutas, paseos, rincones a descubrir, etc... sean bienvenidos!

Bonjour, Je suis Victoria (et sa petite famille) et nous recevons des hôtes depuis 2010 ici a Cadaques. Nous vivons ici a l'année et nous connaissons pratiquement touts les secrets de ce petit coin du monde, lesquels nous partageons avec touts nos hôtes, pour faire de leur séjour quelque chose de plus qu'un simple séjour; nous partageons nos recommandations de restaurants, routes a ne pas manquer, promenades, petits coins a découvrir, etc... soyez les bienvenus!

Hello, I'm Victoria (and little family) and we've been receiving guests since 2010 here in Cadaques. We live here the whole year round and we know almost every secret from this little corner of the world, and we love to share them with our guests, making these stays not like a simple stay but like whole experience; we love to recommend nice restaurants, routes to walk around, little corners to discover, etc... please be welcome home!

name: Can Portell by 123ole: 7 rooms, max 15 pers.
description:
No two rooms in our house are alike.
In The Hayloft, with its soaring beams, you could imagine yourself in a medieval barn. This room has its own bathroom.
The Gypsy Woman does full justice to its name. Ideal in combination with The Blue Mirror because of the spacious living/library and bathroom they share.
The Green Pleasure is a romantic space for two, with an en suite bathroom (with tub).
The Conservatroy is the only room with its own entrance, and has an en suite bathroom.

The space
Can Portell” has both the sea and mountains on its doorstep, is not far from the vibrant town of Girona, and only half an hour’s drive from the airport. Not only is it easy to get to, but Can Portell caters to everyone’s needs.
The house is an old masia farm and dates from 1690. The main building is surrounded by a beautiful plot of land with a swimming pool, stables, trees that provide shade and an original, abandoned corral where we now keep our hor
