name: Casa Rabòs beautiful country house!
description:
Casa Rabòs is a traditional 17 century house,entirely renovated with all modern amenities and it is situated between Figueres (Dali's museum)and Llança/Rosas (sandy beaches) near Peralada (golf) in north Catalonia ,Spain.
Cadaquès, beautiful little harbour,with Cap de Creus,beautiful natural park are just half an hour drive.
Welcome.

The space
Casa Rabos is a traditional 17th century stone house, entirely renovated with all modern amenities and it is situated between Figueres and Llanca/Rosas near Perelada in north Catalonia, Spain.
The Orlina river runs down the village,and a beautiful bridgeunder which you can bathe.
You can treck around in the Albera natural park,discover dolmens, menhirs and the tipical méditerrannéen nature.

Perched in the renowned bay of Rosas close to the sea and entoured on one side by the Pyrenee mountains with 3,000 meter snowcapped summits. The climate is ideal with more than 300 days of sunshine per y
neighborhood_overview:
The house is on the outskirts of a charming medieval village at the foot of which the Orlina river flows.
The village is very peaceful, it has a small grocery store open in the morning only.
You can take beautiful walks, discover dolmens and menhirs in the middle of the surrounding garrigue, located in the Albera natural park.
host_about:
D'origine Québecoise, je m'occupe de cette merveilleuse maison de famille qui a au dessus de 400 ans ,et dans laquelle on fabriquait autrefois l'huile d'olive, le pain et le vin.
 Je partage cette occupation avec ma mère qui elle,est catalane d'origine et vit au Québec une grande partie de l'année.
J'ai suivi une formation en tourisme et aime partager ma passion pour la vie.
  Ma mère ,elle ,est massothérapeuthe et enseigne le Qi Gong, elle donne des ateliers d'initiation de cet art.
  Nous aimons toutes les deux recevoir les gens, qu'ils se sentent à l'aise et chaleureusement accueillis.
  Nous aimons aussi la nature, les plantes, la musique, la mer, la montagne, avoir du plaisir et partager tous ces merveilleux cadeaux que nous donne la vie;

name: Single room near train/bus station
description:
The space
Hi there!

We are Pilar and her son, Arnau. Pilar lives in the apartment and Arnau is currently based in Barcelona. Due to Pilar's difficulties with English, Arnau is helping out with all the reservations, but you might meet him as well, specially on weekends.

We are happy to offer the possibility of hosting you in our beautiful apartment in the centre of Girona, only five minutes far from the train/bus station (that connects you with Barcelona, Madrid and Figueres among other; and where you can catch a bus to Girona airport).
At the same time, you can reach the old city and the well-known ancient Jewish quarter within 10 minutes walking. Do not miss it's charming and enigmatic atmosphere!

The room we are offering is small, but so told at the same time and more than enough to host a person comfortably. There is single bed (90x200cm). A big wardrobe is built up above the bed, so you have plenty of space to keep all your s

name: The sea at your feet in Cadaquès
description:
Your private family holiday villa awaits!
Ideal in times of Covid 19 pandemic !
Spanning three levels, with windows in every room, most with perfect views of the Mediterranean sea. Each morning you can watch the sun rise from any window and enjoy your breakfast on the main terrace.
The house has direct access to the sea, with private stairs and an almost private "beach", perfect for a morning swim or water skiing.
Walking distance to the village, relax to the sound of the sea.

The space
15 people can sleep comfortably and the house is great for entertaining. This home is spacious and has many comfortable indoor and outdoor living areas. Your direct access to the sea is unique and you can sunbathe on the lower level private terrace.

The house has three levels that make up the main house and also a connected studio apartment that has a separate entrance, kitchenette and bathroom, but is easily accessible from the stairs at the bott
neighborhood_overview: Neighbours are around if you need any help, however you have your privacy as there are very few houses close by.
host_about:
Executive , French and very opened to the world. The house we rent is a family house in Spain where our family has its roots as we all did travel a lot around. 
I love reading (in three different languages), skiing and going to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) for the food I rely on my partner because he is the cook in the family.
My style of traveling : no travel agency, lodging depending upon the country and moving around by my own .

name: Beautiful Apartment La Fosca
description:
Comfortable duplex apartment only 500 m from La Fosca beach. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, perfecly equipped kitchen, living and dining room, confortable terrace with garden furniture and view. Perfect for families and couples all year round

The space
This comfortable apartment is just 500 m from one of the most beautiful beaches on the Costa Brava -¨la Fosca¨. It is a very spacious, comfortable and and tastefully decorated apartment, on the first floor of a large villa which has been converted into 5 units.
The apartment is 130 m2 and takes up two floors. The large living room is furnished with cosy sofas, nestled into a niche near the open fireplace, flatscreen TV and a stereo with speakers in every room. The living room is connected to a dining room with access to the roofed terrace. A wooden staircase leads up to a mezzanine that is also furnished with sofas. This floor also has a laundry room with a washing machine. The adjacent kitchen is very well equip
neighborhood_overview: This lovely apartment is in a quiet residential area, only 500 m from the beach, 400 m from the nearest restaurant and 800 m from the nearest shop. The nearest large beach town Palamós, where there are lots of supermarkets, bars, restaurants, shops and other leisure facilities is just 4 km away. This region is famous for its wonderful beaches in craggy bays with crystal clear blue seas. There are lots of places nearby where you can enjoy water sports and other activities like cycling, hiking, golf, tennis and horse riding.
host_about: I have been working with tourist apartments in the center of Barcelona and villas in Catalonia uring the last 10 years and would be happy to help you find the best choice for your perfect stay in Catalonia.

name: Cozy apartment with big terrace in S'Agaró
description:
Nice and clean one-bedroom apartment in s’Agaró, located 10min from the beach and 5min from the center of the town. Ideal for couples and couples with kids. Very close to Platja d’Aro with endless shops, restaurants and bars!

The space
The place is a one-bedroom apartment located in a second floor. It's located in s’Agaró, a small town in the wonderful Costa Brava area. Recently renovated, the place is cozy, nicely decorated and welcoming. There's a double bed and a sofa bed, so the apartment can accommodate 4 people. However, it's ideal for couples or for 2 adults and 2 kids. We also have a cradle for those families traveling with babies/toddlers. The bedroom, living room and bathroom are of good size. The kitchen is small, but you will probably spend more time in the huge and sunny terrace than in the kitchen!

The kitchen comes with appliances (fridge and freezer, electric cooker) and cookware. Additionally, the apartment has AC and TV. The place
neighborhood_overview: Great location to explore Costa Brava!
host_about:
I'm easy-going, smiling and open minded. I love to travel so I can discover new places and cultures, as well as to meet new people. 

I traveled for a year in Latin America and then moved to the States to study my MBA.After school I found a grown-up job and I decided to stay for a bit longer. 

I'm renting the apartment in S'Agaró on behalf of my parents. I'm living abroad, so they will be the ones giving you the keys. No worries, they are great people! :-)

name: Hermosa casa por el precio de un apartamiento
description:
!! LA PISCINA Y EL PARQUE SON SOLO PARA INQUILINOS !En la otra mitad de la casa, los dueños viven con su hija y nunca usan la piscina ni jardin.!!!
La mitad de la casa con tres dormitorios, salón, cocina, terrazas, piscina, barbacoa y todo el equipamiento necesario se alquila en una casa de la Costa Brava, a 30 km de la frontera con Francia. En todas partes hay aire acondicionado.
Estacionamiento gratuito para dos COCHES.

Guest access
Además de los dormitorios, la sala de estar y las terrazas, los huéspedes tienen acceso a todo el equipo de la cocina, el lavadero, los 6 acres de jardín, incluida la oportunidad de usar una barbacoa, el uso de la piscina.
El jardín y la piscina son utilizados únicamente por inquilinos.
La segunda parte de la casa está completamente aislada, en la segunda parte hay propietarios que nunca entran al jardín y no usan la piscina !!!!!!

Other things to note
podemos alquilar bicicletas, raqueta

name: Apartment for rent 2 Lloret de Mar Costa Brava
description:
Apartment duplex of 2 rooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen, large terrace and solarium on the 2nd floor.
It includes a parking space in the garage in the basement of the building (free).
A 5 minutes from the beach Sa Boadella, on foot, 10 min. of Fenals and 20 min. of Santa Cristina.
Located in gated community with 2 swimming pools, sports courts, playgrounds and gardens. ideal for families with children.

The space
The apartment is in the heart of the Costa Brava, next to the beautiful and preserved Cala Sa Boadella in Lloret de Mar, partly naturalistic tradition. The apartment has a large solarium-terrace on the top floor of 59 m2., Has a parking space in the basement of the same block, taking the elevator we arrived directly to the 2nd floor where the floor is. It is located in a private residential area, "Jardins de Sa Boadella", this is an area of ​​selected integrated in nature and surrounded by its own gardens apartments. Enjoy tranquility,
neighborhood_overview:
It is a very quiet neighborhood, built in the wild, mostly second homes, away over 1 km. City of Lloret de Mar, where the party and the environment.
It is in a privileged place among the beautiful natural beaches of Sa Boadella, Santa Cristina, Sant Francesc, Fenals, etc.
In immediaciones we find several spectacular botanical gardens (Martimurtra, Pinya de Rosa, Jardins de Santa Clotilde).
In less than 200 m. we have restaurants, supermarkets, bus stop, on the beach of Fenals we can take a tour boat to visit the beautiful neighboring coastal towns.
host_about:
Soy una mujer servicial y hospitalaria. Me gusta que la gente se sienta cómoda y feliz a mi alrededor. Intento tratar a mis huéspedes como me gustaría que me trataran a mi. 
Me congratula compartir experiencias y una de ellas es ceder mi propiedad de Lloret de Mar para disfrute vacacional y de ocio.
En mi apartamento doy prioridad al confort, la limpieza, una buena dotación de equipamiento doméstico, servicios y un entorno íntimo y agradable para que tanto famílias como parejas disfruten de un alojamiento y estancia immejorable, relajante y placentera... Además, yo estoy siempre disponible presencial y/o telefónicamente por si hay cualquier problema.
Parece que consigo mi objetivo puesto que frecuentemente alojo inquilinos repetidores. Mi premio es ver las caras de mis clientes cuando se marchan (y vuelven!).
Esta es mi mayor satisfacción!

name: Un espacio agradable, amplio y cerca de la PLAYA
description:
Habitación y comedor decorados con mis pinturas.

The space
- alquilamos habitación en piso compartido, a personas no fumadoras, desayuno no incluido en el precio.
- el equipamiento de la habitación consta de : dos camas, una de 190 x 90 y otra de 190 x 80 cm., un armario con algun estante y espacio para colgar la ropa, a disposición de los huéspedes, mesita de noche, dos muebles con libros,, una mesa escritorio y asientos
l- la casa está situada en el centro del pueblo, a escasos metros de la playa, el puerto, mercado municipal, supermercado, cafeterias, restaurantes, farmacia, centro de salud, estación de ferrocarril, monumento a Walter Benjamin.

Guest access
los huéspedes tienen acceso : además de a su habitación, a ba

A very pretty and cosy holiday home with a lot of character, beautiful views and loads of peace and quiet and the prettiest sunsets!
The perfect place to fully disconnect and enjoy nature, yet only 10 minutes from the village and at a 20 minutes distance from the beach...! At a short distance from Impressive Girona and bustling Barcelona, a perfect base to explore the incredibly beautiful Costa Brava área! And....we have the best suggestions to fully enjoy your stay! Caulès is a smoke free area!

The space
Visiting the Costa Brava? Or planning to visit Barcelona of historic Girona? Come and stay in our very beautiful and romantic "Petit Caules" the converted stables of our 15th century (once) farmhouse in the Massis de Cadiretes natural park.
The view on the hills is incredible. You can relax in the swimmingpool, which is set in the garden behind the house, surrounded by trees so very secluded!

Petit Caulès has a large, "panorama view" livin
neighborhood_overview:

Impressive Girona 30 minutes, romantic medieval villages all around! Spectacular Barcelona 50 minutes (also by train!) Plenty to discover along the worldfamous breathtaking Costa Brava coastline and inland. I will be happy to suggest daytrips as I am a tourist Guide as well.

The village of Vidreres 10 minutes, Tossa de Mar 20 minutes as well as Lloret de Mar 20 minutes. France only 1 hour.

name: Catalan Farmhouse Apartment with Mountain Views
description:
Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 private apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

This Catalan farmhouse will be your private slice of rural bliss. We give you everything you'll need to feel at home, while still enjoying the comforts and ease of hotel-style convenience.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged, each retaining its own individual historic charm, while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Secluded in twenty acres of peaceful woodland and paddocks, this Catalan farmhouse is a perfect destination for families and friends. The large swimming pool, play area and games garden all have views up to the imposing peaks of the mountains or down to the valley beyond.
neighborhood_overview: Can Cruanyes resides within the foothills of the Pyrenees where you can enjoy beautiful rural and mountain surroundings while remaining well connected to local amenities and the beaches of the Costa Brava. We are well connected also the local villages and towns including Tortella where you can buy all the basics including artesan bread and fresh fruit and vegetables. Besalu with many restaurants is only 10 minutes by car.
host_about: I'm Donny from Ireland and I enjoy meeting people from all over the world. I don't travel as much as before I had kids but meeting my guests helps me feel like I'm still travelling and learning about new cultures. I love helping people discover the area, and letting them in on the little local gems that I've discovered over the years.

Located inside a private villa with pool shared with the owners. Easy to park at the entrance close the main gate. Ideal for couples with 2 children in a fantastic location for either a short or long holiday in one of the most charming villages of the Costa Brava.
We wait for you!

The space
A cosy little guesthouse/bungalow within a private villa overlooking Tossa's castle with seaside views and private swiming pool shared with the owners.
45 square mts (147 feet aprox.) bungalow with open plan kitchen. Bedroom with 2 single beds. Living room with one double bed. Bathroom with shower and terrace with excelent views.

No wifi
No pets allowed.

host_about: Villas Julia was built in 1954 by a Belgian couple who on his honeymoon trip fell in love with Tossa de Mar. His creativity and her good taste shaped Villas Julia into an exceptional place. Their daughter Roberta, the last of five children whom inherited both the creativity and good taste lives in this wonderful setting to develop her work in sculpture, painting and photography. She has two children and enjoys its tranquility and beaches through the year.

name: Rural Hostel Mas Cadavall
description:
At Mas Cadavall we invite you to enjoy the simplest acts, to experience a slower pace that allows you to perceive the subtlety of the nuances of the changing nature that surrounds us and of the nature of oneself. We wish you a happy stay and coexistence!

The space
Mas Cadavall is a large, beautiful and simple white farmhouse surrounded by forest. It is located in a privileged place. Isolated and surrounded by nature and at the same time close to various locations. 15 minutes from Banyoles and Besalú. at 30min. from Girona, Olot and Figueres. And 45 minutes from the nearest beach (Sant Martí d'Empúries).

The accommodation belongs to the farmhouse, in which the hosts live and with whom the exterior of the house is shared.

The accommodation has a room with two bunk beds, an outside toilet, kitchen and porch / living room separated from each other. On the porch there is a sofa, table and an artisan wood oven.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
The hostel is located in a privileged natural environment! Close there are 2 rivers: the Fluvia (15 min. Walking), ideal for strolling along the beautiful path that borders the river and the Ser (20 min.), perfect for swinming and enjoying the journey.
For those of you who miss civilization, don't worry. 15min by car is Banyoles (a large town with supers, shops ... and the best ... a beautifu place for swinming and enjoy the walks it offers) and 30min. there is Girona, Figueres and Olot.
Besalú is at the gates of La Garrotxa, the beautiful medieval town just 15 minutes away. And nearby is also the volcanic area of ​​La Garrotxa.
And the sea? Well, the closest beach is in Sant Martí d'Empuries at 45min.
host_about: En Mas Cadavall vivimos Sergio, yo y nuestros dos hijos Abel (8años) y Shanam (4años). Dos niños muy sociales, con muchas ganas de compartir y jugar con los demás!

name: Tamariu: the most exclusive and quiet beach
description:
Only 150 m. to the beach.
The house retains its old charm if well is fully equipped with a modern kitchen and two bathrooms.
Private access.
Terrace and patio to eat and relax.
Perfect interior temperature in Summer (air conditioning not needed)

The space
We are in the heart of Costa Brava. Tamariu is the most exclusive and quiet beach in the coast.

Tamariu is situated in a small secluded bay between the towns of Begur and Palafrugell. Small coves set amongst rugged tree-lined cliffs, crystal clear water and beautiful beaches have made the area famous the world over for its beauty. Originally a small fishing village, Tamariu has not been over developed and has retained its identity and charm.

There are some new villas and apartments on the edge of the village and like everywhere the village center and beach gets busy in August, but you will find no high rise hotels or English pubs.

Our three bedroom,

Nuestro mayor deseo es que nuestros huéspedes se sientan tan felices en casa como nosotros. Haremos todo lo posible para que disfrutéis vuestra estancia en la Costa Brava.

host_about:
Hola, somos Manolo e Isabel, 
Desde Villalloret queremos  darles  la bienvenida. Este alojamiento que en principio nació para uso personal, para albergar reuniones familiares y vivir momentos únicos con familia y amigos, fue decorado con todo amor, por eso está lleno de pequeños toques con  sabor rural, para  los que utilizamos útiles de labranza propiedad de la familia.
Tiempo después vimos que por la dinámica de la vida diaria  no podíamos hacer uso de él y disfrutarlo nada más que en determinadas ocasiones,  y así fue como decidimos ponerlo a disposición para que otras familias pudieran disfrutarlo y pasar aquí  su tiempo de vacaciones, e incluso teletrabajar si este fuera su caso. 
Por eso nos  encantaría que pudieran conocer la Costa Brava desde  una perspectiva diferente, combinando el sabor de antaño, con lo actual, combinando el mar y la montaña, en un espacio para evadirse y reencontrarse con la naturaleza y con un ritmo más lento en su vida diaria más auténtico y sostenible. Pero a  la vez y cercano a lo urbano, a lugares de ocio y a las mejores playas de la costa Brava

Tengo 63 años , he trabajado 20 años de secretaria y ahora soy pensionista por una artritis. Me encanta bromear y reir, sobre todo de los infortunios que da la vida y empiezo por reirme de misma, ¡ es muy saludable!.

name: Beautiful house with spectacular views
description:
Beautiful house with spectacular views of the bay of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, and steps away from the Natural Reserve of Cap de Creus.
Sleeps 7 people and is 5 minutes by car from the village and beaches, also reachable by foot.

(HUTG-017508)

The space
Located in the charming fishing village of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, "Giraluna" is a beautiful rustic-style villa with lots of character. It is situated among pine trees on the top of a hillside and enjoys spectacular views over the village, the bay and the mountains. The location is very tranquil, just 30 meters from the entrance to the protected reserve of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus, though very close to the centre of the village and the beaches, easily accessible by car and on foot.

"Giraluna" has a capacity for seven people distributed between 3 double bedrooms with their respective bathrooms, two with panoramic views. The kitchen is well equipped

description:
Casa ANNIE is a house / apartment (50m2) with capacity for families / couples (2 adults and 2 children), located in a private urbanization, less than 5 minutes by car from the center of Lloret de Mar. The price includes a private parking and internet connection by wifi. Just 30 meters from the house there is a communal pool (with sink, shower, benches, parasols, sun loungers and natural grass)

The space
Casa ANNIE is a house / apartment (50m2) with capacity for families / couples (2 adults and 2 children), located in a private urbanization, less than 5 minutes by car from the center of Lloret de Mar. The price includes a private parking and internet connection by wifi. Just 30 meters from the house there is a communal pool (with sink, shower, benches, parasols, sun loungers and natural grass) that is cared for daily by a gardener. In the surroundings of the house there are several beaches to which you can walk, but by car it is more recommended. About 200 meters
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
¡Hola, bienvenidos a nuestro perfil en Airbnb!

Nos hemos decidido a alquilar nuestra casa en Lloret de Mar, porque no la usamos lo suficiente, y dado que nos encanta viajar y apreciamos las numerosas oportunidades que ofrece el portal Airbnb, nosotros también lo utilizamos como huéspedes, nos gustaría poder ofrecer a los demás viajeros que conozcan esta bonita zona de la Costa Brava: ciudades costeras tan famosas como Lloret de Mar (5 min. en coche), que te ofrece un sinfín de posibilidades de diversión y buena comida, la ciudad medieval de Tossa de Mar (15 min. en coche), con su famoso castillo, o Blanes (15 minutos en coche) con sus famosas fiestas con fuegos artificiales. Nuestra casa está rodeada de muchas e increíbles playas como Canyelles, o la playa Llevadó, sin olvidar la playa de Santa Cristina, por citar algunos ejemplos. 

Nuestro deseo es que te sientas como en tu propia casa, y por eso hemos pensado en ofrecerte todo lo necesario para una estancia cómoda, lo más acogedora posible y que te lleves un bonito recuerdo. En nuestra casa encontrarás el relax y la tranquilidad que estás buscando, y podrás refrescarte en los días de calor en la maravillosa piscina de la urbanización. Estamos siempre a tu disposición para cualquier consulta, incidencia o sugerencia que surja durante tu viaje y estancia. Además, nos encantará ofrecerte recomendaciones e ideas sobre cómo pasártelo bien. 

Un abrazo, Ady y David

name: Can Cirera, rural house in Girona
description:
It is a rural house, ideal for families or groups of up to 8 people. Located on the Costa Brava, near Girona, Banyoles, Olot i Figueres. For excursions, nature, culture, ... The legal numer of regist. Generalitat de Catalunya is PG-000234

The space
Can Cirera is a farmhouse independent. The whole house is to rent. It has 4 bedrooms (2 double and 2 single beds) with 2 bathrooms.
Kitchen with fireplace, oven, refrigerator, microwave, hot water, washing machine, hairdryer, ...

Great room for leisure, with small team of music, tv, games, ...
One room has been adapted in the block, keeping the dining room, and three layers (a kind of hole wall, where the hens laid eggs).
20 minutes: MUSEUM DALÍ, in Figueres
20 minutes: GIRONA, capital city, different museums like the Museum of Cinema, and old quarter, cathedral
20 minutes: OLOT, volcanic city
5 minutes: BANYOLES, lake city

VIRITUAL VISIT OF THE HOUSE
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about: La meva família i jo tenim la casa des del 1.997, va ser tan bonic viure-hi, que vam decidir convertir-la amb casa rural, amb l'objectiu de tenir la possibilitat que famílies o grups d'amics, fessin estades d'uns dies per viure la bona energia que té. Va ser construïda al 1.778, és de pedra, l'hem restaurat, adaptant-la a que hi ha totes les comoditats per disfrutar-la. Les cases abans no les feien com ara, tardaven el que fes falta, les construïen amb paciència, les feien al lloc més adequat, tenint en compte el lloc, el sol, la solidesa, la seva energia, ... Té alguna cosa màgica, no és espectacular, però si és bonica, acollidora i a mesura d'estar-hi fa que t'agradi cada vegada més.

name: Mas Pinoses

The space
Mas Pinoses es una masía típica catalana donde podrá disfrutar de la tranquilidad en medio de la naturaleza, en un entorno privilegiado, de fácil acceso y muy bien comunicada.

Dispone de un alojamiento rural independiente en el antiguo pajar, totalmente restaurado, con capacidad para 6 personas, y equipado con todo lo necesario para ofrecer el máximo confort y bienestar:

• 3 habitaciones dobles (dos de ellas con opción de cuna o cama auxiliar)
• 2 Baños
• Cocina-comedor
• Sala de estar con chimenea

Los exteriores son amplios, con zonas verdes, jardín con mesas y tumbonas, porche con barbacoa y zona de aparcamiento cubierto.

name: Apartment in Regencos with beautifull garden
description:
50 m2 apartment located on the first floor. Has: 1 large bedroom with a double bed, 1 complete bathroom and a living area with a fully equipped kitchen and a sofa bed.
Our apartments are located in the beautiful Rectory of Regencos village, very close to begur with private garden and pool for the exclusive use of our guests.

The space
Spacious and fully equipped apartment of 50 m2 with views to our garden and pool. Perfect capacity for 2 adults and 2 child.

Apartment decorated by interior designer Anna Puig. Her vision has managed to turn our rooms into cozy and bright spaces, taking care of every detail accompanied by the practicality and comfort necessary to satisfy the needs of our clients.

Each apartment has:

• 50 m2
• 1 large master bedroom with comfortable double bed
• 1 full bathroom with bathtub and shower
• Living room
• 1.60 m sofa-bed perfect for children
• Kitchen fully equiped.
• Ai
neighborhood_overview:
Place that stands out for the tranquility of the town of Regencos at the same time that it is perfectly located, between the towns of Pals and Begur, just 10 minutes from the places of interest and the best beaches on the Costa Brava.
The perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy nature and the sea, in a dream environment.

The Rectoria de Regencós, as its name suggests, is located in the medieval town of Regencós, characterized by its tranquility. It is the ideal place for those who want to enjoy the village life characteristic of its people, its narrow and cobbled streets and surrounded by cultivated fields with views of the Quarlemany mountain.

It is located just 5 minutes by car from the best beaches such as Sa tuna, Sa Riera, Calella de Palafrugell, LLafranc, Pals and Platja del Castell.

name: Apartment with garden near lake
description:
The space
A 100m2 apartment with a 70m2 garden, in front of the lake and the park “la Draga”. The area has all the necessary services (shops, library, bars and restaurants, kindergartens ...) and is 5' from the historic center of Banyoles, 8' walk from the public swimming area of the lake and 5’ from the Sports Club and pools, 40' from the Costa Brava. The apartment has 4 bedrooms (1 suite, 1 twin and two singles), two bathrooms, a large lounge and kitchen, a garden and two terraces. The garden, allows a comfortable stay on wood or earth, with awnings and total privacy. From Girona, there is a direct bus service to Banyoles, that stops 2' from the apartment . It also has all the necessary appliances (oven, stove, refrigerator, microwave, blender, mixer, washing machine and dryer, ....) . Additionally to the garden, there is another terrace with views to the park, and an interior one used as laundry. There is plenty of available parking area around.

Banyole

neighborhood_overview:
Es una autentica casa de pueblo ubicada en el casco antiguo de Pals, uno de los pueblos medievales con mayor encanto del Ampurdan. Tiene un premio de Bellas Artes.
Excelente comunicación con Barcelona, Gerona y Francia.
La casa esta ubicada en el llamado triangulo de oro, muy cerca de la playa de Pals a 4Km. así como de otras playas de aguas de color turquesa muy bonitas.
Hay innumerables y auténticos pueblos medievales para visitar, así como el Museo Dali ubicado en el pueblo de Figueras y el castillo de Pubol donde se encuentra enterrada Gala la mujer de Dali.
Pals esta a una distancia de 35 Km. de Gerona, una ciudad interesante para conocer ... barrio judío, catedral, etc...
host_about:

Alegre y con muchas ganas de vivir y de disfrutar con mis amigos organizando eventos diferentes: comidas con vinito, ver películas, exposiciones de Arte, salidas en bicicleta...

neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT OUR VILLAGE : LLAMPAIES

The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands.

The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about: Haber realizado mi sueño de hace más de 20 años me hace muy feliz. Desde Mayo del 2013 vivimos mi marido y mis dos hijos Roger y Oriol en una masía rural Can Gat Vell, en un núcleo de 100 habitantes y a 2 km de Camallera. Me encanta estar en contacto con las personas, ayudarles en lo máximo que pueda y prestarles todos los servicios para que estén satisfechos. Después de 23 años de vivir en la ciudad de Barcelona, vivir aquí en una casa rodeada de casas medievales y campos es un cambio radical necesario para volver a disfrutar de la vida y la verdad muy bonito.

name: COSTA BRAVA, PEACE & 5MIN WALK TO THE BEACH
description:
It is a pleasure to share our Beach House surrounded by Nature 5 min. walk from the beach called Cala Canyelles, on the Costa Brava in a peaceful and unique place.
We offer private room with double bed with private bathroom.
House Exclusively to rest, go to the beach, hammocks to take a siesta, WIFI, Parking. our house has 4 rooms.
These spaces coexist and are shared: terraces, dining rooms, kitchen, gardens.
What to do on the Costa Brava: Hiking, Snorkeling, Kayaking.

The space
Cozy, nice and clean room located 5 MINUTES WALK to the beach at the quiet zone of the Costa Brava.
Authentic Mediterranean beach house of 400m2 where you can discover the Costa Brava beaches, hiking tours along the coast..

You can discover Costa Brava beaches and their unique landscapes.
Spacious house with terraces and gardens where you can have your breakfast or take a nap, living rooms, dining room and common areas with genuine modernistic pai
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet and safe neighborhood. Our neighbors are quite far from us. We offer a lot of privacy.
Local restaurant with Mediterranean gastronomy at the beach under the name Restaurant Cala Canyelles.
Bar at the beach for nice sunsets, daily menu, fresh juices...
Supermarket 5 minutes walk from the house.
Bus stop 5 minutes walk.

name: Els Racons del Fort: Castle in wine territory
description:
A stone building from 1694 having a shape of a fortified castle in the village of Capmany only 14 minutes away from Figueres and 26 minutes from Roses.

The fortified construction has a big garden, two terraces, and a covered outdoor space with a pergola. Swimming pool will be ready April 2022.

Capmany has more than ten wineries and your host Yves can teach you about local cuisine in form of: private dinners, hands-on cooking classes, or local experiences visiting wineries and food producers.

The space
The house offers a very unique feeling of the history that has happened inside and outside its walls. It has been renovated in a very respectful way and host Eli has decorated the house to make you feel good during your stay.

For family gatherings, it is possible to rent the apartments too and come together in the garden and pool.

There is also a huge diaphanous space very suitable for diverse activities such as retreats
neighborhood_overview: Capmany is a village with 614 inhabitants and more than 10 wine cellers. Beautiful walks can be done and the closest beach is a 26 min drive away.
host_about:
I was born in Switzerland and live in Barcelona since I am 8 years old.  I love cooking and I have decided to move from online marketing (10 years working in the field) to Cooking Workshops and private cooking events, following my passion in life.  
------

Nací en Suiza y vivo en Barcelona desde los 8 años. Me encanta cocinar y he convertido esta afición en mi ocupación principal, después de 10 años de marketing online.

name: Rustical house for rent in Pals.
description:
Our house is located in the center of the town. You can walk to the bakery, local market, bars and restaurants in town.
We recommend you to come by car, stay in Pals, and from there visit the other charming little towns and small beaches around.

The space
Our charming house is in the town center. You can walk to the basic services (bakery, post).
It is strategically located: in the country, but only 10 minutes by car from the beautiful Costa Brava beaches.

The house has 3 big doublerooms, and 2 small childrens' room. It has 2 toilettes, one in every floor.
The house is antique, traditionally decorated.
It is fully equipped.

Guests have their private room, and they have access to all the house. We explect them to feel at home!

My parents live, and work, nextdoor. You can contact them anytime.

There are neighbours around the house, they are really nice.

We recommend to come by their ow
neighborhood_overview:
There are neighbours around the house. They are all very nice.
You can walk to the shops, restaurants... and to the old part. To go to the beach you have to drive 10 minutes. There is no parking problem.
host_about:
Soy Irene, la mayor de las tres hermanas. Todas crecimos en Pals, pero vivimos en la ciudad.
Alquilamos la casa donde vivía nuestra abuela, por eso está perfectamente cuidada y equipada.
Mis padres viven, y trabajan, al lado. Siempre hay alguno de nosotros con quien contactar fácilmente.
A todos nos encanta conocer gente nueva, ¡ y recomendarles sitios donde ir!

name: Exclusive! only 45 m. from the sandy beach
description:
“Can Casellas” is an exclusive 18th. century village house in Sant Antoni de Calonge. The perfect location of our beach house in Costa Brava makes it the perfect place to stay whether you are visiting our area for leisure or business, as in our rental village house one finds exclusive serviced accommodation.

The space
The property has been carefully restored with charm, preserving as far as possible its original constructional features and preserving the architectural wooden beams, vaulted ceilings and centennial stone walls that gives warmth and authenticity to the house. The property has been refurbished without sacrificing comfort in order to offer the visitor a pleasant stay.
Distribution:
* Ground floor: the main entrance gives way to the living room opened on a nice dining room (for 10 pax) located under the original roof with Catalan vault.
From the entrance of the house, a long vaulted corridor leads the visitor to a beautiful well-equippe
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a very quiet area, the house is close to all shops, excellent restaurants and health services.
Every year the local beaches receive the blue flag granted by the European authorities for their uncontaminated crystalline waters.
host_about:
Hello! I'm so glad you are interested in renting one of my three properties here, in the heart of the Costa Brava. Each one has something special to offer our guests, a rustic village house with lots of character, a modern elegant family house and a stylish beach front apartment. 
What I love most about my place is the location, out of the ordinary and  literally steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, and the most beautiful beaches anywhere in Spain.
I work in a local real estate agency and I live only five minutes away from all the properties, I will help you make your stay perfect, just ask. I like to meet guests’ needs from before they even step foot in the door. Every year, at the end of the summer season, together with my husband, we plan a new improvements.  
I am very fortunate in that I get to enjoy where I live all year-round. Each season is a special time here on the Costa Brava!

name: Charming & quiet apart. cadaqués
description:
Apartment located in the center of Cadaqués, in a quiet street, one minute from the town square and one minute from Platja Gran. It is very practical because of the situation where it is located, you can walk everywhere.

The space
Charming and quiet apartment of 40 m2, 2 bedrooms, one double and one with a bunk bed (without door). Located in the old town, in the center of town, 30 seconds from the "gran" beach and the town square.

It has a kitchen with all cooking utensils, microwave, induction cooker, toaster, blender and washing machine. The dining room is sunny, with TV and DVD. The bathroom has a shower and sink. The double room consists of a double bed.

The double room consists of a bunk bed with 2 single beds. This last room has no door. The special thing about this apartment is that it is super central and at the same time very quiet and you can walk everywhere.

name: Pet Friendly Mas Torrencito (private outdoor WC)
description:
Possibly the first rural house in Spain for pets that accepts people. It is a different country house, specializing in pets. The whole house is ready for them. Refrain people who do not like pets.

Double room with private outdoor bathroom
Breakfast price: 7,50 - dinners: 15 €

The space
Possibly the best rural house in Girona to go with your pet
Mas Torrencito offers its four-legged and human visitors the possibility of actively enjoying the rural tourism of Girona, among the different options that we propose are the routes that surround the unique environment of Mas Torrencito. Holiday cottages Girona Mas torrencito. Our House - Rural Tourism pets girona Make the best of the nature and beauty of the area by foot, by bike or by car, to get lost in long woods or the hills of the empurdanese plain, long routes that without Doubt if you will be short, from forest to costa brava. No doubt an ideal starting point for rural tourism in Girona, especi
neighborhood_overview: It is an "isolated" house with more than 70 hectares of land, where puppies and people can walk to our langillo ... Surrounded by woods and rivers ... a quiet place where silence is only broken by the singing of the Little birds We are 2 kms from Bascara, 14 from Figueres (museum Dali) 19 from the beach (La Rubina, an immense beach where you can go with your pet), 40 from France, 14 from Besalú and Banyoles, ....
host_about:
NIÑOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÍDEO

Mas Torrencito es una casa rural diferente. Una masía del siglo XV, restaurada con un estilo muy personal, y rodeada de campos, bosques y caminos que llegan hasta un río que merece ser escuchado al menos durante un rato. Su propietario, Miguel, se ha encargado de darle su propia personalidad a la casa durante siete años, creando diferentes rincones en los que puedes charlar con tu pareja disfrutando de una buena botella de vino mientras tus hijos juegan libremente por los alrededores, compartir con otros huéspedes costumbres y (Website hidden by Airbnb) de tus mascotas mientras ves cómo ellas disfrutan y se persiguen felices, o subir a la planta de arriba y escoger una de esas películas que tenías pendiente para hacerte un homenaje frente a una gran pantalla. Puedes hacer lo que quieras, porque en Mas Torrencito la libertad se respira a cada momento y en cada lugar.

Marcos, Manuela y Matías, tres de las mascotas de Miguel, son el auténtico espíritu de la casa. Esos tres perros deberían tener contrato indefinido y pensión vitalicia. Ellos muestran la casa a los nuevos huéspedes, sus 8 confortables habitaciones dobles y triples, los baños completos, el salón de techos altos y vigas de madera, el antiguo horno de pan, la sala de entretenimientos, la piscina y el jardín con mobiliario y juegos para niños. Pero también acompañan a los huéspedes durante los paseos, entretienen a mayores y niños con su buen carácter y sus ganas de jugar, y relacionan con las mascotas recién llegadas con paciencia, cariño y una gran amabilidad.

Mientras tanto, Miguel cocina. Y cómo cocina. Platos elaborados con productos de su propia huerta. Recetas que le chivan las madres de los propietarios de los restaurantes de los alrededores. Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan recién hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del país en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compañía siempre que quieras. También es un lugar ideal para niños, ya que rápidamente se enamorarán de Marcos, Matias y Manuela, probablemente la mejor buscadora de piedras del mundo. Y también es un lugar perfecto para visitar con tu propia mascota, disfrutar de unos días en la naturaleza y que los dos hagáis buenos amigos. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demás.

El único problema de Mas Torrencito es que obliga a volver. Yo ya lo he hecho, y no será la única vez.

name: Beautiful old farmhouse with pool I  (PG-503)
description:
Mas Vinyoles is a Catalan countryside house that is partly converted to offer a pleasant space to you to spend your holidays. We have two comfortable apartments fully equipped (central heating, dishwasher, washing machine). There is a garden with a swimming pool and a barbecue, a biological vegetable garden and an orchard.
We are in the heart of the protected area Les Gavarres, a series of lovely hills covered with Mediterranean forest that go from Girona to the Costa Brava.

The space
Mas Vinyoles is at the same time away from it all and close to everything: Beach, mountains, beautiful cities like Girona, Barcelona, Figueres.... After a full and busy day it is wonderfull to retire to it's unique quietness.
Mas Vinyoles is also ideal for people who look for a peaceful spot for working: good internet (fibra optica) and 10% to 30% discount on long term rent.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the swimming pool, a beautiful garde
neighborhood_overview: We are 33 neighbours in the middle of a protected wooden area.
host_about: I live in "Les Gavarres" since 1985 and I love it. To take care of the forest and the wild life has become an important project of my life. I am happy to realise that every year a new variety of birds discover that this is a good place for them to spend at least part of the year.

name: Tamariu A, two steps from the beach
description:
The space
Sur la magnifique Costa brava, notre appartement à deux niveaux est situé dans le charmant village de Tamariu.

Calme et de décoration agréable ,entièrement rénové à seulement trois minutes à pied de la plage et du centre de Tamariu(il ya même un petit chemin qui vous enmène directement à la plage/baie de Tamariu),cet appartement confortable, et très lumineux vous offre une petite terrasse avec solarium, agréable et intime, deux chambres, une double et une simple (avec 2 lits superposés) et une salle de bains dans un inmmeuble de seulement 2 maisons d´aspect acceuillant pour passer vos jours de détente.

L´appartement est ideal pour profiter de la plage de sable, des criques de tamariu et de la gastronomie locale . la plage bordée d´une variéteé de restaurants de bord de mer, cafés et boutiques est un plaisir pour les soirées d´eté. Ce village pittoresque conserve sans doute, le charme d´antan et l'ambiance familiale décontractée.
Venez

name: Sun d'Aro 50metros on the beach
description:
The space
This apartment is located in Costa Brava, Playa de Aro in Spain and it's situated on the 2nd floor of the building. It is very conveniently located only 50 metres from the beach.

It offers a fully equipped kitchen, living/dining room, 2 bedrooms, and balcony. The kitchen has a microwave, oven, stove and dishwasher, plus a freezer, coffee maker and washing machine. All the apartment have wi fi internet and ACC cold and heat.
Towels and bedding are also included for your convenince. The excellent beach is easily accessible by foot where you can enjoy long walks along the seashore. There are a many good restaurants, bars and other entertaining activities in the vicinity. A parking space is also available near the building.

The coastal resort of Calella de Palafrugell is only a 30 minute drive and the Barcelona airport is an hour drive. Furthermore, the Girona Airport it is about a 40 minutes drive in car. The hotel is 800 meters from a golf
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hello!!
 
My name is Javier, and although I'm originally from Girona, I've been living in Barcelona for the past 25 years, so I know the city and its surroundings quite well.
 
Traveling is one of my favourites hobbies. I love getting to know different cultures and people from around the world. I had the chance to visit many countries, either for fun or for professional reasons, since my last job was as a publisher for trade magazines.
 
I started the business of rental apartments “The Vintage Rentals”  because as a tourist, I lived first hand the benefits of living a local experience wherever I go, and I know other people search the same type of authentic vacations. This is how I got into the this business and now I have apartments in the best areas of Barcelona with all the necessary facilities for an affordable price.
 
I invite you to come and discover a different and unique experience of Barcelona and all its beautiful locations and sites!
 
For further details, do not hesitate to contact me.

name: One bedroom apartment with garden
description:
One bedroom apartment, ground floor, separate kitchen, living room, 2 terraces, private garden with garden furniture, brick BBQ, off road parking, satellite TV, air conditioned, within 7 minutes walk from the sandy blue flag beach of Reills.

The space
One bedroom (double bed and a bunk bed), kitchen, living room, small terrace with a bunk bed, terrace with access to the garden, a garden with evergreen plants, barbecue, table and umbrella. Air conditioning (living room) and satellite TV. To the main beach (Blue Flag) is 600 m, to Carrefour hypermarket 300 m, the old town within 15 minutes walk, the magnificent Girona and Figueras with the Salvador Dali museum in 35 minutes. Promenade along the sea leads to the ruins of Empuries - the first Greek and then Roman capital of the Iberian Peninsula, and further to the walled town of Sant Martí. Unlike the most of resorts town of L'Escala is a real Spanish town with an old center, not full of high-rise hotels, with all
neighborhood_overview:
L'Escala is located between the south of the Gulf of Roses and the Cala (bay) Montgó. Traditionally, the main industry had revolved around fishing, especially sardines and the anchovies of L'Escala. More recently, the most important industry is tourism.

Nobody can present the municipality of L'Escala without mentioning the, located two kilometres away at St. Marti d'Empuries. This wonderful site attracts thousands of visitors every year, not only persons interested in archaeology but also by those who only wish to enjoy a walk in the fresh air in a setting of great beauty.

I am Alexey, love to travel and read.
Married, two children.

neighborhood_overview: The house is in a lively and familial neighbourhood. Sant Feliu de Guixols is a historic coastal town in the Costa Brava. You can enjoy nature at your doorstep with an endless choice of seaside walks, bike and trekking trails in the surrounding mountains. The region has plenty to offer to anyone interested in arts, culture and gastronomy with several festivals running throughout the year.
host_about: Amalia & David se consideran makers. Les gusta crear lugares y objetos desde el diseño conceptual hasta su finalización. Desarrollan y trabajan juntos en proyectos que reflejan sus intereses comunes por el arte, el diseño, la ilustración, la fotografía, la arquitectura, el paisajismo, la vida rural y urbana, la edición literaria, la gastronomía, el hospitality business, la música, el humor y el entretenimiento, por enumerar algunos.

neighborhood_overview: The town of Pals is a medieval walled enclosed, now restored and very well conserved. The first reference to the town dates from 889. With just over 2,800 inhabitants Pals and the surrounding area offer you a wide range of things to do, from organised activities to gastronomic routes with the most exquisite recipes. You can play golf, scuba dive or go windsurfing at the beach of Pals. You can enjoy nature by walking over the dunes or cycling through the rice fields.

name: CAN FELIP - Apartamento 2 (s.XVIII)
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d

name: CASA DE DISEÑO A 450 METROS PLAYA
description:
Impresionante casa, recien reformada, 4 habitaciones, jardín privado además de zona comunitaria con piscina. Totalmente amueblada y a punto para entrar.

The space
La casa consta de dos plantas, la entrada tiene espacio para dejar un coche y otro en el garaje cerrado propio.
En esta planta salón comedor muy amplio, baño de cortesía, cocina espaciosa con salida al jardín y el garage.
En la planta superior, 4 habitaciones: 1 habitación suite con cama de matrimonio y baño propio, además de terraza propia, 1 habitación con cama matrimonio, 1 habitación con dos camas individuales y 1 habitación abierta que puede usarse de despacho, zona de juegos, habitación auxiliar…posibilidad de 2 camas más.
En esta misma planta baño con ducha y baño con bañera en suite.

Guest access
En el jardín privado, un maravilloso porche con cenador cubierto con sofás, sillones, mesa y sillas de exterior. Además la casa dispone de barbacoa de obra propia.
neighborhood_overview:
Urbanización tranquila y familiar muy cerca de la playa, se puede ir andando a la playa y el centro está a 10 minutos caminando.
Toda la oferta a 10 minutos pero con la tranquilidad de una urbanización.
Tienes al lado los pueblos de Palamós y Platja d'Aro.
Situada en plena Costa Brava, con lo que caminando podrá acceder a todas las calas de Sant Antoni.

name: House in Costa Brava with salt pool
description:
Double bedroom in a house with 350m backyard and private salt pool. Very close to the town center, in a very quiet area surrounded by vineyards. 2km away from crystalline beaches where you can practice snorkel. 5km away from Palamós and Platja d'Aro.

The space
House in Calonge. Close to crystalline beaches in a quiet town. The house provides all kind of amenities; indoor garage, private backyard with salt pool and barbecue area. All appliances available and central heating.
3 double bedrooms, the one that is for rent is located on the ground floor and has a private bathroom. There is another bathroom and a toilet. The kitchen, office kind, disposes all menage for cooking and fridge is provided.
Restaurants are near by where you can taste mediterranean cuisine. Also supermarkets and fish market if you prefer to cook yourself.
If you are looking for entertainment and high quality trade, you can find it just 5km away, in both Platja d'Aro and Palamós

host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

name: LA CASA NOVA - Mas with much comfort
description:
The space
The house is a detached stone house near the village Pontós. The farmhouse is situated at 145m altitude and offers a beautiful view out over the valley towards the sea to the east and south. To the north and west, you got the view of the Pyrenees Mountains and its foothills. It is just 20 minutes drive away from the spectacular beaches and coves of the Costa Brava, 15 km from the towns of Figueres where the Dali Museum is situated, from Banyoles with its large lake, and 25 km from Girona with its very attractive old town. Barcelona is situated 130 km south and by car, but also by train, well and quickly accessible.

The farmhouse was built in 1640 on the site of a former Iberian settlement. The house is detached and surrounded by fields and forest. The nature begins thus directly outside the front door. It was renovated very loving and with natural materials. Itoffers all the comforts of a modern home and a homely atmosphere. The large garden, the archi

name: Historic Rural House in Catalonia
description:
This is a 200 year-old historic house rehabilitated by a local architect in the center of medieval town Besalu (Girona), with peaceful garden where to disconnect from the world. County of Garrotxa, a remarkable region plenty of outdoor options.

The space
House is suitable for two families (max capacity is eight), with a private garden and a small natural pool (no chemical depurator). Walking distance from main facilities (supermarket, bakery, press, etc.). Situated in the inner center of old town. Restricted access to cars.

Guest access
Three-level house with private garden. Small natural pool (in the garden). House is fully equipped for self-catering and has washing machine too.

Other things to note
Visit the official Website of Besalu and of the Garrotxa region to learn more about what to do; it's amazing!

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT with POOL TOSSA
description:
Nice, open and bright apartment with terrace, where you can enjoy nice relaxing moments, meals, etc.
Another important detail is the swimming pool, where you can enjoy of the common zone, which you can see from your terrace.

The space
The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 family bathrooms and a wide and open living room. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washing machine. The terrace, has furniture so you can have nice meals outdoors.
It has parking lot in the same building.
The living room has AC, that thanks to its location, can cool all the apartment.
It has room for 6 people, with the following distribution:
- Bedroom with double bed.
- Bedroom with 2 single beds.
- Bedroom with 2 single beds
We have cribs for the babies and high chairs. Please, if needed, ask for it before your travel. It is 15€ for the hole stay.

Guest access
There is a really nice common zone, with grass and a swimming pool,
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very quiet zone, less than 10 minutes away (walking) from the beach, with an easy and flat access, in the middle of the comercial street.
It is a new neighborhood, very spacious and bright with parks and green areas al around.
Just a 2 minutes walk away from a big supermarket and a restaurant.
Four minutes away, is the beautiful comercial zone, with all kind of shops.
Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Wal
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Llançà (Costa Brava)
description:
Apartamento grande, amplio y luminoso, de 3 habitaciones (una suite), 2 cuartos de baño y salón comedor con sofá cama de 150 cm. Las habitaciones y el salón comedor dan a la terraza, de 30 m. en forma de L. Amueblado, con electrodomésticos (TV Led, DVD, lavadora, lavavajillas, microondas...), menaje, ropa de casa y aire acondicionado. Wi-Fi y garaje. Está en una zona muy tranquila del pueblo histórico (la vila). Vistas a las montañas y, un poco, a lo lejos, al mar. Con servicios muy próximos.

The space
Está ubicado en un lugar excepcional, en la zona alta de la vila, muy tranquilo y, a la vez, con todos los servivios cercanos. muy bien comunicado. Confortable y luminoso, con bellas vistas y muy silencioso.

Guest access
Garaje particular cerrado. Se accede por un pasaje particular. Edificio formado por planta baja, donde está el garaje particular (cerrado) y 4 plantas con ascensor, con un piso por planta.

Other things to note</
neighborhood_overview: Está en la “vila” (pueblo histórico), en una zona muy tranquila, con todos los servicios, junto al inicio del parque natural del Cabo de Creus, con vistas a las montañas y, un poco, al mar, a unos quince (o veinte) minutos andando del puerto y de la playa más cercana. Está a media hora de Girona, hora y media de Barcelona, a 10-20 minutos de El Port de la Selva, Portbou, Perelada, Figueres, Garriguella, Pau, unos 30 de Cadaqués, y cerca de l’Escala, Begur, Pals, Olot, Colliure, Céret, Perpignan, Carcassone...
host_about: Soy profesora de secundaria, ya inactiva. Me encanta el cine y la literatura. Soy persona pacífica y de gustos tranquilos. Soy muy respetuosa con la propiedad ajena y con los gustos de cada cual. Me gusta conversar de forma sincera y directa.

name: Best terrace of Costa Brava
description:
In the very first line of the sea, and only a dozen meters from the water, you will have the sensation of sailing through the interior of Satuna Bay, one of the 25 best beaches in Europe according to "The Guardian".

Satuna is the smallest, most romantic and quiet of the three coves of the municipality of Begur (Costa Brava - Girona). Has managed to preserve the air and the size that his former fishermen gave him. And its tranquility is only disturbed by the winds of East and Tramontana.

The space
Large apartment of 140sqm (1507sq feet, with 4 bedrooms, and two magnificent terraces that views the cove and the sea, just 10 meters from the water.
Unique property on the seafront, in the heart of Costa Brava.

With two huge terraces from which you can see the whole bay, from the beach to the open sea and the sunrise.

Inside, a living room with marble flooring (designed by architect Josep Llinàs in 80's), which is elevated so that
neighborhood_overview: Cala Sa Tuna embodies the foreigner’s vision of the Mediterranean, with narrow whitewashed houses that accentuate the craggy bay. A place of large family lunches, gnarled old men and brightly coloured fishing boats, it’s the kind of village you see in travel brochures, but rarely in real life.

Fan of mountain (nearly everything except running), ethnography, and bricolage.
I like to discover and keep the old paths.
We are a family with 2 daughters: Jana (8) and Neus (5).

name: El Molí d' en Solà. Les Moles. PG-18
description:
Charming appartment in an ancient mill-farmhouse in a green peaceful valley, between the Costa Brava and the Pyrinees. Perfect place for a relaxed holiday in the country.
July minimun nights 4
August minimun nights 7.
Swimming-pool shared from june to september.
Children under 14 have to go aconpagnated in the pool by an adult (over 18 yerars old).

The space
Our house, El Moli d'en Solà, is a Catalan farmhouse situated in a privileged environment for its beauty and peacefulness. It dates back to the fourteenth century. The house is surrounded by meadows and forests and the river that moved the mill is clean and perfect for swimming. If you find it too cold you can also bath in the pool(open from june to september)

Guest access
The house has a large communal green area with playground playground and football goal.
Each unit has access to its own BBQ and shared pool (open from June to September ).
The old mill
neighborhood_overview:
The house is at the bottom of a valley in a rural area with few isolated farmhouses. It is a green and quiet corner, away from the madding crowd but only 5 minutes from the village.
We are in the region of La Garrotxa, which is famous for its volcanoes, the Fageda d'En Jorda and medieval villages like Santa Pau, Besalu. It is an excellent starting point for trips to the Costa Brava or the Pyrenees, as we are between the two sites.
host_about: We are a family in love with the place where we live. It's a special place and we want to share it with people. That's why part of our house has appartments for guests.

name: Just us 2, in a cozy apartment in the mountains!
description:
in English...

Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Green Apartment...
· Is a 20 m2 room with no balcony. There is a common outside space one floor below.
· Suitable for a couple and eventually a baby or a small child.
· Double bed (160cm) and private bath room.
· Kitchenette suitable for breakfasts and/or a simple meal preparation. With fridge, microwave and kitchen utensils.
· Central heating and tv&wifi. All the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peacful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orqu
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' wal
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.
neighbourhood: Montagut i Oix, la Garrotxa, Cataluña, Spain

name: Space Oasis - a tranquil and stylish retreat.
description:
Space Oasis is your haven of peace and quiet just a stones throw away from the beautiful beaches and bustling towns of the fabulous Costa Brava - a truly welcoming escape for friends & family to settle back, relax and unwind - hammock in the garden, a dip in the pool, fire pit BBQ, dinner & drinks on the terrace and total privacy as the space is all yours. Bliss!

The space
Space Oasis Holiday Villa is the perfect destination for groups of up to 12 people looking for somewhere a little bit special. We had a lot of fun creating the 'Pop Art' guest accommodation and love sharing our distinctive home with appreciative and laid-back friends from all over the globe.

Our living spaces are split into sections all accessible from a large central courtyard with 100 m2 terrace & 10 x 5 m swimming pool. The main guest house has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a lovely spacious open plan kitchen/diner/living area with a wall of glass doors opening out to the terrace
neighborhood_overview: The setting is really special and unique. We enjoy lots of peace, quiet and tons of privacy but are just minutes away from some of the most stunning old towns and fabulous beaches in Europe. Pals old town is truly unique with narrow stone streets and a multitude of great restaurants and shops and Begur, Girona and Barcelona are of course bucket list places to visit.  If action and activities tickle your fancy then there is fab scuba diving on the Illes Medes a few minutes drive away plus skiing in the Pyrenees, road and mountain biking, great walking routes and beaches & sparkling little coves to die for all up and down the coast.
host_about:
Welcome to our Space Oasis! My name is Amalia, I am English/Canadian and my husband Dani is Russian. We met here on the Costa Brava, have lived here for almost 15 years. We speak EspanglishRuss together!

I work from home whereas Dani manages a super yacht in Barcelona and is often out 'at sea'. We both enjoy travelling and finding adventure when we can doing outdoorsy stuff like motorbiking or cycling; on-and-off road, horse riding and long dog hikes, but more often than not we're both working or relaxing in the garden at home. Well, to be honest, usually Dani is doing the gardening whilst I practise juggling, hula hoop, poi - or whatever is the latest skill I'm learning off YouTube!
 I'm a passionate animal lover and have 2 dogs, 8 cats and 1 horse. When I'm relaxing I love to just hang out with my animals and read a book. Guests have full access to my large library of books. Quite a few are beach-read best sellers - perfect for holidaymakers.

As we are often out-and-about our good friend Amber Jane will help you with  enquiries and bookings in the first instance and I will meet you when you arrive at Space Oasis Holiday Villa.

I will be here to help you get settled in but once I give you the keys my house is yours to enjoy in your own way. 

I like to share my house with good people , all I ask is that you respect my belongings and we both respect each others privacy. Other than that: 
Eat, Drink, Swim and Make Merry!

name: Dream Architect in Costa Brava
description:
The space
The house, which opened in 2010, is built on one of the last available sites in the old town of Begur, is 5 minutes from downtown and at the same time enjoying 600m2 of land equipped with porch, lawn and pool perfectly oriented to the Mediterranean. The house style is a blend of contemporary lines solved with technology and materials. Environmentally friendly, using organic materials, and home automation systems to ensure maximum comfort. It features a bedroom suite with Jacuzzi tub and shower room with a big window facing the Mediterranean. Two rooms with shared bathroom also overlooking the sea and the castle. And fourth room free to the main body of the house with a window looking at the bottom of the pool. The kitchen dining room is set in a single room under a massive dome-shaped cover Catalan. You can park up to 3 cars. Fully exposed to the sun.

Licencia: HUTG-001233

Guest access
There are three parking spaces in the house.
neighborhood_overview: Begur is a medieval village, situated 400m from the sea level around a castle that served as protection from pirates. It is surrounded by numerous small beaches only by the emerald water and the cuisine. The house is oriented toward the valley that ends at the beach Aiguafreda and enjoys magnificent views of the horizon of the Mediterranean and the castle of Carmen Amaya. Front of the house, and almost runs into the sea with a forest of oaks that have just trekking routes on the beach.
host_about:
Born in Brazil, Catalan by choice.
Since 1998, from Monday to Friday I live in Barcelona and from Friday to Sunday, in Begur.
Sharing life with a husband, 2 wonderful daughters and a huge dog!
