name: Family 5, cozy & independent stay in the mountains
description:
Can Banal Rural is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Yellow Apartment
It is a cosy 40 m2 multi-space apartment with bed & bath-room, own kitchen & dining.
Beautiful views and tranquility.
Fits for couples as well for families.
Equipped with a double bed (160cm) and 3 bed places more, up in a loft compartment, suitable from around 5 up to15 years of age. Smaller children might sleep down in an adding bed or with their parents.
Central heating, tv&wifi, gas stove, micro-wave, fridge, extractor and a small balcony.
There are all the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is amazing, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season.
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' wal
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

Owner rent spacious apartment of 100 m2 -Not Shared!- (7 pers. Max.) With stunning sea and mountain views, the harbor and the town of Llançà, with two terraces with garden furniture (table + chairs), large living room with fireplace , solid wood rustic furniture, sofa and armchairs, TV TNT SAT, large windows and terrace for breakfast, lunch and dinner, one guest bathroom (toilet + sink), 1 bathroom (bath with glass partitions, toilet, sink , washing machine), equipped kitchen (microwave, oven, toaster, juicer, coffee maker, refrigerator + freezer), 2 double rooms (1 with terrace for breakfast), 1 double, 1 single.

The house is in a very quiet residential area called 'The Battery / La Batería', on top of a hill overlooking the village on one side and the other side the Port of Llançà, which is accessible on foot and by car. The nearest beaches and coves are within 500 meters walk. Supermarkets, shops, children's entertainment park and restaurants very cl

name: Fantástico Alojamiento Noa
description:
Situado en la bella vila de Blanes, portal de la Costa Brava, es un acogedor apartamento con una decoración exquisita y con todo lo necesario para unas vacaciones inolvidables. En zona tranquila y muy próxima a centros comerciales, centro de la villa y a las bellas playas y calas.
DEL 15 DE OCTUBRE 2022 A 31 DE MARZO DE 2023 LA CAPACIDAD MAXIMA DEL ALOJAMIENTO, ESTARÁ LIMITADA A DOS PERSONAS.
En los meses de Julio y Agosto la estancia mínima debe ser de 5 noches.

The space
Alojamiento construido en el año 2014, en zona residencial, se han realizado reformas de mejoras y ampliación en el año 2020. Ideal para disfrutar de unas vacaciones relajadas, pero muy próximo al centro de la villa y la zona de ocio y playas. Dispone de una gran terraza donde se encuentra una fantástica barbacoa, con una nevera y un gran Jacuzzi (NO CLIMATIZADO-NO AGUA CALIENTE) y una zona de tumbonas para disfrutar del sol, donde se puede pasar muy bonitas veladas. En el interior u
neighborhood_overview: Zona muy tranquila, donde podrá estacionar con toda tranquilidad y seguridad su vehículo. Esta muy bien comunicada al haber parada de bus a 50 metros del alojamiento.
host_about: Me considero persona amable y cordial, dispuesto a que el viajero se encuentre como en su propia casa y se lleve un recuerdo inolvidable de su estancia y trato recibido.

description:
Habitaciones con desayuno en casa rural del s. XV a diez kilómetros de Girona y a 25 del mar (Playa de Aro). Lugar aislado y tranquilo en el Espacio Natural de les Gavarres. Wi-Fi. Terraza bajo una parra para las noches de verano.

The space
Masia con cinco siglos a cuestas, restaurada con todas las comodidades. Con campos, bosques y prados. Dentro del espacio natural protegido de Les Gavarres. Rutas marcadas de senderismo y bicicleta desde la puerta de la casa. Centro de la ciudad de Girona a doce kilómetros.

Guest access
Desayuno incluido. Libre acceso a toda la casa (salas, biblioteca, terrazas, baños, etcètera) excepto las dos habitaciones ocupadas por el anfitrión. Libre acceso a la cocina.

Other things to note
Motociclistas bienvenidos. Motorbike friendly. Garaje donde cerrar las motos. Herramientas.

name: Śruti Home: casa rústica con encanto HUTG-015653
description:
Casa de pueblo muy bien restaurada, con paredes de piedra vista y suelo típico de baldosín.
Ambientado con detalles de alrededor del mundo y con todas las comodidades de una vivienda actual!
Pequeña terraza con grandes vistas.
Situada en el centro del pueblo medieval de Corçà , dotado con varios restaurantes (uno de ellos con 2 estrellas Michelín), panaderia, dos colmados y un supermercado.
A 20 km de la costa: Playa de Pals, Begur, Estartit...
Rodeado campos y otros pueblitos medievales

The space
Preciosa casa de pueblo del 1750a, muy bien restaurada y con las comodidades de una vivienda actual. Mitad de piedra vista, mitad pintada de blanco
PLANTA BAJA:
Entrada a pie de calle, cocina y gran mesa de comedor
PRIMERA PLANTA:
Sala de estar, balconcito, sofá y lectura
SEGUNDA PLANTA:
Habitación estudio con cama de matrimonio (futón )
Baño completo con bañera
TERCERA PLANTA
Terraza con vistas
neighborhood_overview:
¿Que puedes hacer fuera de casa?

Ir a la playa, senderismo, en bicicleta, rutas en coche, navegar, montar a caballo, volar en avioneta, en globo, una comida campestre, turismo, compras...
host_about:
Nos gusta la vida relajada y llena de cosas que nos hagan felices.
Ambos nacidos en Barcelona pero afincados en el Empordà (Costa Brava) desde hace más de veinte años.

Trabajamos en "Espai Tònic" un espacio propio dedicado al arte contemporaneo ubicado en una antigua bóbila restaurada, donde desarrollamos  proyectos de diseño gráfico y arte textil, y gestionamos y promovemos exposiciones y eventos culturales. Bienvenidos a visitarnos, ¡está a 10 km de casa.!

Living in small village in countryside but going often to Barcelona for some work around sound and language research - Loving eco-live

name: Masia dels Plans  16 pax
description:
Masia d'Els Plans is located in the province of Girona in the pre-Pyrenees mountain range, between the regions of La Garrotxa and Osona at an altitude of 1,200 metres.
The house is completely isolated and surrounded by green meadows and forests with panoramic views to the top of Puigsacalm and Santa Magdalena mountains.
At Masia d'Els Plans we are as respectful of the environment as possible. The farmhouse has been restored maintaining the structure of the original building,.

The space
The farmhouse has four rooms with four beds in each room and a bathroom inside each one.
The entire house and its surroundings are rented to a single group, it is not shared with other groups of people.
It is a perfect place to organize meetings of family and friends groups.

Guest access
There is a game's room with table tennis and table football. Board games and children's boooks.
On the terrace porch there is a barbecue with firew
neighborhood_overview: The house is totally isolated in the middle of the nature, between mountains and surrounded by meadows and forests. With a wonderful panoramic view.

name: El Serradell West - Your cottage in Alta Garrotxa
description:
El Serradell is an old "masia" (Catalan country house) which has been divided into two 2-storey appartments for 4/ 6 PAX each.
El Serradell is located in a magnificent remote outdoor setting, on a large estate with spectacular views overlooking the Catalan Pyrenees and the Garrotxa to the south. The house is 2hrs away from Barcelona, 1hr away from Girona, Figueres and the French border.
Access through 12km of forest road in good condition, you'll have to drive slowly.

The space
Typical "masia", or Catalan country house, dating back to the 10th century, but totally renovated in style and comfort.
This is your place if you are looking for nature, quiet and the best comfort.
The house is totally disconnected from the grid, and uses solar power and biomass for electricity and heating. Water supply from the nearby spring.

Guest access
Each appartment has an independent entrance and independent outdoor areas. The only shared
neighborhood_overview: El Serradell is located at the heart of the protected natural area of Alta Garrotxa, at an altitude of almost 1000m , surrounded by silence and holm oak, pine and beech groves.

name: Duplex con magíficas vistas !
description:
Duplex en el "Cau del Llop". Dos habitaciones (una habitación simple con una cama-nido y otra habitación con cama de matrimonio) y dos baños con duchas. Dos terrazas con vistas al mar!

The space
PISO SUPERIOR: En el salón-comedor con vistas al mar, hay un sofá cama (1,20m x 2,00m) y una
mesa para 6 personas. Se puede acceder a la terraza a través de un ventanal de vidrio. La cocina está totalmente equipada con nevera, congelador, cocina, horno, microondas, cafetera, utensilios de cocina,etc.
PISO INFERIOR: La habitación doble tiene una cama de matrimonio (1,40m x 2,00m) y una salida
directa a la terraza con vistas al mar. El lavabo tiene un WC y una ducha. La habitación simple tiene una cama-nido con dos plazas de (2 x 0,80m x 1,90m) y una salida a una habitación pequeña con la lavadora y utensilios para lavar ropa. En esta
misma salida hay una ducha exterior, que normalmente se usa al volver de la playa.

Guest access
L
neighborhood_overview:

name: Villa Extravagance 8 pax pool-beach
description:
#Modern Villa to #rent  in #Lloret de Mar on the Costa Brava. Total area more than 340 m2. Villa has  4 bedrooms (2 of them Suite), 4 bathrooms, separate kitchen, dining room, large living room, terrace with dining table and chairs, closed garage for 4 cars, to the sea 400 meters, house with swimming pool and barbecue. Capacity for 10 persons.

The space
Exterior:
Vila is located in the prestigious urbanization of Cala Tortuga, far from the city noise and at the same time near the centre of Lloret de Mar. House with swimming pool, barbecue and large terrace from where you can join beautiful sea view.
Cala Canyelles beach is about 7 min by car; there are two restaurants, cafes on the beach, yacht club. The centre of Lloret de Mar 5 minutes by car.
Within 10-15 minutes by car there is a Water world, children's entertainment Park and Dolphinarium.

Guest access
General
- air conditioning
- central heating
- Privat
neighborhood_overview:
Lloret de Mar’s diversity will make your holiday unforgettable
Villa Extravagance is so entertaining that you’ll almost forget about Lloret de Mar and the beach. Nevertheless, it’s only 2 km away Lloret de Mar’s centre and promenade so, in the unlikely event of you getting bored, you can always pay a visit to it. First of all, you can walk over the pebble sand beach and dip in the Mediterranean Sea. Besides all the tourist and cultural sightseeing, you’ll find many other interesting places.

And what about a city trip, or discovering other villages and places in the surroundings? Cities like Girona or Barcelona are easily reachable by car or public transport (from the bus station of Lloret de Mar). Villa Extravagance is also very well located to have a one day trip to a small and almost forgotten place, like Banyoles, Besalú, Rupit or the Sau reservoir.

name: Luxury Villa&Spa, 10m from the sea
description:
MAS TORROELLA is a superbly restored Catalan farmhouse dating from the 14th Century. A large and roomy property both inside and out, the house radiates unassuming grandeur and luxury yet has all the home comforts, mod-cons and facilities such as its own spa, sauna, gym, tennis court and outdoor swimming pool.

The space
Thanks to its excellent location, guests can disconnect and enjoy complete privacy and seclusion at Mas Torroella which is set amid protected pine and cork forests. Yet just a short drive away, you find rustic villages dotted along the coast and inland where you can discover the essence, the character and gastronomy of this romantic region.

Mas Torroella´s scrupulous restoration highlights some amazing details such as Baroque style hand-painted ceiling friezes, traditional stone windows and rustic stone walls. These features combine with grace and luxurious finishing touches to give a lasting unique, magical feeling the moment you step f
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Mas Torroella was built in the XIV century. When my father bought it in 1989 it was an abandoned stone ruin crying to be loved and cared for by somebody... And he spent most of his life rebuilding it, investing all his love and passion to create his dream. When my father passed away, my husband and I decided to fulfill his dream and complete the restoration... now our historic masia has been turned into a charming luxury villa & spa.
Most of our guests agree that you can feel peace, tranquility and love inside and outside our house. We are proud of it and must admit that, after a long and hard period of restoration, it has been worthwhile.
We have really put lots of effort and lots of love in restoring it... and I hope this can be seen in the result...

I am sure the Villa will be up to your standards and that you will be able to enjoy the holiday you have wished for, here with us in the Costa Brava.
We will do our best to make it happen!

name: Apartament Costa Brava
description:
Bonito apartamento para disfrutar a tope de su estancia en la Costa Brava.
A 400 metros de la playa, podras escoger entre múltiples posibilidades turísticas, deportivas, culturales y gastronómicas.
El apartamento es cómodo y agradable, con mucha luz, bien cuidado. Tiene terraza con barbacoa para comer al aire libre.
Dispone de todo lo necesario.
Se admiten mascotas educadas.
Ubicado en zona tranquila y de turismo familiar.

The space
Amplio y luminoso, todo exterior, con vistas. En el se respira bienestar y comodidad.
Puede alojar cómodamente hasta 6 personas.
Dispone de todo lo necesario, cocina grande y bien equipada con cafetera, microondas, batidora, tostadora. Además les proporcionamos artículos y especias como café, sal, azúcar, aceite, especias, detergente y productos limpieza,.
.. Baño completo con secador de pelo y artículos de higiene personal como gel de baño, champú, botiquín,. .
Las 2 habitaci
neighborhood_overview:
Zona dels salats. Es una zona tranquila, peró a la Vez cercana lo cual permite ir caminando a la playa o al centro. La playa esta justo al final de la misma calle, a cinco minutos caminando.
El centro y el puerto estan a unos 15 minutos a pie, agradable paseo Marítimo.
De junio a septiembre Tenemos un supermercado justo al lado.
L'Estartit cuenta con una magnífica playa de 5 km. De arena fina y poco profunda, con todos los servicios, animados chiringuitos y una amplia oferta de actividades nauticas y submarinismo. Tiene playa que admite perros, LA PLATERA-
L'Estartit, con les Illes Medes, paraiso del buceo, navegacion a vela, y todos los deportes acuaticos. Dentro del parque natural Montgri-Illes Medes, permite el senderismo y avistamiento pájaros.
host_about:
Enamorada de la Costa Brava, de Girona i del Pirineo. Practico senderismo y no hay nada comparable a descubrir rincones maravillosos y contemplar la naturaleza, tanto en los caminos de ronda como en los numerosos GR-
Intento cuidar todos los detalles para proporcionar a mis huespedes unas vacaciones inolvidables. Me apasiona la lectura y manualidades.

name: Wood cabin in the middle of nature
description:
A pinewood cabin set in lush setting within rural camping

The space
Great little cabin, (pod) set under cool trees, and fresh grass. Fits snugly into a pitch
within rural camping in the middle of the countryside, just 3km from Besalú.
Inside the cabin there are comfortable beds(large double bed, and 2 singles - or 2 doubles) Outside kitchen with fridge and double gas ring cooker. Pots and pans, knives forks, cups and glasses etc all included.Bathroom facilities
located a few meters from Pod. Camping in comfort with the added addition of melodic nightingales to lull you to sleep.

Guest access
A large communal swimming pool, bar/restaurant/terrace. Free Wifi, ping pong and lots of fresh air and open space

Other things to note
We provide sheets and towels for an extra 20€ if requested.

name: Can Nentia, encantadora casa de Turismo Rural.
description:
Can Nentia es una hermosa casa rural del siglo XIX que recupera la hospitalidad de las antiguas casas de pueblo, con amplias estancias y rincones acogedores. En el corazón del Baix Empordà, entre el mar y la montaña, aún existen lugares donde disfrutar de unos días inolvidables. A tan solo 20 minutos de nuestra casa estan las playas más maravillosas de la Costa Brava, lo cual os permite disfrutar de un fantástico día y retiraros al atardecer a Can Nentia para gozar de la paz y el descanso.

The space
En Can Nentia encontrará un amplio comedor muy iluminado, con bóveda catalana, en el que podrá disfrutar de grandes momentos, en la mejor compañía.
Una acogedora cocina con chimenea, donde podrá preparar unas tostadas con pan con tomate y carne a la brasa.
Una entrada muy grande que hace de distribuidor de los espacios.
Habitación Romero, con cama de matrimonio y baño con ducha. Una combinación perfecta entre piedra y madera, calidez y bienestar.
neighborhood_overview: El pueblo de Fonteta está situado a pie de las Gavarres, prácticamente a la entrada de sus bosques, justo a la derecha del arroyo que lleva su nombre. El núcleo urbano forma un conjunto compacto de calles estrechas en el entorno de la iglesia parroquial de Santa María. Algunas de sus calles conservan aún el antiguo empedrado y le dan un característico aspecto rural de pueblo marcadamente ampurdanés. El edificio más singular y notable del núcleo, además de algunas casas de gran valor histórico y arquitectónico, es la iglesia parroquial de Santa María, que debía existir ya el 904.
host_about: Soy un hombre trabajador, amante del hogar y la familia, gran amigo de mis amigos, mi gran pasión es mi huerto. Trabajo de constructor, lo que me ha permitido restaurar la casa que ahora les ofrezco, espero que la disfruten.

name: Old Farmer House in Rural Village
description:
Cal Pedrals is early nineteenth century, next to the Sant Climent Church of (1037) in the most emblematic square of Urús, a charming rural village of La Cerdanya (Pyrenees). Preserves the architectural elements characteristics of the area.

The space
Urus is a small nearby town situated at the foot of the Alp and Tossa de la sierra Moixeró in full Cerdanya, in the Catalan Pyrenees them. It trafficking in a quiet and cozy village of unos 200 habitantes with excellent views over the valley of the mountains that rodean ya.
In front of the house must be located Pedrals San Clemente church dating from the year 1037.

Guest access
The price indicated in the announcement is for 6 people.

I can apply for departures up 4x4 with a guide.

Other things to note
-Alp (5’)
-Puigcerdà (15’)
-Molina i Masella (15’)
-La Seu d’Urgell (40’)
-Andorra (45’)

neighborhood_overview:
Cerdanya is a mountainous region with a high flat only because it is one of the wider valleys of Europe, between the Moixeró and the Pyrenees. In Cerdanya can find scenic beauty and diversity that make it unique.

Time in this region is variable, but mostly sunny throughout the year. The slopes have a high high mountain climate, while the lower slopes and plains enjoy a continental Mediterranean climate prone mountainous, with cold winters and cool summers.

In Cerdanya can enjoy variety of outputs, meadows, forests, beech, mountain ranges, massive rivers, lakes, peaks, a unique ... that offers a wide range of possibilities.
host_about:
Soy residente y autóctono de la comarca y me gusta dar a mis huéspedes , toda la información y asesoramiento necesario para que su estancia en mi casa y en La Cerdanya , sea lo más satisfactoria y agradable para que se sientan como en su casa y vuelvan en próximas ocasiones a disfrutar de este privilegiado valle;
LA CERDANYA

name: Maravillosa suite  en la Costa Brava
description:
En la tercera planta, el ático, una Suite grande, espaciosa y muy luminosa, independiente del resto de la casa. No cocina.
Cama doble, un baño completo, un vestidor, calefacción y aire acondicionado.Y una terraza de 15m con puesta de sol y vistas a la montaña.
La casa fue renovada en 2010 con un estilo moderno.
Una casa muy luminosa, muy cálida y acogedora.
A 10 min. de la playa en coche y a 5 min. de la vía verde a pie o en bicicleta.

The space
Ca La Baba, es una antigua casa de pueblo restaurada, con un estilo y diseño moderno, y equipada con las máximas comodidades.
Muy bien ubicada en Palafrugrell, es perfecta como base para explorar la Costa Brava y el Ampurdán. A sólo 10 minutos tanto de las playas como de las montañas dónde realizar trekking y excursiones.
La casa dispone de tres partes diferenciadas y a la vez integradas entre sí.
En la planta baja, encuentras una acogedora y espaciosa sala de yoga, que regenta Sua,
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell – Costa Brava
A pocos quilómetros del mar y la montaña, Palafrugell es un municipio de la comarca del Baix Empordà, en plena Costa Brava, en el que puedes encontrar la tranquilidad del mundo rural o el movimiento de un importante destino turístico.
Rodeado de naturaleza puedes descubrir las calas más representativas de la Costa Brava como Calella, Llafranc, Tamariu y Agua Xelida y a la vez practicar excursiones por el macizo Les Gavarres, el GR-92 por los caminos de ronda de la Costa Brava o por las vías verdes del municipio.
Palafrugell es perfecto para disfrutar en pareja, familia y amigos.
host_about: Soy madre de dos niños y profesora de yoga. Vivo en la casa restaurada de mis abuelos, y después de unos años viviendo en ciudades grandes he vuelto a mis orígenes para así poder darles a mis hijos la calidad de vida que se merecen. Disfruto mucho de la naturaleza que hay en este entorno maravilloso que es l'Empordà.

An ideal place to discover and enjoy the Costa Brava.

The space
Our house is a lovely retreat in a country setting, from which you can plan the most wonderful day-trips in Catalonia: going to swim to the neighboring beaches, or visiting the Roman ruins of Empuries, and even spending a whole day in Girona or in Barcelona. The house offers a beautiful private garden with a swimming pool and wonderful views.
It is an ideal place to spend the holidays for families with children, and specially with kids up to 16 years old.

The house is fully equipped to enjoy a comfortable accommodation. Includes linens and bath towels. It also has a maintenance service for the garden and the pool.

Around Llampaies you can do all kind of outdoor activities: cycling, horse riding, tennis, golf, diving, windsurfing. From the house you can take nice walks in the countryside.

Although the best thing is to have your own car, in the neighboring village

name: El Molí d' en Solà. Golfes Oest PG 204
description:
Charming appartment in an ancient mill-farmhouse in a green peaceful valley, between the Costa Brava and the Pyrinees. Perfect place for a relaxed holiday in the country.

The space
Our house, El Moli d'en Solà, is a Catalan farmhouse situated in a privileged environment for its beauty and peacefulness. It dates back to the fourteenth century. The house is surrounded by meadows and forests and the river that moved the mill is clean and perfect for swimming. If you find it too cold you can also bathe in the pool.

Guest access
The house has a large communal green area with playground
Each unit has access to its own BBQ and shared pool (open from June 1 to September 31).
The old mill and a small collection of antique farm tools can be visited.
We also have a small farm where children can meet our chickens, ponies, pigs, donkeys ...

License number
PG-000204
neighborhood_overview:
The house is at the bottom of a valley in a rural area with few isolated farmhouses. It is a green and quiet corner, away from the madding crowd but only 5 minutes from the village.
We are in the region of La Garrotxa, which is famous for its volcanoes, the Fageda d'En Jorda and medieval villages like Santa Pau, Besalu. It is an excellent starting point for trips to the Costa Brava or the Pyrenees, as we are between the two sites.
host_about: We are a family in love with the place where we live. It's a special place and we want to share it with people. That's why part of our house has appartments for guests.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just 1 minute walk from the beach, like restaurants and supermarket.
You will find the shopping street with all kinds of shops just 2 minutes walk, and the area of the old town 4 minutes.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the commercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours, visit all the little and hidden beaches around, and so many other things we can recommend, according t
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Luxury house in green oasis, huge pool, fab views!
description:
This is a spacious house with uninterrupted views of the stunning Mediterranean for people who want fun and exploration but value comfort and relative peace when they get back from their excursions.

It is light, spacious and very comfortable, with a/c, high speed, unlimited wifi and well-equipped kitchen.

The shared pool is very large - for swimming in, not splashing, and never crowded.

We use Maremar ourselves and want to keep it like a home. You will feel like our personal guests!

The space
Maremar is our holiday home not "a rental". Everything is designed with our own comfort in mind - from the extra comfortable beds and bedding to the A/C and unlimited wifi to the well equipped kitchen to the fact you will not have to go shopping for loo rolls and tea bags as soon as you arrive!

We have one of the largest houses in our community, which means you will not be cramped.

Our town is one of the very best on th
neighborhood_overview:
The beauty of Sant Feliu de Guixols is that it is a prosperous Catalan town visited by the well-healed of Barcelona and France. It is not a town that relies on packing visitors together like sardines and offering them a uniform touristic experience.

It has all of the best resort amenities but has not had to go "down market" to attract visitors and therefore attracts people who are genuinely interested in a Catalan experience (although the inhabitants do speak many languages).

You will have access to many beautiful coves, stunning beaches and all of that, but also history, first class gastronomy and fantastic art such as the three Salvador Dali properties.

You can spend the day on the beach or exploring the marina or the fishing port. You can enjoy first class shopping and night life. But then you can come "home" to relative peace and tranquility at Maremar.
host_about:
I am a semi retired company director and chartered accountant who has escaped to travel and have fun!

I love good company, food, wine, music, experiences and kind thoughtful people.

My wife and I delight in helping people to have really memorable holidays and experiences - we get a real buzz out of it!
neighbourhood: Sant Feliu de Guíxols, Catalonia, Spain

name: Large family-an Apartment for an independent stay!
description:
Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Terracotta Apartment...
· Is a 60 m2 large room, suitable max 7 persons – preferently a large family.
· There is a double bed (160cm), a bunk bed and a bed-sofa.
· The kitchen is equipped with gas cooking-stove, micro-wave and an extractor.
· It has a large furnished balcony with a pleasant view.
· Central heating and tv&wifi. There are all the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items)
· It is a good reunion room for medium size groups.
· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peaceful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' wal
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

name: Cosy Modern Family Apartment with Mountain Views
description:
Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged each retaining its own individual historic charm while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Can Cruanyes (Alzina) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

The vaulted ceilings and original window frames are reminders of the farmhouse as it once was, while the large window into the open plan kitchen/livingroom gives a lovely vantage point onto the adjacent woodland of holm oak, pine and hackberry trees.

Seclu
neighborhood_overview:
Can Cruanyes is set within the Alta Garrotxa. Nature will be your neighbour while you are here. Immerse yourself in the forests, mountain views and valleys.

However we are well connected to local villages and towns including Tortella and Besalu. In Tortella you can buy all the basics including artesan bread. Besalu in only 10 mins in the car and has some wonderful restaurants.
host_about: I'm Donny from Ireland and I enjoy meeting people from all over the world. I don't travel as much as before I had kids but meeting my guests helps me feel like I'm still travelling and learning about new cultures. I love helping people discover the area, and letting them in on the little local gems that I've discovered over the years.

name: Villa de diseño en la Costa Brava
description:
es un chalet de diseño moderno y lineal, con piscina privada, jardin con cesped, zona de barbacoa y zona de juegos para los niños (columpio, tobogan, mesa y sillas, y cajon de arena).El chalet tiene disponibilidad para 10 personas, las habitaciones estan distribuidas en dos dobles, una cuatriple,otra habitación individual y un plegatin, dos baños completos, uno de ellos con bañera de hidromasaje doble.Dispone de un gran vestidor y cocina moderna y actual, en el comedor podran disfrutar de la televisión de 49 pulgadas y el sistema dolby surround.

Un chalet destinado a los mas exigentes.

Alrededores

Como una tela en la que la naturaleza ha querido combinar, primorosa y armónicamente, el verde intenso de las pinedas, la rotundidad de las rocas, la dulzura de la arena dorada y el fulgor del azul intenso del mar. Así es la Costa Brava. De Blanes a Portbou, el catálogo de vivencias contiene propuestas tan esenciales como los parques naturales del Cap de Creus

2 habitaciones, salón-comedor con impresionantes vistas al mar, cocina abierta, bonita terraza.

Refugio ideal para disfrutar de una playa tranquila y de un rincón precioso de la Costa Brava y sus pueblos medievales.

Apartamento con vistas al mar, a 10 pasos de la arena en una zona segura, donde padres y niños pueden disfrutar de la naturaleza en libertad y tranquilidad.

HUTG022377

The space
El apartamento es acogedor, funcional y luminoso (orientado a este, sur y oeste) pensado para disfrutar de la playa, el mar, la cocina y el entorno natural del Empordà. Se va a pie al supermercado, mercado (en julio y agosto), al golf, escuela náutica, etc.

neighborhood_overview:
La playa de Pals es muy familiar en verano. El espacio de parking es limitado, lo cual hace que no haya mucha gente en la playa.
Si le gusta el golf o el pitch&putt, tiene varios campos muy cerca.
El pueblo antiguo de Pals es precioso y muy bien restaurado. Los pueblos de la zona como Peretallada le encantarán también.
Si le gusta la gastronomía, la oferta es muy variada en la zona y puede con mucha antelación reservar una mesa en el Celler de Can Roca en Girona (3 estrellas Michelin).
host_about: I mostly travel for business, and use Airbnb as a more personal and quiet alternative to hotels.

name: Bonito apartamento a 3 minutos de la playa
description:
Bonito apartamento con terraza. Habitación con cama de matrimonio y salón con sofá cama también doble. Céntrico, a 3 minutos de la playa y de todos los servicios. Se incluyen toallas y ropa de cama. Detalle de bienvenida.

The space
Bonito apartamento, exterior, muy luminoso y totalmente equipado. Dispone de 1 dormitorio doble, baño completo con bañera, cocina independiente, salón-comedor con sofá cama (doble) y salida a terraza de 18 m2 en la que puedes comer, relajarte o tomar el sol porque dispone de mesa, sillas y dos butacas.
El apartamento está totalmente equipado y amueblado. Con toallas para el baño (no para la playa), champú, gel, ropa de cama, secador, y todos los utensilios necesarios para la cocina.
A pocos metros de la playa de Lloret, muy bien situado, céntrico y al lado de todos los servicios (farmacia, restaurantes, supermercados, estación de autobuses, oficina de turismo, paseo marítimo, … )
Es un 5º piso en un edificio con dos a
neighborhood_overview: Lo mejor del vecindario és que puedes encontrar de todo al lado de casa: Terminal de autobuses, farmacia, estanco, cibercafé, locutorios, bares, gasolinera, hamburgueserias, restaurantes, parques infantiles, biblioteca, supermercados, heladerias, ...
host_about: Responsable, comprometida, simpática, amable, amiga de mis amigos y con un gran amor en mi vida, mi hija. Me encanta la música, el cine, el teatro y viajar. Con ganas de hacer cosas, de comerme el mundo, de VIVIR. "Don´t worry, be happy".

name: Beautiful apartment along the beach, pool, parking
description:
Spacious apartment in Roses, with view from the terrace over the beach and the swimming pool in the garden.
The apartment is very comfortable distributed. It has a large living with sofas and a dining table for 6. The Kitchen has all the utilities to have a comfortable holiday. There a 2 comfortable bedrooms with 2 bathrooms. All the rooms have windows and view over the back garden or the front garden with the swimming pool.
It has good quality wifi, TV satellite and a private parking.

The space
The apartment is decorated in light and sunny colours. The apartment is about 70 m2 and the terrace an extra 10 m2.
The very spacious living room with American kitchen is directly connected to the beautiful terrace where you can enjoy a delicious meal with a view over the pool in the garden and the sea in front of you. In the salon there are sofas, a table for 6, a television and internet. There are 2 bedrooms, 1 with a double bed and tele and an en-suit
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in a very quite neighborhood. Nearby there is a small supermarket with fresh bread. In front of the apartment on the promenade there are restaurants to enjoy breakfast, lunch or diner. The beach is just 2 steps from the apartment.
You can walk in the neighborhood, or rent bikes.
Also you could visit, Cadaques, Figueres (Dali), Castello de Empurias or Girona.
host_about:
I live in Roses with my husband and 2 children since 2006. It is a lovely place to live, always something to do and many days of the year you can find us playing on the beach, biking at the boulevard or walking in the nearby mountains. 
We would be glad to welcome you to our apartments.

name: MASIA AISLADA EN LA ALTA GARROTXA
description:
Se alquila Masía aislada del S XV totalmente restaurada conservando los elementos originales, pero con las comodidades actuales. La casa está situada en el Espacio Natural de la Alta Garrotxa a 12 Km del pueblo de Tortellà por un camino rural en buenas condiciones (20 mints en coche).

The space
Lugar para desconectar de la rutina, autentica Masia catalana del año 1403 rodeada totalmente de naturaleza y grandes bosques, donde podrás estar integrado en un paisaje Único y totalmente aislado.
La casa es auto sostenible y ecológica: se calienta con caldera de leña se ilumina con energía solar y el agua brota directamente de unas fuentes.
Junto a la casa está la Masoveria y la casa de los propietarios que se dedican a la ganadería ecológica.
Con una superficie de 220 metros y capacidad para 8 personas dispone de 4 habitaciones dobles y dos baños completos. Cocina con chimenea, Salón de 55 metros, pequeña capilla y zonas exteriores con piscina de mader

name: Apartamento Ampuriabrava, España
description:
Apartamento a primera línea de mar, muy luminoso y acogedor, ideal para parejas, hay otra mini habitación con una litera, hay un lavabo con bañera. La estancia mínima es de 5 días.

The space
Tiene vistas al mar y al río Muga que es una zona de reserva natural de l'empurdá, las vistas son impresionantes, el piso es muy luminoso y se encuentra a 50m de la playa y paseo marítimo

Other things to note
se pueden hacer paseos en barquita por los canales,de nuestra pequeña venecia,paseos en bici y si eres mas atrevido y te gusta el riesgo saltos de paracaidismo,anímate es muy divertido. Y la novedad túnel de viento y sino simplemente,relax,sol y playa y a disfrutar de las vacaciones
la entrada del apartamento sera sobre la 13.00 del mediodía.y la salida a las 11.00h
Estancias minima una semana,no se podrán entregar llaves más tarde de las 17 horas!

neighborhood_overview: La playa, zona de comercios, restaurantes, con mas de 23 Kilómetros de canales navegables, que configuran la conocida como "pequeña Venecia". A demás del turismo de playa y de la afamada gastronomía de la zona, disfrutamos del turismo activo: Surf, Remo, Ciclo-turismo, el túnel de viento de Windoor y uno de los centros de paracaidismo mas grande del mundo, a 50m se encuentra una escuela municipal de vela y surf.,zona de aparcamiento gratuito
host_about: Somos una pareja de Barcelona y os  ofrecemos nuestro apartamento,para quien quiera disfrutar de nuestra magnífica costa brava,saludos hasta pronto

name: Mas del siglo XVII ENTRE MAR Y MONTAÑA COSTA BRAVA
description:
Mas Arnau es una impresionante masía para disfrutar con tu familia o amigos, ubicada en uno de los lugares más solicitados del Alt Empordá, con más de 3 hectáreas de jardín, frutales y una gran piscina adaptada para los más pequeños (disponible del 15 de abril hasta el 31 de octubre)
La Masía dispone de grandes espacios de vida para relajarse y desconectar del ritmo acelerado de la ciudad. A pocos km, Golf Torremirona, Figueras (Museo Dalí),playas de la bahia de Roses, Cadaqués y Cap de Creus.

The space
Cuenta con una superficie útil de más de 1000 m2 distribuida en dos plantas con capacidad para 15 / 16 personas. En la planta baja encontrarás 4 salones con confortables sofás, chimenea, una cocina independiente (totalmente equipada) y 1 baño. Desde esta planta se accede al gran porche y la piscina. En la primera planta, 4 Suits . En la segunda planta, una master suit de 60m2 con 5 camas individuales y 1 doble. Se alquila con todos los enseres ( sábanas, toa
neighborhood_overview: Cistella es un pueblecito encantador, de vida tranquila y familiar. Se ha convertido en un punto estratégico por su cercanía a Figueras (Museo Dalí), a los campos de Golf de Torremirona y Perelada, además si te gusta la aventura podrás tirarte en Paracaídas en Ampuria Brava, practicar el senderismo y disfrutar de los placeres del mar ( buceo, navegar en velero, pescar, etc...) en las playas de la Costa Brava. Un lugar apacible para descansar.

description:

The space
Bonito estudio a 10 minutos del centro y de la playa. Zona tranquila para dormir y con todos los servicios. Edificio con piscina. Dispone de dos camas individuales unidas formando una única de 1,60X1,90 y de un sofá cama doble.

neighborhood_overview: Lo mejor del vecindario es que es una zona tranquila para dormir pero con todos los servicios. Además de estar a 5 ó 10 minutos del centro y de la playa. También hay que destacar que el edificio dispone de piscina.
host_about: Responsable, comprometida, simpática, amable, amiga de mis amigos y con un gran amor en mi vida, mi hija. Me encanta la música, el cine, el teatro y viajar. Con ganas de hacer cosas, de comerme el mundo, de VIVIR. "Don´t worry, be happy".

name: Mas Quatre Camins.
description:
Nineteenth century cottage located in an exceptional place. You can enjoy the wonderful views of the pastures and forests that surround it, as well as easy access to the most important places and the best beaches of the Costa Brava.

The space
This nineteenth century Catalan cottage, available for ten people, has the best amenities and comfort to make you feel at home. On the ground floor, there is a big living room with two different chilling areas. from wich you can acces to the toilet and to a double bedroom. At the other end of the floor there is the kitchen, fully equipped with a large solid wood table and a fireplace.
The first floor has a small lounge, four double bedrooms and three bathrooms. From every room you can enjoy wonderful views of the fields and the woods surrounding the house.
And, if the cozy inside of the house has dazzled you, the outside is even better!
In the garden you can prepare a delicious barbacue in the summer porch,
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in a road within 2 kilometers from the village of Viladasens and Sant Jordi Desvalls. It's a quiet place where you can enjoy the silence, fresh air and the sights  reach you until the last meadow. A beautiful landscape, where small forests offer you nice walks next to the Ter river.
host_about:
Somos una familia que reside en Barcelona.
Somos amantes del viaje, de los buenos paisajes y vivir con harmonía y felicidad.
Nos fascina conocer culturas y mundo.

name: Charming farm cottage near our organic cellar!
description:
Lovingly restored stone cottage next to our Catalan farmhouse at the foot of the Albera mountains.
Beside a small river, 2.5km from town, with private patio and garden, amid vineyards, dolmens and olive groves.

We make ORGANIC WINE!
Near Figueres and the "Costa Brava".

The space
The cottage is separate from the main farmhouse, with its own entrance, private garden and large patio with views of the river and mountains.
YOU WILL BE SURROUNDED BY CALM AND QUIET!
Restored with passion and charm, with all the details to make you feel at home!
The two single beds in one of the bedrooms can be joined to make a double.
Small, fully-equipped kitchen stocked with all the basic essentials for cooking meals (oil, salt, sugar, honey, coffee, tea...)
We offer catered lunches and suppers: please let us know in advance.
official rural house n. PG-936

Guest access
Just outside the cottage, you can enjoy a p
neighborhood_overview:
The cottage is 2.5km from the village of Sant Climent Sescebes.
The village has shops and basic services (bank, pharmacy...)
The Albera Natural Park is within walking distance, with hiking trails and the chance to explore Requesens Castle.
The natural parks of Cap de Creus and Aiguamolls and city of Figueres are all within a 20-40 minute drive.
host_about:
Som la Barbara i en Joan Carles. Tenim una petita finca a peu de l’Albera on cultivem vinyes i elaborem vi natural i ecològic.
El paisatge és característic per la presencia de dòlmens i menhirs i d'un espai protegit.
Cuidem les vinyes velles i les noves petites parcel·les amb la passió per aquest indret, l'esforç i la tenacitat que ens fan forts i units, la gana de protegir i mantenir el territori que vam heretar.
En 2016 vam arreglar la que ara és la nostra caseta rural, a on us acollim per donar-vos un espai i uns moments de tranquil·litat i natura amb la possibilitat de conèixer la nostra feina i tot el món dels productors ecològics de la nostra zona.

name: Costa Brava: lovely appartment
description:
Appartment with impressive views to the Palamos bay in the heart of Costa Brava. In a luxury residential area with 3 swimming pools, 3 tennis courts, 3 minutes from the beach and small bays and with room and meal service if required.

The space
Appartment with impressive views to the Palamos bay in the heart of Costa Brava. In a privileged and quiet area between pines, a big garden and the sea, the building has the Mediterranean sea in front. Direct access to the beach and small bays typical on Costa Brava with pines, sand and rocks.

Guest access
3 swimming pools (one with salted water), 3 tennis courts, pin-pon rooms, room, laundry and meal service if required. Caretaker and surveillance 24 hours/7 days a week all the year round. Wi-fi. TV. In July and August there are swimming clases and some activities (tennis competition, swimming clases...) for children and adults.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet residential area very close to villages with restaurants and shops (Palamos). In the heart of the Costa Brava which has many places to visit (middle-age village Pals and Peratallada, small fisher villages like Tamariu, small bays and lovely mountain/sea landscapes).

name: BEACH APARTMENT 2rooms with PARKING
description:
Nice and cozy apartment, very bright, with terrace and excellent location, just 1 minute away from the beach, supermarkets, restaurants and more. Privileged by being in a quiet street, where nightlife noises won’t be a problem.

The space
That apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, American kitchen equipped with washing machine and living room with access to a little terrace, prepared for you to spend time outdoors..
It has private parking lot in the same building.
There is room for 4/5 people, with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with double bed.
-Bedroom with bunk bed for 2 people. In case you are 5 people, and if it’s not an inconvenient for you, we have a mattress under this bunk bed, that you can put on the flor, for the 5th person.
We have cribs and high charis if needed. Please requested it in advance. Costs 25€ for the hole stay.

Guest access
ADDITIONAL SERVICES

- Cot and high chair.
- Cle
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a centric area, but at the same time is quiet and everything is near.
Just 1 minute away from the beach, a big supermarket and restaurants.
Less than 3 minutes away you will reach the commercial street, with another big supermarket, excellent shops where you can find fish, perfumes, clothes, presents and mucho more.
Just 5 minutes away, you will find the old part of town, the walled city called “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you e
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 4
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.
neighbourhood: Sant Antoni de Calonge, Girona, Spain

name: 10th century medieval Castle
description:
In the Ripollès region, between rivers, valleys and mountains, the ancient Castle of Llaés (10th century) stands splendidly. A unique place, of exceptional beauty, where absolute tranquility reigns in the middle of an exuberant nature.
The Castle has been fully renovated for the comfort required by the facilities for rural tourism, with 8 rooms, 5 with a double bed, and 3 with two single beds. It has a living room, dining room, kitchen, 4 bathrooms, garden and terrace.

The space
The Llaés Castle is a project of reform and maintenance of this national cultural asset that, by force of spirit and the guests from all over the world who come to visit us, can continue its journey.

Guest access
Currently the fortification retains the physiognomy of a castle, the homage tower, the parade ground, and the religious enclosure with a garden area, the small cemetery, and the church of San Bartolomé, in a marked Romanesque style.

Other
neighborhood_overview: In the town of Llaés we are 12 inhabitants, and what we like the most about our neighborhood, the tranquility and harmony that is breathed, the green of the mountains with the contrast of the electric blue of the sky. We love quiet afternoons where just looking up you see eagles, owls at dusk, butterflies, hares, moles, foxes, and countless more neighbors running around the neighborhood!
host_about:
Hello!
 We love the rural environment and the variety of activities offered: hiking, mountain biking, climbing, and a lot more.
We are fortunate to be able to receive people from all over the world in this small and incredible X century castle.
Always there, 24 hours 7 days a week, we ensure that our guests feel like royalty!
 We hope you have the best experience during your stay :) Marc & Ginny

Hola!
  Somos una pareja joven, amamos el entorno rural y la variedad de actividades que ofrece: senderismo, ciclismo de montaña, escalada y mucho más.
  ¡Somos afortunados de poder recibir personas de todo el mundo en este pequeño e increíble castillo del siglo X!
  Siempre allí, las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana, nos aseguramos de que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como la realeza.
  ¡Esperamos que tengas la mejor experiencia durante tu estancia! :) Marc y Ginny

neighborhood_overview: Apartamento a pocos metros del centro de la población con calles peatonales y comenciales, entorno tranquilo. Por las mañanas, mercado municipal para poder comprar frutas, verduras, carne y pescado fresco cada dia.
host_about: Estoy casada y tengo cuatro hijos, un chico de 21 años y trillizas de 16 años. Trabajo por cuenta propia, soy arquitecta técnica. Me gusta hacer deporte, sobretodo el senderismo, i también ir en bicicleta y nadar. Me gusta estar con la familia y con los amigos. Me encanta viajar, sobretodo visitar ciudades europeas. Pero también me apasiona el contacto con la naturaleza y descubrir lugares con encanto.

name: BEGUR. Country house in Costa Brava
description:
Restored house from 1.870 in the center of Begur one of the most beatiful villages in Costa Brava.

The space
The house was an old little factory to produce corks for wine bottles. It was refurbished as a summer residence for our family and friends.
We kept all the old elements from the past, old Catalonian ceiling, wooden doors, and old tile floors, opening big windows to make the place special and full of sun and light.
We love cooking, so the kitchen is perhaps bigger than normal, with all the equipment to prepare fresh food just bought in the local farmers.
It has a little garden of about 25m2. A special place to relax under the shadow of a jacaranda tree which gives flowers once a year (in June).

Guest access
The house was fully prepared as a summer residence 4 years ago. You will find 3 double rooms with two double beds and a double bunk. One of the rooms 100% independent on the lower floor close to the garden like a
neighborhood_overview: This is a quite pedestrian street with just one entrance. Only 5 lovely houses, our is the coziest one ;) . Good relationship with our neighbourhood, you will feel like a local soon. Some British, Spanish, Welch...
host_about:
...Life is short so I feel I need time to enjoy it as much as possible: lot of energy and creativity, the best friend of my friends, and a father 100% love.
Thus our house is always plenty of good friends who likes enjoying the good life that Costa Brava offers us, love wine, cooking, running  and staying on the beach till the sun goes down everyday.
...Dicen que la vida es corta. Es por eso que la quiero vivir tanto como pueda. Me considero positivo, creativo, el mejor amigo de mis amigos, y un padre envidiable con mi hijas.
Es por esto, que nuestra casa está siempre llena de buena gente, que le gusta la buena cocina, el buena vida en general, el deporte, aprovechar las puestas de sol para despedir el dia...y dar gracias al que está por llegar....

Garden and pool

name: Céntrico y familiar
description:
Céntrico apartamento de 3 habitaciones y 2 baños. En el centro de Roses. Ubicado a 3' de la playa principal. En la misma calle, todo tipo de comercios y restaurantes. Climatizado y con doble cristal, optimo para el descanso. Dispone de ascensor, TV. y Wifi. Cocina de lujo, grande y bien equipada, con nevera, horno, vitro, microondas, lavavajillas, cafetera y tostadora. En un cuartito, todo para la perfecta colada, lavadora, y plancha de ropa.

The space
El apartamento se encuentra en pleno centro de Roses, pero en un barrio tranquilo para el descanso. a 200 metros de la playa de arena de Roses, así como del puerto y paseo marítimo. A 5 minutos a pie de toda la zona más turística si os apetece.
Es un apartamento nuevo con todas las comodidades.
3 habitaciones, una de ellas con el cuarto de baño incorporado tipo suite.
Espacios amplios y diáfanos. Completamente exterior. Climatizado frio y calor
Se trata de un edificio pequeño y familiar, 2º piso
neighborhood_overview:
Vecindario tranquilo, con varios comercios y restaurantes cercanos.
En la misma calle hay de todo, frutería, carnicería, pescadería, panadería, así como varios supermercados cercanos.
Hay una plaza de juegos infantiles en el mismo barrio.
host_about:
Mi prioridad es que los huéspedes se encuentren a gusto en mis apartamentos.
guardando la esencia de Airbnb.
Desde siempre, damos una especial atención a la limpieza e higiene, ahora más, ajustándonos a los protocolos marcados por el ICTE.
Roses es la ubicación ideal para una extensa variedad de actividades por toda la zona.
Gracias por confiar en mí ! Espero conocerte!

description:
Casa de pueblo rehabilitada, de diseño, con estilo y con encanto. Está ubicada en una de las calles más tranquilas del casco antiguo de Peratallada, probablemente el pueblo medieval más bonito no solo de la Costa Brava sino de Catalunya. Peratallada cuenta con pequeñas tiendas de producto local, restaurantes donde se come muy bien y se encuentra, solo, a 15 minutos de las mejores playas del litoral catalán.

Distribución en tres niveles: Planta baja con un espacio diáfano y baño / 1er piso con cocina, comedor, sala de estar y patio-terraza / Buhardilla con dos habitaciones con vistas y baño. Materiales: Piedra, madera, hierro y cristal.

name: Nice studio vintage in Old Town
description:
Our cozy studio is equipped with everything you need to feel comfortable during your stay. It's an ideal place for couples, located in the old city center, near the main tourist attractions and the best restaurants

Due to the current situation, caused by COVID-19, we have taken extreme higienic measures to clean and disinfect in order to avoid any risk of infection and we have installed a remote system that will allow you to dispose of the key autonomously, without to have physical contact.

The space
First of all, we want to tell you that our studio is located on the first floor without a lift, so when you arrive, you will have to climb about 15 steps.

Once inside, you will see that the distribution consists of an open space with living room, dining room, office and kitchen, a bathroom and an attic with a double bed.

The balcony is a viewpoint of one of the most emblematic streets in the city. Here you can spend pleasant moments r
neighborhood_overview:
The studio is located in the old town, exactly in the historic center of Girona (Cort reial street). It is a charming area, close to the major historical sites and museums as well as the best restaurants in town.

At two minutes walking there is a supermarket where you can find all that you can need to cook your meals.

On the other hand, is a 10 minutes walk from the shopping area of the city and the bus and rail station. Do not forget that Girona has great attractions as a city, but it is also the starting point for visiting other inescapable places as the Costa Brava, the Dali Museum in Figueres, the charming villages of the Empordà or the Pirineus. As well, high-speed rail takes you in Barcelona in only 30'.
host_about:
Hello! 
We are Jaume and Marta. We live with our children in a small village half an hour from Girona, where we enjoy nature and peace of mind. 
We work as professor and librarian and we like to travel and discover curious and original spaces at the places we visit. 
We invite you to enjoy the small studio we have in the historic center of Girona and we promise to share with you everything we know of the city to make your stay very special and memorable.

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 5
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

name: CAN FELIP - Apartamento 1 (s.XVIII)
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d
host_about:
Como representantes de una pequeña empresa familiar que se dedica a la restauración de Casas y Apartamentos nos complace mucho integrarnos en la comunidad Airbnb para poderos ofrecer nuestras viviendas, que esperamos sean el futuro de magníficas experiencias para nuestros invitados...

------------------

As partners of a small family business dedicated to the restoration of properties, we are delighted to become Airbnb members to offer our Houses and Apartments, which we hope will be the future of great experiences for our guests...

name: Casa de piedra rehabilitada Cal Masover
description:
En un entorno privilegiado,destaca el silencio y la era exterior. La casa consta de cocina-comedor con chimenea,dos cuartos de baño,salón y dos habitaciones con altillos practicables,se pueden alojar 5 adultos en camas + 2 jóvenes en altillos.

The space
Antiguo convento adosado a la iglesia de Sant Marcel de Planès,armoniosamente rehabilitado pero respetando su esencia de paz y tranquilidad,bien comunicado a la vez goza también de inmejorables vistas del valle del Rigard.
Buen punto de partida para conocer la comarca,destacando el Santuario de Nuria a 2.000 metro de altitud y las estaciones e esqui de la Molina y Masella.

Guest access
Comedor exterior situado debajo del porche con mesa,banco y dos sillas,hamacas para tomar el sol en la era.
Mesa de ping pong a su disposición.

name: Can Janot
description:
Can Janot es una casa rural en la zona de Camprodon, Girona.

Una casa rural para poder disfrutar unos días en grupo y/o familia y tener una estancia perfecta.

Dispone de un jardín privado de unos 100 m2, con una mesa de picnic y también hay una barbacoa propia en la zona común.

Tiene capacidad para 8 personas y una cuna a disposición del grupo.

The space
CASA 2 “CAN JANOT” (Disponible) Capacidad: 8 personas más una cuna/ cama de 60x120cm (para bebes o niños de hasta 6 años)

PRIMERA PLANTA

1. Sala anexa con llave y salida directa al gran Jardín trasero de la casa (1.500 m2) para 2 pax TV.
2. Salón con mesa para 8 comensales al lado de la chimenea, sofá y butaca individual para leer, juegos de mesa, televisión, calefacción y TV. El Salón tiene salida directa al jardín principal, de unos 2.500 m2
3. Cocina completamente equipada, lavavajillas, horno, microondas, tostadora, cafeteras Oroley y Nespresso
neighborhood_overview:
Este magnífico lugar ubicado en Rocabruna está rodeado de montañas, riachuelos, prados donde pastan vacas, ovejas, caballos y cabras, y dónde podemos encontrar espectaculares bosques, árboles frutales, setas e infinidad de rutas para descubrir y explorar. En los alrededores de Rocabruna podemos encontrar desde cuevas naturales hasta una mina abandonada de cobre, piedras semipreciosas y plata, y que según cuenta una leyenda, parece ser que estuvo habitada por gnomos, así como una historia medieval de un amor imposible - al estilo de Romeo y Julieta -entre los hijos de dos señores feudales.

Hay constancia escrita de su existencia desde el siglo IX. Es un pequeño y armonioso ejemplo del Románico Pirenaico con su gran castillo de defensa en ruinas, su iglesia del siglo Xll y un núcleo de casas antiguas a su alrededor.

Las tres casas están situadas en Rocabruna (Camprodón), que es un pueblo de origen medieval y uno de los rincones más bellos y vírgenes del Pirineo Ca
host_about:
Somos muy familiares, nos gusta leer cerca de un buen fuego, con una buena comida a la brasa de leña, somos amantes de los animales. Es por eso que queremos que otras personas puedan disfrutar de nuestras casas.

.

name: stunning villa on the costa brava,
description:
Located on the most beautiful part of the Costa Brava, Vila Gelida has it all. A guesthouse for 3 downstairs, a private elevator to take you up to the mainhouse where the views are simply stunning, and the swimming pool awaits you. PermitHUTG- 009961.

The space
Enjoy lounging on one the terraces, by the pool, in the comfortable living room. Wherever you go, the Mediteranean sea follows you. Villa Gelida is decorated in modern style with some Asian touches.

License number
HUTG-009961
neighborhood_overview: Overlooking the impressive coast line of Aigua Blava and Begur and very close to the town of Tamariu, Villa Gelida is in a very unique location. Girona and Barcelona are an easy drive away. Numerous excellent golf courses are nearby, not to mention a huge choice of excellent and well priced restaurants. The waters in front of the house are among the best diving waters of the Coast, and you can rent gear or join a diving school in Tamariu. Boat rental is available in Tamariu.The famous Dali museum in Figueres is an hour's drive.
host_about:
This is our little piece of heaven..... It is our second home and we drive down as many weekends and holidays as possible from Barcelona. We have all traveled most of our lives and that would be a very important factor to the whole family, the need to travel and see and discover as much as possible. Part of the family spent many years in italy and the other part of the family in Asia.

5 things i would not be without, would be my family, recycling, animals,nature and the sea.
I love Jazz and Clasical music and love to read history books!
