name: Country House in Costa Brava
description:
Can Gironella is a typical country catalan house. It is located in a little and quiet town far away from the coast crowds, but near from the beaches of Ampurias and La Escala (5km).

The space
Can Gironella is an airy and large rustic house (200m). It has 3 double rooms and one single with 2 beds (8 persons). There is a kitchen with a fireplace, a sitting room with TV, 2 bathrooms, a big balcony and a billiard hall.

Guest access
Bed linen and towels are provided.

Other things to note
The village of Viladamat counts with an exceptional location due to its nearness to many interesting points both cultural and leisure. It has a large variety of possibilities around.

The Natural Park of Aiguamolls de l'Empordà is 8km away, the Empúries ruins and museum at 5km, La Escala at 5km, the Natural Park of Cap de Creus at 21km, the Natural Park of l'Albera at 25km, Figueres at 20km, Girona at 32km, La Bisbal at 19km, Bar
neighborhood_overview:
Viladamat is the typical rustic town of the Ampurdan zone. Even though is little and very quiet, it counts with all the basic services such a cash machine, a little supermarket, bakery, butchers, bar and a restaurant.

It is located 5km away from the coastal town of La Escala and very close to the Costa Brava beaches.

name: Begur: lovely house with pool next to Sa Tuna
description:
Beautiful house with large garden and private pool. BBQ area and relax. Various outdoor spaces to relax in the sun or shade. Very close to Sa Tuna beach (you can walk). Sea views. Wifi highspeed 300MB. Ideal for 8 people. The house consists of 2 independent floors, each with 2 double bedrooms, bathroom, living room & kitchen. Games and books for children and protected pool. Parking area (2 cars). Towels, sheets and taxes included. Visit my Insta "begurisbeautiful" for more pictures of the area.

The space
The house is perfect for 8 people. Since the house is distributed in two independent floors (outdoor stairs), it is ideal for two families of four or to have certain autonomy among friends. The house has two bathrooms, one on each floor, four double bedrooms (two with single beds and two with double beds), two living rooms with access to a terrace or garden and a kitchen on each floor. The house is in an area between pine trees, overlooking the sea and has a priv
neighborhood_overview: The house is completely independent and located in a convenient spot, very close to some of the most beautiful beaches such as Sa Tuna, Sa Riera, Aiguablava or Aiguafreda. The house is in front of the "Camí Vell" of Sa Tuna, a forest path that goes from Begur to Sa Tuna. It is a pleasant path that allows you to walk to the town or to Sa Tuna. You can walk to Sa Tuna (about 10/12 minutes) and the town of Begur (18m). By car it takes 2 minutes to Sa Tuna and 5 minutes to Begur. A drive to Barcelona takes about 1:30 h and to Girona about 45 minutes, both worth day excursions! Not more than 20 minutes away you have many nice villages to visit and even Dali spots.
host_about: Vivimos en Barcelona con nuestros hijos pero siempre que podemos nos escapamos a la Costa Brava. Nos encanta ir a la playa para hacer snorkelling y padel surf, relajarnos y disfrutar de los muchos restaurantes y rincones que ofrece la costa.  Esperamos que disfrutes igual que nosotros!

name: Close to sea and main street  #1
description:
Lovely double room with double bed, TV, large closet and window to patio. Apartment situated between the port of Palamos and the main street of the village, 5 minutes walk from the beach, the fish market and the lighthouse.

The space
Among one of the most charming ports of Costa Brava and the most pristine beaches in the area. About four streets is the lighthouse of the town, from which you can see the race boats at 6:45 a.m. in the morning: a beautiful sight of the open sea can enjoy a few minutes before sunrise.
The best way to see the beaches and coves of the area is the coastal path linking Palamos with other locations: an idyllic walk hard to forget.

Guest access
On the floor you have the option of tasting the most typical dishes of the area at a great price, prepared by an excellent chef specializing in Mediterranean cuisine.

name: Habitación privada en Casa Medieval  del Siglo XII
description:
Viaje a la época medieval.
Game of Thrones stage. Dentro escenario de Juego de Tronos.
Casa de piedra muy grande del siglo XII, reformada. Habitación privada para 2 personas ( cama de matrimonio ) con baño privado.
En pleno barrios medieval y judío, edificio adosado a los Baños Arabes, al lado de la catedral, rodeada de iglesias, conventos, jardines, plazas y paseos que rodean la catedral de Girona.
Restaurantes y bares con encanto al lado. A 4’ del Sunset Jazz Club y de bares de copas.

The space
Es una vivienda única por su belleza y singularidad, considerada patrimonio de la ciudad. Primeros cimientos datan del S XII.
Rodeada de la catedral, la colegiata de Sant Feliu, de la iglesia de Sant Lluc, de los Baños Arabes y de 2 conventos de monjas.
Zona peatonal, tranquila y a 4/5 minutos de plazas, restaurantes y bares con ambiente todo el año.
A 3' club de Jazz con encanto y con conciertos de alto nivel todo el año, Sunset J
neighborhood_overview:
La casa esta ubicada al lado mismo del edificio de los Baños Arabes y la pequeña iglesia de Sant Lluc, entre la Catedral y la Colegiata de Sant Feliu.
Al lado mismo están los jardines del Paseo Arqueológico q llevan a la Muralla desde la cual se puede ver toda la ciudad y el paisaje.
El Barrio Judio está al lado con su museo y antigua Sinagoga.
El Museo de la catedral y el claustro de la misma son visitas obligadas al igual q el Museo de Arte, el de Historia de la ciudad o el de arte romanico de Galligans si se dispone de más tiempo.
El Museo del Cinema és también muy interesante.
Las callejuelas, plazas, bares típicos y de diseño al igual q todo tipo de restaurantes están a 4' / 7' de la casa.
Al estar en el corazón del "Barri
Vell " todo está al lado.
host_about:
Sociable, me gusta conocer gente. Enamorada de mi ciudad y de mi tierra Interesada en la fotografía, el arte en general, la gastronomía, la vida sana, música sobretodo jazz y disfrutando del arte y las buenas cosas que nos rodean. 
Me gustan los paseos en bici, la fotografia, la nutrición natural, el mundo de la cosmètica y la perfumería natural.

host_about:
Bonjour,
Mon nom est Olivia Sales et je suis née le 18 mai 1981.
Je vis dans le sud de la France à Perpignan dans les Pyrénées-Orientales.
Les Pyrénées-Orientales sont un département français situé dans le sud de la France, dans le nord de la Catalogne, à la frontière avec l'Espagne, dans la région du Languedoc-Roussillon.
Je vis entre la mer Méditerranée et les Pyrénées.
C'est une belle région baignée par le soleil. Il y a de nombreuses activités à faire qu'elles soient sportives, culturelles ou de détente.
Voyager est ma grande passion, j'ai visité de nombreux pays:
L'Espagne, le Portugal, l'Italie, la Hongrie, la Roumanie, l'Irlande, la Slovénie, la Grèce, Malte, la Sardaigne, les Baléares, les îles Canaries, le Royaume-Uni, la Turquie, Cuba, l'île de la Réunion, les États-Unis et les îles d'Hawaï.

neighborhood_overview:
Area:
The villa is located in the Mas Nou Mountain, just up from Platja D'Aro (5min drive to the city center). As common in the area, the streets leading to the Villa are not very well maintained and slow driving is recommended to avoid damages to the car.

Region:
Costa Brava is a 220km long coastal region of northeastern Spain in the province of Girona. The Costa Brava stretches from Blanes, northeast of Barcelona, to the French border. Its rich culture includes picturesque fishing villages such as L'Estartit and Tamariu, hidden beaches and bays, some of which are only accessible by boat. The average air temperatures range between 24°C and 28°C in summer and in spring between 17°C and 25°C. The water temperature is comfortable for swimming from May 20°C until October and in summer goes up to 24°C.

Sport:
Sailing and windsurfing is still possible in some places, such as in Roses, Palamos and Platja d'Aro and dive spots are the small islands (Illes

Hola! Som la Laia i en Jofre. Som de Tossa, on vivim i tenim la nostra família. Tossa és el nostre racó, un poble de la Costa Brava que ens dona molta vida a l’estiu i molta pau a l’hivern.
No dubteu a demanar-nos recomanacions.
Fins aviat!

name: www·empuriaholidays·com - Farigola
description:
Magnífica casa de planta baja de 2 habitaciones y cocina separada. Casa a 3 vientos equipada con chimenea, patio delantero y una amplia zona ajardinada en su contorno. Situada en una calle sin salida, muy tranquila, ideal para alojarse familias con niños. Puertas de cristal correderas y puertas exteriores de aluminio, totalmente plegables. La casa es totalmente plana, sin escalones. El exterior está equipado con barbacoa, hamacas, sombrilla, mesa y sillas de jardín.

The space
Magnífica casa de planta baja y jardín situada en una calle muy tranquila, sin salida. La casa dispone de un comedor con chimenea, aseo con ducha, cocina separada y 2 habitaciones (una doble y la otra con dos camas individuales).

La cocina dispone de utensilios para 6 personas y está equipada con lavavajillas, encimera de gas con 4 fuegos, extractor, nevera con congelador, cafetera eléctrica y microondas.

El acceso al comedor es por 2 puertas correderas acristaladas
neighborhood_overview: El conjunto de casas están situadas en una calle sin salida, por lo tanto muy tranquila. Pero a la vez no están muy lejos del centro comercial o de la zona comercial "Les Alberes".  Una localización céntrica pero tranquila.

Pequeño, pero espectacular apartamento situado encima mismo del mar y en pleno centro de Cadaqués. Es una antigua bodega de pescadores, construida encima de las rocas, hoy transformada en un cómodo apartamento.

Los meses de Julio y Agosto el alquiler minimo es de 7noches

The space

Generalitat de Catalunya grava los "Habitatges dùs Turístic con una tasa de 1€ por persona y noche, que se liquida al abandonar el apartamento

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview:
Nuestros huespedes tienen el privilegio de habitar en el mejor lugar, perfectamente situado, con todos los servicios turísticos de Cadaqués a pocos metros del apartamento.
Muy cómodo en todas las epocas del año al estar protegido del viento de "tramontana" predominante en la zona. Es muy cálido, en invierno, al estar orientado de cara al sol.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the first line for sea views and at the same time, right next to the “Vila Vella”, the walled city.
For those who don’t know Tossa, you don’t have to worry about noises for being at the first line. Not much later than midnight all restaurant are close and the street is really quiet.
Distance from the beach is less than 1 minute. There is a little supermarket a minute away and another one, a little bit bigger 4 minutes away. The biggest is 10 minutes walking.
This zone belongs to the old neighborhood, so you will find narrow streets, nice shops and much more.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the ol
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

Наш бизнес и наша компания построены вокруг потребностей наших клиентов. Мы относимся к нашим клиентам так, как хотели бы, чтобы другие относились к нам. 
Мы работаем с удовольствием и оптимизмом. Мы верим в себя, в будущее и активно работаем для улучшения нашего сервиса. Наш труд, наш энтузиазм и наш професионализм являются гарантией нашего собственного процветания и служат 100% гарантией удовлетворенности для наших клиентов. 
Мы надеемся, что Вы придете к нам и благодарим Вас заранее, за то, что Вы являетесь нашем гостем!
С уважением и наилучшими пожеланиями,
Семья K3HOMES

name: Near sea and main street  #2
description:
Single room in Pedró neighborhood, the old town of Palamos. One block from the harbor and 20 meters from the main street of the village. Charming fishing village of 22,000 inhabitants on the Costa Brava.

The space
Among one of the most charming ports of Costa Brava and the most pristine beaches in the area. About four streets is the lighthouse of the town, from which you can see the race boats at 6:45 a.m. in the morning : a beautiful sight of the open sea can enjoy a few minutes before sunrise.
The best way to see the beaches and coves of the area is the coastal path linking Palamos with other locations: an idyllic walk hard to forget.

Guest access
On the floor you have the option of tasting the most typical dishes of the area at a great price , prepared by an excellent chef specializing in Mediterranean cuisine.

- it's walking distance everywhere (this is very important in summer in this area since finding

name: Private villa with pool & sea view for families
description:
Villa with great sea views overlooking the valley of Palamos and St Antoni de Calonge. We accept families and guests 30+.
Top floor: kitchen, living room, WC, roof terrace and small balcony.
Lower floor: 4 bedrooms w/ double beds - two new bathrooms.
Large terraced garden with pergola and generous pool area.

Quote from previous guest: "French riviera meets vintage Hollywood Hills."

The space
Villa Mariposa is very private - set on the end of the street Carrer Om in the urbanization of Rio de Oro - located on the hillside of Calonge. The house offers a spectacular view over the valley of Calonge and bay of St Antoni de Calonge/Palamos.

The house have a large landscaped garden with pergola for comfortable shade and a pool area with space for 8 pool beds.
The partly refurbished (2013) terraced house is 190+ sqm over two floors. Upper floor with a brand new kitchen, a large roof terrace, spacious living room area with
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the quiet urbanization Eio de Oro - only 10 minutes with car from the ocean front. Two good supermercados in the village of Calonge - only five minutes with car. Eurospar the closest one and Suma by the entrance to the village.
There is a great restaurant in the urbanization - Restaurant Rio de Oro.
host_about:
Villa Mariposa is our dream project. After searching for both the right area and then the right house - we found Villa Mariposa in febuary 2013. The house was in bad shape but we saw the potential.

We planned the renovation with an architect from Barcelona and finished the first renovation phase for the summer of 2013 - and we will continue with more renovation projects along with time.

We travel a lot - New York, Sydney, Europe, Asia - and over the years we have come to places where we have found special details or fantastic ambience or great views. These "moments" have been the inspiration for Villa Mariposa. Spacious, not to much furniture, a garden garden that tells a story over the year - and a view that takes the breath away.

Private room with private Bathroom in Historic Stone House built in the 1700s in secluded countryside with historic oil mill and masseuese.
30 minutes to the beach
20 minutes to Girona
20 minutes to Figueres
5 minutes off national highway

The space
Historic Stone House built in the 1700s strategically located just 5 km off the national highway but completely in the middle of beautiful secluded quiet countryside with spectacular views of the landscape.

Beautiful private room includes Catalan arch brick ceiling, large comfortable bathroom with arched ceiling, televisión, sofá, comfortable bed that sleeps two, additional bed upon request.

30 minutes to the beach (L'Escala-Empuries)
20 minutes to Girona (beautiful historic city)
20 minutes to Figueres (Dali museum, oldest castle in Europe)
20 minutes to Banyolas (relaxed natural clear lake)
30 minutes to ´Empurias (Greco Roman ruins and beach

neighborhood_overview:
I live in a tiny historic village with a church 50 meters away. It is amazing to walk through the village and look at the old architechture. It is also incredible to walk on the road through the farms and countryside and see the locals growing tomatoes ect..
There are many local producers of local produce and products such as marmalade.

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT BY THE SEA
description:
Lovely apartment at the exclusive development Cap Sa Sal, former luxury hotel right by the sea, astonishing views, seawater swimming pool, coast for the exclusive use of Cap Sa Sal. Begur is one of the most beautiful towns of Costa Brava.

The space
Beautiful apartment, 45m2, perfect for 2 to 5 people. Right by the sea, with breathtaking views. It has one main bedroom and a living-room/dining room, part of which can be converted into a second bedroom by closing a sliding door. There is also a mezzanine with another bed. Very well equipped kitchen, balcony with impressive views of the sea (Aiguafreda and the Meda Islands).
The apartment is fully equipped (air conditioning, dishwasher, washing machine, vitro…) and has Wifi and cable TV.

Guest access
Cap Sa Sal used to be a luxury hotel. It has direct access to the sea from the lift. The estate has 30,000m2 of common areas, including a paradisiacal swimming pool with seawater right by the
neighborhood_overview:
Begur is a typical, small town that started out as a fishing village. It is the proud location of some of the prettiest bays on the Mediterranean coast, all offering the crystalline water and pine forests that have made the Costa Brava famous. This area is also known for its many medieval towns, some of which (e.g. Peratallada) were declared historical and artistic monuments in 1975. In addition to the many small coves (Aigua Blava, Aigua Feda, Aigua Gélida, Sa Tuna, Fornells, etc.), Begur also has excellent sandy beaches (Sa Riera, Playa Pals, etc.) and even a nudist beach – the red island. There are many picturesque coastal towns that are worth a visit such as Calella de Palafrugell and Tamariu, and attractive harbours such as Llafranc.

The ruins of Begur castle offer one of the Costa Brava’s most spectacular views. The castle was the scene of pirate attacks that led the local inhabitants to turn their village away from the sea. The towers they built in the 16th and 17th
host_about:
Soy de Madrid, casada con un catalán. He viajado por todo el mundo y me encanta compartir mi apartamento con quienes saben disfrutar de lugares muy especiales para mí.

I am from Madrid, married to a Catalan. I have travelled all over the world and I love to share my apartment with those who know how to enjoy places that are very special to me.

Habitación con cama doble, con baño y posibilidad cuna para bebe (suplemento 15€)

Tiene muy buenos accesos, a 5km de la autopista (salida 5 l'Escala), y de la N-II.
Privilegiadas vistas del molino de aceite (de 200 años de antigüedad) convertido en museo.
También se puede visitar la iglesia románica que está a 50m de la masía.

Guest access
Posibilidad de desayuno con incremento de 6€/persona y d
neighborhood_overview:
Es una zona en plena naturaleza, característica por su tranquilidad, silencio, harmonía. Es un lugar ideal para descansar y disfrutar de la naturaleza.
A 30 minutos de Girona (donde pueden disfrutar de su casco antiguo, su muralla, la catedral y el barrio judío) y Figueras (museo Dalí, museo del juguete, castillo de San Ferran considerado el castillo más grande de Europa) así como disfrutar de sus zonas comerciales.
A 30 minutos de la playa en coche (l'Escala, Estartit, Sant Pere Pescador, Roses, etc) y de 45 minutos de la montaña (Olot donde pueden visitar la Fageda d'en Jordà con sus parajes y su Zona Volcanica, Santa Pau, etc).
Y a 25 minutos de Banyoles, famoso por su lago.

name: Casita rural en la Costa Brava
description:
Casa rural con piscina privada en un entorno privilegiado. A 1km de la playa de la Gola.
Gran salón comedor con chimenea, cocina equipada, un baño y dos habitaciones con 4 camas. Rodeada de naturaleza. Cerca de las mejores playas de la costa brava.

The space
La Casita es el lugar perfecto para pasar unos días de calma y relax. Rodeada de naturaleza, y envuelta del encanto rural de la zona. Perfecta para los amantes de lo ecológico.
La Casita es una vivienda autosuficiente y ecológica. El agua se obtiene a través de un pozo y la luz la recibimos a partir de una instalación de placas solares. La calefacción en invierno la conseguimos con la canalización del calor del fuego de la chimenea . Nos hace muy feliz saber que se puede vivir respetando el medio. Tenemos arboles frutales , manzano, peral, olivos y disfrutamos recolectando sus frutos y hasta hemos elaborado conservas para disponer de ellas durante todo el año.
En su interior se combina la p
neighborhood_overview:
La Costa brava tiene lugares para perderse, es simplemente maravillosa en todas las épocas del año.
La casita se encuentra rodeada de campos de cultivo, cereal y frutales, el paisaje es completamente llano, impera el castillo de Montgrí.
Tenemos la playa de la Gola a escasos 1000 metros, que confluye con la desembocadura del río Ter. Esta zona y los alrededores forman parte del "Parque natural de las Islas Medas y el Ter" y en ella hay rutas para hacer a pie, senderos recomendados para ir en bicicleta, puntos para avistar aves, ...
Desde la casita se pueden ver las “Islas Medas" que constituyen una de las reservas de flora y fauna marinas más importantes del mediterráneo occidental, así como uno de los destinos más apreciado para los amantes del submarinismo. Diferentes empresas proponen viajes a bordo de barcos con fondos de cristal.
Son poblaciones vecinas, Begur, Pals, Peratallada, Ullastret, Escala, St martí de Ampúries, la Bisbal, st Pere Pescador, Cadaqués

name: CS01 Luxury villa, 500 m Sant Pol beach, S´Agaró
description:
Fully renovated luxury villa, located in one of the most prestigious areas of the Costa Brava - S'Agaró, just 500 meters from the unique and beautiful beach of Sant Pol. The villa is fully equipped with everything you need for holidays in family and is within walking distance of all services.

The space
The house has a total area of ​​about 250 m2 and is divided into 3 floors:

1st floor: entrance hall, through which you can go directly to the kitchen or living room, living room with dining room and access to a large sunny terrace with direct access to the pool, fully equipped modern kitchen, 3 spacious double bedrooms (one of them with own dressing room), a large bathroom with bathtub and shower and a guest toilet.

2nd floor: large master bedroom with built-in wardrobe and desk, bathroom with shower, large solarium overlooking S´agaró.

Basement: study with its own bathroom and a small equipped kitchen, games room, laundry, addition
neighborhood_overview:
S’Agaró is a luxury residential area located in the heart of laqa Costa Brava, between the towns of Sant Feliu de Guíxols and Playa de Aro.

S’Agaró has two main beaches: Sa Conca and San Pol, one of the most beautiful on the Costa Brava. Sa Conca is even officially considered one of the best beaches in Europe, surrounded by beautiful houses between pines and rocks.

The beach has all the services: bathrooms, showers, Red Cross, bars, sun beds and umbrellas for rent, playgrounds, adaptation for people with disabilities. Cafes and restaurants serving Mediterranean cuisine are located on the beach promenade of Sant Pol.

Guests of S’Agaró should definitely visit the promenade of Cami de Ronda. The 1.8 km long route is immersed in vegetation and has several viewpoints with spectacular views of the sea and the landscape of the Costa Brava.
host_about: Hello! My name is Verónica. I live in Lloret de Mar, Costa Brava and I am in love with this wonderful place. I love traveling! I am dedicated to vacation rentals in Lloret de Mar, Playa de Aro and Sagaro. Since 2009 we have hosted travelers from all over the world in our accommodations and we love our work. We will be happy to welcome new travelers on the Costa Brava and provide them with the best conditions and advice for an unforgettable stay.

name: BAIX EMPORDÀ Rustic house rental
description:
This is your ideal home if you are looking for a quiet and wonderful landscape of Empordà without wanting to skip the easy access to the beaches of the Costa Brava. St Martí d'Empuries is 15 min. away and the Medes Islands not more than 20 min.

The space
It is an ideal house to enjoy with the family. It allows you to host very comfortably up to 7 people. Personally, I consider it important to note that one of the bedrooms, and a bathroom with shower, are located on the ground floor of the house (see the plans!)
On the other hand, from the garden and the lounge you have direct access to the porch leading to the garden.

In connection with its geographical location, it’s the perfect place if you want to enjoy a holiday in a quiet, rural location without giving up your daily swim on the beaches of the Costa Brava.

Furthermore! If you practice the golf, Golf or Pitch & Putt Golf Empordà and Pitch & Putt Gualta are just 15 minutes away.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a very quiet and perfectly located place near the beaches of St. Martí d'Empuries, L'Escala and Estartit. It's also a spot with easy and convenient access.
host_about:
Soy nacido en el Empordà, en la población de Palafrugell, y actualmente tengo 42 años.

Vivo en La Bisbal d'Empordà, con Silvia, mi compañera y con Mel, Maui y Bruno, nuestras mascotas.

Me licencié en Derecho en el año 2000 pero nunca he ejercido la profesión; seguramente, porqué prefiero la tranquilidad de la vida en mi tierra que teñir mi existencia con las tensiones de los Tribunales ( no estoy hecho para esto ).

En Airbnb anunciamos casas de la familia ( 2 casas en Canet de La Tallada y dos apartamentos en Palau-Sator ) y también otra casa cuyos derechos de explotación he adquirido ( Sant Iscle d'Empordà ).

El proyecto inicial de las casas de Canet de la Tallada era la venta pero la depresión del sector inmobiliario hizo a la familia cambiar de opinión y decidimos su explotación en modo de arrendamiento. Además, cuando no están alquiladas las usamos la familia ( somos 5 hermanos ).

En Palau-Sator, los apartamentos que tienen origen en la rehabilitación de la casa de mis abuelos paternos. Era una casa muy grande y hace ya más de 15 años la familia tomó la decisión de restaurara en este sentido.

Después de 3 años en la plataforma, mi experiencia como anfitrión con Airbnb es francamente buena. Salvo pequeños detalles y algún caso aislado estamos muy contentos con los huéspedes que nos han llegado.

Recomiendo el Empordà de forma enérgica, cualquiera de sus rincones, espacios, paisajes o playas...Esta región, es muchísimo más que el conocido Triángulo de Oro. Os lo aseguro!! 

Aquí, puedes relajarte, divertirte, ir de fiesta, en globo, practicar equitación, bajar en canoa por el río Ter, alquilar un velero, ir en bici, jugar a Golf o Picht&Putt, practicar nudismo, bañarte en calas preciosas o, si lo prefieres, en playas kilométricas, perderte en largos paseos al atarceder y comerte un buen arroz!!
neighbourhood: Canet de la Tallada, Catalonia, Spain

La cocina dispone de utensilios para 6 personas y está equipada con lavavajillas, encimera de gas con 4 fuegos, extractor, nevera con congelador, cafetera eléctrica y microondas. Toda la casa es completamente exterior.

name: Habitación doble en La Trobada Hotel Ripoll
description:
Somos un hotel familiar, con historia y de alta calidad. Estamos ubicados en el centro de Ripoll, sobre el río Ter, a 2 minutos a pie del Monasterio, a 5 minutos de la estación de trenes y autobuses, y con aparcamiento gratuito justo en frente.

The space
Nuestras habitaciones dobles superiores han sido totalmente remodeladas con el objetivo de ofrecer un espacio perfecto para nuestros clientes. Equipadas con una cama doble o dos camas individuales, cuentan con un cálido suelo de parquet y ropa de cama de algodón. Asimismo, los baños han sido diseñados pensando en el máximo confort, para ello cuentan con una amplia ducha o bañera de fácil acceso. Disponen de un escritorio preparado para para las nuevas tecnologías. Debido a su buena relación calidad-precio, las habitaciones dobles superiores son nuestras habitaciones más populares.

License number
HG-002103
neighborhood_overview:
Ripoll y El Ripollès, punto de nacimiento y confluencia de los Ríos Ter y Freser, es ideal para diferentes actividades de naturaleza y cultura.
En este sentido, cabe destacar la Vía Verde Ruta del Hierro y del Carbón, que comienza en el mismo paseo del hotel, la puerta principal del monasterio de Ripoll, ahora candidata al reconocimiento como Patrimonio Mundial de la UNESCO, el Museo Etnográfico de Ripoll,
y nuestra querida Vall de Núria. Somos buenos conocedores de nuestro territorio y estaremos encantados de recomendar a nuestros clientes los mejores lugares y actividades dirigidas y libres según sus intereses.
host_about:
Soy Jaume Farrés. Nací y crecí en La Trobada, el hotel que fundó mi abuelo junto con mi abuela y mi madre durante los años ochenta en Ripoll, en pleno corazón del Pirineo Catalán. Estudié arquitectura en Girona, preciosa ciudad donde viví seis años. Mi pasión por el hoquei patines, deporte me ha acompañado toda mi vida, me llevó a vivir en Barcelona durante dos años más. Ahora vivo de nuevo en Ripoll, en el hotel de mi familia. Combino mi profesión, arquitectura, con el negocio familiar, y el hoquei sobre patines. 

Me interesa el contraste entre lo local y lo global, y me gusta ser el anfitrión de los viajeros que llegan a Ripoll. 

Si quereis hacer excursiones, a pie o en bicicleta, os daré detalles de varias rutas que conozco perfectamente, y os recomendaré una u otra según vuestras preferencias!

3 dormitorios dobles , amplio salon con 2 sofas, con 2 lavabos, 2 grandes terrazas , todo amueblado, cocina independiente con todo detalle, lavajillas , horno , frigorifico, vajilla, vasos, cacerolas, cubiertos sartenes,cafetera,hervido
neighborhood_overview:
EL Apartamento se encuentra caminando cerca de la playa principal y del paseo maritimo, parque infantil , en una finca muy tranquila, y cuidada. y sus vecinos turistas y algunos españoles.Tiene una ubicacion perfecta ,para hacer grades paseos por el litoral , casco antiguo, con mucha animacion.museos, ayuntamiento, parques , iglesia. te va a encantar lloret . Desde la terraza podras disfrutar de unas bonitas vistas sl, comer, cenar , almorzar tranquilamente. Los grupos de jóvenes podreis disfrutar de estar del apartamento en el centro a un paso de la zona de ocio , discoteca , bares musicales ,restaurantes.
La ciudad de Gerona y su aeropuerto se encuentra a tan sólo 40 minutos en coche , hay transporte Bus.
Barcelona se encuentra a una hora.
host_about:
soy una mujer, que me gusta relacionarme con otras personas, sociable 
Me encanta que nuestros clientes , encuentre el apartamento, limpio, comodo, nuestro fin,,  es que las personas que se alojen en nuestro apartamento, pasen unas vacaciones de lujo. Me encanta sugerir  pequeñas salidas por carretera y indicar que pueden visitar , la costa brava es marivillosa.

We can accommodate up to 7 + 2 people.
There is
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. The village of Rocabruna has two high quality restaurants, the Romanesque church of Sant Feliu de Rocabruna from the 12TH century and the ruins of Rocabruna Castle. It is also an ideal place for mountain routes, horseback riding, BTT, 4x4, trekking, trail-running or enjoy pleasant rural views and fantastic nature.

name: LUXURY RUSTIC HOUSE with POOL in TOSSA DE MAR
description:
Spectacular house from XIV century, inside the walled neighborhood of Vila Vella, fully restored, keeping details from back then and decorated with beautiful old furniture.
Located at the entrance, just 1 minute from the beach and 2 from downtown

The space
Rustic house with wifi included in the price, with 6 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, toiliete, dinning room, big fully equipped kitchen and a huge and beautiful terrace with BBQ and a covered part with furniture for you to enjoy excelent moments relaxing outdoors, dinners, fresh nights and more.

IDEAL FOR 2 FAMILIES, since it has 2 floors with 3 bedrooms with 1 bathroom on each floor.

Private parking for 1 car, 5 minutes walking from the house. Possibility of a second parking space with additional cost.

There is room for 12 people, with the following distribution:

Bedroom with 1 double bed

Bedroom with 1 double bed

Bedroom with 2 single bed
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located inside the emblematic walled neighborhood of “Vila Vella”, declared historic-artistic national monument, with lovely narrow streets. An area full of magic where is a privilege to stay.
One minute walking, you have the beach, restaurants next to the wall and 4 minutes away there is the commercial area, where is hard not to stop and see the beautiful shops.

The house is located inside Vila Vella, therefore, it is not possible to reach the door of the house with the car.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

description:
Casa en Rocabruna, Camprodon, Pirineo Catalán. Tranquila y luminosa. Increíbles vistas de la Alta Garrotxa. Naturaleza, paisaje y aire puro. Casa Rural con gran tranquilidad, grandes espacios exteriores, adecuados para multitud de actividades: Descanso, Sol, Juegos Infantiles, Barbacoas...
Ofrecemos amplitud en los espacios interiores, bañados de luz y paisaje. Nuestro propósito es buscar la comodidad y la calidad respetando el medio ambiente y las características de la antigua “Masia Catalana”

The space
La casa tiene para vuestro uso exclusivo, una sala de estar-comedor con cocina incorporada. La cocina esta totalmente equipada (Utensilios para cocinar y comer. Electrodomésticos: Nevera-congelador, horno, microondas, tostadora, batidora, exprimidor, lavavajillas, cafetera italiana,lavadora)
Estos espacios se complementan con 2 habitaciones con baño.
Podemos alojar hasta 6+2 plazas.
Tiene un espacio exterior de uso exclusivo.
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna es una pequeña aldea del municipio de Camprodon, situada en  la Alta Garrotxa, espacio de Interés Natural. El pueblo de Rocabruna dispone de dos restaurantes de gran calidad, la iglesia románica de Sant Feliu de Rocabruna del s. XII y las ruinas del castillo de Rocabruna, además de multiples rutas de montaña. Perfecto para salidas en caballo, BTT, 4x4, trecking, trail running o asequibles paseos por la más rural o salvaje y apacible naturaleza.

neighborhood_overview: The Costa Brava has a wealth of wonderful places and cuisine for the visitor to experience.  The area has some of the most beautiful beaches and hidden coves in Europe, for guests to explore.  There is an unlimited amount of water sports from kayaking, boat hire, windsurfing/boarding and other water-borne sports.  The Illes Medes islands, just off the coast of Estartit, is a protected marine area and has some of the best diving experiences in the Mediterranean.  Examples of occupying civilisations from the ancient Iberians to the Greeks and Romans have all left their mark on the landscape of this area.  There are great cycling routes and for the more tranquil pursuits, there are wonderful walks and bird watching opportunities.  The area also has a wealth of wonderful historical buildings/architecture for guests who wish to explore the history and culture.  The Medieval towns/villages of Castello d'Empuries, Pals, Peratallada and Torroella de Montgri are all within short distances of th
host_about: Hello, my name is Brent , I am a retired nurse from the United Kingdom.  My partner and I love meeting new people and gain great satisfaction from making people's holidays memorable ones.  We would like to welcome you to the Costa Brava and all that it has to offer.

name: SANT CARLES 6 Apartment in the urban centre with pool and close to the beach
description:
Apartment in the urban centre with pool and close to the beach.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This fan
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment with pool is located at the calm zone of Sant Carles in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayak, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) and mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres’ shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino too.
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

name: Apartamento nuevo frente al mar en Palamós
description:
Apartamento nuevo en Palamós delante del mar totalmente reformado en 2023. Situado en el centro y frente a la Pltaja Gran, encontrarás todo tipo de comercios y restaurantes. Ubicación ideal para no utilizar el coche durante toda la estadía. El apartamento consta de un salón-comedor y cocina con acceso a una terraza privada y 3 habitaciones dobles con todas las comodidades. Un baño completo con ducha. Dispone de aire centralizado. Acabados de máxima calidad.

The space
El apartamento consta de 3 habitaciones, dos con camas de matrimonio y una con literas. Cada una tiene armarios hechos a medida y con luces led. El amplio salón-comedor conecta con la terraza y la cocina abierta. La cocina está totalmente equipada, cafetera Nespresso, lavavajillas, lavadora, utensillos de cocina y acabado en cuarzo. El baño cuenta con todas las comididades necesarias. El apartamento ha sido decorado por profesionales.

Guest access
Los huéspedes disponen de tod
neighborhood_overview: La ubicación es uno de los puntos fuertes del apartamento. Situado frente al mar y en el casco antiguo, corazón de todo el ocio del pueblo. Encontrarás todo lo que necesites a menos de 5 minutos a pie.

name: Can Barraca VentÓs
description:
CAN BARRACA (alojamiento+paseo*)
Situado a 5 km de Figueres. Dispone de cocina, comedor, baño y dos dormitorios, uno de cama doble, y otro de dos camas individuales.
*Con estancia de 3 noches, se ofrece paseo en carro y mulas con desayuno.

The space
El apartamento Ventós, ubicado en la planta baja de Can Barraca, en el centro del pequeño pueblo de Avinyonet de Puigventós, es un alojamiento acogedor, totalmente equipado y con conexión wifi gratuita.
La cocina está totalmente equipada con horno, lavavajillas, nevera con congelador, microondas,vitro-cerámica y otros pequeños electrodomésticos. El salón-comedor está equipado con sofá, sillones y televisión. El apartamento tiene dos dormitorios: una habitación con cama de matrimonio y un espacioso armario, y el otro dormitorio dispone de una litera con dos camas individuales y un pequeño escritorio. Cocina con barra americana, nevera, horno, vitrocerámica y lavavajillas. Lavadora, aire acondicionado, persianas eléctricas, TV, wifi. El edificio dispone de ascensor desde la 1ª planta (hay que subir un tramo de escaleras)

The space
Situado en una zona privilegiada de la bahía de Palamós-Sant Antoni, muy céntrico, en la zona de restaurantes!
neighborhood_overview:
Sant Antoni de Calonge es un pueblo muy tranquilo durante la temporada de invierno y con mucho turismo en la temporada de verano. El turismo es de tipo familiar y el Ayuntamiento organiza muchas actividades de todo tipo para la familia: yoga, gimnasia en la playa, actividades infantiles, ...
El pueblo dispone de muchos restaurantes y cafeterías, así como un Mercadona (a 5 minutos a pie del apartamento), un Carrefour market, un Esclat,...

name: SANT CARLES 2 Fantastic penthouse in the seafront
description:
Fantastic penthouse in the seafront.

The space
This cosy penthouse is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
The apartment it's in the sea front
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment is located at the calm zone of Sant Carles, in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities (GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.

name: Can Barraca Puig
description:
Nuestro apartamento, recién rehabilitado, se encuentra en un pequeño pueblo del Alt Empordà. Dispone de cocina, comedor (con sofá-cama), habitación doble, baño y terraza.

*Con estancia de 3 noches, se ofrece paseo en carro y mulas con desayuno.

The space
El apartamento Puig, se encuentra en la primera planta de Can Barraca, ubicado en un pequeño pueblo del Alt Empordà. Dispone de TV, conexión wifi gratuita y un pequeño porche exterior con vistas al jardín.
Esta propiedad consiste en un salón con sofá-cama italiano de 135cm, una amplia cocina equipada con horno, lavavajillas, nevera-congelador, microondas, cocina vitrocerámica y otros pequeños electrodomésticos, también dispone de utensilios y productos básicos como sal, azúcar, aceite o productos de limpieza. Un dormitorio con cama doble de 150cm, y finalmente el baño, con ducha, lavabo e inodoro.
Además, el apartamento está equipado con una lavadora-secadora, plancha y tendedero de ropa.

description:
Apartamento de 66 M2 con dos habitaciones dobles (convertibles en triples) y acceso a zona comunitaria con dos piscinas, situado en el corazón de la Costa Brava, en una zona tranquila de Lloret de mar y al lado de las espectaculares playas de Fanals y Boadella.
El apartamento dispone de aire acondicionado y se entrega completamente equipado y dotado de toallas, ropa de cama y pequeños suministros (jabón , papel WC, detergentes , papel cocina, aceite, azucar, café, agua,...).
NLT: HUTG-013116

The space
El apartamento está enclavado en el tranquilo barrio de Fenals de Lloret de Mar. A menos de 10 minutos caminando se accede a las maravillosas playas de Fanals y Boadella. El acceso al centro de Lloret y su famosa vida nocturna es fácil, a 5 minutos de transporte público o 15/20 minutos caminando.

Guest access
El apartamento ha sido dotado de todas las comodidades posibles (aire acondicionado, Smart TV de 37'', DVD, tres tipos de caf
neighborhood_overview:
Hay dos cosas que destacan por encima de lo demás de la zona de Fenals-Boadella en que se encuentra el apartamento.
1) La cercanía a las playas de Fenals y Boadella (para mi gusto, una de las playas más bonitas del mediterráneo).
2) La tranquilidad del barrio incluso en los meses de verano que contrasta con la gran animación del centro de Lloret a 5 minutos en transporte público o 15 paseando.
host_about:
Soy un apasionado de viajar y descubrir nuevos lugares y nuevas gentes. 
Como viajero suelo alojarme en apartamentos turísticos , especialmente en mis viajes por Europa.
Como anfitrión intento ofrecer todo aquello que me gusta encontrar a mi :)

name: Cabin Can Janot. Heart of the natural park
description:
Nice 2-storey cabin with a garden in Batet, the only one facing the volcanoes of the Garrotxa natural park. For lovers of nature, hiking and tranquility. Two bedrooms with bathroom, equipped kitchen, living room and dining room. Only 5 km from Olot
Private garden with barbecue and porch. Starry sky, views and a lot of tranquility

The space
Built on two floors, it has 2 bedrooms: a triple room with a double bed and a single bed on the first floor of the house with a full bathroom with a shower and another double room on the ground floor with a bathroom with a bathtub. On the ground floor, there is one of the bedrooms and a dining room with a fireplace and a large and well-equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, oven, hob, coffee maker, toaster, kitchenware and utensils, washing machine (only for long-term use) , etc.
Private garden, garden furniture, barbecue, outdoor parking area next to the house, table tennis. Easy access.
The farm is closed i
neighborhood_overview:
The mountain of Batet de la Serra, of which you will find Can Janot, in realidad pertenece a Olot y se trata de una pequeña montaña donde solo hay masias, bosque y campos de cultivo. Zone exclusiva between Olot and Santa Pau. Views over the volcanoes and Pirineos. Routes of senderiso and BTT. Easy access
A solo 5 Km from the center of Olot there are 5 Km from Santa Pau

Lots of light and views. Outdoor shared parking area

The space
Cozy and rustic accommodation with vaulted ceilings and stone walls. Recently reformed. Total area of 35 m2 with a double bedroom with a complete bathroom, a living-dining room with a large sofa bed, TV and an equipped kitchen. Central heating. no stairs

neighborhood_overview:
Mas Violella is a typical Catalan farmhouse from the 18th century, restored. It is located in the heart of the Garrotxa Volcanic Zone Natural Park, a privileged location, next to Olot, the volcanoes, the Fajeda d'en Jordà, medieval towns such as Besalú and Santa Pau, etc. An area unknown to many people, with a unique and incomparable charm and landscape, with a large protected area due to its high natural interest.
The excellent location of the house allows you to easily explore the entire region and the province. In a radius of 45-50 km it can go from the northern Costa Brava to 2000 meters high in the Pyrenees. Girona is only 45 km away

Restaurant service 100 meters from the house. Food prepared at home. Bicycle rental, guides, monitors, taxis-transfers, etc. All services in the town at 1.5 km: supermarket, food stores, pharmacy, tobacconist, restaurants, etc.

keinerlei Einschränkungen.

frei

El vallado de madera del jardín es zona privada. Lo utilizamos como almacén. Es totalmente independiente de la casa, tiene entrada independiente donde la puerta de entrada es por la calle.

name: Room in a charming country house
description:
Casa Rabòs is a traditional 17 century house,entirely renovated with all modern amenities and it is situated between Figueres (Dali's museum)and Llança/Rosas (sandy beaches) near Peralada (golf) in north Catalonia ,Spain.
Cadaquès, beautiful little harbour,with Cap de Creus,beautiful natural park are just half an hour drive.
Welcome.

The space
Casa Rabos is a traditional 17th century stone house, entirely renovated with all modern amenities and it is situated between Figueres and Llanca/Rosas near Perelada in north Catalonia, Spain.
The Orlina river runs down the village,and a beautiful bridgeunder which you can bathe.
You can treck around in the Albera natural park,discover dolmens, menhirs and the tipical méditerrannéen nature.

Perched in the renowned bay of Rosas close to the sea and entoured on one side by the Pyrenee mountains with 3,000 meter snowcapped summits. The climate is ideal with more than 300 days of sunshine per y
neighborhood_overview:
The house is on the outskirts of a charming medieval village at the foot of which the Orlina river flows.
The village is very peaceful, it has a small grocery store open in the morning only.
You can take beautiful walks, discover dolmens and menhirs in the middle of the surrounding garrigue, located in the Albera natural park.
host_about:
D'origine Québecoise, je m'occupe de cette merveilleuse maison de famille qui a au dessus de 400 ans ,et dans laquelle on fabriquait autrefois l'huile d'olive, le pain et le vin.
 Je partage cette occupation avec ma mère qui elle,est catalane d'origine et vit au Québec une grande partie de l'année.
J'ai suivi une formation en tourisme et aime partager ma passion pour la vie.
  Ma mère ,elle ,est massothérapeuthe et enseigne le Qi Gong, elle donne des ateliers d'initiation de cet art.
  Nous aimons toutes les deux recevoir les gens, qu'ils se sentent à l'aise et chaleureusement accueillis.
  Nous aimons aussi la nature, les plantes, la musique, la mer, la montagne, avoir du plaisir et partager tous ces merveilleux cadeaux que nous donne la vie;

name: Magnificent villa near the sea
description:
Gorgeous cosy villa in the prestigious picturesque urbanization, situated in a quiet fishing cove Cala Margarita, 5 min. walk from the famous beach of La Fosca and Palamos. With garden and private pool. The combination of seclusion and civilization.

The space
Стильное размещение до 11 человек в 5 минутах ходьбы от пляжа La Fosca.
Площадь дома 320кв.м. На первом этаже расположены большая полностью оснащенная кухня, отдельная столовая, гостиная с камином, комната отдыха с выходом к бассейну, 1-местная спальня с собственным туалетом и душем, туалет. Все окна первого этажа являются панорамными и предоставляют выход на террасу и в сад (800 кв.м.). На террасе имеется большой обеденный стол и уютный диван, что позволит с комфортом проводить время на свежем воздухе. Имеется барбекю, теннисный стол, шезлонги для отдыха. Терраса оснащена раскладными маркизами для создания тени.
Также на первом этаже расположен гараж и прачечная, оснащенная стиральной и суш
neighborhood_overview:
Бухта Ла Фоска в окрестностях Паламоса — хорошее место для пляжного отдыха. В переводе с испанского «La Fosca» означает «темная скала», которую можно увидеть около берега, напротив руин старинного замка Сант-Эстева. На берегу имеется прокат каяков, площадка для игры в пляжный волейбол, душевые, кафе и магазин.
В часы солнцепека прогуляйтесь по дорожкам вдоль берега: одна из них ведет к иберийским раскопкам, а другая — в сосновый бор, где можно устроить пикник или просто подышать целебным воздухом. Пляж неоднократно получал Голубой флаг за чистоту прибрежных вод и развитую инфраструктуру.

neighborhood_overview: The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands. The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about:
Hola a tod@s,
Fue en Mayo del 2013 que decidimos venir a vivir aquí en la provincia de Girona ... y hacer un cambio radical de vida. Necesitábamos alejarnos de la ciudad, de la falta de respeto, de una convivencia que se hacía cada vez más insoportable, del egoísmo y anonimato que conocíamos en Barcelona. Ahora disfrutamos de estos pequeños detalles de cada día, en Llampaies, un núcleo de muy pocos habitantes: el cielo, sus amaneceres y puestas de sol, el ambiente rural al 100%. la naturaleza con nuestros insectos, plantas y árboles, nuestros animales con las gallinas y conejos, nuestro gato Llamp y sobre todo disfrutar cada momento con nuestros hijos, Roger y Oriol.
Estamos muy felices de poderos recibir en nuestra casa y haceros descubrir nuestra comarca tan bonita. 
Hasta pronto.
Eduard, Isabelle, Roger y Oriol
neighbourhood: Saus, Camallera i Llampaies, Catalonia, Spain

name: Studio Coll 3
description:
Recommended for travelers who value the place where they are staying, new, impeccably designed, comfortable and functional, this studio will be perfect. Like other accommodations in our complex, it is just a few meters from the beach and the center of Sant Martí d'Empúries. It is divided into three zones; terrace, kitchen-living room and bedroom-bathroom. The terrace overlooking the garden, facing south, has outdoor furniture (table and chairs), solarium, barbecue and drying rack. The kitchen, ample and well equipped, having all the necessary utensils, shares the space with the living room; It has a coffee table, TV with national and international channels and a three-seater sofa.As for the bedroom, separated from a sliding door, is equipped with a bed of two people and a bathroom "en suite" with large Italian shower.

150 m2 apartment with sea views, 11 meters from La Fosca beach. Living room with 2 sofa beds, TV, dining room for 8 and terrace with table, chairs and sun loungers. Apartment with garden 11 meters from the sandy beach of La Fosca. Qualified beach with blue flag by the EU. The highest rating a beach can get. Ideally located. Privileged environment. neighborhood_overview: The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands. The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about:
Hola a tod@s,
Fue en Mayo del 2013 que decidimos venir a vivir aquí en la provincia de Girona ... y hacer un cambio radical de vida. Necesitábamos alejarnos de la ciudad, de la falta de respeto, de una convivencia que se hacía cada vez más insoportable, del egoísmo y anonimato que conocíamos en Barcelona. Ahora disfrutamos de estos pequeños detalles de cada día, en Llampaies, un núcleo de muy pocos habitantes: el cielo, sus amaneceres y puestas de sol, el ambiente rural al 100%. la naturaleza con nuestros insectos, plantas y árboles, nuestros animales con las gallinas y conejos, nuestro gato Llamp y sobre todo disfrutar cada momento con nuestros hijos, Roger y Oriol.
Estamos muy felices de poderos recibir en nuestra casa y haceros descubrir nuestra comarca tan bonita. 
Hasta pronto.
Eduard, Isabelle, Roger y Oriol
neighbourhood: Saus, Camallera i Llampaies, Catalonia, Spain

name: Lovely house in the Emporda
description:
Special and peaceful village house, restored respecting the traditional architecture of the area, in the heart of the village of Vilafant.
Situated at 1 km distance of the AVE train station and 3 km away from Figueras and the Dalí Museum

The space
An old village house with vaulted ceilings in the traditional style of the volta catalana, carefully restored with ecological materials, maintaining and respecting the original architecture of the house and giving it a special charm.

Guest access
There is a balcony where you can enjoy the fresh air in the summer, and even enjoy your meals, at night and during the day if you're three people or less.

Other things to note
There is a balcony where you can enjoy the fresh air in the summer, and even enjoy your meals, at night and during the day if you're three people or less.
neighborhood_overview:
The AVE (a specially fast train) station is 1 km outside the village and the AP7 highway is at a 2 km distance.
You can reach Barcelona in 55 minutes in the AVE train and in 1.5 hours by car.
The house is situated in an ideal spot, both to go to the beach and to explore the mountains. It is at a distance of 3 km from Figueras and the Dali Museum. Llança, Sant Pere Pescador, Rosas and the natural park of Alvera are also great places to visit. The nearest beaches are at only 20 km.
You can make great excursions to places with excellent gastronomy such as the natural parks of Cap de Creus and Alvera, the lake of Banyoles, Besalú, Sant Llorenç de la Muga, Port de la Selva, Empuriabrava and the city of Gerona, as well as architectonic Romanic and Gothic highlights...
host_about: La casa situada en el L´Alt Empordà, una zona bella,  con lagos, bosques, parques naturales,  cerca del mar y la montaña a su vez,  localizada en el casco antiguo del pueblo, ha sido restaurada pensando en el respeto al medio ambiente y con la intención de conectar con lo esencial  y grato de la convivencia.

name: Charming Seaside Family Home, 2 Min Walk to Beach
description:
Our eclectic, charming family home is located in a picturesque vibrant seaside village, just a couple of minute's walk from the fabulous local beaches. Situated in the "old-town" centre, our townhouse retains original features e.g. patterned ceramic floor tiles, vaulted ceilings & characteristic window shutters. You'll benefit from the "home from home" (as in family home/not a hotel!) atmosphere while immersing yourself in village life, with an array of cafes & bars on your doorstep. Enjoy :)

The space
Our home is located in the "old town" of L'Escala, a former fishing village, on the beautiful Costa Brava. This is not a hotel style rental but rather it is our family home.

The accommodation is situated over three floors, with kitchen and dining room on the ground floor. The 4 bedrooms (one with kingsize bed and 3 with single beds) and the WC and bathroom are found on the middle floor. The sitting room is located on the top floor and leads onto
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in a peaceful residential area in the "old town" of L'Escala, close to several beaches. The sandy family beach, surrounded by a variety of cafes and restaurants, is located just beyond the bottom of our road. A short stroll away are a number of independent boutiques, jewellery and craft shops, also shops selling local Anchovies of L'Escala. Creu Cove, a minute's walk away (to the left of our house), is great for snorkelling. The larger, sandy crescent beaches of Empúries are a short walk away, and if you want a bit of culture you can visit the nearby Greco-Roman ruins of Empúries. Also within walking distance (a bit of a hike, but worth the walk!), along the beautiful scenic coastal path, is Sant Marti d'Empúries, a charming hill top hamlet with a selection of fabulous restaurants, overlooking the Golf of Roses.

If you drive, there is free parking in our street but the residents use the spaces so you will most likely have to park your car at the to
host_about:
Hello from Seeta and John!

I'm an editor and John is an architect who undertook the renovations on our house which hadn't been lived in for 40 years.  We hope you will enjoy our home as much as we do :)

Situada en el Alt Ampurdán, a 10min de Figueras, a 30min d diferentes playas de la Costa Brava, a 40min de las montanyas nevadas de los Pirineos. name: Cal Ouaire House
description:
Casa con chimenea , patio privado y piscina compartida.
Cal Ouaire ofrece una experiencia auténtica en el corazón del Empordà. Se trata de una casa restaurada, rodeada de bosques y pequeñas casas que conforman el tranquilo barrio de Diana. El edificio un antiguo pajar se ha reformado con la premisa de preservar su estructura original como sus paredes de piedra, buscando siempre serenidad y confort. El resultado no es más que un hogar tranquilo que transmite una sensación de simplicida...

The space
Cal Ouaire es una masia Catalana restaurada rodeada de pequeñas casas que conforman el tranquilo vecindario de Diana.
El edificio ha sido renovado a partir de la ruina de una antigua granja. Las renovaciones se llevaron a cabo con las premisas de preservar sus paredes de piedra, buscando siempre la serenidad y comodidad. El resultado no es más que un hogar tranquilo que transmite una sensación de simplicidad y calma. La casa está amueblada con un estilo na
neighborhood_overview:
Todo se reduce a una experiencia sencilla y pura. Huimos de las aglomeraciones y buscamos la discreción. Queremos que nuestros huéspedes formen parte de esta tierra, la vivan y la disfruten de una forma especial. Buscamos ser parte del recuerdo que te llevarás.
La desconexión y el descanso lo encontramos en una puesta de sol, en el ruido de los árboles, en el aire y la energía del viento del Empordà.La casa está emplazada en un camino a 2 kilómetros de Sant Jordi Desvalls. Es un lugar donde reina la tranquilidad y el silencio. Un precioso paisaje de interior, rodeado de campos, huertos y bosques donde disfrutar de agradables paseos.
A escasos kilómetros de la casa se encuentran las playas más bonitas de la Costa Brava. A tan sólo 20 minutos en coche de l'Estartit, i l'Escala, y a 25 minutos de Girona. También podrás visitar numerosos pueblos con encanto. En la casa encontraríes varias ediciones de la Guia de l'Empordà y recomandaciones.
En el pueblo de Sant Jordi Desva
host_about:
Nuestra familia siempre trabajó en el campo y nuestra ilusión de dar nueva vida a antiguos espacios utilizados para el ganado y sus cultivos nos llevaron a construir estas magníficas casas, respetando siempre el entorno y los lugares, con materiales honestos y de calidad.. 
Estaremos encantados de daros la bienvenida y explicaros lo que creemos es lo mejor y más bonito de la zona del Empordà y el Gironès.

name: Rustic apartment near beaches and golf courses
description:
Located at the characteristic medieval village of Palau-Sator, this renovated apartment offers you a comfortable residency during your holidays. The living room, dining room, and kitchen merge into a single open-plan space, painted in warm tones and filled with light. Totally furnished, the living room area is fitted out with two sofas, a coffee table and, for your entertainment, a flat screen TV and Wi-Fi service.
The apartment offers also two bedrooms and one bathroom.

The space
This specific location, which is setteld in a very quiet medieval village is an exceptional catalan

Guest access
The apartment has no public areas. All spaces, interior and exterior, are strictly for private use. Wifi.

Other things to note
As for the tourist accommodation tax, upon arrival, you will be charged the amount of € 0.45 / per person over 16 years / night (up to 7 nights).

Minimum 7 nights from Saturday to Saturday
neighborhood_overview: Historic center of Palau-Sator, medieval village in the province of Girona. Located 10-15 minutes from the beaches of the Costa Brava (Pals, Begur, Estartit..). Palau-Sator, is a quiet tourist town. You will not find large crowds. The neighbours, mostly, are people from the country. It is also important to note that in the village there are exactly 4 restaurants, I particularly recommend Can Saló and Mas Pou.
host_about:
Soy nacido en el Empordà, en la población de Palafrugell, y actualmente tengo 42 años.

Vivo en La Bisbal d'Empordà, con Silvia, mi compañera y con Mel, Maui y Bruno, nuestras mascotas.

Me licencié en Derecho en el año 2000 pero nunca he ejercido la profesión; seguramente, porqué prefiero la tranquilidad de la vida en mi tierra que teñir mi existencia con las tensiones de los Tribunales ( no estoy hecho para esto ).

En Airbnb anunciamos casas de la familia ( 2 casas en Canet de La Tallada y dos apartamentos en Palau-Sator ) y también otra casa cuyos derechos de explotación he adquirido ( Sant Iscle d'Empordà ).

El proyecto inicial de las casas de Canet de la Tallada era la venta pero la depresión del sector inmobiliario hizo a la familia cambiar de opinión y decidimos su explotación en modo de arrendamiento. Además, cuando no están alquiladas las usamos la familia ( somos 5 hermanos ).

En Palau-Sator, los apartamentos que tienen origen en la rehabilitación de la casa de mis abuelos paternos. Era una casa muy grande y hace ya más de 15 años la familia tomó la decisión de restaurara en este sentido.

Después de 3 años en la plataforma, mi experiencia como anfitrión con Airbnb es francamente buena. Salvo pequeños detalles y algún caso aislado estamos muy contentos con los huéspedes que nos han llegado.

Recomiendo el Empordà de forma enérgica, cualquiera de sus rincones, espacios, paisajes o playas...Esta región, es muchísimo más que el conocido Triángulo de Oro. Os lo aseguro!! 

Aquí, puedes relajarte, divertirte, ir de fiesta, en globo, practicar equitación, bajar en canoa por el río Ter, alquilar un velero, ir en bici, jugar a Golf o Picht&Putt, practicar nudismo, bañarte en calas preciosas o, si lo prefieres, en playas kilométricas, perderte en largos paseos al atarceder y comerte un buen arroz!!

name: Habitación con terraza
description:
En Sant Pere Pescador rodeado de campos fruteros, al principio de la reserva natural “Parc de Mig de Dos Rius” dónde hay una gran diversidad de fauna, al lado del río Fluvià i cerca de la playa, en el corazón de los Aiguamolls de l'Empordà.

The space
El mas se encuentra en Sant Pere Pescador rodeado de campos fruteros, al principio de la reserva natural “Parc de Mig de Dos Rius” dónde hay una gran diversidad de fauna, al lado del río Fluvià i cerca de la playa, en el corazón de los Aiguamolls de l’Empordà.

La masía está situada en la comarca del Alt Empordà, en la población de Sant Pere Pescador, en el Baix Fluvià. El pueblo se encuentra a unos 300 m y se puede ir dando un paseo. Aproximadamente a un kilómetro tenemos la desembocadura del Fluvià de gran valor ecológico y la playa que tiene una extensión de 6 km. de dunas de arena fina. Es una de las pocas playas que se mantienen vírgenes en la Costa Brava.

El camino que pasa por delante de
neighborhood_overview:
Desde Sant Pere podrá hacer muchas visitas turísticas, como son por ejemplo:
Figueres (19 km): Museu Dalí, museo del juguete, de la técnica, del Empordà, Castillo de Sant Ferran, ….
Castelló d’Empúries (8,5 km): villa condal, basílica de Santa María, la harinera, …
L’Escala (12 km): ruinas greco-romanas de Empúries, fábricas de anchoas,…
Roses (17 km): castillo de la Trinidad, Ciutadella, monumentos megalíticos, puerto pesquero, …
Sant Pere de Rodes (28 km): monasterio románico.
Cap de Creus (38 km): Parque Natural.
Besalú (38 km): pueblo medieval, Puente Viejo, baños judíos, ….
Girona (50 km): catedral, barrio judío, la Rambla, la Devesa, …
Barcelona: 147 km.
Perpiñán: 76 km.
host_about:
M'agrada llegir, cuinar, la natura, passejar amb els gossos i quan tinc un moment sortir a córrer pels voltants del mas. 
També m'encanta viatjar però des que tenim la casa rural no ens queda massa temps per fer-ho.

name: Begur Villa with pool and sea view
description:
This single-storey villa in Begur has a large sunny and private garden with pool, sea view and Wifi Internet. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, private parking and a beautiful and quiet location.

The space
This single-storey villa has a large sunny and private garden - great for the kids to run around in with plenty of room for games and the pool - which has a special Baby-Secure safety fence. All the bedrooms have french doors opening out onto the garden and with great views across the valley of Sa Riera and the Mediterranean Sea. There is a large garden table and chairs for dining on the shady terrace and 6 pool chairs for comfortable sunbathing as well as a barbecue.

The kitchen is equipped with the necessary modern appliances: fridge-freezer, dish washer, gas stove with extractor hood, electric oven and microwave. The kitchen opens out onto the terrace making it ideal for alfresco meals.

name: Mas Violella Cargol. Parque  Natural -La Garrotxa
description:
Cargol de Mas Violella is a rural tourism house that preserves its authenticity. Stone floor, wooden beams, centennial fireplace, etc. Large garden with barbecues, billiards and everything you need to spend wonderful days surrounded by nature.
Exceptional situation close to everywhere and easy access. Within the natural park of the volcanoes of La Garrotxa (Girona)

The space
Typical Catalan farmhouse from the 18th century, restored and very authentic
The “Cargol” accommodation is located on the first floor of the house, at the level of the porch and garden. It has 3 bedrooms, bathroom, toilet, living room with TV, fireplace and kitchen. Children's furniture. Direct exits to the garden. Central heating and Wi-Fi
Large garden and community facilities.
In the house there are other accommodations, of little capacity that share exteriors, but in total there are few people and a lot of space

Guest access
Outside the farmhouse,
neighborhood_overview: Located near the beautiful town of Sant Joan les Fonts, in the Garrotxa Volcanic Zone Natural Park, a privileged location, next to Olot, the volcanoes, Besalú and very close to Girona and Barcelona. An area unknown to many people, with a charm and a unique and incomparable landscape, with a large protected area due to its high natural interest. Excellent local gastronomy. Just 1.6 km from Sant Joan les Fonts where you can find all the services: restaurant, supermarket, traditional food stores, pharmacy, tobacconist, doctor's office, etc. Public transport with stop in Sant Joan les Fonts
host_about: Hace más de 20 años que me dedico al tursmo rural. Mi trabajo se ha convertido en mi vocación y me encata recibir a personas de todo el mundo y hacer que se sientan como en casa.

name: Edirla
description:
Es la primera de nuestras habitaciones. Situada en la planta baja de la casa y con salida directa a la fachada principal. Orientada al sur, es una habitación fresca en verano y cálida en invierno.

The space
En el exterior puedes disfrutar del bar, la piscina, los rincones sorprendentes, y el paisaje excepcional que rodea la casa. Las fantásticas playas de Pals se encuentran a 20 minutos andando y el núcleo antiguo de Pals o el nucleo cercano de Begur a pocos minutos en bicicleta por caminos interiores de gran belleza.
La masía está situada en un entorno ideal para conocer la zona de Pals y el bajo empordán, donde se suceden los pequeños pueblos medievales y las playas de la Costa Brava. En el área más cercana es posible además participar en gran variedad de actividades deportivas y culturales muy variadas: museos, festivales, senderismo, golf, deportes de agua etc. A menos de una hora, se puede visitar Torroella de Montgrí, Figueres, Girona o Perpinyá con to

Alojamiento situado en la primera planta de una masía del 1771, totalmente restaurada. Dispone de un amplio jardín de 5000m2 delante de la casa con piscina, ideal per a relajarse y desconectar. El alojamiento està equipado con todas las comodidades incluyendo calefacción central y estufa de leña. Casa de tres façanes. Davant de la plaça de l'església. Planta baixa, pis, balconada i gran terrassa 67 m2. Rebedor, menjador, cuina, cinc habitacions, un quarto bany, un lavabo. Aparcaments a la mateixa plaça. A 2Km de la platja i 500 m del Riu.

The space
Per la seva tranquil·litat, ubicada en zona peatonal, en ple casc antic. Si poden allotjar fins a nou persones adultes.

Guest access
La casa entera està a disposició dels hostes. Amb cuina complerta, rentadora i si es durant l'hivern calefacció central.

Other things to note

name: AL01 Studio 250 m from Fenals Beach, Costa Brava
description:
Nice and cozy studio, tastefully decorated, situated in an enclosed grounds with swimming pool only 250 meters from the beach in one of the best areas of Lloret de Mar - Fenals. It has a bright living room with a comfortable sofa bed of 160 cm, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and cooking utensils, TV, WI-FI internet (included in the price), iron, air conditioning etc., and a bathroom with bath and hairdryer.

The space
The studio has a bright room with a very comfortable 160 cm sofa-bed, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and kitchen utensils, TV, Wi-Fi internet (included in the price), iron, air conditioning etc., and a bathroom with bathtub and dryer.

Guest access
Guests can access the garden and the communal pool

Other things to note
Included in the price:
- welcome detail (for stays from 1 week)
- supplies (electricity, water)
- Internet WIFI
- Linens and towels

NOT inc
neighborhood_overview: The Fenals area is very quiet and perfect for family holidays. It has a very complete infrastructure: restaurants, cafeterias, shops, supermarkets, playgrounds, transport stops and multiple places of leisure. It is 15 minutes walk from the center of the village and its nightlife, for those who wish to go out to spend a fun and enjoyable time. A few meters away are the beaches of Fenals and Sa Boadella, recognized as one of the most beautiful beaches of the Costa Brava.
host_about: Hello! My name is Verónica. I live in Lloret de Mar, Costa Brava and I am in love with this wonderful place. I love traveling! I am dedicated to vacation rentals in Lloret de Mar, Playa de Aro and Sagaro. Since 2009 we have hosted travelers from all over the world in our accommodations and we love our work. We will be happy to welcome new travelers on the Costa Brava and provide them with the best conditions and advice for an unforgettable stay.
