name: Cozy house near the sea
description:
Casa adosada para 6 personas, con jardín, A/A y piscina a 10 minutos a pie de la playa y el centro.

The space
Наш дом - это прекрасное место для семейного отдыха с детьми!
Таунхаус угловой, выходит одной стороной в лес, двухэтажный.
Около дома расположен бассейн 15 метров (общий на урбанизацию), ухоженный газон.
На первом этаже расположены
гостиная, кухня, туалет, терраса, два ухоженных участка спереди со стороны входа и сзади дома, площадью 150 и 30 кв.м. соответственно.
На втором этаже находятся 3 спальни и 2 ванных.
Все спальни кондиционированны.
Кухня оборудована всем необходимым.
Плита, холодильник, посудомоечная и стиральная машины, кофеварка, микроволновая печь, мелкая бытовая техника (соковыжималка, тостер, измельчитель, блендер)
Есть места, где можно полежать, позагорать в шезлонге, или, наоборот, посидеть почитать книжку в тени деревьев. Самое волшебное время - завтрак на террасе! На участке растет
neighborhood_overview:
Тихое, уютное и зеленое место в пешей досягаемости от моря и от фешенебельного курортного города с развитой инфрастуктурой для отдыха и шопинга (магазины, рестораны, аквапарк, детский парк аттракционов).
Расстояние до пляжа - 10мин пешком, расстояние до центра города Platja d'Aro около 15 минут (на машине 2 мин).
Развлечения для детей:
- аквапарк 10 мин пешком;
- детский парк аттракционов 15-20 мин пешком;
- детские площадки вдоль всего пляжа;
- теплоходные экскурсии;
- 2 больших гипермаркета с игрушками, в одном из них есть большая детская комната;
- русский летний лагерь и детский сад дневного пребывания.
Развлечения для взрослых (непосредственно в городе):
- рестораны, кафе, пляжи;
- аквапарк;
- дискотеки в пешей доступности;
- город Lloret de Mar с его дискотеками и казино. Расстояние 40 мин. на машине
- теплоходные экскурсии в Tossa de Mar, Sant Feliu, Lloret de Mar.
host_about:
Мы с мужем живем в Испании. У нас двое детей.  Мы очень любим эту страну, можем рассказать  и познакомить вас с самыми интересными и необычными местами Испании и Франции.  Тем более, что наше общее хобби это  путешествие,  планирование и « разведка» новых мест, которое постепенно перерастает в профессиональное занятие.  У нас много друзей и мы любим принимать гостей у себя дома.  Мое хобби – изготовление десертов и фотография!

I'm native russian, living now in Barcelona with my family. We enjoy traveling and sightseeing. My favorite thing to do is to discover new beautiful places, this brings me fun and inspiration.
I have got 2 children and one hampster :) I like cooking, dancing, swimming and trekking. Currently I study spanish.

name: Calm and tranquility in the canals
description:
The apartment, built in 2008, is placed in urbanization Santa Margarita, Roses. Totally fully equipped for 4 people, it is very well oriented and close to several supermarkets and restaurants. A comunal swimming-pool and one car parking is included.

The space
The apartment was built in 2008 and is placed in Santa Margarita, Roses. It has:

* One room with one double bed.
* One room with two single beds.
* 16m2 terrace, with table and electrical awnings, in order to enjoy at any moment.
* A cot, if it is required.
* Communal swimming-pool.
* Car parking.

Guest access
--- Parking ---
There is one car parking in the basement, beneath the same building. Therefore, the car is safe under lock and key, and in the shadow.

--- Swimming-pool ---

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Nací en un pueblecito de León, hace ya muchísimos años. Llegué joven a Rosas, donde tras varios trabajos temporales, comencé a trabajar como maestro en la escuela. Y desde entonces, hace ya más de 35 años, aquí continúo, disfrutando de esta magnífica zona donde confluyen el mar, la llanura y las montañas! Un enclave realmente afortunado!

Cuando vengas a visitarnos, muy posiblemente seré yo quien te atienda a tu llegada. Repasaremos junto el apartamento y sus características, y te explicaré dónde puedes encontrar los principales supermercados, así como el Centro de Información Turística. 

!Será un placer tenerte como inquilino!

name: Apartamento lujo a 2min de la playa
description:
Apartamento de 3 habitaciones y 2 baños con amplios jardines y 2 piscinas. A 2 minutos andando de la playa.

The space
Apartamento de 3 dormitorios (130 m2) es adecuado para 5 personas. Hay una habitación en suite (baño privado), una con cama individual (120 cm) y un tercer dormitorio con 2 camas individuales. Hay un segundo cuarto de baño grande. El suelo es de mármol en las zonas comunes.

El salón comedor cuenta con TV, DVD, equipo de música con radio y CD. Sofá de 3 plazas y 2 puffs. Hay otra zona con mesa y sillas para las comidas.
La cocina está totalmente equipada con nevera, congelador, microondas, tostadora, cafetera, calentador de agua, lavadora, lavavajillas y utensilios de cocina.
La terraza es amplia (29 m2) con dos ambientes: uno con sofás y mesa para relajarse y otro con una mesa y sillas para las comidas. Tiene vistas preciosas a los jardines y a la piscina.

Guest access
2 piscinas comunitarias y ampli
neighborhood_overview:
S'Agaró es una de las zonas más exclusivas y demandadas de la Costa Brava, con una excelente y variada zona de ocio y restauración.
La playa más cercana está a 200 metros: Sant Pol. En ella podéis practicar multitud de actividades como kayak y vela.
Personalmente recomiendo mucho la playa Sa Conca a tan solo 10 minutos a pie del apartamento (400m). Tiene una arena y agua de gran calidad. Se puede llegar a través del Camí de Ronda que sigue toda la Costa Brava y durante el cual se encontrarán con distintas calas donde se puede pescar o practicar snorkel.
A Platja d'Aro se puede llegar andando (40 minutos), en coche o autobús (10 minutos). En la zona del puerto de Platja d'Aro (20 minutos a pie) hay una zona de ocio con cines, bolera, restaurantes y discotecas. Platja d’Aro ofrece una amplia zona comercial con las mejores marcas y las últimas tendencias en moda.
Desde S'Agaró se recomienda visitar toda la zona de la Costa Brava: Roses, Cadaqués, Pals, Calella de

name: Casa Rural en la Costa Brava - 6/8 Pax
description:
The space
RURAL HOUSE IN CCan Ginesta (Tramuntana) is a rural house that offers all the comforts to rest and to know the region.
The house is distributed on two floors. On the first floor there is the kitchen, fully equipped, the dining room, the living room, a room with a double bed and a bathroom.
This room communicates with an ample porch for exclusive use.
On the upper floor there are the other two bedrooms, one with a double bed that has a large sun terrace, and another with two single beds, to which two extra beds can be added. All rooms have their own bathroom.

Sant Feliu de Boada, has a privileged situation, since it offers the tranquility of a small rural town, and at the same time allows in 10 minutes to be located in any of the most beautiful coves and beaches of the Costa Brava, as well as the main towns of the region as La Bisbal, Palamós, Torroella de Montgrí, Palafrugell, Begur, Pals, Peratallada ...

name: House with sea view
description:
House: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room with a terrace with beautiful views of the Mediterranean Sea , communal swimming pool, parking.
There is also a possibility to charter a yacht for an additional fee.

The space
The house is located in a small bay Canyelles Petites in Roses. From the terrace there is a very beautiful view of the bay. Easy access to all the attractions. In the area there are numerous cafes, restaurants, clubs.
The house can accommodate up to 6 people.
It is possible, for an extra fee, to take a cruise by boat and see Costa Brava from the sea. I suggest trips to the surrounding bays or to Cadaques (with a break to visit the house of Salvador Dali). Guests can choose the direction of the cruise.

Guest access

name: Beautiful old farmhouse with pool II  (PG-502)
description:
Mas Vinyoles is at the same time away from it all and close to everything: Beach, mountains, beautiful cities like Girona, Barcelona, Figueres.... After a full and busy day it is wonderfull to retire to it's unique quietness.

The space
Mas Vinyoles is a Catalan countryside house that is partly converted to offer a pleasant space to spend your holidays: 2 fully equipped apartments, for 4 and 6 people.
There is a garden with a swimming pool and bbq, a biological vegetable garden and an orchard.
We are in the heart of the protected area ″Les Gavarres ″, a series of hills of Mediterranean forest between Girona and Costa Brava.
This is a place to spend some quiet days of rest, exploring the surroundings by foot or on bicycle.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the swimming pool (sea salt water), a beautiful garden surrounding the house, tons of hills with cork trees, silence, bird songs and clean sky with outstanding stars.
neighborhood_overview: We are 33 neighbours in the middle of a protected wooden area.
host_about: I live in "Les Gavarres" since 1985 and I love it. To take care of the forest and the wild life has become an important project of my life. I am happy to realise that every year a new variety of birds discover that this is a good place for them to spend at least part of the year.

name: Charming Apartment. Sea views. Pool. Pkg. 6 people
description:
Cozy and cute apartment with fireplace. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, fits 6 people. Very sunny, with a balcony overlooking at sea views and pine trees. 20 m to big swimming pool. Parking included. Situated at 800m of el Golfet, one of the most beautiful beaches of Costa Brava with amazing crystal water. The area is very quiet and relaxing area through an exceptionally beautiful path along the coastline that will take you to the centre of Calella in 25-30 min walk. Going by car is less than 3 minutes

The space
Ideal place for families with children that want to enjoy the beauty of Costa Brava but want a quite and relaxing place.

Surrounded by truly Mediterranean vegetation, all rooms overlook at pine trees, cypress and other trees, with views of the sea from the balcony. This community was awarded with the well-known architectural design FAD awards, with a very good distribution that allows space for six people for a medium-size apartment. Beautiful kitche
neighborhood_overview: The area is very quite with beautiful houses and their swimming pools. The type of vacationers are mostly families with children. The closer beach is el Golfet, 800m away, 2 minutes by car, quite easily to park or 10 minutes walking. This is considered one of the most beautiful beaches in Costa Brava.
host_about:
I live close to Barcelona and spend my weekends in this apartment. During summer I love travelling with my family and this is why I rent it. I always go to apartments and love to have advices from places to visit or recommendations on restaurants so I am very pleased to do the same with my guests. 

I love travelling with my family and showing my kids the beauty of learning different cultures, learning few words from new languages and making friends from other cultures. Few years ago I lived in London for a couple of years and I have great memories of that time. 

I also love painting, and the apartment has some of my collection on the walls. I also love dancing salsa and all type of music too. Recently I've just started Kundalini yoga which I love too. Next to the apartment there is a beach, el Golfet, which is an amazing place to meditate in the morning with the rising sun. That's unbeliveable!

I love sharing my apartment with my guests and feel extremely happy when they are experiencing the 'good vibes' it transmits.

Only 2 minutes walk to the beach!!

neighborhood_overview:
a 2 minutes from the beach, a 3 the municipal market and the centrum town, a 6 minutes from the railway station.

The town of Portbou is well connected by road and railway, the winding road follows the rocky coast, a perfect site to explore the northern and southern Catalonia.

20km from Cadaqués
20km from Collioure (France)
30km from Figueres (Dali Museum)
60km from Girona (Jewish Quarter and cathedrals)
60km from Perpingnan (France)
100km from Barcelona (Sagrada Familia , Park Guell and Palace, Gothic Quarter, Museum Picasso, Foundation Miro, La Pedrera, Palau de la Música...)

From Figueres you can take the high speed train (AVE and TGV) to contact:

Girona in 15 minutes
Barcelona in 55 minutes
Perpingnan (France) in 20 minutes

It is a comfortable journey and fast travel.
host_about:
Som parella desde fa uns anys, francesa ella, català jo, ella treballa en el sector de salud, el meu en el sector de telecomunicacions.

Ens agrada viatjar i descobrir, molt propers al nostre entorn natural, amb el que ens relacionem sobretot practicant esport. 

Viatgem on podem quan podem, ens desplacem fent cicloturisme, amb autocaravana, o caminant, sempre tot és millor caminant plegats!!!

Aficionats al "make your self", som uns bojos del brico! tenim el nostre propi hortet, fem la nostre mermelada, recollim plantes remeires...

Si vens com hoste et trobaràs ven acollit i quasi com a casa teva...!!!

The space
Costabravaforrent Masramon is a beautiful villa with its own private swimming pool of 6x3, with views of the Montgrí Park and 900 metres from the beach.

It consists of a suite and four double bedrooms, two with double beds, one with two single beds and one with two bunk beds. The living room and dining room look out on and have access to the terrace and garden. In the living room there are two sofas, two armchairs and a fireplace. The dining room has space for up to twelve people. There are three complete bathrooms, one in the suite with a bath and the other two with showers. The kitchen is fully equipped.

neighborhood_overview:

Costabravaforrent Masramon is situated in the neighbourhood of Montgó, 900 metres from the beach of Cala Montgó and 3 km from the centre of L’Escala. This is a quiet residential zone surrounded by nature. The house faces south-east with views of the Montgri Park. To the north is a woodland nature area protected by the local council of L’Escala. Here you can find a path which leads from Mateua Island to the port in L’Escala.

Cala Montgó has supermarkets, bakeries, bars, restaurants and shops.

description:
Appartement de caractère au coeur de la Cerdagne avec vue 360 sur tous les sommets -

The space
L'appartement est situé à Llivia au coeur de la Cerdagne - Au 3ème étage, sous les toits, très lumineux (300 jours de soleil par an en moyenne), la baie vitrée et les ouvertures offrant une vue 360 sur les sommets de la Cerdagne - Très agréable et calme, il dispose d'une chambre entièrement mansardée avec un lit double - 1 autre chambre contient 1 (voire 2) lit(s) simple (s), le séjour peut recevoir un matelas double de grande taille et dispose d'un fauteuil déployable en lit simple - Pour les enfants en bas âge, la chambre principale peut recevoir un lit ou un matelas pour bébé en plus du lit double - Cuisine équipée, salle de bain avec 2 lavabos et petite baignoire faisant douche - Cheminée dans un séjour chaleureux orienté plein sud avec grandes baie vitrée - Un vidéoprojecteur est à disposition à la demande (projection sur murs blancs dans la grande pièce ou la cha
neighborhood_overview: Tous commerces d'alimentation, petits supermarchés, pharmacie, tabac, journaux (catalan), coiffure, nombreux restaurants, cafés, pizzerias et crêperies à proximité - La plupart ouverts le dimanche matin - Un commerce de plats à emporter ouvert le dimanche toute la journée - Un commerce de boisson, alimentation de base et produits de nécessité ouvert le dimanche toute la journée l'été - Supermarché Charter Consum ouvert toute la journée non-stop y compris lundi - Parc situé à 200 mètres pour activités ludiques, sportives ou de détente, barbecue et piscine -
host_about: Musicien classique (instrumentiste à cordes interprète) passionné de sports outdoor, hiking et alpinisme (ski), sports de raquettes (tennis, padel,etc.), golf et voile - A fait de Llivia et de la Cerdagne son "centre d'entraînement en altitude" - Simple, discret, accueillant et très heureux de faire profiter son appartement qui peut se prêter aussi bien à un esprit familial et de détente qu'à des activités orientées outdoor et montagne ou enfin à une recherche de calme et de tranquilité -

name: CAP RAS 8 Magnificent apartment with community Pool
description:
Magnificent apartment with community Pool.

The space
The apartment has four rooms with two single beds each one, a kitchen, a dining room, a garden with pool, a barbecue, two bathrooms with shower and a toilet. Pets accepted.
This cosy apartment is in the middle of Cap Ras, in Llançà, near to the natural park, the beaches ant the seaside paths and a 10 minutes of the Port's urban centre, where you will find the principal shops and restaurant, the Port and Gola beaches, the marina port and other important see sights.
Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their
neighborhood_overview:
Incredible seafront apartment in the quiet zone of Cap Ras!

This magnificent apartment with fantastic sea views it’s located at Cap Ras zone in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

neighborhood_overview:
Fantastic apartment in Sant Genis near the beach!
This cosy apartment is located at the quiet zone of Sant Genis, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)

This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.

Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.

name: Cosy Apart 2 Minutes Walk to Beach, + parking
description:
Sleeps 5. Bedrooms 3, bathrooms 2. Fully renovated in 2013. Large shared garden. Located in the center of the village, has fantastic facilities in the area (3-5 m walk): great range of, restaurants, shops, supermarkets.(HUTG-013170)

The space
The apartment, fully renovated and equipped in 2013, is on the first floor and all rooms are exterior. The fully equipped kitchen is very nice with the window overlooking the garden with beautiful twisted pines; near the window, there is a dining table for 6 people, which is very handy. Meals can also be enjoyed on the terrace. The living room has two sofas and a TV; during the warm season, it is possible to expand the space of the terrace opening the sliding glass doors. Two full bathrooms. A large private garden is good for children. Parking for one car is available in the basement of the building. Beach (2 minutes away) is one km long, with a very convenient sand (not too big to hurt your bare feet and not too thin to g
neighborhood_overview: The quietness of the place. The great beach that is very comfortable for its very convenient sand and clean water. Great range of bars, restaurants, shops, supermarkets, all only in 3-5 mins walk away. Barcelona and Girona towns are available by car, but also by bus  (the bus station is 5 minutes walk from the apartment) and so are many villages (see below).
host_about: Biólogo retirado, amante de las artes, letras y la ciencias. Me gusta particularmente las artes escénicas, tambien viajar. Para estancias largas prefiero las grandes ciudades. Vivo en Barcelona y me gusta mucho, y no me importaria vivir en Nueva York. Para estancias cortas tambien amo la naturaleza. Aunque frugal, me gusta la buena cocina i el buen vino. La familia y los amigos som de la maxima importancia. Politicamente soy liberal: vive y deja vivir

description:
Amazing sea view Vila 3 minutes walking distance to the beach.

The space
Our Vila is located in an exclusive house development of the area, a small creek is just next to the house also big sandy Lloret beaches are at walking distance.
The house have more than 300 m2 and is perfect to spend a funny holidays even for the biggest groups, house can host comfortably till 24 people, it have numerous indoor and outdoor spaces, kids playground , ,four independence terraces , barbecue area , chillout space with bar and jacuzzi so there are space and amenities for everyone.
It has a full equipped big kitchen and an outside cooking area with barbecue, eight room and six bathrooms, the main suite is equipped with a bath-in-the-room from which is possible to enjoy the sunset over the sea.
House development is just next to city center full of restaurants, shop and nightlife but in a really quiet neighborhood so relax is guaranteed. House development faciliti

host_about:
Hello! I'm Ismael and this is my wife Oksana. We are young family which like to travel, active sports, music, beach and enjoying the life...  Bending with people from different countries and cultures is one of our passions, cause we are international family ;)
We are sociable, outgoing, friendly, hospitable and we love good conversation.
We love Lloret de Mar with great beaches, good food, wine and friendly people. We invite you to come here - a beautiful Mediterranean city. We want that you enjoy your vacations. Here are many activities available ranging from boat rental, rock climbing, kayaking, sailing, day trips to other cities, wine tasting tours, scooter rental to explore more of the our city and many more things.
We can organise anything you may want to do during your stay with us.

name: Masia de Can Creus (1.890) Vilanna- Bescanó
description:
Can Creus és una masia construida en 1890 de paredes muy gruesas de piedra i ventanas pequeñas típicas de las casas de labradores de la época, se para preservar la temperatura del interior tanto en verano como en invierno. La casa se restauro hace unos 40 años i se terminó de reformar de nuevo en el 2010.
Situada en un pequeño bosque.
Decorada con encanto.
Capacidad para 8 personas, con todo lo necesario.
Para reservas de una semana precio especial. Ponerse en contacto con el propietario

The space
La masia de Can Creus és especial por;
1- su construcción de paredes de piedra y gruesas en el exterior y tambien en parte del interior. Agunas puertas bajas que se han conservado como las originales Festejador en la ventana principal. El techo de la planta baja con vigas de madera.
En la planta baja hay una entrada grande , cocina , comedor i salon en una sola pieza, un labavo amplio i una estancia con sofà.
En la planta s
neighborhood_overview:
La masia està envuelta de bosque y tiene zonas de pradera para poder jugar.
Una zona del bosque con hamacas para descansar , leer o relajarse.
Bescanó , és un pueblo a pocos kilometros donde hay restaurantes, supermercado y todo lo que tiene un pueblo.
host_about:
Jo i el meu marit som professors de secundària jubilats.
A mi m'agrada viatjar, llegir i el cinema.
Al meu marit li agrada tot el món del motor, la tranquil·litat, la música, etc.

En Girona, como en el resto de Catalunya, esta establecida una tasa turística por día de estancia. Cuesta 1 euros por adulto y día. Los niños menores de 17 años no la tienen que pagar. En el caso de estancias largas, se pagan solo los primeros 7 días.

Alquile por días, semanas enteras o fines de semana un apartamento totalmente equipado e independiente con capacidad para 5 personas.
Este apartamento bonito y cómodo se alquila amueblado. name: Paraiso en plena naturaleza
description:
Can Piferrer es una masía típica de la plana de La Selva construida en 1740 y restaurada en 2.007, situada en plena naturaleza. Ocupa una superfície de 600 m2 en cada una de las dos plantas y capacidad variable desde para 8 hasta 20 personas.

The space
Can Piferrer es una masía única tanto por su arquitectura como por su entorno.
Por su interés y valor arquitectónico está catalogada como Elemento de Interés Arquitectónico y no ha sufrido ningún tipo de transformación a lo largo de más de 260 años. Se ha restaurado (2007) a conciencia para mantener su carácter y su personalidad, adaptándola para el turismo rural con el máximo de lujo y comodidades en un lugar envidiable por el entorno que la rodea y la tranquilidad que se respira.

neighborhood_overview:

Máxima tranquilidad, ideal para relajarse y descansar

This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Port, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.

description:
Exclusive rental property with pool in the historical core of Girona

The space
Located in the heart of Girona's medieval quarter, inside the original city walls and overlooking Sant Domènec Square, is the property Alemanys 5, whose original building dates from the sixteenth century.

Its recent restoration integrates old and new, with sober, clean lines that celebrate essential elements such as space, light, shade, fire, stone, water and silence.

The house is available to be rented as a whole unit, but it also can be divided into two independent apartments that can be rented separately: "El Badiu" i "El Jardí".

"El Jardí” (The Garden) is a 90 m2 flat that offers:

two double bedrooms
a spacious bathroom
a large dining-living room with fully equipped kitchenette
a private sunny garden with swimming pool.
Its capacity is up to 4 people.

Facilities also include: free WiFi broadband Internet acc

Passionnée d'Espagne depuis toujours, amoureuse de la Catalogne et plus particulièrement de l'Empurdan pour la diversité de ses paysages, sa culture, sa gastronomie, ses fêtes locales, les céramiques et antiquités de La Bisbal...
Tamarina est une maison de famille que nous entretenons avec soin et avec Airbnb nous essayons de faire découvrir ce superbe coin de la Costa Brava.
Nous sommes une famille avec deux adolescents et vivons à Nîmes.

neighborhood_overview: Está situada en la costa norte del golfo de Rosas, al sur del cabo de Creus. Es un gran centro turístico, con urbanizaciones, hoteles y playas[6]​ y dos puertos (pesquero y deportivo), y un lugar atractivo y de gran relieve dentro del sector septentrional de la Costa Brava. La costa del municipio de Rosas incluye una larga playa de arena y más hacia el este un gran número de calas, entre las cuales destacan Canyelles Petites, L'Almadrava, Cabo Norfeu, Punta Falconera y Montjoi.
host_about:
Hola queridos seguidores de Airbnb, llevo desde 2014 con esa gran Familia, tengo 56 años, soy una mujer divorciada, con 2 hijas lindas y 4 nietitos que son el amor de mi vida. Actualmente vivo Sóla, me gusta hacer submarinismo y caminar por la playa. Soy una persona tranquila pero con obligaciones y responsabilidades. 
Espero conocerles pronto, estoy segura que les van a encantar  mi  bonito lúminoso y tranquilo apartamento.
Un abrazo.
Lucía.

name: House in Tossa de Mar, Costa Brava
description:
Áncora is a cosy house located in Sta. Maria de Llorell Beach, Tossa de Mar. It offers sea view, a terrace with BBQ area, a relaxing communal swimming pool and one of the best beaches of la Costa Brava. Free Wifi.

The space
Áncora is a 2 floor semi-detached house. The entrance is a big terrace with a barbecue area. Some steps further, you will be at the porch: a sheltered place to have dinner, read or just relax.
The ground floor is an open floor: living room and kitchen. There is a toilet and a fireplace as well.
On the first floor there are 2 double rooms (1 with a queen bed and 1 with 2 twin beds) and a bathroom with shower. There is also a balcony with sea views.

Guest access
Swimming pool (next to the house)
Beach (1km /15-20 minute walk)
Supermarket (5 minute walk)
Bus stop (5 minute walk)
Free parking on the street

Other things to note
*Pets are not allowed

*Kitchen f
neighborhood_overview:
Santa Maria de Llorell is a private estate located in one of the nicest beaches of La Costa Brava: Cala Llevado - Santa Maria de Llorell. It is a crystal clear water beach surrounded by cliffs and green valleys. It offers diverse water sports and there is a chiringuito and a restaurant.

Santa Maria de Llorell is 3 km away from Tossa de Mar. This beautiful town has plenty of restaurants, supermarkets and shops.

The bus stop to Tossa de Mar and Lloret de Mar is a 5 minute walk from the house.
host_about: Somos Rosa y Cinta (madre e hija) ponemos a disposición de los usuarios de Airbnb nuestra casa en la playa de cala Llevadó, Tossa de Mar. Haremos todo lo posible para que disfruteis de una agradable estancia en la casa.

neighborhood_overview: The house is in the village, in a very quiet area. There are bakeries, supermarkets, kiosks, shops, bars, restaurants and shops dedicated to ceramics. Breda is a historic medieval town, which retains the Monastery of Sant Salvador, the eleventh century, and the Church of Santa Maria, in Romanesque style. The village is a few minutes from the Montseny Natural Park, where you can make many excursions.

description:
Es una casa maravillosa con vistas que invitan al descanso de la ajetreada ciudad, cerca del centro de Puigcerdà, al pie de la montaña y muy cerca de las pistas de esquí. Ideal para un fin de semana especial o unas semanas de vacaciones.

Es un sitio espectacular para hacer excursiones, rutas a caballo o simplemente tumbarse y disfrutar de la tranquilidad que nos brinda estar en medio de la naturaleza.

The space
Se trata de una preciosa casa de dos plantas, en la planta superior, por donde la casa tiene la entrada se encuentran el comedor, la cocina abierta, el salón y la zona de juegos, donde tenemos la mesa de billar.

En el comedor hay una mesa para 10 personas de madera maciza y unas vistas muy especiales.

En el salón hay un fuego a tierra que dejamos equipado con unos tronquitos para que podáis preparar un fuego y disfrutar de una película al lado del fuego.

Unas escaleras nos llevan a la planta de inferior donde
neighborhood_overview: Es uno de los barrios mas prestigiosos de la cerdaña, muy tranquilo, seguro y elegante

name: Estudio con encanto
description:
Pequeño estudio de 35m2 con capacidad para dos plazas, totalmente reformado conservando el estilo rustico, dispone de todos los servicios independientes (cocina, baño con ducha hidromasaje, chimenea, etc)

The space
Can Barrina, es una atigua casa Pairal situada en la plaza del fantástico pueblo de Ventalló, conocido por el encanto de sus calles y casas de piedra de estilo rustico.

La casa ha sido totalmente reformada en 2014 conservando su caracter y autenticidad.
En la segunda planta del edificio encontramos este pequeño estudio de un solo ambiente con una cama doble, un sofa cama y chimenea.Con un total de 2-4 plazas

Guest access
En la parte superior del edificio una amplia terraza desde dónde se puede ver todo el golf de rosas con el mar y las montañas del cap de Creus.
También se pone a disposición de los huéspedes una zona común de lavanderia

Other things to note
Botella de cava, vino, bombon
neighborhood_overview: Ventallo, es un precioso pueblo situado en pleno empordà, a tan solo 5 minutos de las playas en coche y muy cercano a los principales atractivos turísticos de la zona (aiguamolls de l'emporda, empuries, figueres y museo dali, etc)

name: Charming 1920’s house. Nice views.
description:
Charming 1920’s house, completely remodeled. Large terrace and a huge garden. Confortable dining room , fully-equipped kitchen, 2 full bathrooms and 4 large rooms .Very quiet neighborhood. Excellent location
38 min by train to Barcelona .

The space
It is located just five minutes from either downtown or to the beautiful valley of St. Daniel. Its historical views, spaciousness of the rooms (all exterior-facing) as well as large garden suitable for walking, playing and relaxing—all bespeak true tranquility. Ideal for the perfect family vacation or romantic getaway.

Other things to note
We have a neighbor house with capacity for 8 guests.

License number
HUTG-012685

host_about:
Pertenezco a una familia caracterizada por su hospitalidad y mente abierta. Interesados por el mar, la cultura, el deporte, la naturaleza, el senderismo,los viajes, la gastronomía y las tradiciones locales.
Soy oceanógrafa y debido a mi profesión he tenido la suerte de vivir en distintos países, permitiéndome conocer diferentes lenguas, culturas e idiosincrasias y a respetarlas.
Sed bienvenidos a nuestra casa y disfrutad del entorno más privilegiado de Girona.

name: Perfect place for beach holiday.
description:
Well maintained apartment on the beach and with sea view in Santa Margarita - Roses. It is located in front of the beach of Santa Margarita. From the vitrified terrace you have a beautiful sea view.

The space
Well maintained apartment on the beach and with sea view in Santa Margarita - Roses. Perfect place for beach holiday.
The apartment is on the 4th floor of the building Roses Holiday Centre on the northern Costa Brava in Roses - Santa Margarita.
It is located in front of the beach of Santa Margarita. From the vitrified terrace you have a beautiful sea view.
The apartment has a spacious living room with dining area, sleeping alcove with 2 single beds, and a separate bedroom with double bed. The kitchenette is equipped with a small fridge, a ceramic glass cooktop, oven and a filter coffee machine. Cutlery, crockery, pots and pans are also available. A bathroom with shower, a modern satellite TV and a washing machine complement the equipment. <
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about: Seit 1987 lebe ich in Roses, meiner Wahlheimat. Ich liebe dieses Fleckchen Erde. In meiner Freizeit bewaffne ich mich oft mit unserem Hund Uma - eine Königspudeldame, die aber Hund sein darf,  und Fotoapparat und mache unsere Bucht "unsicher" :-), während meine Lebensgefährte Joan, gebürtiger "Rosinc" - so heissen die Bewohner aus Roses, mit dem Fahrrad unterwegs ist. Wir hoffen, Sie recht bald kennen zu lernen und wieder einen neuen "Roses-Fan" gewinnen zu können.

name: Cargols de Mar 6 - Empuriabrava
description:
Very nice house located in a small residence in front of the sea in Empuriabrava.
Comfortable and well equipped.
It has a community pool, WIFI, air conditioning and private garage.
Privileged location and magnificent views from its various terraces.

The space
Beautiful house, in a private residence with swimming pool.
Privileged location, on the seafront in Empuriabrava and on the canal.
House divided into 3 floors.
On the ground floor is a private garage with one bedroom and a large terrace with garden furniture and barbecue. This room is not air conditioned and is not recommended for young children, as it is independent from the rest of the house.
The first floor consists of a spacious living / dining room with terrace, a modern open-plan kitchen and a bathroom with shower.
Stairs give access to the second floor where you will find two double bedrooms with air conditioning, one bedroom with bunk beds and a second bathroom
neighborhood_overview:
Very calm area in front of the sea and the maritime promenade.
A few steps from the city center of Empuriabrava and tourist activities.

name: PORT 6 Great apartment in front of the beach
description:
Great apartment in front of the beach.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Port, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This aparment it's located in the seafr
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment is located in the urban centre of the Port’s zone, in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities (GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.

name: Can Sici Masia
description:
Can Sici es una masía tradicional del SXVIII, con piscina, situada en un entorno rural y tranquilo, donde encontrareis hospitalidad y confort para disfrutar de vuestras reuniones familiares y encuentros con amigos, a menos de 10 km de Girona.
Capacidad para 12 adultos más niños hasta 22 personas.

The space
La masía se alquila entera y tiene una capacidad de hasta 22 personas (máximo 12 adultos) distribuidas en 6 habitaciones dobles, una habitación con 6 camas y un altillo con 4 colchones.

Dispone de amplios espacios donde poder compartir momentos en común: en la planta baja la Sala de la entrada y el magnífico Salón-comedor con una gran mesa de madera y una zona de estar con chimenea. En la primera planta la Sala central y la luminosa Sala del pajar (donde se encontraba el antiguo pajar).

A pocos metros de la fachada principal hay una pérgola con mesas sobre la balsa ajardinada que antiguamente proveía la casa de agua de lluvia. La cas
neighborhood_overview:
Can Sici está a menos de 10 km de Girona. Pertenece a la barriada de Sant Medir, en el término municipal de Sant Gregori.
Se sitúa dentro del territorio de la Vall de Llèmena, uno de los lugares naturales mejor conservados de las comarcas gironines, por donde se extienden pequeños pueblos, antiguos vecindarios y singulares masías en un marco de gran valor paisajístico. La combinación entre los campos de cultivo, los diferentes tipos de bosque, los riscos y la presencia del agua, conforman un paisaje armónico modelado por la naturaleza y los usos tradicionales de sus recursos.

name: Fidara
description:
Una habitación muy especial, situada en la planta baja. Cubierta de bóveda catalana, con salida directa a uno de los rincones más bellos del exterior de la casa, junto al pozo.

The space
En el exterior puedes disfrutar del bar, la piscina, los rincones sorprendentes, y el paisaje excepcional que rodea la casa. Las fantásticas playas de Pals se encuentran a 20 minutos andando y el núcleo antiguo de Pals o el nucleo cercano de Begur a pocos minutos en bicicleta por caminos interiores de gran belleza.
La masía está situada en un entorno ideal para conocer la zona de Pals y el bajo empordán, donde se suceden los pequeños pueblos medievales y las playas de la Costa Brava. En el área más cercana es posible además participar en gran variedad de actividades deportivas y culturales muy variadas: museos, festivales, senderismo, golf, deportes de agua etc. A menos de una hora, se puede visitar Torroella de Montgrí, Figueres, Girona o Perpinyá con toda su oferta cultura

name: Casa rústica molt ben situada, 4 places, familiar
description:
Con vistas fabulosas y muy bien situada para hacer turismo, cerca del mar y la montaña, es ideal para descansar y desconectar. El entorno invita al paseo y a disfrutar de la naturaleza, así como de la piscina y la barbacoa. El alojamiento (4p) es la planta baja de la casa con entrada independiente. La primera planta corresponde a otro alojamiento rural. Los propietarios viven en la casa principal de la masía.
Con terraza y muebles de jardín propios.
Piscina, barbacoa y zona de juego compartidos.

The space
Los interiores:

Se pueden alquilar 2 alojamientos (conjuntamente o por separado) con una capacidad total para 18 huéspedes: la “masoveria de dalt” permite alojar hasta 14 personas (4 habitaciones en la primera planta, 2 habitaciones en planta baja) y la “masoveria de baix” permite alojar hasta 4 personas (2 habitaciones) en la planta baja, ambas con entrada independiente y con su jardín particular. The space
The house is located in a unique and beautiful location in the area of Empordanet, very close to small rural and medieval villages and easy access to the beautiful beaches of Costa Brava. The closest villages are Ullastret, Peratallada, Palau - Sator, Gualta, Pals, Torroella, La Bisbal.

The nearest beaches are Pals, La Gola de Ter, Estartit, Begur, Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc, Tamariu...

You can go biking to the beach or to visit these medieval and Iberian villages, and enjoy the delicious traditional restaurants in the area!

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
Campelles is part of the Ripollès region, in the province of Girona.
It is a very well-preserved natural area with all kinds of fauna, ideal for short excursions along the river, with the option of bathing in its refreshing waters in summer. During the fall, it is a very good place to go looking for mushrooms, or in winter to ski on the nearby slopes of Vall de Núria, La Molina, Masella or Vallter 2000.The town also offers a great variety of local gastronomic products, they highlight its sausages and cheeses, honey or biscuits from Camprodon, near Campelles, are also highly appreciated.

name: Apartamento Voramar - de lujo a 50 metros playa. Parking, wifi y AACC
description:
Two-bedroom apartment, sofa bed in the living room, two bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, terrace with table, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning throughout the house, parking space and elevator from the parking lot.

The space
Apartment 100 meters from the beach, with exquisite decoration.
Two bedrooms (one double with bathroom and the other with two single beds). Two bathrooms (one of them in the bedroom). Large terrace with table, parking, elevator, all air-conditioned, and WIFI. Kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, and perfectly preserved. In one of the best areas of Tossa de Mar.
Comfortable apartment with beds for 4 people, and a very easy to open sofa bed for 2 people.
The apartment has parking in the same building.
The apartment is located in one of the best areas of Tossa de Mar, 100 meters from the beach, and 150 from the city center.
400 meters from the medieval castle.
At 500 meters is the Tossa bus station, with a
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar. Perfect for a romantic evening, weekends, holidays! Аvailable WiFi. It features a pool in the common part of the building. Near the beach Fenals and within walking distance city center.

The space
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar (for 1 - 2 people)

Guest access
- Cozy living room with bed (160x200 cm), TV 48", DVD player, dining table and chairs, cupboard; including baby crib if needed. The room with elegant decor features lots of natural light and ventilation, panoramic view of the playground.
- Electric kitchen fully equipped with all the necessary implements to cook during your stay: fridge, oven, microwave, kettle, coffee maker, sandwich maker and washing machine.
- Bathroom with bath, hairdryer.
- Internet Wi-Fi.
- Has common pool of the building.
- 1st floor, exterior, Southeast; two elevators.

Other things to note
* Arrival at the apart
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the popular district of Fenals, is a quiet comfortable area to access and close to everything:
CAPRABO supermarket, Carrefour-EXPRESS, DIA, CONSUM; Fruteria, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants, souvenir shops and beach accessories, playground, weekly market (Tuesday), bus (to go to Blanes, Barcelona, Girona, Figueres and etc).
Close to all major attractions of Lloret:
• beaches, variety of water sports, diving, sightseeing boats;
• discos, games and Casino Lloret;
• aquapark (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• dolphinarium;
• playground "Gnome Park";
• karting "GO KARTS Lloret" (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• Botanical Gardens of Santa Clotilde, with a magnificent view of the sea.
Perfect to be near the beach Fenals (400 m) and within walking distance of the city center, you can enjoy the nightlife in the center and walk back to the apartment.

name: Vistas al mar y piscina en Begur.
description:
Hay un COBRO ADICIONAL correspondiente a la TASA TURÍSTICA del gobierno local de Cataluña , 1,10 € POR PERSONA y NOCHE ADULTA MAYOR DE 18 AÑOS.

Es obligatorio presentar los documentos de DE IDENTIDAD DE CADA HUÉSPED A LA POLICÍA , deben enviarse previamente a su llegada por EMAIL: :

Urbanización privada en el Puig D'Aiguafreda, piscina comunitaria rebosante con vistas al mar, pádel y acceso directo a la playa de Aiguafreda por el camino de ronda, y a Satuna.

The space
La casa tiene vistas privilegiadas y se haya en una zona tranquila con un bosque colindante de pinos y con terraza súper amplia y protegida con toldos si se desea para refugiarse de sol.

La casa consta de:
- Habitación de matrimonio, con suite -
- 2 habitaciones dobles, -1º habitación, cama de matrimonio o separadas , 2º habitación, 2 camas individuales con baño a compartir-
-Salón comedor y cocina todo abierto con vistas al mar,
-coci
neighborhood_overview: La casa está ubicada en una pequeña comunidad de vecinos vacacionales. En lo alto del Puig D'Aiguafreda, las vistas son espectaculares. Para algo de animación, el pueblo de Begur queda a 10 min en coche.
host_about:
Persona activa ,positiva ,me gusta de disfrutar de la naturaleza y de las pequeñas cosa.
Soy muy organizada y super limpia , me guata tenerlo todo a punto para que cada persona disfrute de mi casa ,como si fuese la suya propia.
Soy super familiar y me gustan los amigos.
Hobbies : Fotografia, nadar , andar .skie de nieve y de agua , navegar , juego al bridge y al golf
Osea , que me gusta la vida en si.

name: La Bisbal d´Empordà. Casa S. XVII
description:
Casa restaurada del S. XVII en Sant Pol de la Bisbal d'Empordà. Situada en el espacio natural protegido de Les Gavarres. Entorno rural muy bello y tranquilo a 4 km de La Bisbal con todos los servicios y a 20 min de las playas de la Costa Brava. English & German.

The space
El encanto del espacio es que se trata una casa que unicamente se alquila 3 semanas y el resto del año es la vivienda habitual por lo que intento conseguir que el huésped se sienta como en su casa.

Número de permiso Turismo Rural HUTG-000889

Guest access
La casa se alquila entera y no se comparte con otros huespedes.

Other things to note
Cancelación: Estricta
Depósito de seguridad: 200€

License number
PG-000889
neighborhood_overview:
La casa está a 2 minutos de la Bisbal donde se encuentran todos los servicios y su importante mercado de los viernes. El entorno natural permite practicar trekking o mountain bike desde la puerta de casa y visitar los pueblos medievales cercanos, jugar a golf o pasar el día en las playas de Calella, Pals, Palamós, Llafranch, etc que se encuentran a 20 minutos en coche.

The house is 2 minutes driving from nearby La Bisbal, where you will find all amenities, shopping, a great Friday market, supermarkets, etc... perfectly located to discover the beaches and coves of Costa Brava, as well as its wonderful medieval villages like Peratallada, Pals, Monells...
host_about:
Después de muchos años viviendo en la zona sigo descubriendo paisajes y lugares maravillosos. Mi afición por la naturaleza me ha empujado a realizar excursiones en coche todo terrenos para dar a conocer bellos lugares de difícil acceso.
La cocina es otra de mi aficiones así  es que si lo deseas puedo aconsejarte que como o donde comer. Como decía el escritor catalán Josep Plá: "la cocina es el paisaje puesto en el plato".

name: Apartment in Regencos with garden and pool
description:
Stay in a typically Empordanese house located in the heart of the Costa Brava. This beautiful 18th century rectory has been transformed into four cozy apartments that preserve the historical essence of the establishment.

Our apartments are 50 m2, have 1 large bedroom with a double bed, 1 full bathroom and a living area with a fully equipped kitchen.

The rectory of regencos, where our apartments are located, has a beautiful garden with a swimming pool.

The space
Spacious and fully equipped apartment of 50 m2, overlooking our garden with pool. Perfect capacity for 2 adults and 1 child.

Apartment decorated by interior designer Anna Puig. Her vision has managed to turn our rooms into cozy and bright spaces, taking care of every detail accompanied by the practicality and comfort necessary to satisfy the needs of our clients.


Each apartment has:

• 50 m2
• 1 large master bedroom with comfortable double be
neighborhood_overview:
Our customers can park their car esaily, few meters from the apartment.

Place that stands out for the tranquility of the town of Regencos at the same time that it is perfectly located, between the towns of Pals and Begur, just 10 minutes from the places of interest and the best beaches on the Costa Brava.

The Rectoria de Regencós, as its name suggests, is located in the medieval town of Regencós, characterized by its tranquility. It is the perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy the typical village life of its people, its narrow and cobbled streets and surrounded by fields with views of the Quarlemany mountain.

We are in the small and cozy medieval town of Regencós, between the well-known towns of Begur and Pals. The perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy nature and the sea, in a dream environment.

It is located just 5 minutes by car from the best beaches such as Sa tuna, Sa Riera, Calella de Palafrugell, LLafranc, Pals and Platja
host_about:
Mi nombre es Alicia y soy de Barcelona. Llevo residiendo en Gerona 19 años y me he dedicado siempre a la hostelería y gestion de restauración y eventos.
Mi objetivo es hacer sentir a los huespedes como en casa y recomendarles todos aquellos preciosos y reconditos lugares que alberga la Costa Brava, para pasar unas inolvidables vacaciones.

host_about:
Arrels d'Emporda es un aparthotel moderno con piscina al aire libre y está situado en Palafrugell. Los apartamentos tienen aire acondicionado, están a 4 km de la playa de Llafranc y disponen de conexión Wi-Fi gratuita.

Cada apartamento cuenta con balcón,  sala de estar con sofá y TV de pantalla plana. La cocina está equipada con vitrocerámica y microondas. El baño privado dispone de ducha y secador de pelo.

Arrels d'Emporda cuenta con un bar y una sala de reuniones para alquilar. Hay un mercado de productos tradicionales a 500 metros de los apartamentos.

Hay varias playas de la Costa Brava a 10 minutos en coche. El aeropuerto de Girona está a 40 km y el establecimiento ofrece servicio de traslado.

name: Ático con terraza en pleno centro
description:
Apartamento de dos habitaciones en un edificio pequeño y familiar en la calle más céntrica y comercial de Lloret. Tiene una terraza de más de 20m2 con mesa y pergola. A 5 minutos andando de la playa, 3 minutos de la terminal de autobuses y cerca de la zona de ambiente nocturno y ocio. Wifi, A/C, ascensor y cocina equipada. Estancia mínima: 3 noches. Temp.alta: 1 semana. Posibilidad de cama extra plegatín (suplemento de 10€/noche).

The space
Ático luminoso, decorado con encanto y una terraza maravillosa. Apartamento nuevo, moderno, bien equipado y funcional. Inmejorable situación, cerca de todo lo que se pueda necesitar.
Su privilegiada situación. Bienvenida personal del propietario.

Other things to note
MEDIDAS ESPECIALES COVID-19

Debido a la situación actual, hemos tomado medidas especiales para asegurar la salud y bienestar de nuestros huéspedes.
- Aseguramos una limpieza y desinfección completa de todos los elementos
neighborhood_overview: Calle peatonal, en pleno centro de Lloret de Mar. No se necesita transporte por la situación tan céntrica, cerca de muchos servicios (supermercados, panadería, farmacia, bares y restaurantes). Muchas tiendas con ofertas interesantes. Terminal de autobuses a 3 minutos andando y la playa se encuentra a 5 minutos andando, así como la zona de ocio nocturno.
host_about: Soy una persona muy extrovertida a quien le encanta mucho viajar. Y la gastronomía de todo el mundo.

description:
Apartamento en el Pirineo de Gerona a 20 minutos de Ripoll, a 90 minutos de Barcelona y menos de 2 horas de la Costa Brava. Estación de tren de la línia Barcelona - Puigcerdà. Apartamento en planta baja. Ideal para familias con niños de todas las edades. En verano ideal para la realización de excursiones por el Pirineo y paseos por los bonitos valles de la Vall de Ribes y Núria. En invierno la práctica del esquí en la Molina, Masella y Núria.

The space
Dispone de cocina equipada, un baño completo, un aseo y tres dormitorios con capacidad para 6-8 personas. Salón-Comedor con chimenea y terraza con espectaculares vistas al valle.

name: Apartment overlooking the sea
description:
Our high standing apartment has beautiful views over the Bay of Roses. The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms a large living room, and a terrace overlooking the Mediterranean.
The kitchen has all modern comforts. A garage for 2 cars is available

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and has a high quality finish. It is situated on the 2nd floor of a small apartment block with swimming pool. Six people can easily be accommodated and we can provide a cot for small children and high chair. The views across the bay never gets boring. The terrace is large and has a dining corner and lounge chairs.
The apartment is airconditioned and heated in the colder months. A garage for 2 cars is available on the ground floor. A separate space for a washing machine is in the apartment.

Guest access
Guests have access to all rooms, however there
may be some cupboards locked in the living room. They can use the swimming pool an
neighborhood_overview:
What do we love about Roses. I suppose the beautiful sea, the fishing fleet, which leaves port everyday to return in the late afternoon, which is a lovely sight from our terrace. The sunsets. The restaurants and the nice boulevard of Roses.
The nice villages to visit near Roses, such as Cadaques, Figueres with its Dali museum, the National Parks of Cap de Creus and Aiguamolls.
host_about:
Twenty five years ago we wanted to buy a house in France for our holidays and we found Le Coustal. We restored first the old farmhouse dated 1870 and this is the place we used to live in ourselves. Now this beautiful  farmhouse is also for rent and we named it La Ferme.  We ourselves moved to Château Preyssac in Thenon,  which we are renovating right now.  We started to restore all the other buildings on the domaine. Many years later we could buy the land of our neighbors and we were able to completely renovate the Maison de Maitre and opening it for guests six years ago. 
We are originally from the Netherlands, however 16 years ago we moved from Holland to the United Arab Emirates with our daughter Sanne. 
Nowadays I spend my time between France and the Emirates and together with my daughter Sanne and a dedicated team we take care of our guests in France and Spain, where we also have a family property ( las Rocas) hosted by my cousin Gijb.
Apart from las Rocas we now manage 3 more properties in Rosas: 
Belleza del Mar, Casa Diaz, and Casa Flamenco. 
in the future we hope to add some more treehouses at the domaine Lalande-Laborie. At the moment there are two and maybe in the future in the forests of Preyssac !!

name: SANT CARLES 7 Fantastic apartment in the seafront
description:
Fantastic apartment in the seafront.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This ground floor is in the Port zo
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment with sea views it’s located at the calm zone of Sant Carles in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) and mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres’ shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.

neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood with all the services you may need. There are a supermarket, a pharmacy, a restaurant and some shops in the same street of the apartment. The City Stadium, other sport facilities and a Medical Center are within walking distance from the apartment (100 mts).
host_about:
Hola! Sóc Marc López, de Palafrugell, però actualment resident a Girona. 
Sóc compositor, i treballo de professor de música en un institut de secundària i de professor d'harmonia i guitarra a escoles de música. M'agrada molt practicar esport i tota mena d'activitats a l'aire lliure, cosa que vaig fent en funció del temps lliure del que disposo. 
Conec molt bé Palafrugell. És el poble on he crescut i on he viscut tota la meva infantesa i adolescència. Tinc meravellosos records dels estius d'aquella època: les anades i vingudes diàries a les platges de Calella, la sal i la flaire del mar sobre la pell bronzejada pel sol, els vespres de Festa Major a Plaça Nova... No hi ha res com passar l'estiu en un poble de la costa mediterrània com Palafrugell. De fet, malgrat tenir la residència habitual a Girona, cada any hi torno a l'estiu i intento passar-hi tant temps com sigui possible. Això em permet reviure totes aquelles meravelloses sensacions vitals!  
Més que no pas un allotjament en sí mateix, aquestes sensacions són l'essència del que Airbnb em permet compartir amb tots vosaltres. L'apartament, si bé és molt  important, només és el mitjà que ha de fer possible que els hostes vingueu fins aquí i conegueu el poble i els paratges únics que hi ha a les rodalies. Però la finalitat, allò que és realment important aconseguir, és gaudir de les vivències i sensacions úniques que, com jo, tindreu el plaer i el privilegi d'experimentar passant l'estiu en un poble de la costa catalana com aquest.
Per mi serà tot un plaer ser el vostre cicerone, compartir aquestes experiències i guiar-vos a través de tot aquest tresor de sensacions mediterrànies. Benvinguts a l'estiu! Benvinguts a Palafrugell!

neighborhood_overview:
Located 1 km from the center of Begur, just 3 km from the beautiful coves of Sa tuna, Fornells, Aiguablava, Sa Riera, etc.

Located in the heart of Empordà, the town of Begur and its beaches is one of the most wonderful spots on the Costa Brava. The town boundary takes in the impressive hills of the Begur Massif and an extensive coastline washed by the Mediterranean sea.

The striking silhouette of the medieval castle overlooking the old town, its numerous monuments and colonial-style houses (the village has cultural ties to Cuba) and the narrow streets and alleys give the village a beauty that is easy to enjoy. The old fishermen's huts still conserved in the Begur coves, also testify to a long and intense history that make Begur and its natural surroundings an unbeatable place to visit.

name: Belvedere - Ideal for family!
description:
Comfortable apartment on the seafront. Between the beach of Almadrava and Canyelles Petites. With a large terrace ideal to eat outdoors and enjoy at the same time an incredible view of the bay of Roses. With private access to the sea. Located 3 km from the town of Roses. Free pàrquing.

The space
Belvedere is a beautiful private apartment. It offers splendid sea views from its terrace , very quiet, to 20 meters from the sea (you can almost fish from his terrace :)) , located between the two best beaches of Roses and perhaps the Costa Brava: "L'Almadrava" and "Canyelles Petites".

Guest access
Apartment with all amenities, satellite TV, Wi-fi internet, dishwasher, washer, new large capacity refrigerator, radiator heating, completely new electric kitchen, barbecue deck, large community garden, spacious modern bathroom and fully renovated, ...

name: Sa Boadella beach apartment 1, Lloret de Mar
description:
Duplex apartment with 2 bedrooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen, large balcony and roof terrace. It has a parking space in the basements and common facilities of the Jardins de Sa Boadella urbanization: 2 swimming pools, gardens, basketball and soccer sports courts and playgrounds. It is located in the heart of the Costa Brava, next to the beautiful Cala Sa Boadella beach, also very close to the Fenals beach, Santa Cristina and Treumal, and Lloret de Mar.

The space
the apartment is in a nice private and closed urbanization that is ideal for families with children as they can run around and enjoy themselves throughout the urbanization.
From the same street there is a small path that goes to the privileged Cala Boadella beach, 5 minutes away on foot.

Guest access
2 Swimming pools with hammocks available
2 Sports basketball and soccer courts
Children's parks
Walks, viewpoints, small forest.

License number
neighborhood_overview:
It is an area integrated into a natural environment near the beaches of Sa Boadella, Fenals and Santa Cristina de Lloret de Mar, one of the most beautiful on the Costa Brava.
Very quiet and exclusive neighborhood, away from the festive atmosphere of the center of Lloret de Mar.
200 m. There is a local bus stop and a tourist stop, with a circuit through the botanical gardens, and supermarkets 300 m away. At Fenals beach you can take boats with a tour of the beaches of the Costa Brava.
host_about:
Soy una mujer servicial y hospitalaria. Me gusta que la gente se sienta cómoda y feliz a mi alrededor. Intento tratar a mis huéspedes como me gustaría que me trataran a mi. 
Me congratula compartir experiencias y una de ellas es ceder mi propiedad de Lloret de Mar para disfrute vacacional y de ocio.
En mi apartamento doy prioridad al confort, la limpieza, una buena dotación de equipamiento doméstico, servicios y un entorno íntimo y agradable para que tanto famílias como parejas disfruten de un alojamiento y estancia immejorable, relajante y placentera... Además, yo estoy siempre disponible presencial y/o telefónicamente por si hay cualquier problema.
Parece que consigo mi objetivo puesto que frecuentemente alojo inquilinos repetidores. Mi premio es ver las caras de mis clientes cuando se marchan (y vuelven!).
Esta es mi mayor satisfacción!

name: Apartment in Rosamar / Cala Canyet
description:
Apartment for 4 people in an only 3 flats family building. Wonderful panoramic sea views.
The beach at 10 minutes walking (1 km).
In a residential area (Urbanización Rosamar) in the Costa Brava, between Sant Feliu de Guíxols and Tossa de Mar.
From 22/7 al 25/8 - only full weeks from Saturday to Saturday (7 nights).

The space
Minimum stay 3 / 5 / 7 nights depending season.
Discount if 7 nights or more in some dates of june, july and september.
From 22/7 to 25/8 only rented for full weeks from Saturday to Saturday (7 nights).
We offer linen, not included in price. You can rent it for 12 € / person, payment at arrival.

Apartment with 2 double bedrooms, one with double bed and one with 2 single beds, 2 bathrooms, equipped kitchen, living room and terrace.
Check availability for a 5th person (extra fee 15 €/day if adult).
Placed on the top floor of an isolated building with only 3 apartments (3rd floor-no lift). The
neighborhood_overview: Quiet area in the middle of nature. Residential area for summer holidays and weekends. Beach and water sports in summer. Hiking in Massís de Cadiretes. Cycling. Basic services in Sant Feliu de Guíxols.
host_about: Vivo y trabajo en la ciudad, pero en vacaciones y los fines de semana me encanta ir a Rosamar con mi familia a disfrutar de la naturaleza y la tranquilidad.

name: Primera linea de mar. Platja D'Aro
description:
Bonito apartamento en primera linea de mar. Cocina americana integrada al salón. 2 habitaciones dobles y 1 habitación triple con literas. Un baño completo y un aseo. 2 terrazas de cara al mar. wifi gratis.
Está incluido la ropa de cama, toallas, toallas de playa incluso podrán disponer de sillas de playa, parasoles, pelotas, gafas de buceo y todo lo necesario para disfrutar de unos dias de playa.
Recién instalada la calefacción a gas para poder disfrutar también del apartamento en invierno.

Other things to note
Ahora con calefacción instalada en todo el apartamento para poder hacer uso del apartamento en invierno.

name: Duplex in L'Escala with pool and WIFI.HUTG-053026
description:
Lovely cosy flat with comunal pool in front of the harbour La Clota. Seaview. HUTG-053026

The space
Duplex apartment for holiday rentalin the harbour of L’Escala. The flat « El Moll »is spacious and modern and you will appreciate its green communal area with swimming-pool and lovely seaviews. It is situated only a few meters to the beach of Riellsand is a promise of a wonderful stay !
The apartment is on second floor with liftand built on two levels. On the main floor, you will find a large and bright living-room with terrace and views to the harbour, a well-equipped independant kitchen area, two bedrooms and a complete bathroom. A spiral staircase will lead you to the first floor, where a large bedroom with en suite bathroom is to be found as well as a lovely terrace with view to the sea.
For a better comfort, the accomodation is also fitted with a dishwasher, air conditionning, heating for the low season stays and a private parking placeunder the bloc
neighborhood_overview: proximity to the beach, harbour and shops.

name: Ca la Mula, Cap de Creus
description:
Pide tu oferta a partir de la tercera noche, Casa en entorno rural, con calefacción, 3 dormitorios, 2 baños (bañera para dos personas, no jacuzzi), jardín con barbacoa, vistas al monasterio de Sant Pere de Rodes.
Ideal para desconectar, pueblo tranquilo a 2 km de la playa. Perfecto para 1 o 2 parejas o familia con niños.

The space
La casa se reformo en 2013, con calefacción mediante bomba de calor, instalada en enero de 2016, dispone de un comedor-cocina con chimenea (35 m2), en la planta primera, con vista a la montaña y al monasterio de Sant Pere de Roda y de Sant Salvador, dispone de 3 dormitorios, 1 doble (15 m2) y 2 individuales (6 m2), con dos camas de matrimonio y una litera, 2 baños completos, uno de los baños dispone de bañera para 2 personas, no es un jacuzzi, los chorros de agua y las burbujas estan desconectados, con las paredes de piedra y iluminación led de colores, perfecto para descansar después de una ruta a pie por los caminos que recorren
neighborhood_overview:
El pueblo de La Vall de la Santa Creu, data del siglo XVI, ubicado a 17 km de Cadaqués, se trata de un entorno rural, protegido por el departamento de patrimonio de la Generalitat, dentro del parque natural del Cap de Creus, con vista al monasterio de Sant Pere de Rodes. Se ubica a unos 2,5 km de la playa.
El pueblo dispone de un restaurante, abierto en verano, especializado en arroz con bogavante y paellas.

name: Cal Pubill de Ciuret 35pax
description:
Cal Pubill de Ciuret és una de les grans masies de la muntanya catalana. Situada a 1150 m d’altitud, en plena serralada transversal, a cavall de les comarques d’Osona, El Ripollès i La Garrotxa, gaudeix d’un clima i un paisatge atlàntics tot i trobar-se a 100 km. de Barcelona o de la Costa Brava.
Destaca l’originalitat de la llar de foc de mig, amb l’escó al voltant de la flama, una peça gairebé única.

The space
Casa de Turisme Rural.

Guest access
Gran menjador i cuina amb llar de foc central, tres sales, sala de jocs amb futbolí i ping pong, 14 habitacions, 8 banys, un lavabo i jardí amb piscina.

name: Relax, culture and beach
description:
Our new central, modern, light and sunny two bedroom apartment is comfortable for 3 people but can accommodate 5/6 people. It has parking and lift. At just 5 minuts walking to the centre of the village and at 3.5 Km to the most amazing beaches.
The parking can also be used to store bicycles or other equipment. The access is a little bit difficult but there is plenty of spaces around the apartment to park.

The space
There is also a daily food Market and on Sundays a County Market.
Near the apartment 2 minutes walking there is a bakery, buchery, pharmacy, big supermarket, hair dresser and a few bars.
The amazing beaches of Calella, Llafranc and Tamariu are just at 3.5 Km.

Guest access
The apartment has wifi, cooker, oven, washing machine, diswasher, fridge-freezer, TV, kettle, toaster, iron, iron board and clother horse.
Bedding and towells included.

Other things to note
There is a gym nearby the apa

name: Apartamento "PLATJA MAR 3"
description:
Nice apartment building first line sea. Third floor with beautiful views over the sea. Practical and well localiazado near the lively area Riells with its small and varied shops , bars and cafes . Guaranteed fun !

The space
It is for 4-6 personas. It has 1 double bed , 2 singles and a double sofa bed. It is in a not too big apartment building with sea view. There is alwayas a nice athmosphere between the guests as everybody is enjoying their free time and the nice weahter.

License number
HUTG-006146
neighborhood_overview: It is the lively Riells . Near the marina, harbor and beach . Ideal for callejar and shopping in the little shops offering everything or drink in one of the bars .
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

description:
The apartment has a living room, bathroom, a spacious room with double bed. In the living room there is a sofa bed that converts into two single beds.

Kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, oven and dishwasher. small gallery where available washing machine.
It is possible to charge electric cars in the street next to the apartment.

host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

description:
The Riells blau apartments are located around 700m to the beach of Riells. The apartment complex has a large communal pool located in beautiful gardens with both plenty of sun and shade. The apartment complex is ideal for children as there is a childrens play area.
Our apartment is on the first floor and overlooks the pool. It consists of two bedrooms with double beds, and one bedroom with twin beds. A fully fitted open style kitchen with oven, electric hob, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave. There is a separate shower room and utility room with washing machine.
The lounge and diner are combined and have a set of patio doors which open onto a large terrace/balcony which overlooks the communal gardens and to sit and watch the kids in the pool while enjoying a glass of wine in the shade! There is communal WiFi and Local TV and CD player, In the lounge there is a big sofa and easy chair to comfortably sit 6 people.
This is a large roomy apartment that sleeps 6

name: f21.DUPLEX II - Old Town of Girona
description:
We offer you a very special place, the building is located in the Força street, in the middle of the old jewish quarter of Girona and it was totally renewed in 2006. An eclectic mix that you will enjoy during your stay.

The space
The Força street is the most special street of Girona’s old quarter. It was the neuralgic center of the old Jewish Quarter and during the Roman period this street was part of the Via Augusta. Nowadays it is a beautiful pedestrian street located and it connects the Cathedral square with the center of the city. From this street we can visit the monumental Girona, the most important museums, eat in the best restaurants and have a drink while we enjoy a live jazz concert.

neighborhood_overview:
The best area of the Costa Brava. Tamariu is very relaxed, with only some excellent small restaurants animating the small bay.

People come from far away to taste the delicious paellas, fresh fish and seafood in front of the sea. A unique experience.

Tamariu has 2 small supermarkets, both selling fresh products: fruits, vegetables and meat, 2 bakeries, hairdressing, international press, shops and bars (some of them with free wifi).The region where Tamariu is situated is simply amazing. You have the best virgin beaches of the Costa Brava around, and if you go inland, most of the villages are medieval, declared historic-artistic monument. The walks around the coastal paths are also highly recommended, with secluded coves to be discovered.
