Llançà és una petita vila mediterrània situada enmig d’un paisatge únic. Està envoltada per dos espais naturals protegits, el Parc Natural del Cap de Creus i el de l'Albera.
L’excel·lent oferta de petites platges i tranquil·les cales que ofereix Llançà, i la riquesa d’elements significatius de patrimoni cultural, des del megalític (amb dòlmens i restes prehistòriques) a restes significatives de l'arquitectura pre-romànica, fan de Llançà un destí ideal per unes vacances familiars plenes d’activitats. 
Us convidem a descobrir aquest meravellós poble de la costa brava i la  bellesa de les seves platges !!!

HUTG-004399
neighborhood_overview:
Sant Feliu is a lovely town, dating back hundreds of years, dedicated to fishing and farming, and nowadays, tourism of course. There is still a substantial fishing fleet based in it's harbour (which also has has a large number of recreational boats, fron basic inflatables to mega-yachts). The daily market is full of wonderful locally grown produce, and delicious fresh fish. The harbour is 3 minutes walk from the apartment, the market 10 mins (walking slowly!). The town has 20,000 regular inhabitants, holding lots of it's original charm. It is not overly touristy, like other places nearby (Playa de Aro being the worst example - best to go there just for the night-life and the shopping!).
There are many great places close-by to go to for beautiful beaches, excursions, cycling, scuba-diving, cliff-walking, etc. etc.

name: Pretty Villa in Spectacular Setting with pool
description:
A countryside haven with in easy reach of the shimmering Costa Brava. Situated within the national park of Les Gavarres, aside a picturesque, medieval village, the villa has breathtaking views and spectacular walks. Enjoy traditional features with modern comforts, pool, garden & donkey.

The space
The situation is idyllic and unique. I don't think there is any other property in the area that can boast such a tranquil setting and be in walking distance of 2 of the best and affordable countryside restaurants in the area. To be by such a pretty but quite medieval village while in a national park is pretty amazing. The house is not "Ikead" it has taste, character and charm. The garden in beautifully planted and the pool at 11m, a perfect size. It really is a fantastic base to explore the medieval villages of Emporda, the beaches of the Costa Brava and the whole of Catalonia in general with the mountains, Girona, France and Barcelona also just a day trip away.
neighborhood_overview:
This area is known for its beaches, its food, stunning countryside, medieval villages, cycling, mountains and art.

A Gastronomic Extravaganza
There are various Michelin starred restaurants and many wonderful off the beaten track, local, authentic, affordable eateries. We owned a restaurant ourselves and can advise you on the best places to eat. There are 2 wonderful local restaurants just within walking distance.

Surreal Art
The area has been known for its ceramics since roman times and one can visit the nearby town of La Bisbal for ceramic shopping and the Friday morning, outside food market is delightful.

We are in the centre of the Dali triangle, with his wife Gala's eccentric castle in neighbouring Le Pubol and Figueres and Cadaques an hour or so away by car.

Surrounded by beautiful medieval villages such as Pals and Peretallada, you can spend a lovely morning at markets and cafes or go back further in time and view the exce
host_about: We love travel, art, design and cooking. We love creating and hosting delicious feasts at home.

name: Casita rústica en el Empordà
description:
Nuestra casita esta dentro de una masía típica catalana, con un precioso jardín con piscina y una bonita barbacoa. Esta en las afueras de uno de los pueblos medievales mas bonitos del Baix Empordà. Rodeados de naturaleza y a 20 min de la Costa Brava.

The space
Casita rústica en el Empordà, preparada para 2 personas, pero con posibilidad de añadir camas individuales o cuna si vienen con niños.

Guest access
Jardín, con piscina y barbacoa exterior con mesa grande donde poder comer o cenar al aire libre. Estos espacios exteriores son los comunes, a compartir con nosotros que vivimos al lado.

Other things to note
Posibilidad de añadir más camas.

License number
HUTG-027545
neighborhood_overview:
Pueblo medieval tranquilo, rodeado de naturaleza en las Gavarres, donde passear o ir en bicicleta, con una plaza preciosa, donde no se puede dejar de ir, a comer, cenar o tomar algo, es una experiencia genial.
Las impresionantes playas y calitas de la costa Brava, a 20 minutos en coche.
La increíble gastronomia de la zona.
host_about:
Hola soy Salónica.
Soy Maquilladora free lance y hace unos años decidí cambiar de vida, dejé la ciudad de Barcelona para venir a vivir al campo con mi marido y mis hijos Jean e Ivo. Estoy muy contenta con el cambio y me encanta vivir en Monells, que és un pueblo precioso y sus vecinos nos han acogido con mucho cariño.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Cruïlles, Monells i Sant Sadurní de l'Heura

name: House with garden "MAR JARDI"
description:
House with 2 bedrooms, 1 with double bed, one with bunk . Max. 5 people is because the house has a spacious living room with sofa bed plus kitchen . It has a large garden terrace with barbecue. Lots of green !

The space
Small cozy house with its terrazita . Frescita especially in summer. Perfect to spend private moments with your family or your friends. Like a little oasis for reading or just relaxing on your own. Same time it s so clos to the fun summer athmosphere and the beach.

License number
HUTG-013329
neighborhood_overview: It is close to the lively Riells . Near the marina, harbor and beach . Ideal for callejar and shopping in the little shops offering everything or drink in one of the bars .
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Apartamento ideal para vacaciones en familia, con piscina comunitaria en el mismo edificio. Edificio pequeño, muy abierto y muy familiar. Cerca de la playa, del centro y de todos los servicios. El pueblo ofrece múltiples actividades y eventos. Vistas a la piscina.

In RIUMORS (ALT EMPORDÀ). Very small town: 10 minutes from FIGUERES (MUSEO DALÍ), 10 min. From the beach: EMPURIABRAVA- ROSES-L'ESCALA. A1h of BCN.

The space
Quiet area, beds: 1King size, 2 Queen size, 1 double, 1 of 2 single beds, (5
room with TV)

Guest access
The rooms are private, each reservation will have, depending on the availability of the booked dates and the number of people hired, the following rooms and bathrooms: Room 1: Bed 180 + cot and private indoor bathroom. Room 2 and 5: Bed 150, private bathroom in the hallway. Room 3: Double bed 135, private bathroom in the hallway. Room 4: 2 beds 90, private bathroom right next door. Each room will accommodate 2 guests from the same reservation.

Other thing
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet area, close to the sea and the mountains. Less than 10 minutes. Activities close to less than 10 minutes: Horse, running, btt, hiking, sailing, caiac, windsurf, aerodrome, parachutes, restaurants, etc ... Dalí Museum and Toys Museum 10 minutes, Barcelona 90 minutes.

description:

Villa Athéna: Un mini trip ou les vacances ! ou/et Villa Douce Escale: Un mini trip ou des vacances

Le matériel de nécessité ( papier toilette, charbon de bois, essuie tout, serviette en papier, savon vaisselle, poudre à laver,....) sont fournis.

description:

Antigua masia restaurada situada en lugar estratégico. A pocos kilómetros de la ciudad de Girona y del sector centro de la Costa Brava. Espaciosa, con terraza con vistas y patio emparrado.

name: Costa Brava: Beach & Pool & Kayak
description:
House at Sant Antoni de Calonge, 5 minutes walk to beach, especially suitable for families with children. A very spacious house with 2 floors, 1 studio. Surrounded by a common area, garden and pool. Optionally, by request, we have the service of 3 Kayaks parked on the beach that allows in a few minutes the bathing and snorkeling to see fishes in the best beaches of the Costa Brava.

The space
Beautiful new house of 200m2 built - legalized for tourist use HUTG-licensed No. 01557 (Generalitat de Catalunya) and certificate of occupancy for 9 people.

Very nice, no noise, 4 terraces with views, quality finishes, electric shutters, fireplace, central heating, private garden and patio. Suite, 4 TV, fridge, oven, microwave, coffee maker Nespresso. Barbecue.
A supermarket, open 365 days, is one minute walking.

Guest access
Fantastic garden and swimming pool for adults and children.

Other things to note
Ideal hou
neighborhood_overview: The location is unbeatable as it is in the center of the Costa Brava with the best communication highway. Then there is only 4 minutes walk from the fantastic white beach Torre Valentina (Sant Antoni de Calonge), in an area of high standing. The house is between Palamos and Platja d'Aro with a fabulous walkway that connects the two towns with mountain scenery and small sandy beaches, towers, etc. Tapas in Palamos, or partying and shopping in Platja d'Aro or mountain excursions or visit the castle of Calonge or Pals or Begur or Calella de Palafrugell or Peratellada ...among other medieval villages.
host_about: Doctora y profesora de la Universitat de Barcelona. Investigadora en turismo. Mi pasión es viajar y aprender de la gente.

name: UN HOTEL SINGULAR EN UN ENTORNO...
description:
Enclavado dentro de una impresionante finca forestal y ganadera de 400 hectáreas y dentro del ámbito protegido del Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa, se alza este incomparable lugar.

Las vistas excepcionales desde 840 metros.

The space
UN HOTEL SINGULAR EN UN PARQUE NATURAL ENTRE VOLCANES y algo más...

Situado en una finca de 400 ha, forestal y ganadera, enclavada dentro del ámbito protegido del Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa (Girona), a 840 m sobre el nivel del mar, con excepcionales vistas hacia el Pirineo, las singulares montañas del Collsacabra y la costa del Mediterráneo.
Acceso pavimentado desde el km 61,5 de la carretera C-63 de Santa Coloma de Farners a Olot. El hotel dispone de 10 dormitorios muy confortable, dotados de teléfono, televisor, acceso a Internet y todo lo necesario para gozar de una buena estancia.
Unos salones con chimenea, sala-biblioteca, zona de relax y una magnífica pi
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
FINCA EL VENTÓS, UN HOTEL SINGULAR

Enclavado dentro de una impresionante finca forestal y ganadera de 400 hectáreas y dentro del ámbito protegido del Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa, se alza este incomparable lugar.

Las vistas excepcionales desde 840 metros por encima del nivel del mar permiten contemplar desde la Vall de Núria y el Puigmal hasta la costa mediterránea, unos elementos (Website hidden by Airbnb) de un valor incalculable el entorno de esta finca donde los clientes tienen la posibilidad de realizar actividades relacionadas con la naturaleza y el turismo activo.

Salones con chimenea, zonas de relax y una magnífica piscina son algunos de los muchos ingredientes que todo el que se acerque encontrará en este lugar. La Finca el Ventós cuenta también con un excelente restaurante especializado en cocina selecta y cocina de montaña, además de una amplia selección de vinos en una bodega exclusiva. *El restaurante del Hotel el Ventós es uno de los establecimientos gastronómicos recomendados por la Guia Michelin 2015.

La Finca el Ventós compta amb 10 habitaciones que ofrecen a los clientes todas las comodidades para hacerles disfrutar de una estancia inolvidable. Entre otros elementos, pone a su disposición dispositivos tecnológicos de última generación, como una sala de home cinema, iPads i iPods, así como una sala de reuniones para empresas completamente equipada.

*Hotel no recomendado a menores de 10 años.

Bienvenidos a nuestra casa!

name: Sleep & Stay deluxe aptmt old town
description:
Make your visit to Girona memorable staying in this fantastic deluxe apartment that is overlooking the main square of the town hall, Placa del Vi and on walking distance of all shops, restaurants and Jewish quarter.

We are looking forward hosting you in our beautiful medieval city!

The space
The apartment is beautifully decorated, with a spacious open dining, kitchen and living room with a super relaxing modern seating area featuring windows and balconies that overlook one of the main squares of the old town, Barri Vell.
The kitchen is recently renovated with all appliances needed and has plenty of kitchen wear. There's a Dolce Gusto coffee machine, oven, microwave, dishwasher, air-con and washing machine. In the living room there is a sofa bed for an extra 3rd and 4th guest.
There is one spacious double bedroom with a kingsize bed (160x200m) and lots of wardrobe space. The mattress is off a high quality, purchased in 2021 We provide high
neighborhood_overview: Located in Plaza del Vi,  this is the center of all cultural activities in Girona.  You'll have all markets, shops and landmarks walking 2 min away from the building.
host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lot’s of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

That’s why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a week’s stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

name: Bright, Riverside Apartment No 6 near old town
description:
Three bedroom apartment, lovingly renovated in Spanish vintage style. Fantastic location near the old town, yet peaceful river view. There are two double bedrooms, one with an extra single bed. The third bedroom has a single bed which can be folded & used as secure bike storage. Cosy in winter, but shaded in summer. Perfect for large families, two couples sharing & cyclists. English speaking host gives you a personal welcome.
Fully registered with the Catalan authorities as a holiday apartment.

The space
There are three bedrooms with lots of storage space - two doubles, one with an extra single bed & a separate single room. A living room with balcony to give space to relax, whilst the kitchen & bathroom are attractive & modern. Free, fast wifi is available for your entertainment devices & there is a TV for local programming.
Sunny yet cool in summer, whilst warm and cosy in winter, there are fans only, as with tree shade and good ventilation, air condit
neighborhood_overview: The Pedret area of Girona is just within the city walls and so the old part of the city. Just 2 minutes away there are numerous little cafés and shops but there is a supermarket 10 minutes walk away. To the front of the apartment is the River Ter which runs through the city and this means that no one overlooks the balcony and there are open views to the river. Tourists & cyclists love how quickly you can be on the road to the sea or to the mountains at this side of the city. There are walks along the river or up the St Daniel Valley for walkers tired of city life.
host_about: My family and I moved to Catalonia from the UK 20 years ago, finding Can Torras two years later. Since then it has been a labour of love to renovate two apartments and my old farmhouse. I knew from the start this was where I wanted to live - the food, the scenery, the wonderful weather. Now I'm pleased to share the farmhouse, my garden and its magnificent views with visitors and offer my apartments in Girona for self catering stays. I am happy to share my experiences so that visitors enjoy the best that Catalonia has to offer.

name: Apartment with amazing views and rooftop terrace
description:
Enjoy everything Girona has to offer: culture, museums, great food, beautiful beaches, and world-famous cycling from a home base that’s conveniently located and ready to welcome your family or group.

There are three bedrooms, one with a queen size bed and two smaller bedrooms that each have two singles that can be put together if you like and one bathroom with a shower and heated floor. The living room has a fireplace for the winter months to keep you warm and cozy. The kitchen has everyth...

The space
The apartment overlooks the Girona Cathedral and the trees of the San Daniel Valley, and you can enjoy the spectacular views from either the balcony or the private rooftop terrace. There is a barbecue, you can park for FREE in front of the building and there is air-conditioning and a fire place for the winter months. It is very calm with only the sounds of the birds and bells from the cathedral below. There is a big entrance, which is perfect to bring up
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lot’s of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

That’s why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a week’s stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

name: Costa Brava, 50 m beach - B2
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach

100 m2 arranged to accommodate up to 8 people (5 beds and a double sofa bed)

Suitable for persons on wheelchair: on street level, with wide corridors and doorways

3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with 1 double sofa bed
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

In
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

name: Historic Girona  apartment
description:
The space
Rent for days, for weeks or weekends an apartment fully equipped and independent for up to 4 people.
The beautiful and comfortable loft rented furnished. It is located right in the heart of historic downtown and beside the most emblematic spaces and buildings of Girona: the Cathedral, the Jewish Call (Jewish Quarter of Girona) and houses overhanging the river Onyar.
Also 5 minutes walk from the nightlife, perfect for having a nightcap. It also offers free public parking 3 minutes away.

The apartment is equipped with TV, washing machine, fully equipped kitchen (microwave, fridge, toaster ...) you have everything you need to cook.
To sleep has a double room with a comfortable and spacious bed 150 cm x 200 cm and a sofa bed for two in the dining room.
Bathroom with shower, available for private use. Sheets and towels included.

I live just a few minutes of this apartment and I will be available at all times to help and assist

name: Apartment near the beach
description:
Completely equiped apartment of 80 m2 aprox. with lot of space, fresh and very luminouse. View to the beach of S'Agaro, elevator, pool and garden on the buiding, private parking and only 3 min. by car to the shops and the beach. Cradle and chair o.d.

The space
The apartment has about 80 square meters and is fully equipped for an unforgettable stay on the Costa Brava. The kitchen is fully equipped with washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, gas hob, microwave and fridge-freezer.
There is a Flat TV and DVD, and a PlayStation upon request.
There are two separate bedrooms, a room with double bed and the other one with two single beds. One bathroom is inside of a bedroom and one bathroom in the hallway.
There is a large dining area by the living room and a bright terrace with overlooking to the sea and the beach of S'Agaro, Playa de Aro and Sant Feliu de Guixols.

Guest access
The apartment has a community pool and garden and a
neighborhood_overview:
S'Agaró is situated between Playa de Aro and Sant Feliu de Guixols, two very idyllic and typical towns on the Costa Brava in the province of Girona. Playa de Aro is ideal for shopping and has a lot of brand shops, spend a day at the beach or go for drinks and dancing at night.
The apartment is located just 30 min. from Girona and 40 min. from Figueras, two capitals with a special charm and great cultural value.

Toegang tot het terras en zwembad dat volledige privacy heeft. Zomers staat de bougainville in volle bloei om van te genieten !

License number
HUTG-021546
neighborhood_overview:
Vall-llobrega is gelegen in de directe omgeving van Palamós een stadje met een regionale betekenis. Er is altijd leven, met de vissers-, jacht- en commerciële haven. Vele restaurants en tapas barretjes zijn het gehele jaar geopend. Palafrugell, Platja d'Aro, Girona en Barcelona zijn zowel per auto als per openbaar vervoer vanuit Palamós te bereiken.
In de omgeving zijn vele prachtige en goed onderhouden golfbanen die de echte golfer zeker als uitdagend zal betitelen.
Vall-llobrega grenst aan het natuurgebied "Les Gavarres" waar heerlijke wandelingen, of fietstochten kunnen worden gemaakt. Voor de sportfietsers is de omgeving zeker uitdagend en bijzonder. Vele wielrenploegen hebben in onze omgeving hun winter trainingskamp daar de omgeving veel verschillende hoogteverschillen en vlaktes kent.
host_about:
We are a Dutch couple living part of the year in our beloved Cataluña, Spain.
Semi retired  and loving to have people and our dogs around us.
Enjoying life, playing Golf in the marvelous climate of Spain. Like to be in the neighborhood of the sea and woods where we can walk the dogs on a daily basis. Culture is important to us. Barcelona and Figueres and other places are nice to visit.

name: Apartamento con piscina y mar
description:
Cómodo apartamento con gran terraza en segunda planta, en complejo residencial con jardín comunitario de diseño con dos piscinas y parque infantil. Situado frente al Golf de Pals, 1000 m. de la playa. Ascensor. Parking subterráneo. Capacidad: 4 personas

The space
Cómodo apartamento en segunda planta, en complejo residencial con jardín comunitario de diseño con dos piscinas y parque infantil. Situado frente al Golf de Pals, 1000 m. de la playa. Conexión WiFi. Ascensor. Parking subterráneo.
DISTRIBUCIÓN: Salón/comedor con salida a la terraza, cocina americana, lavadero, 2 dormitorios dobles, 1 baño.

Guest access
El conjunto dispone de 2 piscinas comunitarias (1 piscina pequeña para niños), un area de juegos para ninos, un cenador y una mesa de ping pong
neighborhood_overview:
Pals playa es una zona tranquila ideal para hacer turismo en familia, para relajarse y desconectar.
Es una zona ideal si te gustan los deportes de playa: kitesurf, submarinismo, SUP, y tambien para practicar golf (el campo de golf esta a solo 50 m), ciclismo y ofrece tambien una zona de arena compacta para correr junto al mar
El pueblo de Pals es un pueblo medieval se encuentra situado en la cima del Puig Aspre, desde donde se contempla una vista magnífica del Ampurdán pequeño o “Empurdanet”

La playa esta formada por dunas y pinos tiene una longitud de más de 3,5km y unas magníficas vistas sobre las Islas Medes

name: The Loft @lovelyhousesdiana
description:
El loft es un pequeño refugio para descansar, desconectar y relajarse. Un espacio único de planta baja con un diseño minimalista. Es un solo espacio para ser vivido con intimidad. Es el lugar perfecto para disfrutar en cualquier momento del día.
Más información y fotos @lovelyhousesdiana

The space
Más información y fotos @lovelyhousesdiana
Dispone de una cocina americana totalmente equipada, el dormitorio está separado del resto de la vivienda por una cortina de madera blanca que da intimidad, con cama doble de látex más un topper de 160cm, un baño con ducha y un gran patio privado con amplias vistas a los campos.
Es el lugar perfecto para disfrutar en cualquier momento del día.
COMODIDADES
Capacidad para 2 personas y un bebé

Wifi gratuito, Sábanas y toallas, Secador de pelo y tabla de planchar, Lavadora, Bola para lavar ecológica, Tendedero, Frigorífico y congelador, Vitrocerámica, Horno, Microondas, Aspiradora, Ollas, Sart
neighborhood_overview:
El loft está emplazado en un camino a 2 kilómetros de Sant Jordi Desvalls. Es un lugar donde reina la tranquilidad y el silencio. Un precioso paisaje de interior, rodeado de campos, huertos y bosques donde disfrutar de agradables paseos.
A escasos kilómetros de la casa se encuentran las playas más bonitas de la Costa Brava. A tan sólo 20 minutos en coche de l'Estartit, i l'Escala, y a 25 minutos de Girona. También podrás visitar numerosos pueblos con encanto. En la casa encontraríes la Guia de l'Empordà y recomandaciones.
En el pueblo de Sant Jordi Desvalls hay un pequeño supermercado de pueblo abierto todos los días; incluso los domingos.
host_about:
Nuestra familia siempre trabajó en el campo y nuestra ilusión de dar nueva vida a antiguos espacios utilizados para el ganado y sus cultivos nos llevaron a construir estas magníficas casas, respetando siempre el entorno y los lugares, con materiales honestos y de calidad.. 
Estaremos encantados de daros la bienvenida y explicaros lo que creemos es lo mejor y más bonito de la zona del Empordà y el Gironès.

name: Apartment in La Fosca
description:
2 bedroom apartment next to La Fosca beach, in Palamós (5 'walk).
Completely renovated, perfect for a couple or family vacation on the Costa Brava.
Private parking in the building. Gardened area. Independent kitchen and fully equipped. Wifi.
Large balcony with dining area to enjoy the sun during the day and dinner at night.
2 bedrooms: 1 double bed + 2 single beds (bunk bed).

The space
El apartamento en la fosca es un confortable espacio con una cuidada decoración mediterránea. Orientado hacia el mar, exterior y luminoso. Tiene 4 estancias y puede alojar cómodamente a 4 personas. Nuestra casa cuenta con una bonita cocina equipada para que podáis cocinar tanto como queráis. Tendréis todo lo necesario. Podréis disfrutar de la terraza para el descanso y como comedor. Baño con ducha termostática y todo lo necesario para vuestro aseo. Los dormitorios, cómodos y serenos invitan a dejar que entre el sol por los grandes ventanales.

Lice
neighborhood_overview:
La Fosca es una zona residencial y tranquila junto al mar.
Las playas y los acantilados son lo más destacado del entorno.
Pero también encontraréis servicios de restauración y a un paseo, estaréis en el centro de Palamós.

name: Villa vue mer piscine sécurisée
description:
Villa 12/14 pers. Indépendante, très spacieuse avec décoration moderne, située dans le quartier très calme de Sa Riera. Magnifique jardin plat (très rare) avec piscine sécurisée. Plage à 5mn à pied. 5 chambres et 4 SdB. Parking 2/3 voitures.

The space
Magnifique villa idéale pour les séjours en famille ou entre amis, au coeur d'un lieu très privilégié de la Costa Brava réputé pour ses calanques, ses plages et ses golfs, Elle comporte de nombreux couchages pour accueillir les visiteurs, au sein d'une décoration moderne et chaleureuse. Les pièces à vivre sont spacieuses et parfaitement équipées pour des vacances de rêve.
Au RDC on trouve un grand salon avec cheminée, une salle a manger, une cuisine américaine équipée et deux suites parentales avec leurs salles de bain privatives. Toutes les pièces ont vue sur mer et ouvrent sur une large terrasse en partie couverte qui vous permettra de vous protéger du soleil aux heures les plus chaudes de la journée dans u
neighborhood_overview:
La maison est à 2,5km de Begur, charmant village médiéval avec de nombreux bons restaurants / bars et petites boutiques chics et beaucoup d'ambiance en saison.
Begur dessert de nombreuses criques toutes plus belles les unes que les autres (Sa Tuna, Aiguablava, Tamariu, Aiguafreda, ...). La très longe plage de Pals située à 2km permet de nombreuses activités nautiques : planche à voile, kite-surf, catamaran, ski-nautique, etc.

La villa est située dans un quartier très calme à 5/10mn à pied de la plage de Sa Riera. Un escalier permet de descendre à pied à la plage de manière très sécurisée, en particulier pour les enfants qui peuvent être ainsi indépendants.

L'environnement est d'une grande beauté naturelle, avec de nombreuses activités possibles comme la plongée, le tennis et le golf (Golf International d'Emporda, Golf de Pals, etc). C’est aussi une destination très appréciée des randonneurs toute l’année.

name: 13 Calle Santa Maria In the heart of old Cadaqués
description:
In the heart of old Cadaqués, between the sea, 100 meters away, and Santa Maria Church, with its baroque altarpiece 23 m high, this family house can accommodate up to 10 people. Built on two floors, it has a large patio where between sun and shade you can have lunch and take a nap. On the second floor, a bay window overlooking the Riba Pitxot with its famous arcade painted by Dali, Picasso and many other painters who made Cadaqués their place of inspiration.

The space
This is an old house bought by my family in the 1950s when fresh water arrived by tanker. The current kitchen is installed in the old cistern. We tried to maintain the house in its original appearance by equipping it with a kitchen and modern bathrooms.

Guest access
The house is entirely up to you.

Other things to note
It is not possible to reach the house directly by car.
We advise you to park at Port-Alguer while you carry your luggage inside.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the old Cadaqués next to the Santa Maria church to visit for its altarpiece, near the town hall where often floats the Catalan flag and offers a beautiful view of the whole bay. This area is full of craft shops and small restaurants. The beach of Port-Alguer is a hundred meters where Ribat Pixot is famous for its arch and its view of the church and its tapas bar.

The space
Touristic license HUTG-017 234
The Can Morè masía is located on the Pasteral plain, just 100 meters from the river Ter. The first construction on record refers to a small warehouse where grain was jaunted and crops were aimed at providing the Moli del Plademont, located a hundred meters east, and for several decades obsolete and nowadays unrecognizable, receiving the name of Can Raya. This fertile plain has been exploited by humans for ov(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) years, and where an Iberian settlement existed in the Colldegria mountain where they were found human remains from the era, hunting tools and pottery vessels from the settlement, you can also see the cave of el Pasteral which served during th
neighborhood_overview:
The environment, can be summarized as pure nature, birdsong and water, bike path, near the river, close to incredible places, where tourist can practice hiking, canoeing, mountain biking, quad, paragliding,
Pasteral, is the best known center of the Cellera de Ter. Located on the C-63 that goes from Santa Coloma de Farnes to Olot, and the N-141 that connects Girona with Angles,
The environment, can be summarized as pure nature, birdsong and water, bike path, near the river, close to incredible places, where tourist can practice hiking, canoeing, mountain biking, quad, paragliding,



Activities: Hiking, cycling, mountain bike trails mountain biking, multisport, paragliding, horse riding, fishing, gastronomic routes and cultural tours, climbing, hiking natural pools, mushrooming.

name: Rustic "Mas" farmhouse Emporda/Costa Brava/Girona
description:
Our wonderful rustic "Mas" farmhouse full of character in the quiet and serene Gavarres Nature Park/Baix Emporda between Palamos and Mont Ras near Palafrugell and Calella... far from the maddening crowd but just a stone's throw away from the beaches of Castell, La Fosca, Cala Estreta, etc on the Costa Brava.
Fully furnished & equipped by default, for 13 GUESTS.
However there is room, if necessary, for 2 more guests for an extra guest fee.

License # HUTG-017243

The space
Mas Cabré is a typical Catalan "mas" (farmhouse) built in 1842, according to the date chiseled on the front stone archway. However, it's been documented that a building of some kind already stood there in the 15th century. That's not surprising, since human presence in the area dates from prehistoric times and several dolmens and other Megalithic carvings can be found on the property or close to it.

During our renovations of Mas Cabré, we've kept its rustic, simp
neighborhood_overview:
Mas Cabre is all about location, location, location! You feel like you are far away from everything, almost in the middle of nowhere.

It is situated in the Gavarres Nature Park which is included in the European Union's Natura 2000 Network of protected areas whose goal is to ensure the long term survival of Europe's species and habitats in a sustainable manner.
The nearest house is 1 km away.
However you can see the sea from the house and the town and beaches of the Costa Brava are only minutes away.

Located in the beautifully scenic Baix Empordà region, in Catalonia, Mas Cabré belongs to the municipalities of Vall-Llobrega and Forallac, an area rich with history, great food and sports activities.
From there, you can visit old medieval towns or go to the beach; you can indulge in lunch or dinner by the sea or surrounded by nature; or you can visit a local winery and experience a wine tour.
And let's not forget bicycle trips, sailing, fishing
host_about:
I am a native New Yorker but have lived more years in Barcelona than in New York.
Profession: Freelance photographer specialized in commercial architecture, interiors and portrait photography as well as documentary photography projects on forest related climate change issues.

neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

name: Beautiful house with sea views in Cadaqués.
description:
This house is four minutes by foot from the beach, in the center of Cadaqués, but away from noisy bars and restaurants. It is an independent house with a private parking, garden, two living-dining rooms (upper floor with sea views and ground floor in the garden) and 2 kitchens. There is also a BBQ area with tables and a pergola in the garden.

The space
The house is located in the center of the town, but away from the noise of music bars and restaurants. It is built in the typical cadaques style inspired in Lanfranco Bombelli’s architecture.
The house was completely rebuilt in 2009 with high quality materials, including double glass windows, doors, floors, heating, air conditioning (living-room), toilets and cuisine. We take care of the house so it always in a perfect state.

Guest access
There is a private parking for your car in the house. Also, there is extra parking space usually available near the house.

License numbe
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the area of Es Poal, three minutes from the beach, four minutes from the town square and seven minutes from Portlligat (all on foot). It is located very centrally, but in a very quiet area with almost no noise.
host_about: Hello! I am Clara Mas, a girl from Barcelona that loves to travel around the world. I am an anthropologist but I have a long working-experience in Fashion. I appreciate places with 'charme' and enjoy meeting new people and experiences. I am a fan of outdoors sports like hicking, swimming, cycling, climbing, kayaking, horse-riding, etc. and gastroomy is also an important part of my life, in addition to Music, Nature and Literature. I have lived in Paris, London and New York, but Barcelona remains my favorite city! I need the sun and the sea!

The apartment is in a very close to the beach (6') and town centre. It is enough away to be quiet throughout the year.

The adventure park "Jocs" will delight children. Wide range of cultural and tourist offers around: ancient medieval villages (Pals, Peratallada, Torruella ..); Empúries, ancient Greek city; Girona, with its beautiful old town and the Jewish quarter; museums (Dalí in Figueras, the Mediterranean in Torruella); music concerts (Torroella de Montgri, Peratallada); beautiful beaches (Cala Sa Tuna, Sarriera Cala, Cala Pedrosa, the large beach of L'Estartit), bird watching in the Aiguamolls. In Barcelona - direct highway two hours drive- Sagrada Familia, the Gothic Quarter, Las Ramblas, the Port.
The cuisine in and around Estartit enjoys high reputation.

description:
A beautiful villa on a quiet spot with fabulous sea views and a great vacation house for one or two families! Villa Bella Vista is situated in a beautiful residential bay with fantastic views of the sea, two beach areas and the Santa Cristina chapel. The secluded beaches can be reached by foot (15 minutes) or by car (two minutes).
Private pool with sun loungers, terrace with exterior dining table and pergola, BBQ and free wifi. A/C in all bedrooms.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
Blanes is located in the region of Catalonia, on the Costa Brava , 60 kilometers north of Barcelona airport .

Once a small fishing village, Blanes still retains some of its original charm ; The complex has a four kilometer stretch of coastline with sandy beaches and small rocky coves , most of which are equipped with water sports and other tourist facilities.

Moving away from the seafront you will find evidence of a town steeped in history, with ancient monuments , churches and buildings still standing as reminders of past colorful Blanes. The medieval castle of Sant Joan offers spectacular views over the harbor , beach and town.
In late July it marks the international fireworks competition , an impressive sight that can be seen from the beach every year.
host_about:
We are a small family run business. Since 2001 we focus on the seasonal rental of villas and apartments that meet our high standards. Location, equipment and decoration are of high importance to us. We hand-pick all our properties to ensure they meet our quality standards and to offer you a unforgettable dream holiday!

Our experienced team speaks spanish, catalan, german, english, french and dutch and will be more than pleased to assist you in your travel arrangements. 

Hope to host you soon!

name: El Xiprer, Biert, Canet d’Adri (prov.of Girona)
description:
El Xiprer is a place to relax and enjoy its surroundings weather you bike, hike or rest with your family. An energetically autonomous house, 25 minutes away from Girona, in the heart of the Biert Valley under the Rocacorba mountain. This farmhouse is in the middle of the woods, remote area but 25 minutes from Girona, 45 minutes from la Costa Brava, 35 minutes from Banyoles and 1h25 min from Barcelona. El Xiprés is in the middle of the forest, great for a driving adventure if you have a jeep.

The space
The house, El Xiprés de Can Soler is a XIX Century Catalan Masia that used to be a stable. The Catalan vault, its 100 hundred year's old stones and the enormous wood beams define the place's architecture. The house has three rooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, living room and dining room. There is a small balcony with a private garden as well as a barbecue, a fireplace and access to the pool shared with the family. Pool; Children have to be supervised while swimming a
neighborhood_overview: We live in a remote area, we have several neighbours, we are not alone, even though it seems like it. This location is unique, Rocacorba is an hour and half hiking trip away, beautiful view of Girona, Banyoles, the Golf of Roses (the Mediterranean Sea). Canet d'Adri (5-10 minutes away by car) has a waterfall and natural pool and there are several restaurants in the area. Banyoles and the lake (“L’estany”) are 30 minutes away by car; La Garrotxa, a hiking and cultural paradise with medieval villages is 25 minutes away; La Costa Brava, its picturesque fishing villages and beautiful beaches are 35-40 minutes away; The Catalan Pyrenees are 1h 30 minutes away; The French border (north) and the beautiful city of Barcelona (south) are 1h 20 minutes away.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the old part of town, just 2 minutes away from the beach and high quality restaurants.
One minute away you will find the church plaza, where you can enjoy nice meals with a quiet and relaxing atmosphere, at the same time your kids play at the plaza without danger.
Just 2 minutes away, you will find a little supermarket and the commercial zone, where is difficult not to stop and watch the beautiful shops.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rug
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: L'Olivera, Casa a Rupià
description:
House located in Rupià, a lovely village. Our home preserves the walls of the village and is perfect to accommodate you and your loved ones.

The space
Our home is located in Rupià, a beautiful medieval village that combines the best of the past with the best of today. Enjoy it!
The house preserves the village wall and has 3 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms, interior patio, equipped kitchen, laundry room, dining room, and 3 living rooms.
It also has a large terrace. All this divided in three floors.
The house has been recently remodeled. It is within the village, in a very quiet area surrounded by nature. The bells of the village can be clearly heard.
It has a fully equipped kitchen with oven, fridge, dishwasher and microwave, and a laundry room with washing machine and dryer.
It also has 3 equipped double bedrooms. As well as the bathrooms. There is a full bathroom, and two toilets.
In the patio there is a shower to clean and refresh you

description:
Ground floor apartment with great views in a quiet urbanization on Alp. Very sunny and calm. A three minutes from the town center and 10km from Puigcerdà. 3 outdoor rooms, very bright living room with private outdoor garden.

The space
Very bright and comfortable apartment. Opened spaces and great views of Valley of La Cerdanya and the Pyrenees mountains.
Pleasant stay both in summer and winter.

The apartment is fully equipped.
In the kitchen you have kitchenware, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, microwave, dishwasher, vitro ...
It has a large living room with good views and direct communication with the kitchen. It has a fireplace, flat TV, DVD, music player, two sofas and an armchair.
There are 3 bedrooms with two beds each. Two of them are twin and one double bed. They also provided quilts and bedding.
The master bedroom has a bathroom with sink and bathtub. There is also another bathroom with a shower. All towels provided.<

name: Apartamento 2pax L'ARCADA DE FARES
description:
L’Arcada de Fares és un petit complex d’apartaments turístics amb encant de caire rural situat a Besalú i inaugurat el juny del 2009. El formen un total de divuit apartaments, integrats en una masia del segle XV al poble de Fares, a la Garrotxa.

The space
L’Arcada de Fares, un petit complex d'agroturisme amb encant, a Besalú
L’Arcada de Fares és un petit complex d’apartaments turístics amb encant de caire rural situat a Besalú i inaugurat el juny del 2009. El formen un total de divuit apartaments, integrats en una masia del segle XV al poble de Fares, a la comarca de la Garrotxa, just al centre de la província de Girona.
Gestionada a nivell familiar, L’Arcada de Fares disposa d’un apartament per a cada tipus de visitant, amb capacitat des de 2 fins a 14 persones: si viatgeu sols, amb parella, amb família, amb amics o bé si sou un grup empresarial.

Hear the sea from the apartment and just walk down the steps onto the coastal path and direct access to the rocks to swim and sunbathe. The apartment is on the ground level so easy access!

The space
Front line to the sea with superb sea views and over the Bay of Roses to the Isle of Medes in the distance which can be enjoyed from the outside private terrace for dining or the open planned kitchen/dining room/ lounge. The bedroom is spacious with one double bed and fitted wardrobes and there is a sofa bed in the lounge. It is perfect for 2 adults. No car needed!
TV offers: Full Spanish, Full French, Full German and some English and other eu
neighborhood_overview:
This area of the coast of Costa Brava is just beautiful! I have traveled all over the world and this area is hard to beat!
There are many things to see and do in this area including most types of water sports, boat trips, water park, go karts, horse riding, cycling, sky diving (wind tunnel also available) in Empuriabrava plus much more.
Out of season it is very quiet and a superb location for walking.
If you like walking then it's perfect to enjoy the stunning scenery along the coastal path or up into the national park of Cap de Creus or take a boat trip along the coast round to Cadaques which is really worth while.

You can walk to the sandy cove of Palangrers (7 mins), Canyelles Petites (10-15 mins), Almadrava (20-30 mins) or Roses main beach and town in under 15 minutes. If you want to hike further you can walk to many other coves along the coastal path including Cala Montjoi, Cala Joncols, walk to Cadaques or even further afield time permitting!
It i
host_about:
Hi, I love to travel although do not do enough of it nowadays! I like to think that our guests have the best experience in our accommodations, that they have everything they need and a very comfortable stay.
This area is fantastic to explore and we do all we can to make sure you enjoy it as much as we do. We have lived her for 18 years+!
I hope we meet soon!

name: Sleep & Stay Duplex apt in Old Town
description:
Cozy city apartment, divided over two levels with one bedroom. Beautifully decorated, to make you feel at home in Girona straight away! Located close to the Sant Feliu church in Calle Barca.

The space
Cozy city apartment, divided over two levels with one bedroom. Beautifully decorated, to make you feel at home in Girona straight away! Located close to the Sant Feliu church in Calle Barca.

This beautifully apartment is located on the third floor. The apartment has high ceilings and has a bright and spacious living space on the first level. There is an open kitchen, with an open bar to the big dining table suitable for 6 guests. There is a sleeping sofa for an extra 2 guests and a cot available on demand. On the second level there is a bathroom with a bath, a little office area and main bedroom. This bedroom is not on the main street side, so a nice and quit room for a good nights rest after a long day in Girona’s old town!

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lot’s of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

That’s why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a week’s stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

name: H2 Habitación doble / Mas Ferran
description:
Masferran is a project of its owner, Ferran, who, once the house restoration was completed decided to open it to the public and share this privileged space in l'Empordà to enjoy an intimate and relaxed stay.
The style was respected adapting it to the current comforts.
We recommend gastronomic routes, outdoor activities and cultural visits.
There is a wide selection of restaurants in the area and a very complete supermarket 3 minutes walk away.

The space
H2
Romantic and quiet 40 m² room. Special design, has integrated bathroom with shower, desk, King size bed, sofa, TV, heating, fan. Access to private terrace and solarium with garden views.
Relaxing decoration in warm tones, with restored furniture combined with modern pieces and natural materials.
100% cotton bed and bath linen.
Quality amenities and hair dryer.
It can accommodate 3 people upon request.
The rest of the rooms, such as kitchen, living room, dining room,
neighborhood_overview: Pals is at the epicenter of the Golden Triangle of Baix Empordà. It's a beautiful area, with marvelous beaches and quite central; perfect for visiting medieval villages and enjoying outdoor, cultural or gastronomic routes.
host_about:
Masferran es un proyecto de su propietario, Ferran, que compró con mucha ilusión esta casa de pueblo. Una vez finalizada la restauración decidió abrirla al público y compartir este espacio privilegiado en l’Empordà.
La restauración se hizo respetando el estilo pero adaptado a las comodidades actuales creando un espacio único para disfrutar de una estancia íntima y relajada.
Trabajamos fuera de casa pero estamos siempre disponibles para asesorar, orientar y hacer recomendaciones sobre la zona a nuestros huéspedes, aunque dejándoles espacio y privacidad para que se sientan cómodos en casa.
Ofrecemos aconsejar rutas gastronómicas, actividades al aire libre y visitas culturales. El espacio está abierto a mostrar arte local y informar de marcados y anticuarios.
Nuestras habitaciones tienen baño privado con ducha, artículos de baño y secador; cama King size, TV, adaptadores usb, altavoces bluetooth, aire acondicionado, ventilador.

name: "Garden-view" double/twin 2.
description:
Well illuminated double bedroom overlooking the garden and fish pond.
Has windows on two sides therefore received the sun for most of the day.
This room is not "en suite". It has its own private bathroom adjacent to the bedroom.
Casa Dos Torres is on the road to the beach which is a 5 minute walk away.
A full description is available is available on the casadostorres website.

The space
Casa Dos Torres is a registered "pension" in Calella de Palafrugell.
We described ourselves as a Bed and Breakfast but this category does not exist here in Sapin therefore we have been given the registration "P" by the Generalitat de Catalunya.

Guest access
Guests are permitted to use our kitchen facilities. This year with the pandemia the kitchen facilities will not be available.
There is free WiFi.
We have a pretty garden with numerous seating areas plus a swimming pool (in season).

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Calella de Palafrugell is an old fishing village. It's centre has retained the original "look" of the place but it has grown considerably over the years.
It still does retain a charm and beauty which attracts people from all over the world.
Calella de Palafrugell is a well known seaside "village in The Costa Brava much frequented by the local Catalans.
The first Saturday in July each year there is the Havanares Festival.
Throughout July and August the Cap Roig gardens hold regular concerts.
This year there may not be concerts!

name: Casa de piedra en Vilaur ,  Can Cavaller
description:
Can Cavaller se encuentra en el tranquilo pueblo de Vilaur .
Tiene un jardín con barbacoa y piscina totalmente privado . , por el otro lado da a la placita del pueblo sin coches . Tiene capacidad para 10 / 13 personas ,

The space
Planta baja :
Sala de estar y comedor cocina con salida a la placita y al jardín y porche donde se puede comer fuera .
Dos habitaciones , una doble con cama 180 y una con una cama de matrimonio
150 y tres camas y dos cuartos de baño.

1ª planta : tres habitaciones dobles dos de matrimonio y una con dos camas , un baño con bañera y una gran terraza .

Guest access
Se entra por una puerta acristalada que da a la plaza de la iglesia (sin coches) donde siempre reina la tranquilidad .
La planta baja, consta de una sala de unos 50 m2 que hace de sala de estar con chimenea y comedor cocina,con mucha luz ,
dos grandes cristaleras una da la plaza y la otra da al jardín
neighborhood_overview:
VILAUR Es un pueblecito de piedra , muy pintoresco y tranquilo .
En el pueblo solo hay el centro cívico , que es un buen restaurante y bar .
el supermercado esta en el pueblo de al lado CAMALLERA a dos kilómetros . Alli se puede encontrar de todo .
En Vilaur hay un bar , restaurante donde se come muy bien ,
host_about:
Después de vivir la juventud  en Barcelona  cambiamos nuestros trabajos e iniciamos otra vida en mitad el campo y rodeados de animales . 
De una ruina que compramos hemos conseguido un paraíso , los arboles y la Naturaleza es agradecida y nos encantara compartir este increíble entorno con aquellos que quieran conocer esta zona .

name: H1 Habitación deluxe doble / Mas Ferran
description:
Masferran is a project of its owner, Ferran, who, once the house restoration was completed decided to open it to the public and share this privileged space in l'Empordà to enjoy an intimate and relaxed stay.
The style was respected adapting it to the current comforts.
We recommend gastronomic routes, outdoor activities and cultural visits.
There is a wide selection of restaurants in the area and a very complete supermarket 3 minutes walk away.

The space
H1
Exclusive and spacious 70 m² room divided into two levels. It has a lower floor with hall and bathroom with large shower; first floor with separate living area from the rest, desk, direct access to private terrace and solarium overlooking the garden. Bedroom with King size bed. Sofa. TV. Heating. Fan.
Unique decoration in light tones, combination of antique furniture with modern elements and natural materials.
100% cotton bed and bath linen.
Quality amenities and hair dryer.
neighborhood_overview: Pals is at the epicenter of the Golden Triangle of Baix Empordà. It's a beautiful area, with marvelous beaches and quite central; perfect for visiting medieval villages and enjoying outdoor, cultural or gastronomic routes.
host_about:
Masferran es un proyecto de su propietario, Ferran, que compró con mucha ilusión esta casa de pueblo. Una vez finalizada la restauración decidió abrirla al público y compartir este espacio privilegiado en l’Empordà.
La restauración se hizo respetando el estilo pero adaptado a las comodidades actuales creando un espacio único para disfrutar de una estancia íntima y relajada.
Trabajamos fuera de casa pero estamos siempre disponibles para asesorar, orientar y hacer recomendaciones sobre la zona a nuestros huéspedes, aunque dejándoles espacio y privacidad para que se sientan cómodos en casa.
Ofrecemos aconsejar rutas gastronómicas, actividades al aire libre y visitas culturales. El espacio está abierto a mostrar arte local y informar de marcados y anticuarios.
Nuestras habitaciones tienen baño privado con ducha, artículos de baño y secador; cama King size, TV, adaptadores usb, altavoces bluetooth, aire acondicionado, ventilador. 
El resto de estancias, como cocina, sala de estar, comedor, jardín, son compartidas con el resto de huéspedes.
Servicio diario de habitaciones.
Ofrecemos wifi gratuita en toda la casa.

name: H4 Habitación doble / Mas Ferran
description:
Masferran is a project of its owner, Ferran, who, once the haouse restoration was completed decided to open it to the public and share this privileged space in l'Empordà to enjoy an intimate and relaxed stay.
The style was respected adapting it to the current comforts.
We recommend gastronomic routes, outdoor activities and cultural visits.
There is a wide selection of restaurants in the area and a very complete supermarket 3 minutes walk away.

The space
H4
Intimate 30 m² room. Silent and relaxing, it is located in the garden. Singularly decorated, it has a King size bed, armchair, TV, air conditioning, heating, integrated bathroom with shower. Beautiful combination of natural materials and sense of spaciousness.
100% cotton bed and bath linen.
Quality amenities and hair dryer.
The rest of the rooms, such as kitchen, living room, dining room, garden, are shared with the rest of the guests.
Masferran has various silent space
neighborhood_overview: Pals is at the epicenter of the Golden Triangle of Baix Empordà. It's a beautiful area, with marvelous beaches and quite central; perfect for visiting medieval villages and enjoying outdoor, cultural or gastronomic routes.
host_about:
Masferran es un proyecto de su propietario, Ferran, que compró con mucha ilusión esta casa de pueblo. Una vez finalizada la restauración decidió abrirla al público y compartir este espacio privilegiado en l’Empordà.
La restauración se hizo respetando el estilo pero adaptado a las comodidades actuales creando un espacio único para disfrutar de una estancia íntima y relajada.
Trabajamos fuera de casa pero estamos siempre disponibles para asesorar, orientar y hacer recomendaciones sobre la zona a nuestros huéspedes, aunque dejándoles espacio y privacidad para que se sientan cómodos en casa.
Ofrecemos aconsejar rutas gastronómicas, actividades al aire libre y visitas culturales. El espacio está abierto a mostrar arte local y informar de marcados y anticuarios.
Nuestras habitaciones tienen baño privado con ducha, artículos de baño y secador; cama King size, TV, adaptadores usb, altavoces bluetooth, aire acondicionado, ventilador. 
El resto de estancias, como cocina, sala de estar, comedor, jardín, son compartidas con el resto de huéspedes.
Servicio diario de habitaciones.
Ofrecemos wifi gratuita en toda la casa.

name: Loft con encanto cerca de Girona "Immaguesthouse"
description:
Ven a disfrutar de este pequeño apartamento privado de 40 m2, relájate con la chimenea de leña y desconecta. Ideal para parejas.Tienes barbacoa , aire acondicionado para el verano y piscina compartida. Hay wifi en toda la casa y podrás aparcar el coche delante de casa sin ningún problema.El apartamento se encuentra en la planta baja de mi casa en una zona residencial muy tranquila y bien comunicada, a 15" en coche de Girona a 10" de Besalú y 5" de Banyolas.
Nº Registro HUTG-020565

The space
Este acogedor apartamento te permitirá sentirte como en casa consta de una amplia cocina-comedor, salón con un sofa y dos butacas, chimenea de leña, aire acondicionado, calefacción cama doble de 1,80x2, dos armarios, lavabo y ducha.
Solo tendrás que llevar el equipaje.
Hay todo los utensilios necesarios de cocina: tostadora, exprimidor, batidora, picadora, cafetera, microondas... también encontraréis aliños, especies y café .
En el baño dispon
neighborhood_overview:
Lo que mas me gusta de donde vivo es que estoy lo bastante lejos del ajetreo y tráfico de la ciudad, pero muy cerca de todo. Todos los servicios (supermercados, farmacias, tiendas, restaurantes, bares,etc...) los tienes a 5 minutos en coche.
Es una zona residencial muy tranquila. Con una plaza delante de casa y sin problemas para aparcar.
Hay un Hostal que tiene servicio de bar y restaurante a 1 minuto a pie de casa.
Para hacer las compras puedes ir a Cornella del Terri que hay un pequeño supermercado, carnicería, verdulería, panadería, farmácia y dos bancos "La CAIXA" y Banco Popular se encuentra a unos 800m de casa (mejor en coche). La otra opción es ir a comprar en Banyoles, esta a 3km, 5minutos en coche. Donde encontraras todos los supermercados en el mismo lugar ( Mercadona, Aldi, Dia, Lidl, Bon Preu,etc ....)
En 10 minutos estas en el lago de Banyoles donde podrás relajarte, pasear y respirar tranquilamente.
A 15 minutos estas en el centro de Girona,
host_about:
Tengo 44 años, dos hijas estupendas y  dos gatos .
Soy positiva y alegre. Me gusta hacer deporte y todo lo relacionado con la salud.
Intercambiar experiencias con otras personas me encanta.
Cada día es una oportunidad y cada oportunidad una experiencia.

description:

The space
Apartament en primera planta que disposa de 3 habitacions i un bany. Disposa de pàrquing a 50 metres. Ideal per a famílies. Ben situat en la fantàstica localitat de Sant Feliu de Guíxols, a la Costa Brava. Cèntric. La cuina està ben equipada. Rentadora. A 3 min. del passeig del mar i a 3 min. de la preciosa platja de Sant Pol i S'Agaró, amb cotxe.

Mercat el diumenges molt concorregut, amples platges amb molts serveis. Port esportiu amb possibilitat de lloguer d'embarcacions d'oci o rutes marítimes per la Costa Brava fins a Tossa de Mar.

Apartament molt a prop de S'Agaró, Platja d'Aro (zona d'oci nocturn, shopping, bowling, multicines...) i Palamós.

name: Enginy Apartament 3-5 personas
description:
El apartamento se encuentra en el centro de Figueres, a menos de 500 metros del famoso Museo Dalí. Este apartamento está bien equipado y dispone de TV vía satélite y conexión a internet gratuita con cable y wifi.

The space
El apartamento dispone en su interior de dos plantas que se comunican por una escalera. La planta baja esta formada por una cocina completa con nevera, microondas y lavadora y una zona de estar independente con sofás cama y un baño completo con toallas y secador de pelo. En la parte superior hay otra habitación con un baño tambien completo.

Other things to note
Cualquier información turística sobre la zona se da.

name: Relax and feel Girona
description:
Estudio totalmente reformado, en pleno casco antiguo de Girona, entre el rio y la catedral a 5 minutos de todos los puntos de interes de la ciudad. Un espacio donde relajarse, sentir y descansar.

The space
Distribuido en dos espacios, tu decides si abrirlos o cerrarlos. Divididos por dos puertas correderas, mi consejo... no las cierres! Salón y cocina totalmente equipados, habitación con cama doble y escritorio con material de papelería por si te inspiras., baño y dos balcones al casco antiguo. El apartmento es soleado, con mucha luz y porticones con vidrios dobles. Dispone de calefacción, wifi, sábanas y toallas, Cafetera Dolche Gusto, café, lavadora, secador de pelo, plancha y productos mínimos necesarios para que la estancia no sea interrumpida.

Other things to note
Disponemos de parquing privado muy cerca del apartamento. Preguntanos si quieres que tu coche no duerma en la calle y descanse como tu. ( precio a parte )

Licen
neighborhood_overview: Una vez llegues, Laura, la anfitriona, te aconsejará sobre los mejores lugares donde ir según tus intenciones. Locales de copas, restaurantes, heladerias, creperias, parques, rincones tranquilos, los mejores lugares para ver las puestas de sol, rutas de montaña o playa, y algunas excursiones cerca de la ciudad.
host_about:
Hola! soy Jorge, Diseñador y Acrobata aéreo de profesión, dedico mi tiempo al arte, dirijo Onair, la primera escuela de danza aerea de España afincada en Barcelona. Me apasionan los colores, este año sobretodo el amarillo, soy detallista, impulsivo, obserbador, gran anfitrion y amigo de mi gente. Vivo con Julieta mi querida perra en Barcelona y nuestro estudio en Girona en pleno casco antiguo es nuestro refugio para el descanso, el paseo y el lugar donde nos inspiran historias nuevas.
Hemos decidido compartir con todos vosotros nuestro espacio para que podais disfrutar y sentir lo magnifico que es pasar unos dias en esta ciudad, rodeada de historia, entre las grandes montañas y las mejores playas. Si algo tiene Girona, es que enamora. 

Si quieres conocer más sobre mi y mi trabajo puedes entrar en este enlace, (Website hidden by Airbnb) , no hay mayor reflejo sobre mi que mi propio trabajo.

name: Beautiful mediterranean villa
description:
Do you want to wake up with a breathtaking view of the sea, while enjoying a peaceful environment on the heights of Platja d'Aro?

This 4 bedroom villa is for you!

The house has a pool, a fully furnished kitchen, a large living room, and the possibility to park 2 cars.

The space
While being very close to various beaches, restaurants/bars or shops (10mins) this mediterranean villa still allows to enjoy tranquility with a large terrasse with a stunning sea view.

The house has 4 bedrooms, with the possibility to add an additional baby bed, 2 separate bathrooms and 1 additional toilet. The kitchen is fully furnished and has all the basics (oil, pepper,...). Furthermore, the terrasse has a barbecue next to the pool, ideal for summer evenings.

Moreover, the pool is located toward the sea, which is ideal for a morning swim before breakfast.

Guest access
The villa is easily accessible by car and is located
neighborhood_overview:
Platja d'Aro is an animated town in the heart of the Costa Brava, which is known for its beaches but also for its gastronomy and its wine. The city hosts many festivals during the summer such as the free "Nits the Jazz", which hosts jazz concerts once a week during the whole summer.

There is a lot of restaurants, bars, nightclubs as well as outdoors activities, such as minigolfs,acquatic activities, horse riding and many walking or cycling routes in the area.

Moreover, the well-know Golf d'Aro is minutes away from the house, on the same hill.

A small food store is a five-minute drive away, on the hill, in the Hapimag complex.

The house is approximately 1 hour away from Barcelona, 30min from Girona. There is also numerous traditional villages in the area.

name: Rectoría de Castellar
description:
Casa de 3 dormitorios, 2 baños, parking y WIFI gratis con vistas a la montaña, situada en el espacio protegido PEIN de L'Alta Garrotxa muy cerca del Parque Nacional de la zona Volcánica.

The space
Su casa de vacaciones es una parte de la recién restaurada Rectoría de Castellar; esta antigua edificación está unida a la Iglesia Románica de Santa Maria de Castellar que data del siglo XI.
La superficie total de la casa es de: 106 m2
La dotación de su casa de vacaciones incluye:
Calefacción central - Fuego de leña -Televisión por satélite - DVD - Lavadora.
Cocina completa:
Fogones y horno de gas - Extractor - Frigorífico - Lava platos - Todos los utensilios.
Las habitaciones y los baños:
disponen de toda la ropa de cama - Sábanas - Mantas - Edredones - Toallas.

A 6 km del pueblo Sant Joan les Fonts (Girona) encontramos Castellar de la Muntanya en un valle que forma parte del espacio protegido de la Alta Garrotxa. Castella
neighborhood_overview: A 6 km del pueblo Sant Joan les Fonts (Girona) encontramos Castellar de la Muntanya en un valle que forma parte del espacio protegido de la Alta Garrotxa. Castellar está situado a una altura de 650 metros sobre el nivel del mar, desde donde podemos disfrutar de vistas al Canigo, esta montaña es la mas alta de los pirineos orientales y durante gran parte del año su cima está cubierta de nieve. Mirando hacia el oeste tenemos una vista panorámica de las montañas de la Alta Garrotxa y a lo lejos, el mar. El paisaje es una policromía en la que predomina el verde, salpicando montañas, prados, bosques, barrancos y torrentes.

name: Can Font Olives - Turisme rural
description:
Acogedora masía ampurdanesa, muy bien restaurada y equipada. Está situada a muy poca distancia de Banyoles, Girona y de las playas de la Costa Brava, por lo que permite hacer visitas culturales, rutas gastronómicas y numerosas actividades al aire libre.

Masía del siglo XVIII rodeada de jardín con piscina, bosques y campos de cultivo. La casa cuenta con cuatro habitaciones, todas con baño privado, y las estancias, que conservan los bonitos techos abovedados, están decoradas con un estilo rústico y elegante. La cocina abierta con el comedor y también la sala de estar cuentan con chimenea.

Cottage form the seventeenth century restored in 2015. The house is in a quiet area surrounded by nature.
It has 4 bedrooms with private bathrooms, kitchen, living room and large garden with pool.

Inside the house you will find: fully equipped kitchen, dining room, lounge (with TV, DVD and games) and common toilet on the ground floor.
In the first floor there a
neighborhood_overview: Can Font Olives está ubicada en el pequeño núcleo urbano de Olives, a ocho kilómetros de Vilademuls, en pleno Empordà. Su situación permite llegar rápidamente a Banyoles, en cuyo lago se puede hacer senderismo, ciclismo, remo y natación, y a Girona, donde se puede visitar su bonito centro histórico. También tiene fácil acceso a las playas de la Costa Brava, donde se pueden practicar deportes acuáticos y disfrutar de su gastronomía y de los excelentes vinos DO Empordà.

The house smells holidays, nature, calm and comfort :)
