name: CENTRIC APARTMENT NEAR BEACH TOSSA
description:
Beautiful and centric apartment, very close to the beach, at a very quiet zone.
Perfectly located, just 2 minutes walking to the beach and really close to shops, supermakets, restaurants and more.

The space
The apartment has wifi included in the price. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, dinning room, big kitchen and a terrace where you can see a little part of the sea.
Fully equipped with all the necessary amenities: dishwasher, terrace furniture, comfortable matresses and more. This will make your stay really comfortable.
Wonderful awning at the terrace, with microperforated material, will give you protection from the sun, but won’t bother the views.
AC in the entire apartment.
There is room for 8 people, with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with 1 double bed.
-Bedroom with 1 double bed.
-Bedroom with 2 single beds.
-Double sofabed in the living room.
We have cribs and high chairs. Please request it in advance
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very well located, in a very centric zone and at the same time very quiet.
Less than 2 minutes walking you have the beach, restaurants, supermarkets and much more.
Two minutes away you have the commercial area, where is really hard not to stop and check all the beautiful shops

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the comercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: A lovely double room in designer flat
description:
Habitació doble en un pis amb encant i personalitat. Enorme terrassa de 70 m2 i petita de 18m2 on podràs esmorzar o pendre una copa relaxant al vespre. Això sí, recorda que per arribar a aquest oasi has de pujar a peu, no tenim ascenssor.

The space
La nostra terrassa és única a la zona. Gaudeix d'una intimitat total. És ideal per a relaxar-se després d'un dia d'activitat, llegir, perdre una copa i fins i tot gaudir d'una barbacoa. També és un bon lloc per a començar el dia, amb un bon esmorzar!
Això sí penseu que no hi ha ascensor.

Guest access
Pots demanar-nos l'esmorzar bio, per un petit increment,si ho prefereixes perquè seguim aquest estil de vida, si no igualment et cuidarem!
El bany està separat del servei, la qual cosa resulta molt pràctic.
Si vens amb bicis i ens avises la podràs guardar en edifici proper, ja que el nostre és un edifici antic i no disposa de parquing.

Other things to note
En ca

name: T3 spécial famille avec bébé/ 100m plage/vue mer.
description:
Appartement cosy pour 4 pers + 1 bébé., (à Roses Canyelles), équipé selon une compétence en puériculture pour accueillir nourrisson et petite enfance....

Rénové, avec terrasse à 3 min à pied de la plage, dominant la crique de «Petites Canyelles, sur la Costa Brava, classée parmi les plus belles baies de la Costa Brava.....

Photos panoramiques sur mer (prises de la terrasse.)
Réservation du dimanche au dimanche. ( hutg 019654 24).
ou 2è possibilité de réservation: vacances avec bébé.com.

The space
Le logement de 45 m2 avec terrasse de 9 m 2 se situe au 2 ème étage d'un immeuble à 100 m de la plage. Vous profiterez d'une vue imprenable sur la mer (180° panorama) de la petite terrasse, sur laquelle vous partagez vos repas....( hutg 019654 24).
Intérieur : Séjour très lumineux, (décoration soignée) climatisation, chauffage, télévision, lecteur DVD, écran plat, bibliothèque
* Cuisine : lave-vaisselle, réfrigérateur, congél
neighborhood_overview: La plage de Canyelles est une plage de sable fin avec des eaux cristallines, des criques et des falaises abruptes . Canyelles petites,est située à 3 Km  de Roses. Ses habitations  blanches perchées dans les collines du parc naturel,  séduisent..  On apprécie  cet appartement douillet et contemporain, entièrement rénové avec vue imprenable sur la mer, (180° panorama)..Photos du logement et vues  prises de l'appartement. Le lieu est facilement accessible, et situé à 44 kms de la frontière française.

Direct access to a small beach. Calm, 60 m2. Can accommodate up to 5 guests. Nicely decorated and totally renovated. Air conditioning in every room. All amenities: Wi-Fi, washer, dish washer, micro wave, fridge, TV. Located on completely fenced large estate with private parking.

The space
This cute and cozy cottage is ideally located a few steps from the beach and has beautiful views of the Mediterranean sea. It can accommodate up to 5 persons and was recently totally renovated. It has all amenities: wi-fi, TV, NETFLIX, washing machine, dish washer, air conditioning, large terrace, barbecue. There is one bedroom on a mezzanine with a large bed. The 2nd bedroom comes with a bunk bed and a single bed. There is a direct access to the beach and to a coastal walking trail tha

host_about: Married, early 50s, love gardening, cooking,  and working out.  I also enjoy working with dog rescue groups.  I have very different taste in music, tend to enjoy reading thrillers and watch action movies. I love traveling and discovering different culture.  Having guests is a great way to meet new people.

description:
Preciosa masía típica con jardín y piscina privada (3x5m). Muy tranquilo, en medio de la naturaleza, ideal para familias con niños, a solo 7 min. en coche hasta la playa. Gran terraza con mesa para 8 personas, plaza de parking privada para 2 coches.

The space
La casa está decorada con mucho estilo y completamente equipada: mesa grande en el comedor para 8 personas, internet wifi, televisión (canales españoles y extranjeros), lavadora y secadora, equipo de música, chimenea. Sábanas, toallas para el baño y toallas para la playa disponibles.

Jardín privado muy bonito con barbacoa, mesa grande para 8 personas, parasol, riego automático, piscina pequeña (3x5m) de sal.

Platja d'Aro a 10 min. en coche. Muchas ofertas de actividades: golf, minigolf, agua park (Agua Diver), tenis, hípica, rutas para caminar y ir en bici (Ruta del Carilet), barco, etc.

name: Chambre privée et petit déjeuner pour 2 personnes
description:
Réservez une chambre indépendante du reste de la maison avec sa propre sale de bain privée et sa propre entrée depuis le jardin.
Vous pourrez profiter du jardin, de la cuisine (jusqu'à 21:00). Aussi, des vélos sont mis gratuitement à votre disposition, et vous pouvez profiter de la piscine. Le petit déjeuner est également inclus dans le prix.

The space
Ce n'est pas un logement luxueux ... Il séduira les voyageurs ainsi que tout ceux qui aiment la quiétude et les rencontres. C'est une chambre simple, propre, commode. Parfaite pour dormir et se reposer.

Guest access
Les voyageurs pourront profiter de toute la maison, ainsi que de son jardin, de ses chaises longues, de sa piscine et des vélos qui sont fournis.
C'est la meilleure adresse pour un séjour calme et agréable.

Other things to note
Située à l'entrée d'Empuriabrava, l'accès y est facile et très simple à trouver.
neighborhood_overview: C'est un quartier très calme ou s'y trouve le golf d'Empuriabrava. (Pitch and Put). Un supermarché s'y trouve également.
host_about: J'aime tout et tout le monde... Je suis français mais je vis en Espagne depuis 2012. J'adore ce pays et ses habitants. Je parle français et espagnol. J'essaie d'apprendre l'anglais... :-/ Je suis jovial, sportif et heureux. Je vis très simplement et j'adore ça.

name: LOFT Can Barraca en Figueres Centro
description:
Situat al centre de la ciutat de Figueres, l’apatament CAN BARRACA LOFT és una antiga impremta avui rehabilitada com a loft amb capacitat per a 8 persones.

The space
Apartamento estilo loft situado en el centro de Figueres, a 500m de la Rambla y el Museo Dalí. Se encuentra muy cerca de las bonitas playas de la Costa Brava (16Km). Dispone de TV, WIFI, toallas, y todos los utensilios básicos de cocina y baño.

Ubicado en una antigua imprenta, el local ha sido recientemente reformado para convertirse en un alojamiento muy práctico y cómodo en el centro de Figueres. La decoración, provista tanto de mobiliario nuevo como de muebles antiguos restaurados, crea una mezcla que garantiza una estancia especial y con encanto.

El apartamento, de 85m2, ofrece un gran espacio común comedor-sala de estar, cocina y baño nuevos y completamente equipados, y dos habitaciones: una de matrimonio con cama doble (para 2pax), y otra con 2 literas (para 4pax). Dispon

name: Casa-masia Camallera (Alt Empordà)
description:
Casa de 285 m2 con jardín de 1.000 m2. Dispone de piscina, porche, 4 habitaciones (3 suites), 4 baños y un aseo. Camallera dispone de todos los servicios (supermercado, tiendas, estación de tren, etc.) A 15 km de las playas de l'Escala y Empúries, pitch & putt, restaurantes.

The space
La casa dispone de 5 habitaciones (pero una la reservamos para guardar nuestras cosas personales) 2 son suite, 3 baños y un aseo de cortesia. Cocina-comedor equipada, 3 salas de estar ( 1 con television). Porche ideal para comer y cenar. Jardin con piscina tipo alberca.
Nuestros huéspedes tendrán tranquilidad y descanso. Cuando cae la tarde, no hay nada mejor que sentarse en una hamaca del jardín y disfrutar de la puesta de sol y prepararse para una cena bajo la pérgola. Como nos gusta mucho cocinar integramos la cocina y el comedor en la misma estancia y con salida al jardín. Saliendo de casa ya tenéis el campo donde podréis pasear, ir en bici, coger moras....

G
neighborhood_overview:
A 15 min. disponéis de fantásticas playas (Sant Martí d'empuries, l'Escala) y ruinas griegas. Si os gusta el golf tienes un pitch & putt a 15 min. y diversos campos de golf a menos de media hora. Si os queréis iniciar en los caballos también hay una hípica a 5 min, y si os atrevéis con el esquí acuático cerca del pueblo también hay en un lago interior.
La zona dispone de buenos restaurantes de precio asequible, caminos para senderísmo y bicicleta.
En Figueres se puede disfrutar del museo Dalí y en Girona todo el barrio antiguo, la Juderia, la zona del río es una gozada para descubrir y pasear.
host_about: Nos encanta la vida familiar, los amigos, el deporte, la cocina, viajar y conocer gente.

neighborhood_overview: Céntrica y tranquilo
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: La Posada
description:
Ihre Urlaubstage fernab vom Massentourismus müssen kein Traum bleiben. Die Landschaft verzaubert durch tradidioneller Architektur und ständig wandelbarer Atmosphäre von Landschaft zu Licht. In unserem individuellen Ferienhaus genießen Sie alle Vorzüge des Dorfes und die Ruhe abseits der Städte. Touristische "Magnete" wie Gerona, Cadaques, Barcelona und viele andere Orte bleiben in schnell ereichbaren Nähe.
Mit Auto sind Sie in 5 Min am großen Strand und flaniermeile verschiedener Dörfer.

The space
Regenerieren Sie sich bei uns , um den Alltag danach relaxter entgegentreten zu können. Und - so wie es Ihnen gefällt - Grillen Sie draußen alle regionale Produkte. Die wunderbar große Terrase mit Ausblick auf die herrliche Natur bringt Erholung vom Alltag, Entspannung und Gelassenheit. Geneßen Sie Ihren Urlaub so richtig.
Auch für Biker ist es ein idealer Standpunkt für Touren bis hin zu den Pyrenäen.

Guest access
Das Ferienhaus st

- HIGHLIGHT A
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very well located, right next to the beach, supermarket, restaurants.
In less than 3 minutes walk find, most central area with all kinds of shops, banks.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the commercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours, visit all the little and hidden beaches around, and so many other things we can recommend, according to your needs.
For yo
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

Apartamento de 75 m2, en primer piso, con mobiliario y decoración agradable y confortable: salón-comedor 26 m2, con TV y equipo de música; Wifi, terraza de 9 m2, 1 dormitorio de matrimonio y otro doble con tres camas; cocina equipada.

description:
We rent an apartment situated in Sant Feliu de Guixols (Girona), on the center of the Costa Brava for the summer season (June, July, August and September). It is an apartment of 60 m2, divided into living room, kitchen, two bedrooms ( one of them with double bed and the other with two single beds), bathroom and a terrace, recently renovated.

The space
It is an ideal place for a family with four components who want to spend some days in a relaxed and sunny environment.
It is very near to the town of Platja d´Aro, renowned as comercial and familiar town, and it has direct sea views above the harbor of Sant Feliu.
Its central position in the harbor make easy to access the beaches of Sant Feliu and also the town hall and the town marketplace.

name: CAN DOU alojamiento rural nº PG-799
description:
CAN DOU Se encuentra en un privilegiado emplazamiento en la Garrotxa, Girona, junto al núcleo urbano de Les Planes d’Hostoles. Un espacio adecuado para disfrutar de los volcanes, la Via Verda del Carrilet y multitud de cascadas y pozas de cristalina agua.
Es un conjunto de dos casas rurales independientes: La Masía, que data del s. XVIII, y el Antiguo Establo.
Piscina para uso exclusivo de las personas alojadas en la Masia.

The space
La masía está dispuesta en dos plantas. En la planta baja se encuentra el comedor-cocina, la sala de estar con chimenea, un baño, un dormitorio de matrimonio y un segundo dormitorio.
En la planta piso se encuentra otro baño y una gran sala que da acceso a dos dormitorios de matrimonio y a un tercer dormitorio.
La cocina esta totalmente equipada con nevera, placa de inducción, microondas, lavavajillas, etc… la casa también dispone durante el verano de internet via wifi.

Guest access
Gran ja
neighborhood_overview:
CAN DOU está situado en la localidad de Les Planes d’Hostoles, en la provincia de Girona. Se encuentra entre el Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa y el Espacio de Interés Natural de Collsacabra.
La comarca de La Garrotxa cuenta con multitud de núcleos urbanos interesantes para visitar: Sant Feliu de Pallarols, Olot, Santa Pau, Besalú,…
Además nos encontramos a 1,25 hrs. (115 km.) de Barcelona. 55 min (65 km.) de la Costa Brava, 1,11 hrs. (68 km) de Francia y a 34 km. del Aeropuerto de Girona|Costa Brava.
host_about:
Hola, mi nombre es Ramon. Quiero invitaros a que  disfrutéis de esta fantástica tierra que es la Garrotxa, seguro que os encantara. Por nuestra parte pondremos todo nuestro empeño en que así sea. 
Recibid un fuerte abrazo garrotxi... :-)
neighbourhood: Les Planes d'Hostoles (La Garrotxa), Catalunya, Spain

name: Apartamento Can Vespa en el Barri Vell de Girona
description:
Apartamento céntrico y tranquilo en pleno Barri Vell. Ubicado en antiguas dependencias de un convento, con anchos muros de piedra originales así como una antigua carbonera. Espacioso, más de 130 m2 útiles y bonita terraza.
A pocos metros de las mejores cafeterias y restaurantes del Barri Vell sin perder un apice de tranquilidad.
HUTG -011193

The space
Situado en las Escales de la Llebre, el apartamento dispone de una estancia diafana con volta catalana y con sala de estar con un sofa-cama doble, una zona de comedor y la cocina abierta y equipada. Un distribuidor con acceso a la zona de noche, con amplio cuarto de bano, habitacion principal con 3 camas individuales disponibles y una habitacion doble con 2 camas.
Acceso a patio de luces con antigua carbonera, con la Vespa del abuelo de los anos 50.
Amplia terraza privada con acceso des de la cocina y desde el salon, con un antiguo palomar y amplia zona de relax.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
El Barri Vell alberga el Barrio Judío mejor conservado de Europa.
El barrio ha ido transformándose los últimos 30 años hasta convertirse en un barrio monumental, lleno de vida y actividades de todo tipo, con los mejores locales de restauración de la ciudad.

neighborhood_overview:
The Old Town of Girona is considered the historical center of the city, bounded by the medieval city wall, part of which was demolished in the nineteenth century, and is where we find the most important historic and cultural attractions of the city.
The houses on the river Onyar are a sight which must be enjoyed from one of the bridges crossing the river, and we approach the Jewish quarter from the Rambla. In the promenade bustle of visitors and locals, strolling, shopping, resting live.
Once entered in the Jewish Quarter, one of the best preserved in Spain, we can enjoy the historic legacy of the city, letting lose through the narrow streets and right steps, discovering corners, gardens, monuments and churches, between steps. The Cathedral, the church of Sant Feliu, the Arab Baths, Sant Pere de Galligants.
host_about:
Hola!!

Soy Anna, una gironina enamorada de su pequeña ciudad.

Vivo en Girona y trabajo en una tienda de antigüedades situada a los pies de nuestra magnifica catedral. Gracias a mi trabajo puedo pasear a diario por estas calles que esconden tantas historias apasionantes.

Soy una amante del arte y de la decoración.

Espero os guste el apartamento que ofrezco que he decorado con tanto cariño.

Os espero pronto!

Hello,

I am Anna and I am in love with my marvelous city.

I live in Girona and I work in an antic shop situated just in front of the Cathedral. 
Thanks to my job I can walk everyday through the streets that hide so many exciting stories.

I am an art lover and I love decorating.

I do hope you like the apartment which I have decorate with so much love

I see you soon!

name: CAN DOU el Antiguo Establo nº PG-000961
description:
CAN DOU Se encuentra en un privilegiado emplazamiento en la Garrotxa, Girona, junto al núcleo urbano de Les Planes d’Hostoles. Un espacio adecuado para disfrutar de los volcanes, la Via Verda del Carrilet y multitud de cascadas y pozas de cristalina agua.
Es un conjunto de dos casas rurales independientes: La Masía, que data del s. XVIII, y el Antiguo Establo. Cada alojamiento cuenta con su propia piscina.

The space
En Can Dou el edificio del antiguo establo, se ha reconvertido en un espacio singular. La vida se desarrolla alrededor de la pérgola situada bajo un nogal y un abeto, desde donde tenemos una fantástica vista de la Vall d’Hostoles.
El antiguo establo tiene capacidad para 2 personas, ideal para parejas o familias con niños pequeños, al tener en el espacio común una cama de matrimonio y un sofá cama, ademas de los espacios de la cocina y el baño.
Se encuentra totalmente equipado con placa de vitrocerámica, microondas, nevera con congela
neighborhood_overview:
CAN DOU está situado en la localidad de Les Planes d’Hostoles, en la provincia de Girona. Se encuentra entre el Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa y el Espacio de Interés Natural de Collsacabra.
La comarca de La Garrotxa cuenta con multitud de núcleos urbanos interesantes para visitar: Sant Feliu de Pallarols, Olot, Santa Pau, Besalú,…
Además nos encontramos a 1,25 hrs. (115 km.) de Barcelona. 55 min (65 km.) de la Costa Brava, 1,11 hrs. (68 km) de Francia y a 34 km. del Aeropuerto de Girona|Costa Brava.
host_about:
Hola, mi nombre es Ramon. Quiero invitaros a que  disfrutéis de esta fantástica tierra que es la Garrotxa, seguro que os encantara. Por nuestra parte pondremos todo nuestro empeño en que así sea. 
Recibid un fuerte abrazo garrotxi... :-)

name: Casa Tarongers
description:
This family home is on a quiet one way street in Calella, but only a less than 10-minute walk to the town & beach . Set in a private garden with pool and barbecue terrace it has four bedrooms, one double with en suite bathroom on the ground floor and ,on the first floor a double bedroom with it's own balcony

The space
The house has 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, including a bathtub. The double en-suite bedroom downstairs is ideal for people that prefer navigating one a single floor.
The other 3 bedrooms are upstairs with the second bathroom, and and access to a balcony and a roof terrace with sea views.
Guest can park in the garage or out on the street, there's never any issue to park.
The pool is 4x8m, a decent size do play or do laps.
The garden is divided between a lounge area, a dinning area and a barbecue area. It has green grass, perfect for children to play outside.

The house doesn't have A/C but doesn't get hot in the summer

name: Casa familiar en l’Escala (Costa Brava)
description:
Casa con 4 habitaciones dobles, 2 cuartos de baño, cocina y comedor muy amplios con vistas al jardín y piscina. A 5 minutos andando de la playa.

The space
IMPORTANTE: En respuesta al COVID-19 se han reforzado las medidas de limpieza y desinfección en este alojamiento para garantizar la seguridad de nuestros huéspedes.

Esta amplia casa con jardín para 8 personas se alquila en l’Escala, Costa Brava. Se encuentra solo a 5 minutos caminando de la playa, y tan solo a 2 km del centro histórico de l’Escala.

SE ADMITEN MASCOTAS, siempre y cuando respeten el mobiliario de la casa.

El alojamiento está distribuido en 2 plantas:
- En la planta baja hay un párking privado con capacidad para 2 coches + bicicletas.
- En la planta principal se encuentran las 4 habitaciones, la cocina, el comedor, 2 baños y el lavadero. Esta planta tiene acceso al jardín con una barbacoa de obra y terraza cubierta para comer y relajarse al fresco.

Si deseáis juntaros con la família o con amigos en un entorno rural en mitat del Empordá con toda su belleza, entorno natural, cultural, deportivo y de relajación. Este es vuestro sitio. Ofrecemos una casa de 10 a 14 camas contando con cunas, camas pequeñas y todo preparado para los más peques de la familia. description:
Nuestro apartamento está en un barrio tranquilo, está totalmente equipado, tiene párquing y piscina comunitaria y está a 300 m de la playa de Fenals, una de las más bonitas de la Costa Brava. Está a 15' a pie del centro de Lloret .

The space
Desde nuestro apartamento se pueden hacer excursiones por la costa durante todo el año y visitar además de las playas más grandes y conocidas de Lloret y Fenals, otras playas más pequeñas pero muy bonitas como: Cala Banys, Santa Cristina, Canyelles, Sa Caleta, Sa Boadella i la Platja de Treumal.

Guest access
Los huéspedes pueden disponer de todo lo que hay en el apartamento del párquing, de un cuarto trastero y de la piscina comunitaria.

neighborhood_overview: Located on the peninsula of Cap de Creus, Cadaqués is one of the most emblematic places of the Costa Brava Girona. Its rocky coastline, beautiful beaches and tour coves, is one of the main attractions and the incredible landscape that holds the Natural Park of Cap de Creus. At the bottom of the bay of Cadaques is its historic, Mediterranean air and deep sea flavor. Source of inspiration for painters and artists of international fame for decades, this kernel today enjoys an intense cultural life, attesting its many museums and art galleries, most notably the Casa-Museo Salvador Dalí. Cadaqués is the ideal starting point for the rest of the Alt Empordà, full of historical places, surprising natural areas and abundant archaeological sites

neighborhood_overview:
Palamos is on the Costa Brava, on the coast of the province of Girona. A gifted town of excellent beaches and leisure opportunities. The rugged coastal relief provides both wide beaches and coves with clear water between the rocks. The cuisine, another way to discover the Catalan culture, offers excellent seafood.
Palamos is a former fishing village that now has significant tourism and leisure endowments. The beaches, coves, sailing facilities and fishing port are the main attractions of this town, but we must not forget the medieval streets of the old town. From the nearby Gavarres be seen throughout the coastal profile and is an exceptional site for hiking or any sport in touch with nature.
Beaches and coves
as the Gran Playa, Fosca beach or Castell beach. Meanwhile, those who prefer the tranquility and the clear water coves with rocky bottoms, ideal for diving, will enjoy Cala Margarida, Cala S'Alguer or Cala Canyers.

name: Apartament Can Closes (reformat 2020)
description:
L'apartament Can Closes disposa de quatre habitacions, dos banys, cuina, menjador i dues petites sales d'estar a les quals una hi ha un sofà llit (extra).
L'accés a l'apartament està a l'exterior, situat dintre el recinte ballat de la casa.

Disposareu de tovalloles per a cada hoste, wifi, smartTv, calefacció, utensilis bàsics de cuina, cafetera, balco a dues habitacions i a la cuina, banyera, dutxa, llençols, nòrdics...

The space
Ens trobem en un lloc idíl·lic situats en una masia catalana del S.XVI, CAN CLOSES, coneguda per la seva passada activitat en el món de la restauració. La masia està envoltada de vegetació en una petita urbanització a uns 300 m d'altitud.

La casa comparteix diferents espais amb un altre apartament turístic, una societat gastronòmica i la vivenda dels propietaris. Tot i això l'apartament és independent amb entrada pròpia.

La Masia és un lloc divers inclusiu i amb molta cultura gastronòmica, és per aix
neighborhood_overview: Des de la urbanització podem trobar vàries rutes de senderisme o btt, on podreu gaudir d'unes vistes de tot el Pla de l'estany espectaculars, on en dies clars podem veure des del Pirineu fins a la costa brava.

License number
HUTG-019299
neighborhood_overview: Es una zona muy tranquila.
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

host_about:
Hola! Som la família Xargay. 

En Pere, constructor d’ofici, és un apassionat amb la seva feina. Ha rehabilitat i restaurat la casa pairal incorporant la comoditat i confort dels habitatges actuals però cuidant tots els detalls. És el pare de la família.

La Dolors, treballadora de mena i incansable, prepara la casa per deixar-la a punt i per atendre la vostra arribada. És la mare de la família però també és el pilar de la casa.

La Raquel, química, li encanta estudiar idiomes però també li agrada donar-vos la benvinguda a la casa i explicar-vos totes les activitats que ofereix la zona.

La Sílvia, alegre, treballadora i biòloga de professió. És la germana mitjana de les tres.     

La Sandra és una gran professional en el món de la fisioteràpia i l’estètica. Li encanta transmetre el relax i el benestar. Us cuidarà al màxim perquè desconnecteu de la rutina.

Ens encanta fer-vos sentir com a casa i esperem trobar-nos ben aviat!

name: Villa Sa Riera, beautiful 6 bedroom home, own pool
description:
This amazing villa was completely refurbished to a very high standard for the 2017 season. It has six air conditioned bedrooms, three doubles, two twins and a triple and 5 beautiful bathrooms. The villa has its own swimming pool which is adjacent to a large terrace with great views of the sea and the Islas Medes.

The space
Sleeps 13 (with a maximum of 10 adults) in 3 double (all en suite) 1 triple and 2 twin bed rooms. (one en suite)

All bedrooms air conditioned

Own Pool

All linen, bath and pool towels included

TV/ DVD player

Apple TV

Cots and high chairs for babies included free

Outside lunch table under Beautiful olive tree perfect for long lunches!

Outdoor teppanyaki wood fired hotplate and barbecue

Welcome pack included with essentials (including wine!) for your arrival

Mid week clean included in price

Amazing views

fast interne
neighborhood_overview:
The villa is situated in one of the most beautiful areas of Spain – the Costa Brava. The Costa Brava is a rocky coastline, plentiful in coves, secluded beaches and little fishing villages. The beautiful beach of Sa Riera, right in the heart of this coast and recognised as being one of the jewels of the Costa Brava, is about 15 minutes walk from the villa.

Begur, a well-known medieval town is about 10 minutes walk. from Villa Begur. Begur has cobbled streets, with a large central square surrounded by pavement cafes. There is a great mixture of fine restaurants, tapas bars, and even a fantastic open air pizza restaurant. There are also plenty of late night bars which cater mostly to the style conscious Barcelonians, no English pubs or rave clubs in this town. There are also many stylish independant boutiques which, in the Summer months, are open late into the cool evenings.

This part of the Costa Brava is much more a getaway for Spaniards than it is a mecca for fore
host_about: The Blandfords have owned Villa Begur since 2003 and Villa Sa Riera since 2016. We love the area and spend much of the Summer there if we can.

The space
Casa abierta com diferentes zonas de relax, muy recomendable para todo tipo de viajeros, familias, turistas o simplemente pasar unos días de ocio y relax, en una zona tranquila y silenciosa. situada a 3 minutos a pie del un centro histórico que es la envidia de la comarca.

Guest access

Nosotros y nuestros hijos estamos muy acostumbra
neighborhood_overview:
Situada en una calle muy tranquila de Castelló d'Empúries precioso pueblo medieval en la comarca de l'Alt Empordà, tierra del gran pintor Salvador Dalí y sus tres joyas el "Teatre Museu Dalí", "la Casa de Portlligat" y el "Castell a Púbol" donde poder conocer toda la obra de genial artista. Sus playas de enormes arenales a calas preciosas y escarpadas, su actividad cultural, lúdica y deportiva es constante sobre todo en verano.
Famoso su parque natural "Aiguamolls del Empordà" naturaleza pura.
host_about: Somos una familia de 4 miembros que nos gusta la vida tranquila i familiar.

name: Holiday apartment 150m from beach
description:
Apartment situated 150m to the golden sand beach of SA RIERA with waterfront restaurants and shops. 50m to Supermarket and restaurants,
2km to the charming historic town of BEGUR with its outstanding choice of restaurants, bars, cafes and shops.

The space
The apartment is spacious, bright and airy and has a large terrace at the front, as well as a communal courtyard at the back of the building.
It is ideal for 2 couples or a couple with 2 well behaved kids.

Guest access
It is located on the first floor of the building, so there are a few steps to access the apartment. This means it can be suitable for a elderly person that can walk up a few steps. The apartment itself is all on one level.

Other things to note
The apartment doesn't come with parking. There are parking spaces all around but they tend to get busy during the summer. 150m from the house there is a car park that costs 2€ per day and always has sp
neighborhood_overview:
Sa Riera is one of the largest beaches in Begur, and the closest to the town.
It is excellently located, with the sheltered Port d’Es Pi cove to the right, and the Rei cove to the left . Sa Riera takes its name from a stream dividing the beach in half, it has kept its traditional character with low rise buildings and the pine covered surrounding hills. It offers a range of different sports activities and tourist services.
There are various bars and restaurants to enjoy the gastronomy of the region, and also a few shops, including a supermarket.
From Sa Riera one can walk the costal trail to the beaches of Platja del Racó and Pals.
host_about:
Originally from Barcelona, but I lived many years in the UK and for a few years now I’ve settled down with my husband Richard and our three grown up sons in Besalú, just north of Girona.
I love walking in the nature, practicing yoga and pilates, healthy food and crafts. I adore little villages with cobbled pavements and narrow streets, and balconies full of flowers.  But I also need regular doses of city life!  Shops, bars, cafes, busy streets, and lively markets.
My favourite season is spring, I like it hot and sunny! I love the smell of freshly cut grass and my favourite colour is the tourquoise green-blue of the Costa Brava waters!
I consider myself a social and friendly person, love meeting new people and discovering new places.
I will be delighted to welcome you!

description:
This very pretty old mill house has been sympathetically restored. It is situated just outside (about 1km) of the medieval village of Pals. The long sandy Pals beach is approx. 5 km.

The restoration has been thoughtfully done by mixing modern living needs and keeping the character and style of the old mill.

The space
The pretty entrance hall leads to a country style kitchen with small table and chairs, cooker, washing machine and dishwasher, microwave, coffe machine, toilette with shower room, an arch lead to the spacious sitting and dining room with doors leading the walled garden and terrace area.

T.v / Wifi.

Upstairs there is a large landing area with sofa and lovely views, 1 shower room, 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 with a double bed and the other 2 single (plus an extra bed if needed) beds.

Parking area in the garden.

Guest access
The whole property is available to our guests.

Other t
neighborhood_overview: It is situated just outside (about 1km) of the medieval village of Pals. The long sandy Pals beach is approx. 5 km.

name: Apartamento en primera linea de mar, Begur.
description:
Apartamento situado en una de las zonas más singulares de la Costa Brava, dentro de un complejo privado que fue un hotel de lujo frecuentado por estrellas locales y de Hollywood en los años 60 cuya propiedad abasta parte de la costera población de Begur en primera linea de mar. Nuestro apartamento recientemente restaurado recupera ese glamour y gusto por los detalles combinado con la ultima tecnología. Ver para creer.

The space
Cap sa Sal fue un antiguo hotel de lujo sobre los años 60 ahora restaurado y convertido en apartamentos, es un lugar idílico dónde podrás disfrutar de una privacidad y tranquilidad difícil de encontrar en los tiempos que corren, la facilidad de servicios como el parking o la seguridad y también las majestuosas areas comunes harán de tu estancia una experiencia única.


*****

Cap sa Sal was a luxury hotel around 60's where famous people as Julio Iglesias or Lora Flores used to spend some of their holidays, now rest
neighborhood_overview:

Nuestro apartamento recientemente restaurado recupera ese glamour y gusto por los detalles combinado con la ultima tecnología. Ver para creer.

****

Apartment located in one of the most unique areas of the Brave Coast, within a private complex that was a luxury hotel frequented by local and Hollywood stars in the 60s, whose property covers part of the coastline town of Begur. Our recently restored apartment recovers that glamor and attention to detail combined with the latest technology. You won't regret.

name: Apartment in Cadaqués with garden and parking
description:
The Pampacunills Apartment is located in a very quiet area of Cadaqués, on a road with other houses of similar characteristics. The beaches of Ses Oliveres and El Ros are a 5-minutes walk along a rural path.

The space
This is a a 4 people appartment; With 2 double bedrooms, one with a double bed and another with 2 single beds. It is very well located for those who are looking for the quiteness and silence of a privileged environment, but still close and with and easy access to the downtown (400 mts). It is a new construction apartment where traditional architecture, functionality and respect for the surroundings have been combined. It is attached to the Casa Gran and has full acces to the quiet garden and the private parking area.

Guest access
Garden area and parking

Other things to note
The apartment is located 5 minutes from downtown, on a street in a rural area and without public lighting at night. The arrival (che
neighborhood_overview: It is a very quiet area at any time of the year and has easy access to the beaches and the village center. It is idel to make life in the open air: sea sports, hiking, jogging and cycling tours. Ideal also for families with children. The weather is very good most of the year. In summer you can also enjoy the cultural offerings and in autumn and winter is ideal to discover the typical fiestas of the Empordà and walk along the roads of round. It is advisable to come at Christmas and the end of the year where you can contemplate the sunrise in Cap de Creus. In January you can see the low tides with a wonderful silver sea.

name: Costa Brava - estudio con jardín
description:
Estudio de dos habitaciones, salon-cocina, baño y gran jardín. Comparte parcela con nuestra casa, aunque es totalmente independiente. Dispone de acceso privado, espacio para 4 personas y situado a 10 minutos en coche de la playa. Sin lujos pero con todas las comodidades necesarias.
Rodeado de montañas , bosques y a 10 minutos en coche del mar.
Aceptamos mascotas educadas, (no se pueden quedar solas en el interior del apartamento), disponen de un amplio patio con sol y sombra a su disposición.

The space
Es un apartamento sencillo y comodo, sin grandes pretensiones, pero con lo básico para tener una estancia muy agradable. Es una construcción aislada de nuestra casa que se encuentra dentro de nuestra parcela. El apartamento es totalmente independiente, dispone de jardín propio, zona de aparcamiento y acceso directo a la calle. No tiene zonas comunes con los propietarios, por lo que la privacidad esta garantizada. Esta situado en una urbanización muy tran
neighborhood_overview:

El carril bici esta al lado de la Urbanización y también tenemos multitud de opciones de actividades en plena naturaleza como trekking, btt, escalada, vias ferratas, kayak, etc...
Supermercados, centro medico, policía, bus, a 4 minutos en coche.

name: Apto.  acogedor en Port de la Selva
description:
Situado en el centro de la población, cerca de diferentes servicios, de la playa y del paseo principal. Planta baja de fácil acceso. Salón-comedor amplio, con chimenea, calefacción. Casa ambientación muy personal.
Julio y Agosto mínimo 7 noches.
Durante el mes de Julio y Agosto, los huéspedes deberían de llegar el domingo y salir del apartamento el sábado siguiente al mediodía, con la finalidad de poder tener el sábado a la tarde para realizar la limpieza y recibir a los próximos huéspedes.

The space
Nuestro alojamiento dispone de licencia de Apartamento turístico de la Generalitat de Cataluña. Nuestras tarifas incluyen la tasa de alojamiento turístico vigente.
Es un piso de planta baja, de fácil acceso. Un comedor - salón espaciosos y agradable. La mesa del comedor se puede ampliar. En el apartamento disponemos de música, CD y discos, así como libros novela, psicología, libros de arte. Hay una amplia información de libros de la zona de l'Alt
neighborhood_overview: El alojamiento esta ubicada en el centro de la población. Cerca encontrareis los servicios más necesarios, banco, supermercado, tiendas de comestibles, pescadería, carnicería, vivimos en la calle donde esta ubicada la Iglesia Nuestra Señora de las Nieves.
host_about:
Me llamo Agnès, me gusta viajar, conocer nuevos lugares y gente nueva. me considero una persona abierta y social, me encanta hacer amigos y tengo facilidad para comunicarme. En mi tiempo libre me encanta leer y escuchar música, cenar con mis amigos. Pienso que viajar es una manera de vivir mas intensamente, hay tantos lugares que conocer, tanta gente para entablar conversaciones tranquilas, interesantes, 
Me gusta conocer la cultura de cada pais, sus costumbres, su arte , sus museos y monumentos, es una manera de saber de las personas que viven, de su caracter, y de su forma de hacer.
Con airbnb es la primera vez que contactamos, pero tenemos experiencia de intercanvio de casa, tambien alquilamos nuestra casa en la costa brava y que pronto queremos ponerla dentro de airbnb, así que tenemos trato con personas que tienen intereses comunes a los nuestros, viajar. me encata enseñar el lugar donde vivo, o bien recomendar lugares especiales que a veces las guias pasan por alto.
neighbourhood: El Port de la Selva, Catalunya, Spain

The space
New cozy apartment located in Fenals, a quite quarter from Lloret quarter called Fenals. The apartment is 45 square meters and has one living room and one big bedroom with double bed. There is a 15 sq meters terrace where have nice breakfasts and fresh dinners at night.

Guest access
The Fenals beach (the nicest beach of Lloret) is just 800 meters away, less than 10 minutes walking. The village center with the shopping and disco area is also 800 meters away so it's close but also quite to sleep at night. The surroundings have all the services available (restaurantes, supermarkets, rent a car, pharmacy...)

name: Puestas de sol en la Costa Brava
description:
Nuestra casa es el lugar ideal para pasar unos días de relax y diversión en el corazón de la Costa Brava: paisajes de ensueño, pueblos medievales, historia y cultura milenarias, deliciosa gastronomía mediterránea, calas y playas de agua cristalina...

The space
Nuestra casa es el lugar ideal para pasar unos días de relax y diversión en el corazón de la Costa Brava. Es abierta, espaciosa, y le da el sol todo el día.
Dispone de 4 dormitorios dobles en 2 plantas con capacidad para 10 personas (ampliable a 12 si se solicita), 2 baños completos y una amplia sala de estar.

Guest access
Se accede a la vivienda desde una gran terraza con porche. El salón da a otra amplia terraza frente al bosque en la que se puede cenar contemplando las maravillosas puestas de sol de la zona. Desde ella se desciende a un jardín / solarium en el que montamos una piscina cuando llega el buen tiempo.
El aparcamiento frente a la casa está siempre disponible, p
neighborhood_overview:
Es una zona muy tranquila de viviendas habituales y muy bien comunicada con el pueblo y los lugares turísticos de los alrededores.
A muy corta distancia está el Parc de l´Arbreda, zona de ocio infantil muy animada en verano y supermercado.
Un corto paseo de 10 minutos nos lleva al centro del pueblo: tiendas con encanto, restaurantes, dispensario médico, cine, piscina municipal... todo muy cerca y accesible.
host_about:

neighborhood_overview:
The Old Town of Girona is considered the historical center of the city, bounded by the medieval city wall, part of which was demolished in the nineteenth century, and is where we find the most important historic and cultural attractions of the city.
The houses on the river Onyar are a sight which must be enjoyed from one of the bridges crossing the river, and we approach the Jewish quarter from the Rambla. In the promenade bustle of visitors and locals, strolling, shopping, resting live.
Once entered in the Jewish Quarter, one of the best preserved in Spain, we can enjoy the historic legacy of the city, letting lose through the narrow streets and right steps, discovering corners, gardens, monuments and churches, between steps. The Cathedral, the church of Sant Feliu, the Arab Baths, Sant Pere de Galligants.
host_about:
Hola!!

Soy Anna, una gironina enamorada de su pequeña ciudad.

Vivo en Girona y trabajo en una tienda de antigüedades situada a los pies de nuestra magnifica catedral. Gracias a mi trabajo puedo pasear a diario por estas calles que esconden tantas historias apasionantes.

Soy una amante del arte y de la decoración.

Espero os guste el apartamento que ofrezco que he decorado con tanto cariño.

Os espero pronto!

Hello,

I am Anna and I am in love with my marvelous city.

I live in Girona and I work in an antic shop situated just in front of the Cathedral. 
Thanks to my job I can walk everyday through the streets that hide so many exciting stories.

I am an art lover and I love decorating.

I do hope you like the apartment which I have decorate with so much love

I see you soon!

neighborhood_overview:
Campelles is part of the Ripollès region, in the province of Girona.
It is a very well-preserved natural area with all kinds of fauna, ideal for short excursions along the river, with the option of bathing in its refreshing waters in summer. During the fall, it is a very good place to go looking for mushrooms, or in winter to ski on the nearby slopes of Vall de Núria, La Molina, Masella or Vallter 2000.The town also offers a great variety of local gastronomic products, they highlight its sausages and cheeses, honey or biscuits from Camprodon, near Campelles, are also highly appreciated.

name: Big Property - Private Pool - Fabulous Sea Views
description:
Charming 1200 square meters property, entirely built in traditional Begur stones, located at the end of a cul-de-sac. Only 1,5km (10-15 minutes walk) from the lovely beach of Sa Riera with stunning views on the sea and Medes Islands. Fully renovated.

The space
This charming 1200 square meters property, entirely built in traditional Begur stones, is located at the end of a cul-de-sac, and offers privacy and quietness, while being only 1,5km (10-15 minutes walk) from the lovely beach of Sa Riera. It has stunning views on the sea and Medes Islands. The property has been fully renovated in 2010/2011, and additional improvement are made by the owner every year. A main villa, on a level, features 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), a brand-new extra equipped kitchen, a large dining/living area with fireplace. On the opposite side of the large private swimming pool, another house offers 2 separate bedrooms with 2 en-suite bathrooms, fully renovated in 2017, with ni
neighborhood_overview:
The closest beach (Sa Riera) is formed by the small beach “Port des Pi”, the large beach “Sa Riera” and the small beach “Cala del Rey”. Only 10-15 min walk from the villa, it is one of the largest and most popular beaches of Begur, preserves its traditional character and offers a wide range of sports activities and tourist services.
The area is popular with golfers with a choice of 9 superb course within easy reach of the property. The Costa Brava has just won an award for the best emerging golf destination worldwide by IAGTO. Emporda is a championship course about 15 minutes away; in Pals which is about 10 minutes away there are two good courses both Playa de Pals and Sierres de Pals. Particularly a golfers dream in the autumn and spring months when it is not too hot!

neighborhood_overview:
Empuriabrava sur la Costa Brava, est une agréable zone résidentielle connue également sous le nom de "La Venise espagnole", en raison des quarante kilomètres de canaux qui la parcourent (dont 24 navigables).
C'est la plus grande MARINA d'Europe, avec plus de cinq mille points d'amarrages.
C'est un endroit où il fait bon vivre et qui dispose de plusieurs kilomètres de belles PLAGES.
Quelques activités/équipements/prestations à Empuriabrava (par ordre alphabétique, liste non exhaustive) :
Bowling, équitation, excursion en bateau, golf, gymnase, karting, kite-surf, location de motos, location de vélos, location d'embarcations, mini-golf, plongée sous-marine, randonnée pédestre, tennis, train touristique...

Pour les amoureux de la nature et des balades :
- Promenade sur les CANAUX
Pour admirer les canaux de la ville et ses berges, vous pouvez louer de petites embarcations. Aucun permis n'est nécessaire pour en devenir les capitaines !
- La
host_about:
Bonjour à tous !
Nous sommes Jana et Jean. Nous disposons de deux appartements à Empuriabrava. Nous souhaiterions vous faire profiter de cette belle région de la Costa Brava et de son agréable climat. 
Jana est une femme adorable, très féminine, avec une bonne éducation, sérieuse et consciencieuse dans sa profession mais, surtout, avec une belle joie de vivre ! 
Pour ma part, je crois pouvoir dire que suis quelqu'un de simple, ouvert, travailleur mais sachant également bien profiter des beaux moments de l'existence. 
Petit inventaire à la Prévert de ce que nous aimons : lecture, soirées entre amis, self-defense, guitare, fruits, vin blanc de Sancerre, Histoire, musique, séries policières, documentaires, langues étrangères...

name: Charming house in Cadaques, Spain
description:
We offer for rent our 150 square meter holiday house in Cadaques, the most beautiful and unspoilt village in Costa Brava, at NE of Spain.
The house is in the center of the village and just 50 meters far from the nearest beach called Es Poal.

The space
The house was built by the prestigeous architect Franco Bombelli in the 70's, who designed the most beautiful houses and studios in Cadaques for its rationality and fine adaptation to the surrounding environment. Cadaques remains a favourite spot for artists and is popular with weekenders from Barcelona (2 hours by car) and visitors from farther afield. The town has been developed carefully over the years and retains its charm. Most who discover it return again and again.

The house have been fully renewed on early 2015, and it is perfect for 4, with 2 rooms with queen beds and 2 en-suite bathrooms, a loft style kitchen, 2 separate living rooms, both with fireplace, and a charming patio. We also have
neighborhood_overview: Quiet. Art galeries

name: Catalan Villa on the Med: Pool, Jacuzzi, Views
description:
Stunning holiday home in Begur, a quaint village 100 miles north of Barcelona. Incredible sea views. Pool, jacuzzi, three sunny terraces, two balconies. Beaches five minutes away. Superbly equipped villa in the coolest village on the Spanish coast. Lots of lovely restaurants, boutiques and bars in the well-preserved village.

Book now for Summer 2023. We are usually fully booked for the high season by the end of January. For summer bookings, we require stays from Saturday to Saturday.

The space
We call it Casa Buenavista because the views are stunning.

We found this house on a whirlwind trip to the Costa Brava in March 2004. We were scheduled to see about ten places that day. This was the third one we visited. We quit looking when we walked onto the terrace and saw the view.

The outlook is not just majestic; it is also a tonic to the soul. Sit on the terrace, sip some Albariño and let the troubles of the world melt away.
neighborhood_overview: We think there’s no nicer place on the Spanish coast.  The Costa Brava (meaning rugged coast) is one of the most beautiful, pollution-free areas that still exist on the Mediterranean. The rocky coves like Aigua Xelida, Sa Tuna, Sa Riera, Platja Fonda and Aiguablava are breathtakingly beautiful.
host_about: I am a retired professor of history at the University of St Andrews and a freelance journalist.  I have rented my villa in Spain to hundreds of happy families over the last 15 years.  There's nothing I enjoy more than hearing how guests enjoy our little corner of paradise.

name: Villa with Private Pool Walk to Beach.
description:
Com Casa Nostra Begur is a 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom villa. Ideally located between Begur and Sa Riera. A seven min walk to lovely Sa Riera beach (uphill on way back) and 5 mins by car to Begur. with authentic bars, restaurants and shops. All four bedrooms have ceiling fans which together with new mattresses and quality bed linen should ensure a good nights rest. An excellent house for a big family group who want a little privacy too. DISCOUNTS FOR UP TO FOUR PEOPLE IN MAY, JUNE OR SEPTEMBER.

The space
The hillside garden at Com Casa Nostra Begur has bougainvillea, oleanders and cacti, fig and lemon tree offers and offers an attractive outlook from the terraces which run the entire width of the property on two levels. Due to the slope of the garden, however, it is not a play area. There is a covered dining area with a large table to seat 8-10 people comfortably and gas barbecue. The private pool (approx. 8m x 4m) with eight sun loungers is in the sun for all o
neighborhood_overview: This is an area of large individual detached houses on the side of a pine-clad valley.  Begur  is the gem of our part of the Costa Brava, attracting visitors from Spain and all its near neighbours. We've been coming here for over 20 years and love the ambience both in high season and the months of June and September.  We use the property as a second home so it is kept up to date. Our local beach, Sa Riera, is unspoilt and traffic free and best of all is walkable from the villa unless you have mobility issues.

name: Double room with terrace
description:
Double room (6m2) with wardrobes, sea views and access to a large terrace.

It is possible to accommodate a third person in another room for 15e more per night.

The space
Just 2 minutes from a beautiful cove, 5 minutes walk from the town center, and 7 of the main beach. Located in a quiet area but in a moment you can find bars, restaurants and taverns.
The house has three floors. The first one is where the common areas are (kitchen, study and a small bathroom). On the second floor you can faind the bedrooms and a larger bathroom and finally on the third floor there is a room / study with sofa and bookstores.

Guest access
Cuisine, salle de bains et salle à manger. Kitchen, bathroom and dining room. There is a cozy study room with two large tables and wheelchairs. The kitchen is large with a table and four chairs, induction hob, fridge, freezer and all the things that you need for cooking.

name: L'Estartit - 2 bed apartment with communal pool
description:
The apartment has a fully equipped modern kitchen. It has a very comfortable double bedroom with built in wardrobe. The second bedroom has bunk beds and also a built in wardrobe. The lounge has spacious seating and dining area leading to a south facing balcony with great views of the sea and Medes Islands. The spacious balcony has a dining table which is wonderful for dining during sunny days.

The space
The apartment has a fully equipped modern kitchen with everything you would need on holiday. It has a very comfortable double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and the second bedroom has bunk beds also with a built in wardrobe. The lounge comprises of a spacious seating and dining area. There is also a very nice and spacious, south facing balcony off the lounge where you can dine with views of the parc natural, beach and Medes Islands. The apartment accommodates 4 people very comfortably. The apartment is situated in a very quiet area of L'Estartit. It is
neighborhood_overview:
The Costa Brava has a wealth of wonderful places and cuisine for the visitor to experience. The area has some of the most beautiful beaches and hidden coves in Europe, for guests to explore. There is an unlimited amount of water sports from kayaking, boat hire, windsurfing/boarding and other water-borne sports to enjoy. The Medes islands, just off the coast of Estartit, is a protected marine area and has some of the best diving experiences in the Mediterranean. There are great cycling routes and for the more tranquil pursuits, there are wonderful walks and bird watching opportunities.

Examples of occupying civilisations from the ancient Iberians to the Greeks and Romans, have all left their mark on the landscape of this area. The area also has a wealth of wonderful historical buildings/architecture for guests who wish to explore the history and culture of the area. The medieval towns/villages of Castello d'Empuries, Pals, Peratallada, San Marti and Torroella de Montgri
host_about: Hello, my name is Brent , I am a retired nurse from the United Kingdom.  My partner and I love meeting new people and gain great satisfaction from making people's holidays memorable ones.  We would like to welcome you to the Costa Brava and all that it has to offer.

name: "El Niuet" Apartamento cerca playa
description:
Vivienda reformada en estilo rústico y moderno, muy cálida y agradable. Planta baja de una casa unifamiliar con salida directa a la calle. Bien situada, cerca de comercios, a 5 min. a pie de la playa, y 10 min. a pie del casco antiguo. Fácil aparcar de forma gratuita en la misma calle y/o alrededores.
El Niuet, es un espacio adecuado y preparado para el verano como para el invierno, para vacaciones largas, para fines de semanas o por pocos días y muy especiales para ti.

The space
Ubicada en zona habitada todo el año, es una vivienda muy práctica tanto para verano como para invierno, es muy agradable y acogedora. El espacio que dispone en la habitación permite poder ubicar a un menor (previa consulta).

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: La zona es de movimiento anual, habitada de primera residencia todo el año, cerca comercios, cerca de casco urbano antiguo, cerca de la playa, cerca del mercado dominical, fácil acceso; en verano más movimiento, en invierno más tranquilo. Logísticamente muy práctica, cerca de comercios, playa y zona de entretenimiento.
host_about:
Hola, me llamo Jaume!

Soy y hablo catalán, L'Escala es mi pueblo de nacimiento, mi pequeño paraíso donde desconectar de la gran ciudad. Me considero aventuro, apasionado,  detallista y extrovertido. Una de las cosas que más me gusta? Viajar: conocer mundo, conocer culturas, descubrir nuevos parajes... 
Vivo durante el año, a caballo de Catalunya y Colombia, Espero que quien decida venir a l'Escala a pasar unos días de vacaciones, pueda descubrir un nuevo entorno dentro de la Costa Brava lleno de sitios espectaculares y momentos para recordar!, lo mismo digo para:
Colombia, todo un mundo para descubrir y gozar de una cultura de culturas , un relieve de relieves , un clima de climas, una gran amplitud de posibilidades para descubrir lugares maravillosos, Colombia es incomparable.

name: appartamente san feliu costa brava con piscina
description:
Appartement de 86m2 situé au sixième et dernier étage en haut d'une falaise qui domine le port de Sant Feliu. Vue splendide de jour comme de nuit. Une chambre avec lit double s'ouvrant sur la terrasse, une chambre avec lits superposés. Salon/salle à manger, terrasse équipée de deux canapés et d'une table. Une cuisine et une salle de bain . Très grande piscine et beau jardin fleuri, aire de jeux, pinède, parking privé dans résidence très calme et sécurisée par un portail électrique.

The space
Cet appartement offre une vue imprenable sur le port de Sant Feliu, toute l'année les Lamparos (vieux bateaux de pêche en bois) partent le soir sous nos yeux émerveillés... Au réveil sur la terrasse, vous les verrez revenir suivis des goélands qui tentent de récupérer des poissons. Le matin, vous pourrez descendre en ville à pied jusque la boulangerie et vous laisser tenter par les croissants au chocolat.
La nuit, vous pourrez admirer les étoiles à travers le télescope
neighborhood_overview: La ville de Sant Feliu de Guixols est animée toute l'année. Ses petites ruelles sont agréables et offrent de jolis boutiques et restaurants. La côte est formée de petites criques et de belles plages. On peut visiter le musée du jouet, l'espace Carmen Thyssen dans le monastère... Les tapas sont bonnes et l'ambiance chaleureuse. Je vous invite à trouver plus d'informations sur le site très riche de l'office du tourisme visitguixols

Lovely apartment close to Fenals beach (600m) and Sa Boadella beach (400m), the most beautiful one in Lloret de Mar.

3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room and terrace with nice views to the swimming pool and garden.

It is equipped with air conditioning, heating, wifi (fast optical fiber) and 2 parking places included.

The space

It is prepared for stays with babies.

Fenals beach is very big and is a great pleasure to walk along the seafront.

There is also a main square (with games for kids, skating rink and green areas), supermarkets, shops and restaurants.

name: Appartement à 2 min de la plage
description:

A proximité : Rosas, Figueres (musée Dali), Cadaquès. L’aéroport de Gérone est à 48 km et Barcelone à 1h15

The space
Dans un cadre convivial et verdoyant, vous ressentirez bien-être et dépaysement dans cet appartement vaste et lumineux. Nul doute que vous passerez des moments agréables et inoubliables !

Guest access
Donnant sur la piscine et à deux pas des restaurants et de la plage, ce logement situé dans une zone résidentielle de vacances vous donnera accès direct à tous les loisirs de bord de mer.
neighborhood_overview:
Parmi la multitude de restaurants et bars à tapas qui entourent le lieu, vous trouverez le SIKIM, un bar lounge dans un cadre moderne et accueillant qui propose une carte de tapas revisités à des tarifs très raisonnables...
Vous pourrez aussi manger une glace, boire une verre et poursuivre par du shopping dans les arcades.
Enfin, vous découvrirez la marina et les yachts du port en louant un bateau sans permis pour une heure à deux pas de votre logement.

name: Apartamento  en S'Agaro a 8min de la playa a pie
description:
Amplio apartamento en S'Agaro de 88m2, con 3 habitaciones, 1 de matrimonio y 2 habitaciones con 2 camas individuales cada una para 6 pax. 2 Baños completos. Totalmente equipado, aire acondicionado, calefacción parking privado y zona común con jardín, ideal para familias con niños. Muy bien comunicado a 8 min a pie de la playa de Sant Pol en zona tranquila. a 3 min. todos los servicios comerciales, a 1Km de Sant Feliu Guíxols y a 1.5km Playa d'Aro.

The space
En una zona tranquila y cerca de todo lo necesario para disfrutar de este expendido pueblito que es S'Agaro, posiblemente de lo sitios mas bonitos de la Costa Brava.

Libre acceso a la zona jardín comunitaria,

Es un Barrio tranquilo a 3 min. a pie de todos los servicios de S'Agaro: Supermercados, Restaurantes, Tiendas, Copas etc..
Para recorer a pie o en bici la "Ruta del Carrillet" a 2 min de apartamento. Playa de Aro a 1,5Km con tiendas discotecas, parques acuaticos. a 1Km de Sant Feliu de Guixols

name: Charming villa on Estartit beach-Costa Brava
description:
Charming villa on the beach, with garden and communal pool, in Urbanization La Platera, next to the Natural Park of Illes Medas. Newly reformed, 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large living room, kitchen and parking. IDEAL FAMILIES WITH CHILDREN.

The space
House located at the foot of a very quiet beach, in the Natural Park of Montgrí, Illes Medas and Baix Ter. Exceptional place for water activities, sailing or diving in transparent waters. You can also play golf or horseback riding. Perfect for families with children.

Guest access
The whole house is available, parking for one car, as well as the pool and communal gardens.

Other things to note
Charming house of 120 m2, furnished and equipped with all facilities. It has 3 double bedrooms. A room with terrace, see views and Illes Medas. Two rooms with balcony. Equipped kitchen with all appliances, large living room with terrace, private garden and barbecue. 2 bathrooms,
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet area, the house is just 5 minutes walking to the beach, with easy access to supermarkets, restaurants and entertainment areas.
host_about: Con Concha, mi pareja, nos gusta acoger a nuestros huéspedes y hacerles la estancia lo más agradable posible. Igual que a vosotros, también nos gusta viajar, los deportes al aire libre, el mar, la buena cocina, y conocer gente de diferentes países y culturas. Nos preocupan los temas sociales y políticos. Nuestra experiencia como anfitriones es muy buena. Nos interesan los viajes de naturaleza y culturales, pero también los viajes a lugares tranquilos donde poder descansar relajadamente disfrutando de una buena lectura, de paseos o de una buena comida.

name: Casa Punta Milà. Private garden and  communal pool
description:
Our house is a two floor semidetached house in a quiet, charming village, L'Escala, in the middle of Costa Brava.(www.lescala-empuries.com) Modern style and very comfortable with free internet wifi access. It is child friendly. Back garden with porch, private garden and direct access to the community garden and pool. Recent build front yard with few amenities.

The space
Our house is a two floor semidetached house in a quiet, charming village, L'Escala, in the middle of Costa Brava.(www.lescala-empuries.com) Modern style and very comfortable with free internet wifi access. It is child friendly. Front and back garden. Comunity garden area with big pool for relax. The house has got 3 double bedrooms (one of them in the ground floor), 2 bathrooms, a sitting room, a dining room and a full equipped kitchen.
Terrace with porche with lovely views to the garden. Very quiet area. You can park the car in front of the house
We provide bed linen and towels
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet neighbourhood between Riells Beach and Montgó Beach .
Restaurants, shops and supermarkets within a 1 km.
host_about:
Hello,
We are Jordi and Carol, married with two daughters.
Our property is a recent and modern semidetached villa for 6 people equipped with every comfort.  It is located between Riells and Montgó, so you can easily reach walking, shops, restaurants and of course the beach. (10 minutes walking).
The house has a private garden and has access to a large communal garden with beautiful pool. Ideal for families with children.
L'Escala is a charming village and  great located in the middle of Costa Brava. You can enjoy our pleasant and sandy beaches such as Montgó Beach, located in Montgó bay, 5 minutes driving from home.
Ideal for people who love all kind of water sports. Near home you can find spots for windsurfing and kitesurfing (El Riuet and Sant Pere Pescador), diving and kayak (Montgó),  deep sea fishing...  Lots of cycling paths for discover the surroundings as well.
The area offers cultural activities such Greek ruins in Empúries, Dali museum (25 km far), a visit to the medieval town of Girona is a must. Barcelona is 120 km from here.
On the other side if you love nature, there are protected natural areas near L'Escala, such as "Parc natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà" (ideal for bird watchers, "Parc Natural del Cap de Creus" and "Parc Natural del Montgrí".

We like traveling around the world and discover wonderful places, but when we are here we enjoy the peaceful and relax that the property offers.
Guests should treat the property and the belongings with respect. 
Guests should respect the rules of the neighbourhood.

Bed linen included
towels included
Bathroom towels included
Wi-fi included

If our place fits with you, we will be pleased to be your hosts and do all the best so you enjoy your stay in Costa Brava.

name: Apartment with views of Rosas bay and Dalí route.
description:
Apt. front Rosas Bay, Costa Brava, Girona with pool. Canals, Aiguamolls park and La Rubina wild beach views. 20 minutes walk from beach and services. Near Dalí's Museum, Dalí's house in Portlligat, Cadaqués and Creus Cape.
Located in Santa Margarida with promenade that leads to Rosas (5' car); great residence with very quiet atmosphere.
Small, comfortable and equipped apartment to breathe a lot of calm.
Touristic tax included in the price.

The space
Cleaning is done with bio-alcohol on all surfaces
There is a minimum period of 24 hours between each departure and each arrival.

It is a small, quiet and comfortable apartment. It has ceiling fans and air conditioner that are sufficient to keep the space cool all day long when you are on the 10th floor.

It is located in a large residence, but where the atmosphere use to be quiet even in the middle of summer.

It is a good place to visit both the beautiful beaches
neighborhood_overview:
This is a holiday area, with all services and very quiet,
since we have the sea ahead of us but we're not on the sea front.
On the promenade you can find various of charming locals, from lounges and beach bars to restaurants and cafés of all kinds.
host_about:
Since young I have been a lover of travel, to meet new people and cultures. Relying on the kindness of stranger I had precious and unforgettable experiences.
Since we moved to the Costa Brava of Girona with my husband, we have rented or exchanged our house on several occasions with foreign and Spanish families. It has always been a positive experience. Now we live in the city of Girona.
As good travelers we do not require great amenities, but we appreciate the cleanliness and attention to detail and we are always willing to help and share as much as possible.

name: Cal Bisbe, Charming Rural Holiday House
description:
Cal Bisbe house, is situated over two floors connected by an external staircase. It has a patio and outdoor swimming pool, decking and a patio. It has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 kitchens equipped with dishwashers. It has a barbecue and wood-burning fireplace, and we provide coal and firewood for your use. The house has heating, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Especially suited for the elderly or people with reduced mobility, the entire ground floor is on the same level and there are no steps.

The house faces the south, protected from the northern wind, with sun all day long, as well in winter as in summer.
Outside there is a yard where you can park your car, a swimming-pool with lawn around, and a resting zone protected by a wooden pergola that allows to enjoy better the time you spend outside.
On the ground floor, you find the yard, with wooden table and chairs, to have your meals outdoor, a vestibule, the kitchen, a bathroom and a large living room with firep
neighborhood_overview: Cal Bisbe house, it's a very beautiful rural whole house for rent. Well equipped and comfortable, it is an ideal place to spend time relaxing or on holiday with family or friends. The house is situated in the small village of Capmany (Girona), which is part of the Alt Empordà region and makes up the northerly part of the Costa Brava. It is very well connected and close to the beaches or mountains, it is also close to the city of Figueres and the shopping areas on the Spanish/French border.

name: La Pallissa - Allotjament rural Can Solà
description:
The space
Independent rural apartment ideal for couples and families with one child in a familiar and pleasant environment. La Pallissa is a cosy apartment with all the conveniences provided including a balcony and a terrace with a BBQ. There is also a fireplace and biomass heating for the winter period and swimming pool (which is shared with the other apartments) during the summer. The kitchen is fully kitted out with all the necessities; ceramic hob, fridge, electric oven, microwave, coffee maker, toaster etc. There is a communal washing machine and all towels, kitchen cloths and bed sheets are provided.

Guest access
The rural property has a communal swimming pool and game area including table tennis. There is a big garden at the front of the house with a small sandy area and swings for children and also a field with a goal and a portable volleyball net. The farm is home to many animals such as pigs, hens, donkey’s and ponies, our dogs and cats keep

Un lloc acollidor, on sentir-te com a casa i amb la natura al costat mateix amb rius,prats, boscos... Coneixedora de la història de la masia, m'agrada que els hostes coneguin els encants de la Garrotxa, fent senderisme, descans, gastronomia.. name: Exclusive villa with infinity pool
description:
Fully fitted. Next to the Botanical Garden of Blanes, spectacular views. Private garden of 1000 meters to enjoy sunbathing on the lawn or swim in your private pool (3m x 10m, depth of 0.2m to 2m.) Of salty and overflowing water, dine outdoors in the barbecue area.
Fifteen minutes walking to the beach of Blanes and five minutes to "Cala Bona-Sant Francesc". Three minutes from the "Convent" of Blanes, Free WIFI. 60 km from Barcelona and 40 from Girona.

The space
From 8 to 10 guests can choose between four bedrooms with the following distribution: Bedroom 1 with a double bed and private bathroom, access to private terrace and sea views. Bedroom 2 provided with two single beds with private bathroom and access to shared terrace and sea views, Bedroom 3 with two single beds with access to the shared terrace and sea views. Bedroom 4 with two sets of bunk beds (four single beds), There is also a full bathroom in the hallway and a toilet in the game room located on t
neighborhood_overview: The town of Blanes is ten minutes  walking. The house is right next to the entrance to the botanical garden "Mar i Murtra" and five kilometers from the botanical garden "Pinya de Rosa". Blanes is in  Catalonia. Located 60 km from Barcelona on the Girona coast. It is the first town on the "Costa Brava", which is known as the "Gateway to the Costa Brava".  Blanes is also a popular tourist town, where coves and beaches surrounded by mountains makes this a very touristy place. One of the best beaches is "Cala Bona" sirtuada just ten minutes walking from our house.
host_about: Vivo en Barcelona, donde trabajo como abogado. Pero, pregúntame cualquier cosa que necesites, me encantará poder ayudaros a pasar unos días magníficos de vacaciones!...

El barrio de la Devesa es de nueva construcción, sus calles son anchas y tiene todos los servicios que pueda necesitar el viajero, pequeños y grandes supermercados, medico, carnicería,... delante de casa piscina, pistas de tenis y padel a las que puede acceder el viajero pagando una entrada.El apartamento esta junto al parque proporcionando armonía y relax.
