neighborhood_overview:
LA ZONA . LA GARROTXA
La Garrotxa disfruta de dos tipos de paisaje totalmente distintos, peculiares y de una gran belleza.
Por una parte la Zona Volcánica, 40 volcanes y coladas de lava que crean un paisaje absolutamente único y por otra parte el Espacio de Interés Nacional de la Alta Garrotxa, que abarca el Valle del Rio Fluvià hacia el Norte, donde el paisaje cambia radicalmente volviéndose abrupto y escarpado, y donde podemos observar espacios naturales de una especial belleza.
Haz clic aquí para modificar.
Olot (10 mins.)
Bonito mercado local los lunes por la mañana.
Calles peatonales llenas de vida local con sus cafés y tiendas y restaurantes
Edificios modernistas
Multicines
Museos
Fiestas tradicionales.

Volcanes (10-20 mins.)
Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa
Hay más de 40 volcanes inactivos en la zona y diversas coladas de lava, formando un paisaj

description:
Beautiful apartment near the center with swimming pool

The space
Beautiful completeley refurbished apartment, well located in a nice community in Calella de Palafrugell.

Excellent communal area which includes a tennis court, ping-pong, huge swimming pool and playground for children.

This spacious and bright apartment, with capacity for 6 people, consists of a large living room with access to the terrace, a modern fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a guest toilet, 3 bedrooms, of which one twin, the other one with a bunk bed and the third is a double bedroom.

It is located just at 500 meters from the beach and close to all services.

It has a private parking space in the community garage.

Water restrictions: We inform you that according to Decree-Law 1/2023 of February 28, due to the extreme drought we are experiencing, it is forbidden to water the lawn of any private property. There are also restrictions o
neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.
host_about: We are the agency Immo Cala Marquesa, local agent in Calella de Palafrugell and Begur, and your contact for all questions or problems you might have during your stay in Calella.

Les Basses d’en coll ofrecen rutas para realizar carrera a pie, senderismo y cicloturismo.

description:
CostaBravaNatura exclusively offers you this wonderful villa, located on the Costa Brava, in a unique setting, with spectacular sea views. Surrounded by nature and very close to beautiful coves, beaches, forests and botanical gardens.
Family house, spacious and comfortable, 1 km from the beach (15 min. on foot), with private pool, garden, suite with hot tub, high speed wifi (100 MB), smart TV, barbecue, several lounge areas and private parking for four cars.

The space
Enjoy with family and friends this cosy and spacious Villa, with more than 300 m2 built area and 300 m2 of garden with pool.
Distributed on 4 floors, it has 6 rooms (one suite with a hydromassage bathtub and a large terrace), several lounge areas, Wi-Fi, barbecue and private parking for four cars.
In a privileged environment, located in the exclusive area of Corona Santa Cristina, 1 km from the beach. Surrounded by many beautiful coves, beaches, forests and protected areas such as the
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a privileged area, in Corona de Santa Cristina, in front of the protected area of the Garden of Pinya de Rosa and less than 1 km from the beach, very close to Cala Santa Cristina, Cala Treumal, Cala Sant Francesc and Cala Boadella
5 min. by car from the Blanes town and Lloret de Mar and 1 hour from Barcelona, by car, train or bus.
host_about:
Hi!  I am Ester, co-founder of CostaBravaNatura. I love sharing the Costa Brava with our guests and ensuring that they enjoy an unforgettable stay with family and friends.
Please, contact us for more information. We will be happy to help you!

host_about:
Hola em dic Pitu, sóc diplomat en turisme i he treballat en agencia de viatges 10 anys, des del 2015 ens hem reinventat i ens dediquem a allotjar-vos, al llarg d'aquests anys hem conegut molta gent i és una experiència genial!  Visc amb la Isma, la meva esposa, i els meus fills l'Alexandra i en Jaume que ha nascut enguany. Ens encanta viatjar, el mar i la muntanya! Fins aviat!


Hi! My name is pitu, I have a degree in tourism, and I've been working as a travel agent for 10 year. We enjoy traveling and meeting new people from all over the world. I live with my wife Isma and my daughter alexandra and our new son Jaume wich is born in 2021 We enjoyn traveling,  the mountain, and the sea! 
Hope to meet you soon!

name: Can Ralet
description:
Both Llafranc and Tamariu offer numerous restaurants and cafés. There is also a restaurant in the small hotel at the San Sebastian lighthouse. On Cala Pedrosa there is a beach bar.

The birds: this year, apart from the cuckoos, thrushes, finches, blue-tits, and the hoopoes, we've two secretive golden orioles. We're close to the beaches, bars and restaurants, but up here, apart from the temperature, it's hard to say if it's July or January. A Norwegian guest comes just to read books.

The space
To be able to relax, rest, eat and sleep in the peaceful surroundings of Can Ralet and yet be within minutes of some of Catalonia's most sought after beaches is quite exceptional. The gardens and extensive lawns are yours to wander in - ideal for frisbee or badminton. If the plum or fig trees are in fruit, do help yourselves. And there's also a vegetable garden from which you can help yourselves according to the season.
If music's your thing, there's me
neighborhood_overview:
This a rural area. The only noises are of the odd tractor, poultry - and occasional Catalan garden parties in August. The track is not made up, so drive slowly.
There are footpaths up to the lighthouse, and down to Tamariu (via Cala Pedrosa) and down to Llafranc and Cala el Cau. At the lighthouse there's a chic Japanese restaurant and in the adjacent hotel there's a traditional Catalan family restaurant. On the Cala Pedrosa beach there's a small snack bar that does good light meals.
We've been to many parts of the Mediterranean, but never found anywhere as beautiful as this part of the Costa Brava.

name: El Jardinet: 50m Montgó beach*Parking*Garden*Airco
description:
El Jardinet is a very nice family apartment (renovated May 2018) that accommodates comfortably 5 guests.

It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, terrace, a private garden, a patio and parking on premises. Wifi and A/C available.

It is located only 50 meters walking from the beach of Cala Montgó, one of the best sand beaches in Girona-Costa Brava.

The space
El Jardinet is a very nice familly apartment that accommodates comfortably 5 guests.

It has a large dining and sitting area, equipped with Airco and TV. It has direct access to the terrace where to enjoy breakfasts and other meals, a private garden with sun loungers and an indoor patio.

The rest of the apartment has 2 complete bathrooms with walk-in showers and 3 bedrooms: 1 double bed, and 3 single beds. All bedrooms have fitted-in closets. Bedding sets, blankets and pillows are provided.

Air conditioning (cooling/heating system) is available in the dining-sitti
neighborhood_overview:
Within a radius of 100 mt around the apartment you will find a large supermarket with a fresh bakery, a newsagent shop, and plenty of good restaurants that serve from tapas, light meals, pasta and pizzas to excellent Mediterranean cuisine: Can Miquel, Restaurant l’Oreig, Bar Waikiki and Pizzeria Sibaris to mention some.

A public tourist train, "the Carrilet" is available during the summer season and links Sant Martí d´Empúries with l´Escala, Riells and Montgó. It operates from 15th June to 30th September from 08:00 until 24:00, with one train every hour. Price is approx. €2 per journey.
host_location: Sant Joan de les Abadesses, Spain
host_about:
I am Cristina, from a small mountain town in the Catalan Pyrenees. We have 2 kids and as a family we like to travel and discover new places.

We have one apartment in Cala Montgo for 5 guests called "El Jardinet" and one in L'Escala town center, for 2 guests, named "Maranges". Both properties are in fantastic locations!

We are not professional landlords but we love hosting and recommending places for guests to explore. 

We also do our best to ensure the apartments are in great conditions so you just have to come and enjoy.

name: Casa con jardín a 1min de la playa
description:
Casa con jardín ubicada en el centro de Sant Antoni de Calonge.

Ideal para pasar unas vacaciones en un entorno inmejorable, en grupo o en familia.
Esperamos que disfrutes tanto como nosotros de esta casa, por eso os la ofrecemos para que paséis una estancia única.

Nos vemos pronto! :)

The space
Es una casa con mucho encanto, con 2 habitaciones, salón, comedor con cocina abierta y un precioso jardín.

Sobre las habitaciones: hay una doble y una quádruple, con una cama doble y literas. En total, hay camas para 6 personas.
Tiene un baño completo (se accede por el jardín) y un aseo, en la zona de las habitaciones.

En el comedor hay dos chimeneas interiores y dispone de un jardín con barbacoa.

La casa dispone tanto de calefacción como de aire acondicionado. También tiene lavavajillas, horno, microondas y lavadora-secadora.

A tener en cuenta, en la casa hay bastantes desniveles (escaleras).
neighborhood_overview:
La casa se encuentra en el centro de Sant Antoni de Calonge, a 1min del Paseo y de la playa. Cerca hay supermercados, panaderías, pollería, quiosco...

Es un entorno muy agradable.

Para aparcar, es todo zona azul pero existen ofertas de 1 semana y 15 días que vale la pena aprovechar.
host_about: Hola! Sóc la Núria i fa molts anys que estiuegem a Sant Antoni de Calonge, des que érem petites. Aquesta caseta ens té enamorats i aprofitem per estar-hi sempre que podem. El jardí és la nostra part preferida de la casa. Esperem que la gaudiu tant com nosaltres.

host_about:
Soy amante del deporte, de la cultura y de viajar. He vivido en varios países diferentes donde he podido constatar que la vida es el arte del encuentro, como decía Vinicius de Morais.

Me encanta mi ciudad, Barcelona, y creo que soy un buen anfitrión, ya que llevo desde bien joven viajando siendo huesped y hospedando personas.

name: Duplex in Camprodon
description:
Beautiful duplex located in the center of the town. The location is very quiet and peaceful and perfect for people who love mountains, nice landscapes and extreme sports. It is also logistically well located as you have a big supermarket (ESCLAT) at 50 meters from the duplex. You can also get to the primary street by 5 minutes walking. For the ones who love hiking we have some guides in the duplex with different trekking. Vall ter ski slope is 15 minutes by car from Camprodon.

The space
The apartment is very well located, in addition to having capacity for six it is located in a very quiet area of ​​the village. The apartment has some very cozy features, in addition to the possibility of using your fireplace in colder months. The proximity to the ski slopes and the multitude of footpaths make it a village with a special attraction.

Guest access
All areas of the apartment can be accessed since renting is delivered in full terms and the hosts
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very close to the center but not in the very center(it is a 5 minute walk). So, being a more residential area you will enjoy the tranquility of this without  the car or people noise. However, its close proximity to the center allows you to enjoy all its benefits and have access to all the services needed for a trip.
host_about: Fun, reliable,sensible,helpful, enthusiastic,amazing...and much more!

name: Apartamento en primera línea de mar
description:
S´Abanell Central Park es un precioso complejo residencial en primera línea de mar en la pintoresca localidad de Blanes. Allí podemos encontrar jardines, un parque infantil y una gran piscina con varios niveles de profundidad

The space
Los apartamentos del S'Abanell Central Park presentan una decoración en azul y blanco con un mobiliario actualizado, y cuentan con terraza privada, aire acondicionado y calefacción. El salón tiene TV y sofá cama. Incluyen baño privado y zona de cocina equipada.

host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Acogedora casa rural para 10 personas
description:
Can Corretjola es una antigua casa situada en una calle peatonal en el núcleo del pueblo de Navata delante de la Iglesia (Alt Emporda - Costa Brava - Girona). Está a tan solo 25 minutos de la costa brava y muy cerca de las montañas del Alt Emporà.

La casa dispone de cuatro habitaciones para 10 pesonas. Hay dos habitaciones de matrimonio y dos habitaciones con tres camas. Se incluyen las sabans y las toallas.

También hay dos baños, los cuales uno es con bañera y el otro con plato de ducha.

The space
La casa está totalmente equipada con todos los estris de limpieza y utencilios para la cocina y baño. Incluye labadora y plancha.
También dispone de una sala de juegos donde se encuentra la ping-pong, el futbolín y patines para toda la família.

Numero de lecencia: PG362

Guest access
El pueblo dispone de supermercado, estanco, farmacia, carnicería y peluquería.

Se puede aparcar facilmente.
<

description:

The space
"Masia Quelet" is located in the centre of La Garrotxa a fascinating county seeming with widely varying landscapes and magically merging micro-climates, caused by the many volcanic eruptions and earthquakes over the centuries in this special strategically meant to be region.
It is smack in the middle of Atlantic, Continental and Mediterranean climate influences and is riddled with valleys branching from the Pyrenees heading down towards the Med.

name: Can Fruitos - Rural accommodation in Besalú
description:
CAN FRUITOS is a rural guest-house with a capacity for 4 to 8 people.
We rent the whole house to the same guest. It is not possible to rent only bedrooms.

The space
Can Fruitós is a rural accommodation located in the Jewish quarter of the Comtal Villa de Besalú. The house is located in a pedestrian street very close to the Romanesque bridge and the main square.

The house has ground floor and two floors: on the first floor are the bedrooms and toilets and on the second floor, the kitchen, dining room and living room.

The house has 4 to 8 beds with:

-3 rooms
-2 bathrooms
-large living room with fireplace, television, DVD, mini chain and board games.
-fully equipped kitchen: ceramic hob, oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge.
-heating.
-Free WIFI.
-washing machine and iron
-sheets, blankets, bath towels and kitchen towels are included.
-Final cleaning included.

The house is always

Besalú is a village in the area  “la Garrotxa” ( Catalonia ) and is located between Olot, Figueres, Banyoles and Girona.

Recomiendo realizar y explorar las diferentes rutas de senderismo y disfrutar descubriendo sus rincones, como por ejemplo el "Llac del Cigne" lago ubicado en la misma urbanización.
A resaltar que en Caldes de Malavella se encuentran situados los famosos Balnearios de Vichy Catalan y Prats. y en su castillo puedes ver el museo con esqueletos de (bóvidos, rinocerontes y tapires),

name: Villa Los Olivos avec piscine
description:
Costa Brava, située dans un écrin de verdure, en face d'un petit vignoble, villa catalane idéalement placée entre mer et collines verdoyantes, superbe piscine carrelée au coeur d'un jardin calme et ensoleillé, sans vis à vis, ni maisons mitoyennes.

The space
Il s'agit de notre maison de vacances, une maison familiale où nous adorons nous retrouver en famille, et refaire le monde au bord de la piscine.

Guest access
La villa est située à 5 minutes en voiture au dessus de l'Eglise de Santa Cristina. Cette petite ville est connue pour son golf, et est à 8 minutes en voiture des belles plages de Saint Pol, de Playa de Aro ou encore de S'agaro. Des cours de tennis se trouvent à 5 km, à S'agaro.

Other things to note
La piscine est superbe (5 x 12 m), mais non sécurisée. La villa n'est donc pas adaptée aux familles ayant des enfants en bas age et/ou ne sachant pas nager.

License number
X6568895A
neighborhood_overview:
De très belles balades à faire à pied ou en vélo dans les collines environnantes.
L'atout principal de cette maison est son calme au coeur de la verdure. Sa situation non loin de l'ensemble des plages (7 km en voiture), du Golf de Santa Cristina, de la charmante ville de San Feliu de Guixols, qui est active toute l'année, et a d'excellents restaurants, ce qui en fait un lieu parfait pour y réussir ses vacances.
Enfin, la maison est à peine à 60 mn de Barcelona, 30 mn de Gérone ou encore 45 mn de Figueras et son fameux musée Dali.
Nous vous donnerons l'ensemble des bonnes adresses du coin, entre petits restaurants à tapas inconnus des touristes lambdas, le restaurant Can Sureda à juste 3 mn à pied de la villa (la paella y est exquise), ou encore les très bons restaurants nichés dans les collines avec une vus sur la vallée à couper le souffle...
Pour les jeunes adultes, la ville de Playa d'Aro à 5 km offre un florilège de bars et discothèques en tous genres...

name: 6p Apartment with Wifi and airco, 260 m from beach
description:
Lovely apartment with a large terrace. Panoramic view up to Castell Montgrí! There are three bedrooms. Everything is well maintained. The terrace is facing South, inside is air conditioning. The large beach of Riells with the great boulevard is at only 260 meters.

The space
The apartment lies on the third floor. The living room is large enough for 6 adults. From the living room starts a terrace. It is large and wide. Enjoy the sun together in summer time or in winter time! It is facing the south and gives a panoramic view from Puig Sec on the left, to Castell Montgrí on the right. During the Tramuntana (strong wind from the north) you are well protected on the terrace.
In the living room is a flat screen tv. The room is air conditioned. The first bedroom has a double bed and is air conditioned as well. The bathroom has a shower and toilet. Great to rinse of after a day at the beach.
The kitchen is very well equipped. There is a ceramic hob, microwave, o
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to Platja Riells. The promenade on the beach is lively with nice shops, little cafes and restaurants. The historic center of L'Escala is located within walking distance. A little further next L'Escala are the famous excavations of Empúries. These are very worth to visit. If you like horseback riding is also possible, there is a riding school at the entrance to the village boundary. In the cultural field is a lot to do with its Museo Dalí Figueres, Girona with its beautiful cathedral and a little further course Barcelona with Gaudi.
Sports, there's a lot possible. Watersports Sea like canoeing, jet-skiing, scuba diving or snorkeling. Excellent bike paths to the beach of Sant Pere Pescador, where you can kite surfing, wind surfing or just soaking up the sun.
Moreover Girona Airport is 40 minutes from L'Escala.
host_about:
Hallo reiziger, 

Even voorstellen: Wij zijn Vakantiehuis l'Escala.
We verhuren huizen en appartementen in l'Escala, l'Estartit en Pals waaronder de onze. l'Escala is vooral in de zomer druk bezocht maar wij willen het ook buiten het hoofdseizoen promoten. Er is hier zoveel meer te doen dan op het strand liggen. Cultureel en sportief een waanzinnig gebied. Probeer het eens uit!
Hopelijk beleeft u er net zoveel plezier als wij!

Andries ter Hennepe
Oprichter van Vakantiehuis l'Escala

Bonjour voyageur,

On se présente: Vakantiehuis l'Escala (Maison de vacances à l'Escala)
Nous louons des maisons et des appartements à L'Escala, l'Estartit et Pals, y compris la nôtre. L'Escala est particulièrement fréquentée en été, mais nous voulons aussi promouvoir en dehors la saison principale. Il y a tellement plus à faire ici que de bronzer sur la plage. Culturels ou sportifs, ceci est une magnifique région. Essayez le!
Nous espérons que vous ferez l'expérience d'autant de plaisir que nous faisons!

Andries ter Hennepe
Vakantiehuis l'Escala


Hello traveler,

Let us introduce ourselves: We are Vakantiehuis l'Escala.
We rent holidayhomes in L'Escala, l'Estartit en Pals. L'Escala is especially crowded in the summer but we like to promote it also outside the main season. There is so much more to do here than lie on the beach. Cultural and sporting activities, this is a very diverse environment. Try it out!

Hopefully you will experience just as much fun as we always have!

Andries and Inge ter Hennepe

Guest access
Salón, cocina, jardín, otro baño con ducha y bañera.

The house has a large garden, which opens up to the surrounding fields and forests. Near the beautiful Costa Brava beaches, the house is perfectly removed from the hustle and bustle of the beach party life, providing a peaceful, re-energizing oasis, optimal for de-stressing and nature oriented fun times.

Guest access
Guest will have full access to all living/lounge areas, kitchen, porches, outside chill out, swimming pool etc...

name: Mas La Coma 2
description:
Casa de campo del S.XVI.
Masia de tres plantas, se alquilan las tres habitaciones de la planta superior con un baño a compartir.
Los anfitriones viven el la casa.
Amplia sala con chimenea.
Gran exterior con barbacoa y muebles de jardín y agradable terraza con bonitas vistas.

The space
La casa está situada en medio de la naturaleza pero a 300m del pueblo.
Es una típica masia catalana de tres plantas que se ha restaurado conservando la esencia de la época y el entorno.
La planta baja dispone de una amplia cocina, un acogedor comedor y una gran sala con chimenea para pasar agradables veladas al calor del hogar.
En la planta alta están situadas tres habitaciones dobles y un baño completo, destinado a acoger a nuestros huéspedes.
En la planta intermedia es donde se aloja Roser y su familia, la anfitriona.

Guest access
El exterior de la Casa es su gran tesoro, una soleada pradera, y un precioso bosque d
neighborhood_overview:
La casa está situada en medio de la naturaleza, junto al Parque Natural de Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa.
La zona ofrece la posibilidad de realizar preciosas excursiones andando, en bicicleta, a caballo, en globo...
El municipio se encuentra situado a la cabecera de río Fluvià, cercado por las sierras del Corb, de Sant Miquel de Llancers y por el Puigsacalm (1515 m).
Fantástica gastronomía y embutidos.
Se encuentra cerca de preciosos pueblos medievales como Santa Pau, Besalú... De La Fageda d'en Jordà, de volcanes, vías de escalada...

До центрального пляжа 300 метров, до центральной улицы, где находятся все дискотеки 10 минут пешком. В непосредственной близости находится множество ресторанов, кафе, супермаркетов.

Уютная и комфортная квартира в центре города

Restaurants, supermarkets in walking distance. It is possible to book a transfer from the airport to the airport for exstra pay

L'apartament (carrer Morer 12) gaudeix d'una vista impressionant.
Menjador sala d'estar, cuina, bany i dues habitacions, una amb un llit doble i l'altre de tipus golfa amb dos llits i un sofà llit niu de dues places, ideal per jugar els nens.

Totes les estances disposen de radiadors i llum natural.

Els establiments de serveis a menys de 10' son: botiga de queviures i revistes, farmàcia, perruqueria, bar, restaurants i servei de taxi.

-2 Double bedrooms with ceiling fan:

name: Disfruta de tus vacaciones en la Costa Brava
description:
Bonito apartamento ..Consta de 3 dormitorios, uno de ellos suite con cama doble y baño completo, otro con 2 camas y el otro con 1 cama y otro baño. El salón es amplio con terraza. La cocina está totalmente equipada con nevera, lavadora, microondas, horno, utensilios de cocina. Todas las habitaciones disponen de ropa de cama y toallas.
Hay 2 baños completos con bañera y aire acondicionado.
neighborhood_overview:
El barrio donde esta situado el apartamento es muy tranquilo.
Todos los sábados hay mercadillo en el barrio y los martes en el paseo de la playa.
Hay muchos lugares que podéis visitar por la zona.
Playas y calas, como la de San Francesc.
El jardín botánico.
El parque acuático de Water World, en Lloret de Mar.
También podéis hacer rutas en barco por la costa, desde Calella hasta Tossa.
En el mes de Julio, coincidiendo con la festividad de Santa Ana, se celebra el concurso internacional de fuegos artificiales, no os los podéis perder!!!!!!!
Hay muchas localidades y ciudades que podéis visitar, Barcelona, Girona, Blanes, Lloret de mar, Tossa, El museo de Dali.
host_about: Soy de Barcelona, me gusta mucho leer y viajar.

name: Casa  con bonito jardín, wifi y aire acondicionado
description:
Hola somos Fernando y Eva una pareja de Barcelona, que ha encontrado en el Estartit ese paraíso particular donde los fines de semana disfrutar al máximo de todos los encantos que tiene el Emporda y especialmente nuestro jardín con su olivo centenario

The space
La casa totalmente nueva esta esperando que viajeros con ganas de tranquilidad vengan a disfrutar de la calma de su jardín, el lugar en el que seguro disfrutarán tumbados en la zona Chile out acompañados de unacopa de vino del Emporda que gustosamente pondremos a su disposición.
Dispone de mucha luz durante todo el dia en todos los espacios ya que es completamente exterior.
Dispone de dos dormitorios dobles: Uno con una cama de matrimonio de 1,50 metros y otro con dos camas individuales de 0,90 metros cada una.
En el salón comedor hay disponible un sofa cama doble de 1,60 metros.
Con aire acondicionado en las 2 plantas, tanto en el salón comedor como en el dormitorio principal, ademas di
neighborhood_overview:
Zona muy tranquila, por la mañana te despiertas con el canto de los pájaros ya que esta situada dentro del parque natural del montgri.
A 500 metros se encuentra un supermercado que esta abierto todos los días de año.
host_about:
Me gusta disfrutar de mi tiempo libre rodeado de las personas que me hacen sentir bien, por eso suelo compartir muchos momentos agradables con mis amigos. Mi casa del Estartit suele ser uno de los lugares de reunión, en ella siempre hay alguna botella de vino preparada para descorchar y acompañarla de un buen queso.
Mis grandes pasiones son viajar, el futbol y una buena comida maridada con un buen vino.

name: SEAFRONT just in front beach WIFI
description:
Precioso apartamento en el paseo marítimo de L’Estartit, céntrico y justo frente la playa, y a sólo 2 minutos del Club Náutico.
Totalmente reformado y equipado. Con aire acondicionado. Magnífico porche y espectaculares vistas de las islas Medas.
Incluye parking privado.

The space
Seafront es un precioso apartamento totalmente reformado de 55 metros cuadrados con un cómodo porche a nivel de jardín y frente el mar. Tiene una habitación de matrimonio con cama doble, una segunda habitación con 2 camas individuales, cocina independiente completamente equipada, baño con ducha, y un amplio salón-comedor con un sofà cama doble.
Seafront es luminoso y tranquilo y, además del porche privado, tiene un amplio jardín compartido con césped. Está a primera línea de mar justo ante la playa. A su vez es céntrico, a 2 minutos de la principal calle comercial (calle santa Anna) y el puerto.
Disponemos de parking privado para nuestros huéspedes. Televisión,aire ac
neighborhood_overview:
La situación geográfica es increíble.
Permite disfrutar de un espacio luminoso con unas vistas del mar y las islas Medas inmejorables.
Es una zona tranquila y de uso residencial.
host_about:
Hola,
Mi nombre es Marc. Tengo 44 años.
Estoy licenciado en historia y durante años he trabajado en el ámbito del deporte y el ocio infantil.
Actualmente también gestiono en airbnb el proyecto "Seafront L'Estartit Apartments" con mi familia. Me considero un anfitrión atento, respetuoso y amable. Y creo que airbnb es una fantástica plataforma para establecer una relación basada en estos principios.
Abrimos las puertas de dos apartamentos familiares, céntricos y a primera línea de mar. Con unas privilegiadas vistas del Mediterraneo y las islas Medas.
En nuestro espacio recibiréis un trato hospitalario y caluroso, y a su vez una gestión moderna del alojamiento y sus servicios.
Rehuimos del modelo turístico a gran escala en favor de una relación respetuosa y afectuosa.
Bienvenidos!

description:
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar. Perfect for a romantic evening, weekends, holidays! It features a pool in the common part of the building. Near the beach Fenals and within walking distance city center.

The space
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar (for 1 - 3 people or 1 - 2 adults + baby)

Guest access
- Cozy living room with double sofa bed (160x200 cm) and an armchair (90x200 cm), flat screen TV, dining table and chairs, built-in cupboard; Crib for baby included if required. The room with elegant decoration has plenty of light and natural ventilation, panoramic view of the garden and playground.
- Electric cooker fully equipped with all necessary implements for cooking during your stay: fridge, microwave, kettle, coffee maker, and a washing machine.
- Bathroom with bathtub, hairdryer.
- Internet WIFI.
- It has a pool in the common part of the building.
- 2nd floor, exterior; Of elevators.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the popular district of Fenals, is a quiet comfortable area to access and close to everything:
CAPRABO supermarket, Carrefour-EXPRESS, DIA, CONSUM; Fruteria, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants, souvenir shops and beach accessories, playground, weekly market (Tuesday), bus (to go to Blanes, Barcelona, Girona, Figueres and etc).
Close to all major attractions of Lloret:
• beaches, variety of water sports, diving, sightseeing boats;
• discos, games and Casino Lloret;
• aquapark (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• dolphinarium;
• playground "Gnome Park";
• karting "GO KARTS Lloret" (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• Botanical Gardens of Santa Clotilde, with a magnificent view of the sea.
Perfect to be near the beach Fenals (400 m) and within walking distance of the city center, you can enjoy the nightlife in the center and walk back to the apartment.

host_about:
Hola! Bon dia! Bonjour! Hello!
Nací en el sur de Francia, tras mis estudios en Canadá viajé a España para mejorar mi español y como me gustó el estilo de vida decidí establecerme. Encontré la casa de mis sueños y la convertí en un lugar maravilloso.

name: CAU DEL LLOP 11 Fantastic apartment in the sea front
description:
Fantastic apartment in the sea front.

The space
This apartment has two bedrooms (one with a double bed and another one with a bunk bed), one bathroom with shower, an open kitchen, a dining room with air conditioning, a great terrace with barbecue, a sea front patio and WiFi included at the price. Pets accepted.
This cosy apartment is located at Cau del Llop a quite zone at the outside of Llançà. It is near to Cau del Llop beach, in front the seaside path, a 5 minutes by car form the Port's urban zone, where you will find the principal restaurants and shops, the Port and Gola beach, the Port Marina and another important see sights.
Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creu
neighborhood_overview:
This magnificent apartment with fantastic sea views it’s located at Cau del Llop zone in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…) This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes. Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
It’s only a 5 minutes by car to the urban centre, where you will find the principals restaurants and shops!!
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

description:
Un lugar único, exclusivo y con privacidad. Un antiguo molino de cereal restaurado para que la familia pueda disfrutar de la tranquilidad y la belleza del alt' emporda.
Piscina con água termal, cerca de Figueras, a 40mins de la playa.

The space
La casa dispone de 4 habitaciones, 2 son suites. Piscina, huerto, oliveras, cerezos entre otras cosas. Lugar perfecto para estar en familia o con amigos queridos. Al rededor de la propiedad se pueden hacer excursiones de bicicleta o a pie y sobretodo una visita a un antiguo castillo del pueblo que esta muy cerca de la casa. En verano se puede disfrutar de un pozo con agua termal. La casa dispone de cunas, sillas de coche para niños y otras comodidades. Tenemos también una sala de juegos con futbolín y billar.

Guest access

name: Apartment Golf Mar
description:
The Golf Mar apartments are located close to the port of L´Escala on the beautiful Costa Brava.
The Golf Mar apartment complex has a communal pool located in well kept gardens with plenty of sun. The apartment is on the first floor and consists of one bedroom with double bed and one bedroom with two single beds.
The double bedroom has access to the rear balcony overlooking the pool and gardens.
This apartment boasts a large lounge, dining area and kitchen area which has access to a balcony overlooking pine woods and with a sea view of the bay of Roses.
The beach of Riells is located at about 15 mins walk.
The beach front has numerous bars and restaurants. Local supermarket are also located here. In peak season a funfair is located at the far end of Riells beach which is approx 20 mins walk. The old village of L`Escala approx a further 15 mins walk.

name: Mas La Coma 1
description:
Casa de campo del S.XVI.
Masia de tres plantas, se alquilan las tres habitaciones de la planta superior con un baño a compartir.
Los anfitriones viven el la casa.
Amplia sala con chimenea y agradable terraza con bonitas vistas.
Gran exterior con barbacoa y muebles de jardín.

The space
La casa está situada en medio de la naturaleza pero a 300m del pueblo.
Es una típica masia catalana de tres plantas que se ha restaurado conservando la esencia de la época y el entorno.
La planta baja dispone de una amplia cocina, un acogedor comedor y una gran sala con chimenea para pasar agradables veladas al calor del hogar.
En la planta alta están situadas tres habitaciones dobles y un baño completo, destinado a acoger a nuestros huéspedes.
En la planta intermedia es donde se aloja Roser, la anfitriona.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:

La zona ofrece la posibilidad de realizar preciosas excursiones andando, en bicicleta, a caballo, en globo...
El municipio se encuentra situado a la cabecera de río Fluvià, cercado por las sierras del Corb, de Sant Miquel de Llancers y por el Puigsacalm (1515 m).
Fantástica gastronomía y embutidos.
Se encuentra cerca de preciosos pueblos medievales como Santa Pau, Besalú... De La Fageda d'en Jordà, de volcanes, vías de escalada...

Un accès direct à la mer juste sous l'appartement par la plage de rocher.
Deux plages de sable à proximité à pied (10mn de marche).
En voiture, accès aux immenses plages qui bordent la baie.
Le chemin de randonnée qui passe sous l'appartement rallie Roses jusqu'à Cadaques pour les plus expérimentés.

name: AV-1 Apartment in the center with pool.
description:
Comfortable and spacious apartment just 400 meters from the beach in Calella de Palafrugell.

The space
Comfortable and spacious apartment just 400 meters from the beach in Calella de Palafrugell.

One of the most popular apartments we have available, fully equipped and suitable for 6 occupants, with 3 bedrooms of which two twins and one double, kitchen, 2 bathrooms and a pleasant dining room with exit to a large terrace with nice views and afternoon sun.

Lovely community with large gardens, swimming pool and tennis court.

Parking space available in communal garage.

For any doubt regarding this property, do not hesitate to contact us.

Water restrictions: We inform you that according to Decree-Law 1/2023 of February 28, due to the extreme drought we are experiencing, it is forbidden to water the lawn of any private property. There are also restrictions on filling swimming pools and human consumption. Given this
neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.
host_about: We are the agency Immo Cala Marquesa, local agent in Calella de Palafrugell and Begur, and your contact for all questions or problems you might have during your stay in Calella.

Calonge mooie bosrijke omgeving

The space
Algemene informatie:
Deze ruime Spaans ingerichte villa op groot perceel van 3000m2 heeft een zwembad en eigen tennisbaan. De villa is gelegen nog geen 2 kilometer van het strand en loopafstand (450m) van de supermarkt en 800m van de dorpskern.
In de tuin is tevens een vaste barbecue aanwezig met stenen zitje.
Mede door de ruime opzet en de riante tuin is dit huis uitermate geschikt voor meerdere gezinnen.

In de woonkamer staan diversen luie stoelen, sofa’s, satelliet televisie, dvd, cd installatie. Aan de woonkamer grenst een gr
neighborhood_overview:
Calonge is gelegen aan de Costa Brava , in de provincie Girona en op een paar kilometer van Palamos en Palafrugell. De plaatsen Calonge en Sant Antoni de Calonge zijn nog weinig bekend bij de buitenlandse toeristen.

Sant Antoni de Calonge ligt op ongeveer 1u50 van de Franse grens . Het ligt ten zuiden van Cap de Begur ( 20 km ) ten noorden van Sant Feliu de Guixols (16 km ) en 45 km van Girona. Het is verdeeld in twee delen , Sant Antoni de Calonge is de kust met grote zandstranden en Calonge is het historische centrum met een middeleeuws kasteel .

In de afgelopen jaren verdiende Sant Antoni de Calonge het etiket van " destinal of Family toerisme" door zijn vele activiteiten tijdens de zomermaanden. De omgeving van Sant Antoni de Calonge is uitzonderlijk met grote zandstranden , kleine baaien , en veel fietsroutes in de vlakte van Calonge midden tussen de wijngaarden. Richting Palamos , is er het strand van Es Monestri wat doorloopt in het strand van Sant Antoni e
host_about:
Wij zijn Carla&Onno van Spainholidays4u. Wij verhuren sinds 2005 vakantiehuizen in de omgeving van de Costa Brava. Ons kantoor is gevestigd in Calonge. 
Tijdens uw vakantie zijn wij uw aanspreekpunt en kunnen je alles vertellen over de mooie omgeving, heerlijke restaurantjes en de mooiste stranden!

name: Mas La Coma 3
description:
Casa de campo del S.XVI.
Masia de tres plantas, se alquilan las tres habitaciones de la planta superior con un baño a compartir.
Los anfitriones viven el la casa.
Amplia sala con chimenea.
Gran exterior con barbacoa y muebles de jardín y agradable terraza con bonitas vistas.

The space
La casa está situada en medio de la naturaleza pero a 300m del pueblo.
Es una típica masia catalana de tres plantas que se ha restaurado conservando la esencia de la época y el entorno.
La planta baja dispone de una amplia cocina, un acogedor comedor y una gran sala con chimenea para pasar agradables veladas al calor del hogar.
En la planta alta están situadas tres habitaciones dobles y un baño completo, destinado a acoger a nuestros huéspedes.
En la planta intermedia es donde se aloja Roser y su familia, la anfitriona.

Guest access
El exterior de la Casa es su gran tesoro, una soleada pradera, y un precioso bosque de
neighborhood_overview:
La casa está situada en medio de la naturaleza, junto al Parque Natural de Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa.
La zona ofrece la posibilidad de realizar preciosas excursiones andando, en bicicleta, a caballo, en globo...
El municipio se encuentra situado a la cabecera de río Fluvià, cercado por las sierras del Corb, de Sant Miquel de Llancers y por el Puigsacalm (1515 m).
Fantástica gastronomía y embutidos.
Se encuentra cerca de preciosos pueblos medievales como Santa Pau, Besalú... De La Fageda d'en Jordà, de volcanes, vías de escalada...

name: Farmhouse in the countryside.
description:
A self contained apartment within a unique catalan farmhouse at the foot of the San Roc mountain nestles in a stunning valley in St.Climent D’ Amer.

It s separated from the bustle and grime of civilization, an ideal location to disconnect and enjoy.

Next door there is another house, which can be seen in the main photo, this is also a space for guests, in case we also have tenants, they will only share the pool area, each accommodation has its privacy and its garden area .

The space
This delightful and homely apartment is in a truly privileged environment at the heart of the mountain. Ideal for all types of rural activities such as walking, mountain biking, rock climbing and many more to be enjoyed with family and friends.

There is a barbecue, wood burner, private garden and access to the pool.

Local activities and information is also provided.

Guest access
The apartment is part of a stunning farmh
neighborhood_overview:
You are in the heart of the Catalan country side a stones throw from an unparalleled amount of hiking , including the routes of ‘Las tres Hermites’, ‘Santa Brigida’, ‘Santa Lena and San Roc’. You can also enjoy the ‘via verde’ and the ‘Carrilette’ famous for its extensive bike routes.

ParaGliding activities can also be booked from Santa Brigida.

Nearby there is also the stunning waterfalls and natural pools of ‘Els Gorgs del moli dels Murris’ for an invigorating dip.

name: Apartment with a breathtaking view
description:
Located up the hill, close to Cap Roig, the apartment offers a spectacular view of the Mediterrean sea. The building is reached via stairs from above (best for parking) while stairs lead down to the closest beach cove Cala el Golfet (10 minutes walk).

It offers the rustic charme of Spanish inventory for relaxed living together with the necessities of modern life like free Wifi, intl. TV, washing machine, dishwasher etc.

The space
Apartment in Cap Roig area, a very special place in Costa Brava for the beauty in the sea shore and beaches. You are in Calella de Palafrugell, an enchanted and beautiful maritim town. If you still have not visited Calella, what are you waiting for?

The apartment has a capacity of 4 people, and it has two bedrooms and two complete bathrooms. There is a room with a master bed and another one with two individual beds. Both bedrooms have outdoor light and a wardrobe. About the bathrooms, one has a shower and the other
neighborhood_overview:
Calella de Palafrugell has a lot of restaurants, beach, supermarkets, and other services. You can snorkel in the beach and also in Cala Golfet, which is very beautiful. Also you can hike in Camí de Ronda through Palamós.

Outside Calella town you can visit Sant Sebastià Lighthouse, Begur, Peratallada, Pals beach and a lot of other places in Costa Brava and Empordà. We are sure you are goign to repeat the visit in our place.
host_about:
I am a Palamós citizen hosting since 2016. 

I loce the art of welcoming people in our little town and showing all sort of cozy places in our Empordà.

name: Apartment: L´Estudi, Begur, Costa Brava
description:
Studio situé au premier étage sur le centre de yoga dans la Urb. 'Residencial Begur' à 20 m Piscine municipale et tennis (à la fois en sus). Restaurant 100 m. Supermarché 200m. Begur centre 400 m. P

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the Gavarres massif and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Studio located on the first floor on yoga center in the Urb. 'Residencial Begur' 20 m from the Municipal swimming pool and tennis (both extras). Restaurant 100 m. Supermarket 200m. Center Begur 400 m. Beaches between 3-6 km. very quiet place.
Nice studio for 2 people consisting of: Living room / bedroom with TV.
neighborhood_overview: the Residencial Begur urbanization begins near the village extending between large tracts of pine forests. It is a very quiet both in winter and in summer while in summer you can enjoy the coolness produced by the trees that surround it. In the same area there are public swimming pool and tennis (extra) can also enjoy a tasty meal at the restaurant located at the entrance " La Galena".

L'Auca is a delightful restored house located in the charming town of Garriguella, a small village blessed with great wines, olive oil and the impressive landscape of the Serra de L’Albera a natural reserve in the Northeast of Spain in Costa Brava.

The space
The house is suitable for up to 8 people. It is a large house in a beautiful countryside; the house is equipped with a large swimming pool (50 sqm.) and a beautiful garden. Also there is a wide space for enjoying dinning al fresco.
Other features of this property include large open kitchen, large dining room space for celebrations and a comfortable living room with a nice fireplace.
One baby cot available under request.

Patio con mesa de comedor e instalaciones de barbacoa
La casa está en perfectas condiciones y reformada con buen gusto
Rutas de senderismo y ciclismo en las inmediaciones
Ubicación céntrica entre Besalú, Banyoles y Figueras
Limpieza profesional, ropa de cama y toallas incluidas

The space
— PLANTA BAJA —


COCINA
Entras en la casa a través de la cocina en la parte delantera de la casa. La cocina está bien equipada y equipada con todas las comodidades. En la cocina hay una gran mesa de comedor y chimenea. La chimenea es puramente por el ambiente. La casa está climatizada con un sistema de calefacción central.

ESCALERA
Desde la cocina se entra por la escalera. Aquí también encontrarás u
neighborhood_overview:
Can Cleda se encuentra en el antiguo centro del pueblo de Esponellà, un encantador pueblo en la campiña mediterránea. El entorno es perfecto para desconectarse y disfrutar de la naturaleza y la vida del pueblo. La casa se encuentra entre el pueblo histórico de Besalú, Banyoles y Figueras.

El pueblo: Esponellà
Esponellà es un pequeño y tranquilo pueblo a orillas del río Fuvià.

A poca distancia a pie de la casa:
- Juegos - A poca distancia a pie de la casa hay una cancha de fútbol/baloncesto, mesa de ping pong y parque infantil.
- Panadería y bar: por la mañana se puede obtener pan fresco de la panadería de Esponellà, que está a pocos minutos a pie. También es un lugar de descanso muy apreciado para los ciclistas que van de Banyoles a «El Mont».
- Restaurante - Para la comida típica, dirígete a Can Roca. Este restaurante es ahora un nombre muy conocido en la zona. Después de una buena comida, puedes volver a casa caminando en 3 minutos.
-
host_about:
La casa es de toda la família, pero soy yo, Mariona, quien lleva todo la gestión de la casa. Si yo no puedo recibirlos, mis padres o una de mis hermanas vendrán a recibirles y darle toda la información que necesiten.
Yo suelo usar Airbnb para mis viajes, y pongo toda mi confianza en los otros usarios de Airbnb para dejar nuestra casa.
La casa es un sitio ideal, acogedor y muy confortable. Es perfecto para pasear alrededor o hacer deporte. Cuándo vengáis os recomendaremos sitios a visitar o recorrer.

name: Elegant apartment in the old Girona
description:
Luxurious apartment in full historical center of the city of Girona.
Apartment in House Estor, neoclassic mansion(small palace) of s. The XIXth placed in the heart of the Jewish neighborhood, to three minutes afoot(by foot) of the points of interest

The space
Situated in the oldest part of Girona it is moments away from the Cathedral, the city walls and all the points of interest in the town. The apartment is in a 19th century neoclassic mansion called Estor House. Like many of the buildings of this time it features a large internal court yard, high ceilings and columns.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment.

Other things to note
Museums, supermarkets, specialty shops and many restaurants are very close by. Bike rentals can be organized.

License number
HUTG-021582
neighborhood_overview:
The location in the centre of old Girona is ideal for tourists. All the significant historic and cultural sites are within a few moments walk. It allows visitors to live like locals in the most historic and prestigious part of the city.

There are also many enjoyable day trips from Girona. It is a short drive to the beaches, coastal villages and stunning views of the Costa Brava. Visitors can also travel inland to the medieval villages of Besalú, Monells or Bisbal and its ceramics. There are the extinct volcanos of Olot to visit as well. Figueras, the birth place of Salvador Dalí and home of the Dalí museum is close by. The train station is a 15 minute walk away and Barcelona is 30 minutes by high speed train.
host_about: In love with Girona, I like that those who visit us, wish to come back.

neighborhood_overview: Découvrez Calonge et ses environs, entre l'histoire et la nature charme incontestable de la Costa Brava.De nombreuses activités vous permettront de passer de belles vacances. Promenades de calanques en calanques sur un itinéraire existant de plus de 5 siècles.Circuit VTT avec 4 niveaux.Suivre un magnifique bord de cote, et trouver des jardins botaniques un plaisir des yeux.A ne pas manquer les routes culturelles; un itinéraire de villages médiévaux à découvrir. N'oubliez pas de réserver une journée pour vous amuser au Parc Aventura ( spectacles et attractions )Visitez des villes comme Barcelone, Palamos, Girona, Pltatja d'Aro,St Féliu de Guixols. De nombreux marchés à proximité, excellents produits locaux ( jeudi à Calonge ). Parc d'attraction pour les enfants. Aquadriver jeux d'eau et mini golf. Des flyers seront à votre disposition pour choisir vos activités.N’hésitez pas à contacter la propriétaire pour tout autre information.

name: Authentic fisherman's house. Begur
description:
Typical fisherman's house, as it was 100 years ago, located in the heart of one of the most emblematic villages of the Costa Brava.

Small village house, stone, rustic, cozy style and equipped with the maximum comfort.

The space
It is ideal for couples who want to spend a few romantic days in the Empordà, without having to worry about anything, feeling at home.

Town house of 50m2 on two floors:

- Entering the house awaits a space of one room. A bright and open space are integrated an open kitchen equipped with all basic needs, a space for dining area and living room.

- On the first floor there is a bathroom, small but complete, and the bedroom, with wardrobe and loft.

Excellent access to the shops in the village on foot.
The house is located in the old town of Begur. Just steps from the main shops in the village, both local food as clothing and accessories stores, cafes, bars and restaurants. All just min
neighborhood_overview:
A quiet and safe street, just a few minutes from the town center but away from the noise of the shops, bars and restaurants.

Very close to the village square, a public parking and bus stops which connect with cities such as Barcelona, Girona or Figueres and to the main beaches: Sa Tuna, Sa Riera, Aiguablava, among others.
host_about:
Hi!
I live in Begur, one of the most beautiful villages in the Costa Brava.
I love the beach, the forest, the nature, the sea, all of our landscape.
Since I live in the Costa Brava all year, I can tell you where are the best places to go, what to discover, where to eat... So you don't feel as a tourist but a visitor and you get to know how we live.

I love to travel, and when I do, I like to get to know the people from the place I'm going!
I travel for fun or for work... Either way, always like to really meet people that live there 

Hope to see you soon!
